anya-e0812n:56_1: Santo viññūhi pasatthattā sobhanā purātanā pubbakālasambhūtā rāmasammādyalaṅkārā rāmasammādīhi ācariyehi viracitattā,

anya-e0812n:56_4: alaṅkārattapaṭipādanato alaṅkāranāmikā ganthavisesā vā santi kiñcāpi vijjanti,

anya-e0812n:56_6: te rāmasammādike alaṅkāre na vaḷañjenti pasādhanavasena,

anya-e0812n:95_6: nānāsantānavuttinīpi ekattanayena ekasmiṃ santāne na vāsitā naparibhāvitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kā sā?
anya-e0812n:95_9: Anekasmiṃ tipiṭakatakkabyākaraṇālaṅkārasatthādike satthantare ucitā savanadhāraṇādivasena paricitā sāyaṃ paññā yesaṃ na sañcitāti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n:95_11: Sammohabbhāhatāti yathāvuttāyātisayavatiyā paññāyābhāvato balappattena mohena abbhāhatā visesena pahatā,

anya-e0812n:100_5: Ihāti imasmiṃ loke yesaṃ janānaṃ gurūnaṃ kātabbā pādasussūsā pādaparicariyā natthi,
anya-e0812n:100_6: tehi janehi yathāvuttanayena paññāveyattiyarasānabhiññehi kiṃ payojanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:100_10: Ye pubbe katapuññatādisampattisampannā tappādarajehi tesaṃ gurūnaṃ pādadhūlīhi okiṇṇā onaddhā gavacchitā,
anya-e0812n:100_11: teva sādhū yathāvuttanayena paññāveyattiyena abhiññātā sajjanā eva vivekino heyyopādeyyaguṇadosavibhāganiyamanapaññāsampattisamaṅgino honti,
anya-e0812n:100_13: Sā cāyaṃ gurupādasussūsā visiṭṭhādarena karaṇīyāti vaṅkavuttiyā tadabhyāse sādhujane niyojeti.

anya-e0812n:101_3: dassento ca taṃdvāreneva attano anaññasādhāraṇagurugāravataṃ sādhujanehi paramādarena sampādetabbamiti
anya-e0812n:101_6: Anekasatthānaṃ tipiṭakatakkabyākaraṇādīnaṃ anekesaṃ ganthānaṃ antare tatvatthasaṅkhātaabbhantare ucitā

anya-e0812n:101_10: Ete īdisapaññāpāṭavarahitā ime sammohabbhāhatā paññāpāṭavābhāvato balappattena mohena visesena pahatā eva kiñcipi heyyopādeyyaṃ nāvabujjhanti.

anya-e0812n:147_11: Sute dassite tannissayaṃ sutamayañāṇampi dassitameva siyāti.

anya-e0812n:152_1: Iminā pana aniyamavacanena attano tattha ādarābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
anya-e0812n:152_3: Etaṃ tehi racitaṃ bandhajātaṃ paraṃ accantameva vimhayakaraṃ na hoti,

anya-e0812n:152_6: paññavanto yena bandhavisesena viññū guṇadosaviduno satthaññuno paṇḍitajane tosenti pīṇenti.

anya-e0812n:157_3: tādisopāyantararahitānampi etādiso bandho siyā”ti vimhayena saha vattamānopi.
anya-e0812n:157_4: Sova bandho tameva bandhanaṃ tādisopāyasampattivirahenopeyyasampattiyā sabbhāvato, nāññoti.
anya-e0812n:158_1: Idāni kabbanāṭakesu aparicitānamamhākaṃ gantharacanāsabhāvāvabodhova kutoti osakkante “kabbanāṭakā”digāthādvayena samussāheti.

anya-e0812n:158_11: kabbanāṭakesu nikkhittaṃ nettacittaṃ yehīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:158_12: Ye janā tattha tesu kabbanāṭakesu avihitādarāpi savanadhāraṇādivasena akatasambhamā eva viññū yena gantharacanāvisesena tosenti pīṇenti,
anya-e0812n:158_14: Sova bandho savimhayo aññesaṃ uppajjamānavimhayena sahito.
anya-e0812n:158_18: Bāhirasatthābhiyogābhāvepi pubbavāsanābhāvepi iha nirantarābhiyogaṃ karonto tādisasāmatthiyaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.

anya-e0812n:176_0: Kabbaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi, jāyate sādhvalaṅkatī”ti kābyādāsa 1.14 – 19 gāthā.

anya-e0812n:182_1: āsīsāpi “mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ mana” miccādiiṭṭhāsīsanaṃ vā bhavati.
anya-e0812n:183_0: Itihāsakathubbhūtaṃ purāvuttakathāsannissayaṃ vā santasannissayampi sobhanānampi rājacariyādinissayaṃ
anya-e0812n:183_5: sabbadukkhā nivattihetu mokkho cāti catuvaggaphalādhīnaṃ caturodāttanāyakaṃ ussāhasattimantasattipabhūsattiyogato
anya-e0812n:183_6: caturo dakkho cāgātisayādiyogena udātto uḷāro sapakkho,
anya-e0812n:183_13: indusavitūdayo candasūriyānaṃ udayo cāti imesaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ yattha, taṃ.
anya-e0812n:183_16: taṃ vippalambhavivāhehi dārāviyogadārapariggahehi ca kumārodayavaḍḍhihi kumāruppattikumāravaḍḍhīhi ca
anya-e0812n:183_21: sapakkhanāyakassa abhivaḍḍhisaṅkhāto abhyūdayo cāti imehi alaṅkataṃ sajjitaṃ asaṃkhitta…pe…
anya-e0812n:183_22: ntaraṃ asaṃkhittā vitthārā rasā siṅgārādayo aṭṭha bhāvā ratiussāhādayo cāti imehi nirantaraṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:183_23: piyavuttasusandhibhi sutisubhagehi indavajirādīhi vuttehi pubbāparasambandhaparicchedatāya sobhanā sandhi
anya-e0812n:183_25: tehi sabbattha sabbasmiṃ paricchede bhinnasaggantehi bhinnasaggā pariyosānā yesaṃ,
anya-e0812n:183_26: tehi nātivitthiṇṇasaggehi nātivitthārasaggasaṅkhātehi paricchedehi upetaṃ yuttaṃ sādhvalaṅkati sobhanālaṅkāravantaṃ
anya-e0812n:183_27: kabbaṃ lokarañjakaṃ taṃ samānaṃ kappantaraṭṭhāyi kappanirantaraṭṭhāyi kappantare ṭhāyi vā jāyate.
anya-e0812n:183_28: Ettha madhupānādirahitapuravaṇṇanādayopi taññūnaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti ce,
anya-e0812n:186_1: atra imesu kabbaṅgesu majjhe kehici aṅgehi kehici avayavehi nyūnamapi ūnamapi,
anya-e0812n:186_4: taṃ pana adussanaṃ bandhaṅgasampadā racitapuravaṇṇanādiaṅgasampadā taññū kabbaññū jane kāmaṃ icchānurūpaṃ ce ārādhayanti,
anya-e0812n:186_6: Punapi nāyakavaṇṇanāsu sapakkhanāyakaṃ vaṇṇetvā tena nirākaraṇabhāvampi. No ce,
anya-e0812n:186_7: paccatthikaṃ vaṇṇetvā attano nāyakena tassābhibhavanampi vaṇṇetuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0812n:192_0: Bandho ca nāma saddatthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
anya-e0812n:194_1: Evametehi sotujanasamussāhanaṃ dassetvā idāni kattumicchitabandhoti vuttaṃ bandhassa lakkhaṇaṃ kattumārabhate “bandho cā”tiādi.
anya-e0812n:194_6: Vuttalakkhaṇā yehi te pubbācariyehi sahitā vuccanti.
anya-e0812n:194_8: Iti dosavajjite sahite saddatthe pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā bandho nāma sabhāvavuttivaṅkavuttialaṅkāravuttivasena
anya-e0812n:194_9: tividhopīti appasiddhaṃ bandhasarīraṃ vidhīyate yathā “yo kuṇḍalī,
anya-e0812n:195_0: Tattha jātiguṇakriyādabbalakkhaṇo saddānamattho mukhyo catubbidho hoti.
anya-e0812n:195_1: Mukhyassatthassa catubbidhattā tividhesu saddesu tabbācako catubbidho hoti jātisaddo guṇasaddo kriyāsaddo dabbasaddoti.
anya-e0812n:195_2: Tividho hi saddo vācako lakkhaṇiko byañjakoti byāpārabhedena.
anya-e0812n:195_4: So hi tividho mukhyo lakkhaṇo byañjanasabhāvo ceti.
anya-e0812n:195_7: Taṃbyāpāravā abyavahitajātyādisakehi tamatthaṃ mukhyabhāvena yo vadati goādiko,
anya-e0812n:196_0: “Visesyaṃnābhidhā gacche, khīṇasatti visesane”ti kābyappakāse dutiyaullāse āgatanyāyo’yaṃ.
anya-e0812n:197_2: Tattha bandhanamocanāni na sambhavantīti attano nissayabhūtā gobyatti ākaḍḍhīyate,
anya-e0812n:197_3: tathā mañcānamugghosanaṃ na sambhavatīti attano ugghosanakriyāsiddhyatthaṃ mañcasamaṅgino purisā ākaḍḍhīyanti.
anya-e0812n:197_4: Tathā gaṅgāsaddavāccassa jalappavāhassa ghosappatyākaratā na sambhavatīti gaṅgāsaddo attanobhidheyyassodakappavāhassa nikaṭaṃ taṭaṃ lakkheti.
anya-e0812n:198_1: Byañjanasabhāvo pana parapariyāyo saddassa tatiyo byāpāro.
anya-e0812n:198_3: Iccetaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saddānaṃ vasena atthopi tividho hoti vācco lakkhaṇiyo byaṅgyoti.
anya-e0812n:198_8: byaṅgyena vinā bandho nijjīvo siyāti pubbācariyānaṃ pavatti,
anya-e0812n:199_4: tāva tappatī attano manosampīṇanaāsīsanā na saṃgacchatīti vākyasāmatthiyāyeva vāṇiyaṃ sāyamocityabhedena devatāsaddassa āropitottho lakkhaṇiyo.
anya-e0812n:199_7: Manosampīṇanassa tu aññathā anupapattiyā passaddhyādikkamena yathābhūtāvabodhasambhavā anāyāsena vicittānekasaddatthapaṭibhānena
anya-e0812n:199_10: Tabbācakā saddā vācakalakkhaṇikabyañjakā hontīti evaṃ sabbattha saddatthavicāro gantabbo.
anya-e0812n:200_1: Ayaṃ yathāvutto bandho bandhasarīraṃ tidhā bhave tippakārena siyā,
anya-e0812n:200_3: Pajjagajjavimissānaṃ bhedena pajjasabhāvādīnaṃ visesena tidhā bhaveti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n:200_4: Tattha pajjaṃ nāma amhehiyeva viracitavuttodayākhye chandasi nirūpitā vuttajātippabhedā catuppadikatthā nirūpito muttakādipi vuttajātippakāroyeva.
anya-e0812n:200_6: Tesu ekagāthā niṭṭhitatthā sappadhānā gāthantarānirapekkhā muttakaṃ,
anya-e0812n:200_7: ekakriyādānena aññamaññasāpekkhā niṭṭhitatthā paccekaṃ aniṭṭhitatthā gāthā kulakaṃ,
anya-e0812n:200_8: nānābhittiyo bhinnakiriyo sappadhānā gāthā koso viya ṭhapitā koso,
anya-e0812n:200_9: ekabhittipadosādikaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ samudāyena pavattā bhinnakriyā gāthā saṅghāto,
anya-e0812n:200_12: Tassa tu dve pakārā ākhyāyikā, kathāti.
anya-e0812n:201_4: so devadatto”ti pasiddhakuṇḍalittānuvādena appasiddhassa devadattattavidhānaṃ viya dassento “bandho”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n:201_5: Tattha bandho nāma ca bandhanaṃ pana.
anya-e0812n:201_10: Evaṃpakārehi tu īdisasaddatthānaṃ viññūnaṃ tuṭṭhijanakaaññamaññānurūpaguṇasahitānaṃ bhāvoti vacanatthena “sāhicca”miti vadanti.
anya-e0812n:201_12: Saddo pana atthappatītiyaṃ attano mukhyabyāpāraṃ lakkhaṇabyāpāraṃ byañjanasabhāvabyāpārañceti tividhaṃ byāpārabhedena.
anya-e0812n:201_13: Kamato vācako lakkhaṇiko byañjanako ceti tividho.
anya-e0812n:201_14: Tathā atthopi vācco lakkhaṇiyo byaṅgyo cebhi tividho.
anya-e0812n:201_15: Atra tu vācako saddo attanā dīpetabbamukhyatthassa jātiguṇakriyādabbabhedena catubbidhattā sayampi jātiguṇakriyādabbasaddavasena catubbidho.
anya-e0812n:201_18: Tathā hi “go nīlaṃ pācako visāṇi”ccādo goādisaddānaṃ mukhyabyāpāro gopiṇḍanīlapaṭapācakakattusiṅgīti
anya-e0812n:202_0: “Visesyaṃ nābhidhā gacche, khīṇasatti visesane”ti kābyappakāse dutiyaullāse āgatanyāyo’yaṃ.
anya-e0812n:203_1: visesane visesanabhūtajātyādimhi khīṇasatti khīṇabyāpāravatī abhidhā mukhyabyāpārova visesyaṃ dabbaṃ na gacche na pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0812n:204_0: Jātyādīnaṃ nissayagopiṇḍādikaṃ abhidhā na vadati ce,
anya-e0812n:204_4: siṅgī dhāvati”ccādīsu jātyādivisiṭṭhagopiṇḍādīnaṃ goādisaddassa kathaṃ vācakattaṃ yujjatīti?
anya-e0812n:204_5: Dabbādhīnajātiguṇādīsu vuttesu tabbisiṭṭhassa dabbassa pariyāyato vācakattā.
anya-e0812n:204_14: gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso”tyādīsu jātiguṇakriyāsiṅgadabbamañcagaṅgādīnaṃ gamanādīhi yogāsambhavato jātiguṇādayo
anya-e0812n:205_3: ettha āyuvaḍḍhanakāraṇabhūte ghate kāriyabhūtaāyuno vohāro āropito hoti.
anya-e0812n:205_22: tassa tatiyabyāpārassa visayo tādisavākyameva vāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n:220_0: Byañjako tu anaññattā, visuṃ tehi na vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n:221_8: tato idha abhimatatthabādhakākusalanivāraṇañca kusalānamanubalappadānañca tato kāyacittapīḷāvigamo ca
anya-e0812n:221_9: tato sukhappaṭilābho ca tato cittasamādhānañca tatoyeva anekavidhatthāvabodho ca tato abhimataganthaparisamatti
anya-e0812n:222_1: Ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇo bandho pajjagajjavimissānaṃ bhedena gāthācuṇṇiyatadubhayamissānaṃ vasena tidhā bhave.
anya-e0812n:222_7: Iha pajjaṃ nāma muttakakulakakosakasaṅghātavasena catuppabhedaṃ chandasi niddiṭṭhavuttavisesaviracitaṃ catuppadikagāthābandhaṃ.
anya-e0812n:222_8: Tattha muttakaṃ nāma niṭṭhitatthā sappadhānā ekā gāthā,
anya-e0812n:222_9: kulakaṃ nāma paccekamaniṭṭhitatthā aññamaññasāpekkhā ekakriyādvārikā nānāgāthā,
anya-e0812n:222_10: kosako nāma nānāvidhavaṇṇanābhūmikā bhinnakriyādvārappavattā sappadhānā gāthārāsi,
anya-e0812n:222_11: saṅghāto nāma sañcyākālādiekavaṇṇanābhūminissitā bhinnakriyāsamudāyena pavattā gāthā.
anya-e0812n:222_12: Gajjaṃ nāma aniyatapado ākhyāyikākathāvasena dvippabhedo syādyantatyādyanto vacanappabandho.
anya-e0812n:222_13: Misso pana imehi dvīhi saṃmisso nāṭakapakaraṇādi ca jātakamālādicampū ca.
anya-e0812n:224_0: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
anya-e0812n:226_1: Evaṃ tippakāraṃ bandhasarīraṃ vatvā idāni aññathāpi dassetumāha “nibandhocā’nibandho ca,
anya-e0812n:226_3: Puna bhiyyo yathāvutto pajjamayabandho dvidhā dvippakārena niruppate nicchīyate. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n:226_4: Nibandho ca tadekadesabhūtehi muttakādīhi catūhi saggabandhādivasena bandho ca anibandho ca kevalaṃ muttakavasenāti evaṃ dvidhā niruppate iti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n:226_5: Nanu tassetassa yathāvuttavātimayassa sakkaṭaṃ pākataṃ apabbhaṃso pesācikaṃ missañceti pañcavidhattaṃ vatvā “sakkaṭaṃ nāma devatābhāsā.
anya-e0812n:226_6: Pākataṃ catubbidhaṃ sakkaṭehi vaṇṇaññattamattena uppannattā mahindasindhavādi tabbhavaṃ,
anya-e0812n:226_14: Sabbesaṃ vasena missa”nti sakkaṭādīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:226_18: viniyogabhedena vuttaṃ duvidhattañca idha kasmā na vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n:227_0: Evamalaṅkārādhiṭṭhānabhāvena paṭhamaṃ bandhasarīraṃ dassetvā idāni hārakeyūrādinā purisasarīramiva bandhasarīraṃ
anya-e0812n:227_1: saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi vindanīyataraṃ hotīti dassetumāha “taṃ tu” iccādi.
anya-e0812n:227_3: Taṃ bandhasarīraṃ tu alaṅkārā alaṅkariyati taṃ bandhasarīrametehīti pasādādayo saddālaṅkārā,
anya-e0812n:227_4: sabhāvavutyādayo atthālaṅkārā ca vindanīyatarattanaṃ atisayena vindanīyabhāvaṃ assādanīyabhāvaṃ pāpenti nayanti.
anya-e0812n:227_5: Sabbathā niddosabhūtānaṃ saddatthānaṃ aññamaññānurūpato sahitabhāvena paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ
anya-e0812n:227_6: tādisapurisasarīramiva vindanīyampi samānaṃ alaṅkārehi pasādhite sati accantameva vindanīyaṃ siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:228_1: Punapi tasseva bandhassa bhedaṃ kathetuṃ “nibandho cā”dimāha.
anya-e0812n:228_2: Puna nibandho ca muttakādīhi catūhi avinābhāvato mahākabbādisabhāvena nirantaraṃ katvā bandho ca anibandho
anya-e0812n:228_3: ca kevalaṃ mahākabbādisabhāvena muttakattā anirantaraṃ katvā bandho cāti sova bandho dvidhā niruppate
anya-e0812n:228_5: Punapi so bandho sakkaṭapākataapabbhaṃ sapesācikamissabhāsābhedena pañcavidho.
anya-e0812n:228_7: tadaññaṃ kabbaṃ savanīyamiti vaḷañjanabhedato duvidho ca hoti.
anya-e0812n:228_8: So sabbopi payojanābhāvato iha na gahito.
anya-e0812n:228_10: Tato kehici akkharehi bhinnaṃ pākataṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:228_12: Tattha sakkaṭato vaṇṇaññattamattena nibbattaṃ tabbhavaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n:228_21: Tehi sakkaṭādīhi sammissaṃ missaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:228_22: Idāni īdisappabhedavantabandhassa alaṅkārena sobhanattaṃ vattuṃ “taṃ tu”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n:228_23: Taṃ tu taṃ pana vuttappakāraṃ bandhasarīraṃ alaṅkārā pasādādisaddālaṅkārā,
anya-e0812n:232_3: agarahitaṃ mukhambhojaṃ vadanāravindañca tathā anavajjā padādidosānabhibhūtāya sundarabhāvena agarahitā
anya-e0812n:232_4: bhāratī ca vāṇī upacārato tappaṭipādanīyo attho cāti ete alaṅkatāva mukhaṃ tilakatāḍaṅkādinālaṅkārena,
anya-e0812n:232_6: niralaṅkatā tathā apasādhitā asajjitā sobhante kiṃ nu,
anya-e0812n:233_2: Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādiavayavasampattiyā ca piḷakatilakakāḷakādidosarahitattā ca aninditaṃ mukhambhojañca anavajjā
anya-e0812n:233_3: padadosavākyadosaatthadosehi amissattā agarahitā bhāratī vāṇī ca abhedopacārena tappaṭipādanīyattho cāti
anya-e0812n:233_4: ime alaṅkatāva kuṇḍalatilakādiābharaṇehi ca saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārehi ca sajjitā eva,
anya-e0812n:233_5: niralaṅkatā tehi avibhūsitā sobhante kiṃ nu,
anya-e0812n:236_0: Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
anya-e0812n:237_1: Alaṅkaraṇañca tesaṃ vinā gurūpadesena karonto vinā pahāsaṃ nāparaṃ visesamadhigacchatīti dassetuṃ silesālaṅkāramāha “vinā”tiādi.
anya-e0812n:237_3: alaṅkārakāraṇopāyopadesakānaṃ vā upadesaṃ “ettha evaṃ kate sobheyyā”ti upadisanaṃ vinā pariccajja mukhassa,
anya-e0812n:237_4: bandhassa ca alaṅkaraṇānabhiññatāya bālo aññāṇako yo koci puggalo taṃ mukhaṃ,
anya-e0812n:237_5: bandhaṃ vā alaṅkattuṃ anurūpavasena sajjetuṃ icchati adhippeti,
anya-e0812n:237_6: so tādiso aññāṇapuggalo viññūhi tabbidūhi paṇḍitajanehi hassabhāvaṃ avahāsaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena na sampāpuṇeyya.
anya-e0812n:238_1: Idāni padādidosarahitabandhasarīrassa alaṅkārehi bhūsanamapi gurūpadesasahitameva seṭṭhanti dassetuṃ “vinā gurūpadesa” miccādisilesālaṅkāramāha.
anya-e0812n:238_3: bandhālaṅkāre vā asamattho yo koci gurūpadesaṃ vinā sarīrālaṅkārakaraṇassa,
anya-e0812n:238_7: so viññūhi tadubhayaññūhi hassabhāvaṃ avahasitabbataṃ kathaṃ na sampāpuṇe,
anya-e0812n:238_9: tasmā gurūhi sādarato uggaṇhitvā kattabbanti bhāvo.
anya-e0812n:242_2: atthagammā ca alaṅkārāti gantho kathanti āha “ganthopī”tiādi.
anya-e0812n:242_4: paṭipādanīyatāya tabbacanīyānañca atthānaṃ alaṅkārappakāsako alaṅkārānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ vibhāvito ganthopi
anya-e0812n:242_5: kiriyākappasaṅkhātaṃ satthampi tabbacanīyattaṃ tena alaṅkārasaddena vāccataṃ yāti upagacchati.
anya-e0812n:242_8: tasmiṃ vā maṇḍanavisese pavattassa alaṅkāravohārassa upacaraṇaṃ soyamityabhedena parikappanaṃ upacāro. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n:242_9: Paṭipādanīyapaṭipādakānaṃ abhedavasena kāraṇe kārīyassa upacariyatoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:243_4: ganthoapi kiriyākappasaṅkhātaṃ satthampi tabbohārūpacārato tassa alaṅkāroti katavohārassa alaṅkārasaddassa
anya-e0812n:243_5: kāraṇe kārīyūpacārena tabbacanīyattaṃ tena alaṅkārasaddena vattabbataṃ yāti.
anya-e0812n:247_2: tappasaṅkañca taṃbandhasarīrañca heṭṭhā vuttampi ekato sambandhetvā dassetuṃ “dvippakārā”di āraddhaṃ.
anya-e0812n:247_4: tasmiṃ vā bandhālaṅkārādhikāre alaṅkārā yathāvuttā dvippakārā honti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n:247_7: saddālaṅkārā atthālaṅkārāti alaṅkārā dvippakārā hontīti attho.
anya-e0812n:247_8: Yesaṃ bhedena te dvippakārā, te saddā, atthā ca.
anya-e0812n:247_9: “Bandho” iti vuttaṃ nāmaṃ yassā āvaliyā sā bandhanāmā eva.
anya-e0812n:247_10: Taṃsajjitatadāvali tehi alaṅkārehi sajjitā pakāsitā taṃsajjitā,
anya-e0812n:247_16: taṃsajjitatadāvalikaṃ pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā appasiddhā saddatthā vidhīyante.
anya-e0812n:248_1: Idāni yathāvuttaalaṅkārānaṃ avuttabhedañca tadādhārādhikataṃ yathāvuttabandhasarīrañca ekato dassetuṃ “dvippakāre”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n:248_2: Tattha tasmiṃ kiriyākappasaṅkhāte alaṅkāraganthe, no ce,
anya-e0812n:248_3: alaṅkārādhikāre vā alaṅkārā vakkhamānālaṅkārā saddatthabhedato saddālaṅkāraatthālaṅkārabhedena dvippakārā honti,
anya-e0812n:248_7: tesaṃ saddatthānaṃ mahākabbādisamudāyarūpā paṭipāṭibandhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:251_0: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
anya-e0812n:252_1: Evaṃ guṇena alaṅkārena sajjitāpi sā saddatthāvali appakenapi dosena saṃyuttā satī asamphusitabbāva viññūhi siyāti dassetumāha “guṇa” iccādi.
anya-e0812n:252_3: atthālaṅkārena ca saṃyuttāpi visesena sajjitāpi saddatthāvali dosalavena dosalesenāpi aṅkitā abhilañchitā
anya-e0812n:252_4: satī viññūhi guṇadosavibhāgavidūhi paṇḍitapurisehi na pasaṃsiyā neva pasaṃsitabbā.
anya-e0812n:252_6: Yathā hi kaññā dasavassikā sannaddhayobbanābhimukhabhāvena jananayanamanovilubbhinīguṇena,
anya-e0812n:252_7: ābharaṇavisesena cālaṅkatā kenaci kuṭṭhadosalesena aṅkitā viññūnaṃ asamphusanīyā siyā,
anya-e0812n:252_10: atthalakkhaṇena ca dosena kuṭṭhakappena vajjanīyā eva viññūnaṃ,
anya-e0812n:253_1: Evaṃ saddatthānaṃ guṇībhūtehi alaṅkārehi sajjitā saddatthāvali kenaci padādidosena abhilakkhitā ce,
anya-e0812n:253_4: atthālaṅkārena ca visesena yuttāpi sā saddatthāvali dosalavaṅkitā padadosādinā aṇumattenapi dosena aṅkitā
anya-e0812n:253_5: yuttā sahitā tādisī guṇālaṅkārasaṃyuttāpi dosalavaṅkitā kaññā viya dasavassikā yobbanappattā vanitāva
anya-e0812n:253_6: viññūhi guṇadosaparikkhakehi na pasaṃsiyā na pasaṃsitabbā.
anya-e0812n:253_7: Yathā hi dasavassikā itthī piyasabhāvasaṇṭhitā manuññehi guṇehi,
anya-e0812n:253_8: sobhanānurūpagīveyyādiābharaṇavisesehi yuttāpi dissamānena kenaci setakuṭṭhalavena yuttā samānā guṇadosaparikkhakehi dassanīyā na hoti,
anya-e0812n:253_9: evaṃ vuttappakārāpi bandhapaddhati kuṭṭhatulyena kenaci padādidosena yuttā viññūhi assādanīyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:253_12: sā viya dissatīti tādīsīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:256_0: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ.
anya-e0812n:257_2: tena tasmā kāraṇā mahussāhena mahatā vāyāmena dosānaṃ padadosādīnamanatthanimittānaṃ nirāsova satthadiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0812n:257_5: Evaṃ dosanirāse ko guṇo upalabbhatīti ce.
anya-e0812n:257_6: Sabbathā sabbappakārena niddosā dosehi niggatā sāyaṃ saddatthāvali saguṇā saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi guṇehi sahitā na bhaveyya kiṃ,
anya-e0812n:258_2: tasmā mahussāhena adhikavāyāmena dosanirāsova padadosādīnaṃ nirākaraṇameva sādhiyo anekasatthavisayāya paññāya viññūhi sādhetabbo,
anya-e0812n:258_3: evaṃ sati sabbathā sabbākārena niddosā dosarahitā sā ayaṃ saddatthāvali saguṇā saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi guṇehi yuttā na bhaveyya kiṃ,
anya-e0812n:262_2: Sā saddatthāvali alaṅkārehi viyuttāpi satī niddosā sabbappakārena dosehi niggatā guṇehi saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0812n:262_3: saṃyuttā janānamānandasandohābhisandanekahetutāya mano harati attano santikamākaḍḍhatīti manoharā hotīti.
anya-e0812n:262_5: Yathā yena kenacipi dosena virahitā vadhū manāpacāritādīhi guṇavisesehi saṃyuttā satī kenaci ābharaṇena
anya-e0812n:262_6: amaṇḍitā apasādhitāpi kinnāma madhurā kavīnaṃ pasādhanaṃ kinnāma manoharā hoti,
anya-e0812n:263_2: Sā saddatthāvali alaṅkārehi viyuttā satīpi niddosā sabbappakārena dosarahitā guṇayuttā tatoyeva guṇībhūtā
anya-e0812n:263_3: saddālaṅkārena yuttā dosarahitā dubbaṇṇadussaṇṭhānādidosehi pariccattā guṇayuttā hadayaṅgamaguṇayuttā
anya-e0812n:263_4: vadhū viya aṅganā viya manoharā sādhujane ārādheti.
anya-e0812n:265_0: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
anya-e0812n:267_5: Tesaṃ padānaṃ vākyānaṃ attho tadattho, tasmiṃ.
anya-e0812n:268_1: Evaṃ alaṅkārayuttāpi appakena dosena yuttabandhassa anupādeyyattā,
anya-e0812n:268_2: alaṅkāraalaṅkaraṇe asatipi dosarahite viññūhi upādeyyattā ca mukhyassa dosaparihārassa avassaṃ kattabbattā
anya-e0812n:268_5: vākye “syādyantatyādyantānaṃ cayo vākyaṃ sakārakakiriyā”ti vuttalakkhaṇe vākye ca,
anya-e0812n:268_6: tadatthe ca tesaṃ padavākyānaṃ atthe ca vividhā anekappakārā ye dosā viññūhi dosabhāvena matā ñeyyā,
anya-e0812n:268_7: etesaṃ padādidosānaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ udāharaṇasahitaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ ahaṃ kathayāmi. Ettha ca–
anya-e0812n:270_0: Nipātakañca taññūhi, asso khalvābhidhāvatī”ti rūpabhiddhiṭīkāyaṃ nāmakaṇḍe.
anya-e0812n:286_2: Viruddhaṃ atthantaraṃ yassa taṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Padaṃ.
anya-e0812n:286_4: Adhiko attho visesyassa yena taṃ adhyatthaṃ.
anya-e0812n:286_5: Nīyati avutto hetu ettha ānīyatīti neyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:286_6: Dosā padānanti yehi dosehi padāni duṭṭhāni,
anya-e0812n:286_10: Bhaggā rīti kamo yasmiṃ taṃ bhaggarītikaṃ, vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:287_3: Kavīhi icchitatthato viruddho aññattho yassa padassāti taṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:287_10: Attharahitattā anatthakaṃ nāmāti ime aṭṭha padanissitattā padadosā nāma.
anya-e0812n:288_9: tena sahitaṃ sabandhapharusanti ime nava vākyānaṃ tathā dosā nāma.
anya-e0812n:289_5: Dūsitālaṅkārattā duṭṭhālaṅkati nāmātime cha vākyatthanissitattā vākyatthadosā nāma.
anya-e0812n:290_3: Evaṃ santepi samāsena padassa gahitattā napuṃsakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:290_7: Yathā hi malaggahito ādāso attano kiliṭṭhattā mukhādīnaṃ pakāsane avisado hoti,
anya-e0812n:291_19: Duṭṭhā dūsitā alaṅkati alaṅkāro yattha taṃ.
anya-e0812n:295_0: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n:296_4: Yassa padassa añño adhippetato aparo attho adhippete vattumicchite atthe virujjhatīti anuvaditvā tasmā taṃ “viruddhatthantara”nti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n:296_11: taṃ dadātīti visado megho vārivaho janaṃ lokaṃ sukhaye sukhayatīti kavicchitattho.
anya-e0812n:296_12: Visasaddo garaḷassa ca vācako siyāti garaḷado megho mārayati,
anya-e0812n:297_2: Yassa padassa aññattho kavicchitatthato añño attho adhippete icchitatthe hi yasmā virujjhati,
anya-e0812n:297_5: Tathā hesa appasiddhaṃ viruddhatthantaraṃ “yassa aññattho adhippete virujjhatī”ti pakāsetvā tasmiṃ pakāsitatthavisaye vattati.
anya-e0812n:297_6: “Taṃ hī”ti yojitattā “yassa aññattho adhippete virujjhatī”ti lakkhaṇaṃ pasiddhabhāvena anuvaditvā taṃ
anya-e0812n:297_18: Megho ambudharo visado visasaṅkhātaṃ jalaṃ dadanto janaṃ sukhaye sukhayatīti kavīhi adhippetattho.
anya-e0812n:297_20: “visaṃ dadātīti visado”ti ettha visassa udakavisānaṃ sādhāraṇattā visadāyako megho nāsetiyeva,
anya-e0812n:297_21: na sukhayatīti kavinā adhippetassa sukhakāraṇassa meghavisesanavisasaddassa viruddhaaññatthatāti visapadaṃ viruddhatthantaradosena duṭṭhanti.
anya-e0812n:303_1: Yena padena visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ aparaṃ padaṃ atthavasena adhikaṃ bhavatītyanuvaditvā etaṃ ajhatthaṃ bhaveti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n:303_4: Obhāsitā dīpitā asesā nikhilā disāyena soyaṃ khajjoto virājate dippati.
anya-e0812n:304_1: Yena visesanapadena visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ padaṃ atthavasena adhikaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:304_2: etaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇopetaṃ padaṃ ajhatthaṃ bhave ajhatthaṃ nāma padadoso bhave.
anya-e0812n:304_4: Obhāsitāsesadiso jotitasabbadiso ayaṃ khajjoto ayaṃ jotiriṅgaṇo virājate dippati.
anya-e0812n:304_5: Ettha visesyassa khajjotassa sakaladisobhāsanassa ajhatthattā atyuttattā (ka.) “obhāsitāsesadiso”ti visesanapadaṃ ajhatthapadadoso nāma.
anya-e0812n:310_8: tāya piyā vallabhāya soyaṃ sāmī āliṅgyate silissate.
anya-e0812n:311_1: Yassa padassa atthāvagamo atthāvabodho pakatyādivibhāgato “ayaṃ pakati,
anya-e0812n:311_7: Tāya piyā vanitāya so ayaṃ vallabho āliṅgyate silissate.
anya-e0812n:311_12: Tāya piyā ettha piyāsaṅkhātāya vallabhāya kathane pīsaddassa avisadattā “piyā”ti padaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0812n:315_6: Kiliṭṭhāni appatītadosasabhāve ṭhitatāya malitānyavisadāni padāni yassa taṃ kiliṭṭhapadaṃ.
anya-e0812n:315_7: Mando appako abhidheyyo attho yassa taṃ mandābhidheyyaṃ,
anya-e0812n:315_8: tādisaṃ tampi yamakādikaṃ kiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva yathāvutte anto abbhantare karīyati vidhīyati tattheva pakkhipīyati,
anya-e0812n:316_1: Idāni anadhippetamapi yamakādiṃ kiliṭṭhadoseyeva antokaraṇabyājena āvīkaronto āha “yaṃ kiliṭṭhe”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:316_2: Kiliṭṭhapadaṃ appatītadosena missakattā avisadapadaṃ mandābhidheyyaṃ appakābhidheyyaṃ yaṃ yamakādikaṃ yaṃ yamakappaheḷikājātamatthi,
anya-e0812n:316_3: tampi kiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva yathāvuttakiliṭṭhapadadoseyeva anto karīyati abbhantare karīyati,
anya-e0812n:320_3: Attano vacanīyatthappatītavasena vācakāpi saddā patītāyeva nāmāti patītehi pasiddhehi saddehi pāṭipadikehi racitaṃ kataṃ patītasaddaracitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:320_4: Siliṭṭhā aññamaññāliṅganena maṭṭhā padānaṃ syādyantādīnaṃ sandhayo sandhanā yassa taṃ siliṭṭhapadasandhikaṃ.
anya-e0812n:320_5: Patītasaddaracitattāyeva pasādasaṅkhātena guṇena saddālaṅkārena saṃyuttaṃ sammadevopetaṃ edisaṃ yathāvuttaguṇāsayaṃ
anya-e0812n:321_1: Idāni adhigatesu yamakesu īdisaṃ yamakamiṭṭhamiti sissānaṃ upadisanto āha “patīte”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:321_2: Patītasaddaracitaṃ “imassatthassāyaṃ vācako”ti patītehi pasiddhehi saddehi racitaṃ pāṭipadikehi kataṃ
anya-e0812n:321_3: siliṭṭhapadasandhikaṃ siliṭṭhā syādyantādipadānaṃ sandhayo yassa taṃ pasādaguṇasaṃyuttaṃ patītasaddaracitattāyeva
anya-e0812n:321_4: pasādasaṅkhātena saddālaṅkāraguṇena saṃyuttaṃ īdisaṃ evaṃbhūtaṃ guṇādhikato ramaṇīyaṃ upari vakkhamānayamakasadisaṃ
anya-e0812n:325_5: tathā ca vakkhati “vaṇṇāvutti paro yathā”ti subodhālaṅkāra 127 gāthā,
anya-e0812n:325_13: taṃ aññaṃ aparaṃ abyapetabyapetanti tidhā yamakaṃ tāva vikappīyate.
anya-e0812n:325_14: Tametaṃ tividhaṃ yamakaṃ visayavibhāganirūpanāyaṃ ādi ca majjho ca anto ca gocaro visayo yasseti ādimajjhantagocaraṃ viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:326_0: Tattha pādacatukkassa ādimajjhantabhāvīnaṃ yamakānaṃ yāvanto pakārā sambhavanti,
anya-e0812n:326_9: Evaṃ paccekaṃ mūlabhūtā sattāti catūsu aṭṭhavīsati honti.
anya-e0812n:327_2: Āvuttehi punappunaṃ vuttehi anekavaṇṇehi samudāyarūpattā anekehi sarabyañjanasarīrehi vaṇṇehi jātaṃ yamakaṃ aññehi vaṇṇehi abyavahitattā abyapetaṃ,
anya-e0812n:327_4: ubhayamissakattā tehi aññaṃ abyapetabyapetañcāti tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:327_5: Tañca yamakaṃ visayavibhāganiyamena gāthāpādānaṃ ādigocaraṃ majjhagocaraṃ antagocaramiti tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:327_7: vattabbantaraṃ nāma yathāvuttaabyapetādibhedato aññaṃ vattabbatāya samukhībhūtaṃ pādānaṃ ādimajjhāvasānantaraṃ,
anya-e0812n:327_15: ādi ca majjho ca anto ca,
anya-e0812n:328_0: Tattha pādacatukkassa ādimajjhāvasānesu labbhamānayamakabhedā ekekasmiṃ pāde satta satta bhavanti. Kathaṃ?
anya-e0812n:328_1: Pādādiyamakaṃ pādamajjhayamakaṃ pādantayamakaṃ majjhantayamakaṃ majjhādiyamakaṃ ādyantayamakaṃ sabbatoyamakanti
anya-e0812n:328_2: evaṃ paccekaṃ satta satta katvā catūsu mūlabhūtayamakā aṭṭhavīsa bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:328_3: Ettha pādādiyamakādikampi abyapetapaṭhamapādādiyamakaṃ tathā dutiyatatiyacatutthapādādiyamakamiti ca
anya-e0812n:328_8: abyapetapaṭhamapādamajjhayamakaṃ tathā dutiyapādamajjhayamakamiccādinā majjhayamakampi vīsatividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:333_3: asujanā asajjanāti ete sabbe ubhayapakkhapātino visesā janā guṇena sīlādinā karaṇabhūtena,
anya-e0812n:333_4: hetubhūtena vā vivekinopi sādhūsu labbhamānānamasādhūsvanupalabbhanato puthubhūtāpi avivekīnaṃ janānaṃ
anya-e0812n:333_5: antike samīpe tesaṃ sannidhāne vivekaṃ vibhāgaṃ na samāyanti napāpuṇanti,
anya-e0812n:333_6: vibhāgavijānanapaññāvekallena ca vivekinopi janā te ekato katvā passantīti.
anya-e0812n:334_3: asujanā asādhujanā ceti sabbe ubhayapakkhikā sīlādinā,
anya-e0812n:334_4: pāṇātipātādinā guṇena hetunā vivekino api sādhūsu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ,
anya-e0812n:334_5: asādhūsu sīlādīnaṃ appavattito guṇena puthubhūtāpi avivekijanantike vivekañāṇarahitānaṃ janānaṃ santike vivekaṃ vibhāgaṃ na samāyanti na pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0812n:339_4: Apabalā tadabhāvato dubbalā ca sabbe kusalākusalā dhammā yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ ahosittaṃ vinā uppattimattaṃ
anya-e0812n:339_5: phaladānāsambhavato kevalaṃ “ahosī”ti vacanīyatthanimittamattakammabhāvena ahosikammattaṃ no yātā na sampattā,
anya-e0812n:339_6: tāva tattakaṃ kālaṃ sukhañca dukkhañca taṃ padantīti sukhadukkhappadā siyuṃ.
anya-e0812n:340_1: Pabalā āsevanādipaccayalābhena balavanto vā atha apabalā tadabhāvena dubbalā vā sabbe kusalākusalā ahosittaṃ
anya-e0812n:340_2: phaladānābhāvato pavattimattataṃ yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ no yātā appattā,
anya-e0812n:340_3: tāva tattakaṃ sukhadukkhappadā yathākkamaṃ sukhadukkhapadāyino siyuṃ bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:343_0: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
anya-e0812n:345_3: tesaṃ bhājane ādhārabhūte ratijananādinā atthena ratanasaṅkhātānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ taye samūhabhūte ratanattaye
anya-e0812n:345_4: sādaraṃ ādarasahitaṃ katvā mayā vihitā katā,
anya-e0812n:345_5: vihitā alaṃsaṃsāradukkhavisaṭanirākaraṇato visesena hitā padhyā sā vandanā so paṇāmo daraṃ darathaṃ kāyacittapariḷāhaṃ hantu hiṃsatu.
anya-e0812n:346_1: Vandanāmānabhājane dvārattayena vidhiyamānapaṇāmapūjānaṃ ādhārabhūte ratanattaye ratijananādiatthena
anya-e0812n:346_2: ratanasaṅkhātānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ taye mayā yā vandanā sādaraṃ ādarasahitaṃ vihitā katā,
anya-e0812n:346_3: vihitā lokiya lokuttara sampattisādhanato visesena hitā sā vandanā daraṃ mayhaṃ kāyacittadarathaṃ hantu vināsetu.
anya-e0812n:346_8: Karaṇañhi vihitāsaddassa vuttakammattepi aññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyato bhijjitvā vijjamānaṃ “akāsi”nti
anya-e0812n:346_11: sattāya ekattā ekavacanañca tabbisesanattā sādarasaddopi napuṃsakadutiyekavacano hoti.
anya-e0812n:350_0: Kātabbā tā visesane”ti sambandhacinto 15 gāthā bhedacintā 194 gāthā.
anya-e0812n:351_1: Evaṃ kriyāvisesane gahite sāmatthiyato “mayā”ti tatiyantassa paṭhamantattaṃ,
anya-e0812n:355_0: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sahitaṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0812n:356_2: Kamalaṃ aravindaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alaṅkattuṃ sajjanatthāya hoti,
anya-e0812n:356_5: Vanaṃ jalaṃ dadāti na tucchoti vanado megho ambaraṃ ākāsaṃ jaladhārabhārabharitambarakuharassa dassanīyatāguṇayogato alaṃkattunti adhikataṃ.
anya-e0812n:356_6: Sahitaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ hitaṃ abhivuddhiṃ karaṃ karonto suṭṭhu gadatīti sugato mañjubhāṇī pubbabuddhā viya
anya-e0812n:356_7: nekkhammādinā kāmacchandādike pajahanto gantvā arahattamaggena savāsanasakalakilese samucchinditvā sobhanaṃ
anya-e0812n:356_8: nibbānapuraṃ gatoti vā sugatoti vutto so mahāmuni attano aparimitapāramitāsimpakacagalitatilakabhāvena
anya-e0812n:356_10: sahitaṃ lokanti vā yojanīyaṃ alaṅkattuṃ alaṃkaraṇāyāti.
anya-e0812n:357_1: Kamalaṃ padumaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alaṅkattuṃ pañcavidhapadumasañchannassa udakassa ramaṇīyattā sajjetuṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:357_2: Avanado kāle vuṭṭhisampadāya sassasampadādīnaṃ kāraṇattā ārakkhaṃ dento vanado megho ambaraṃ ākāsaṃ alaṅkattuṃ
anya-e0812n:357_4: sahitaṃ sampuṇṇaṃ hitaṃ abhivuḍḍhiṃ karaṃ karonto sugato citrakathī sundaraṃ nibbānaṃ gato vā so sugato so tathāgato lokaṃ lokattayaṃ,
anya-e0812n:357_5: sahitaṃ lokaṃ vā alaṅkattuṃ citrakathādikāraṇehi tādisassa aññassa ca lokarāmaṇeyyassābhāvā sajjetuṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:361_3: ādibhūtassa vā yamakassa eso yathāvutto leso kocideva bhedo nidassito vikappito.
anya-e0812n:361_5: Imāya disāya iminā upāyena maggeneva aññāni vuttato aparāni dutiyapādādiyamakatatiyapādādiyamakacatutthapādādiyamakādīni
anya-e0812n:363_0: Vigāhante samaṃ nātha, cittaṃ citte kathaṃ nu te”.
anya-e0812n:371_0: Suciraṃ suciraṃgaṃ taṃ, sa’malaṃ samalaṃbhi yo”.
anya-e0812n:377_0: Yo taṃ jinavaraṃ dhīra-matthakāmosi ce tuvaṃ”.
anya-e0812n:379_3: abyapetapādādiyamakassa vā eso leso “sujani”ccādiko appakodāharaṇanayo nidassito niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0812n:379_4: Aññāni yamakānipi imāyeva disāya iminā nayeneva ñeyyāni viññūhi ñātabbāni.
anya-e0812n:379_8: Evaṃ dassitena iminā kamena abyapetadutiyapādādiyamakādayo ñātabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:382_0: Vigāhante samaṃ nātha, cittaṃ citte kathaṃ nu te.
anya-e0812n:383_0: Bho nātha te tuyhaṃ citte sādhavo asādhavo te janā guṇāguṇena sakasakaguṇena aguṇena ca saha samaṃ ekajjhaṃ kathaṃ nu vigāhante,
anya-e0812n:383_1: cittaṃ acchariyaṃ sujanadujjanesu samamettā acchariyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:386_0: Pādānate jinokāsi, so dhammo hantu vo’ppīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:387_0: Jino appiyabhāṇinopi sabbe jane piyena yena vacasā pādānate akāsi,
anya-e0812n:387_2: Ettha apisaddapariyāyassa pisaddassa gahitattā yatibhaṅgo natthi.
anya-e0812n:390_0: Suciraṃ suciraṃgaṃ taṃ, sa’malaṃ samalaṃbhi yoti.
anya-e0812n:391_3: “suciraṃ sucira”nti pubbaparayugaḷaṃ pubbaparayugaḷadvayaṃ (ka.) “jaye”ti bhinnavaṇṇehi ca byavahitattā byapetañca hoti.
anya-e0812n:391_4: Suciraṃsuci sobhanaraṃsinā uci yutto yo jino saṃ santiṃ nibbānaṃ samalaṃbhi alabhi,
anya-e0812n:391_5: alaṃ accantaṃ atisayena suciraṃgaṃ visuddhadehaṃ taṃ jinaṃ samalaṃ jallikāsaṅkhātena,
anya-e0812n:391_6: rāgādikucchitasaṅkhātena vā malena sahitaṃ saṃ attānaṃ alaṃkattuṃ nimmalaṃ katvā sajjetuṃ suciraṃ sucirakālaṃ raṃjaye attani abhiramāpeyya.
anya-e0812n:393_0: Manohara hara klesaṃ, jina cetobhavaṃ mama;
anya-e0812n:395_0: Manohara jina mama cetobhavaṃ klesaṃ santāpaṃ hara apanaya,
anya-e0812n:398_0: Yo taṃ jinavaraṃ dhīra-matthakāmosi ce tuvanti.
anya-e0812n:399_0: Yo jinavaro sādhunā jayaddhaninā veneyyajayaghosena mahiṃ āpūrayi,
anya-e0812n:399_1: dhīraṃ taṃ jinavaraṃ tuvaṃ sappurisa ce atthakāmo asi,
anya-e0812n:405_1: Kiṃ pana sākallena na vikappitānīti āha “accanti”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:405_2: Tesaṃ vikappānaṃ sambhedo saṅkaro missattamuccāraṇappakāro yoni pabhavo yesaṃ te sambhedayoniyo,
anya-e0812n:405_3: bhedā pakārā accantabahavo atisayena bahulā yathāvuttanayena sambhavanti,
anya-e0812n:405_4: tatthāpi tesu vikappesupi keci vikappā sukhena karīyanti payujjantīti sukarā,
anya-e0812n:405_7: tesu sukarānaṃ kesañci abhimatayamakānaṃ mukhamattaṃ dassitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:405_8: Idāni dukkarānaṃ kesañci mukhamattaṃ na sabbamevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:407_0: Kathaṃ na te na te siyuṃ;
anya-e0812n:416_2: Tesaṃ yamakānaṃ sambhedayoniyo pabheduppattikāraṇabhūtā bhedā uccāvacapakārā accantabahavo,
anya-e0812n:416_3: tatthāpi tesupi keci yamakā sukarā susādhiyā,
anya-e0812n:420_0: Manaṃ manaṃ tena dadeyya ce na,
anya-e0812n:423_0: Yo puggalo manaṃ attano cittaṃ satthu jinassa manaṃ khaṇamattampi dadeyya ce,
anya-e0812n:423_1: satthu munindassa manaṃ cittaṃ assa puggalassa manaṃ cittaṃ pīṇayati sampīṇeti,
anya-e0812n:423_2: tena tasmā manaṃ manaṃ cittaṃ cittaṃ dadeyya ce na yadi no dadeyya,
anya-e0812n:423_3: assa puggalassa manaṃ cittaṃ manaṃpi muhuttampi sādhupujjaṃ sādhūhi pūjitabbaṃ na bhavati.
anya-e0812n:425_0: Kathaṃ na te na te siyuṃ;
anya-e0812n:429_0: Yato yena kāraṇena te tuyhaṃ satā sobhanena samunnatena sammā unnatena hetunā natepi avanatepi anatepi
anya-e0812n:429_1: anavanatepi te te subhā te te sobhanā na na siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n:429_3: ato tena kāraṇena te subhā te sobhanā nate avanate kathaṃ na siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n:435_0: Paṇāmonatasajjanaṃ paṇāmitukāmonatasādhujanavantaṃ janaṃ veneyyajanaṃ asajja pamādamakatvā guṇe sīlādiguṇe
anya-e0812n:435_1: nivesentaṃ niyojentaṃ veneyyanette añjanaṃ añjanabhūtaṃ guṇabhājanaṃ guṇānamādhārabhūtaṃ sajjanaṃjanaṃ
anya-e0812n:435_2: iminā kāraṇena sādhujanānaṃ añjanabhūtaṃ janaṃ sādhujanaṃ khalu ekantena mamentaṃ mamāyantaṃ naṃ jinaṃ
anya-e0812n:438_0: Sābhāya sā bhāti na ce kathaṃ na,
anya-e0812n:441_0: Bhuvane sattaloke sābhāsu vijjamānābhāsu jinassa sābhā sobhanā ābhā sābhāya vijjamānāya,
anya-e0812n:441_1: sobhanāya vā ābhāya ābhāto jātu ekantena bhāsatiyeva dippateva,
anya-e0812n:441_2: sā jinābhā sābhāya vijjamānābhāto adhikā hutvā ce na bhāti yadi na bhāsati,
anya-e0812n:441_3: sasābhānaṃ vijjamānasobhanābhānaṃ brahmādīnaṃ sābhā sobhanābhāyo aticca atikkamma kathaṃ na bhāti,
anya-e0812n:447_0: Surāvinissaṭā surāpānato apagatā janā yathā surājanti,
anya-e0812n:447_1: tathā vibhūsitā visesena alaṅkatā tepi surā te devā api na bhāsurā sobhamānā na honti,
anya-e0812n:447_2: tathā evaṃ surāparājitā surāpānahetu parājitabhāvaṃ pattā bhūri asurā bahavo vepacittiādayo asurāpi na bhāsurā na sobhanti,
anya-e0812n:447_3: tathā evaṃ surājito suṭṭhu alaṅkato rājāpi sabhāsu na bhāsuro.
anya-e0812n:453_0: Ye sappurisā jināṇattiyaṃ buddhassa vinayapaññattisaṅkhātāṇattiyaṃ ohitāsā avītikkamavasena patiṭṭhitaāsā honti sitāsā parisuddhāsā,
anya-e0812n:453_1: te sādhavo hatāsā anukkamena hatataṇhā avassaṃva ekanteneva atāsā bhayarahitā yato honti,
anya-e0812n:453_2: ato tasmā sabbapāpe sabbākusale satāsā bhayasahitā vatāsāva niravajjavatābhilāsavanto sādhujanā santissitā
anya-e0812n:457_1: Nanu yamakaṃ nāma kavīnaṃ sāmatthiyavisesasūcakanti tattha taṃ sopayogaṃ,
anya-e0812n:457_2: paheḷikā ca sopayogā kīḷāvinodane sambādhaṭṭhānamantane parabyāmohane paramabyāmohane (ka.),
anya-e0812n:457_6: Paheḷikā pana pubbācariyehi soḷasa niddiṭṭhā samāgatāvañcitādikā.
anya-e0812n:474_0: Dosattepi cesaṃ sabbesaṃ ukkantādīsu dosabhāve nāropitabbā.
anya-e0812n:474_1: Esā hi manasoti (ka.) “bahuguṇe paṇamati”ccādinā subodhālaṅkāra 44 gāthā vākyasaṃkiṇṇanāmena na vuttā,
anya-e0812n:474_2: pakappitā ca saṃsayadosaparihārena “yāte dutiyaṃ nilaya”nti subodhālaṅkāra 112 gāthā ādinā niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0812n:481_0: Pamussitādayo tu lakkhaṇānusārena, tatthodāharaṇānusārena ca veditabbā.
anya-e0812n:482_0: Evaṃ pubbācariyehi parikappitā paheḷikā ceti etāni sabbāni ekantena niyamena na madhurāni attharasassa
anya-e0812n:482_1: vā saddarasassa vā kassaci abhāvena assāditabbāni na hontīti iminā kāraṇena sissānamuppanno khedoyeva
anya-e0812n:482_2: bhayaṃ tato tesaṃ khedato vā uppannabhayato mayā upekkhiyantīti sambandhanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:483_1: Evaṃ sukaradukkaravasena duvidhattaṃ vatvā kavīnaṃ sāmatthiyappakāsane sappayojanayamakānañca,
anya-e0812n:483_2: kīḷāvinodane sambādhaṭṭhānasammantane parabyāmohane cāti imesu sappayojanānañca paheḷikānamavacane kāraṇaṃ niddisati “yamaka”miccādinā.
anya-e0812n:483_3: Taṃ yamakaṃ yathāvuttaṃ sukaradukkarādibhedaṃ yamakajātañca paheḷi ca pubbācariyehi niddiṭṭhā samāgabhādikā
anya-e0812n:483_4: paheḷikā ca iti imāni sabbāni ekantamadhurāni na iti assādetabbassa attharasassa,
anya-e0812n:483_5: saddarasassa vā niyamato abhāvā ekantena amadhurāni,
anya-e0812n:483_6: iti iminā kāraṇena ca sissakhedabhayā sissānaṃ asahanasaṅkhātāya asahanena jātāya vā bhītiyā ca mayā upekkhīyanti.
anya-e0812n:507_1: padasandhinā padānaṃ sandhānato guḷhatthā apākaṭatthā samāgatā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:507_4: Yattha paheḷikāyaṃ aññattha ruḷhena saddena aññasmiṃ atthe pasiddhena ruḷhisaddena vañcanā vañcitā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:508_0: Atibyavahitappayogā atisayena antaritapayujjamānapadayuttā tatoyeva mohakārinī sammohakārikā paheḷikā ukkantā nāma.
anya-e0812n:508_1: Yassā paheḷikāya padāvali padapanti dubbodhatthā duranubodhābhidheyyā,
anya-e0812n:509_0: Amukhyatthāropāhitapadā appadhānatthe mukhyatthapakāsakasaddānaṃ kiñci sadhammaṃ nissāya āropanato upaṭṭhitapadayuttā samānarūpā nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:509_1: Paccayādīhi paccayādesādīhi kathañcipi yena kenaci pakārena jātasaddā nipphannasaddā pharusā nāma.
anya-e0812n:510_0: Yattha yassaṃ paheḷikāyaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ gaṇanaṃ vuttamapi byāmohakāraṇaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:510_2: Yattha yassaṃ paheḷikāyaṃ vākyattho samudāyattho aññathā aññena pakārena ābhāsate viññāyate,
anya-e0812n:511_0: Yassā paheḷikāya nāme payuttābhidhāne nānatthakappanā vividhābhidheyyakappanā sambhavati,
anya-e0812n:511_2: Tulyatthasutihetuto samānatthasaddānaṃ payogahetuyā avaṭṭhitaññatthā patiṭṭhitaaññatthā hoti,
anya-e0812n:512_0: Yā paheḷikā iṭṭhasaddapariyāyasādhitā icchitatthasaddassa vevacanehi nipphāditā hoti,
anya-e0812n:512_2: Sādhukaṃ niddiṭṭhatthāpi dassitaatthayuttāpiyā mūḷhatāyeva sammohabhāvatthaṃ eva bhavati,
anya-e0812n:513_0: Yassā paheḷikāya viracane nāmaṃ dassiyamānaṃ nāmaṃ sambandhabāhulyā sambandhassa bahulabhāvato bhavati,
anya-e0812n:513_2: Yassā ādheyyaṃ byañja abhibyañjiya pakāsetvā nissayagopanā ādhāragutti bhavati,
anya-e0812n:514_0: Yassā payoge ubhayagopanā ubhinnamādhārādheyyānaṃ gopanā bhavati,
anya-e0812n:515_0: Idāni samāgatādīnaṃ lakkhiyaṃ kamena evaṃ ñātabbaṃ –
anya-e0812n:519_0: Nātha tava pabhavato paṭṭhāya natavittiṇṇā oṇatavasena patthaṭā,
anya-e0812n:519_3: Bho nātha tava tuyhaṃ mahatī satī mahantī samānā āṇā ānatavittiṇṇā attani natesu janesu patthaṭā pahutaphalasādhinī
anya-e0812n:519_4: bahulatthanipphādanī cirāya cirakālaṃ jayataṃ ukkaṃsabhāvena pavattatu.
anya-e0812n:523_1: bhaddajātikesu hatthīsu bhaddajātikahatthimeva upaseveyyāti vuttaṃ viya dissati.
anya-e0812n:523_4: Hatthipakkhe danto sikkhito so hatthi attanisevitaṃ attānaṃ bhajitaṃ janaṃ khemaṃ nibbhayaṃ puraṃ nagaraṃ sampāpeti.
anya-e0812n:523_5: Purisapakkhe pana danto damito so ariyapuggalo attanisevitaṃ attānamupasevitaṃ janaṃ khemaṃ niddukkhaṃ puraṃ nibbānapuraṃ pāpeti.
anya-e0812n:523_6: Ettha kavicchitauttamatthato aññena hatthiatthe ruḷhena saddena vañcanā nāma.
anya-e0812n:531_0: Mukhaphullaṃ tilakādiṃ giṅgamakaṃ evaṃnāmakaṃ pasādhanaṃ niyuruggatthanunnataṃ niyuraṃ valayaṃ,
anya-e0812n:531_3: mukhato unnatābharaṇañca dhārayantiyā bhīruyā itthiyā paṭaccarī jiṇṇavatthanivāsī poso puriso varaṃ uttamo.
anya-e0812n:531_4: Ettha bahupayogarahitehi saddehi racitattā atthassa duravabodhatā.
anya-e0812n:535_1: ettha imesu ratanesu aṭṭha ratanāni aṭṭhannaṃ purisānaṃ asādhāraṇāni,
anya-e0812n:535_3: Imāni nava lokuttarāni cittīkatādiatthena “ratanānī”ti ca tappabhavo sammāsambuddho “ākaro”ti ca kappitoti
anya-e0812n:537_0: Rasavante sare satta, na nāgāpi uposathā”ti.
anya-e0812n:539_0: Himavantamahātale himālayassa matthake rasavante sodake satta sare anotattādike devagandhabbā vindanti sevanti,
anya-e0812n:539_3: Himavantamahātale candaraṃsiyutte mahāpāsādatale devagandhabbā kīḷamānā gandhabbā rasavante madhuraguṇayutte
anya-e0812n:539_4: satta sare vīṇāya chajjādike satta sare vindanti,
anya-e0812n:539_5: nāgāpi ariyāpi uposathāpi upavutthāpi na vindanti nānubhavanti.
anya-e0812n:539_8: Lakkhaṇakkamato pasiddhapacurapayogato aññadatthā yena kenaci lesena paccayādīnaṃ jātasaddassa atthitā.
anya-e0812n:540_0: “Gītasadde sarā dve dve, dve chajjaññatra chassarā;
anya-e0812n:541_0: Pañcavaṇṇaṃ yathā cakkhu, chabbaṇṇā nāsikā tathā”ti.
anya-e0812n:543_1: chajja’ññatra chajjato aññatra chajjaṃ vajjetvā usabho gandhāro majjhimo pañcamo dhevato nisādoti.
anya-e0812n:543_2: Ettha yugaḷato dve dve chassarā chasaravanto.
anya-e0812n:543_5: gītasadde īkāraakārasaradvayasabbhāvato ca chajjaṃ ṭhapetvā usabhādīsu sarānaṃ tividhattā ca “cakkhū”ti
anya-e0812n:543_6: sarabyañjanavasena pañcavaṇṇānaṃ sabbhāvato ca “nāsikā”ti channaṃ sabbhāvato ca evaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:547_1: anurattaamaccamaṇḍalo vā sakantigahanakkhattasaṅghayutto sakassa attano ante samīpe gahanehi aviraḷehi
anya-e0812n:547_2: khattasaṅghehi khattiyasamūhehi yutto saṃyutto sulakkhaṇo pasatthapurisalakkhaṇo udito pasiddho rājā
anya-e0812n:547_3: narindo vo tumhe pātu rakkhatūti ayaṃ anadhippetattho.
anya-e0812n:547_4: Sirimā “lakkhiyā vāsaṭṭhānattā”ti vuttattā sirimanto rattamaṇḍalo uggamane rattamaṇḍalo sakantigahanakkhattasaṅghayutto
anya-e0812n:547_5: kantisahitehi gahanakkhattatāragaṇehi yutto sulakkhaṇo suṭṭhu sasalakkhaṇo udito uggato rājā cando vo
anya-e0812n:547_6: tumhe pātūti ubhayapakkhassa sādhāraṇaguṇaguṇīpadapariggahena idha vākyatthassa aññathā dissamānatā hoti.
anya-e0812n:549_0: Sanātano ca na isi, na sakhā na sanātano”ti.
anya-e0812n:551_1: sumahantopakāravā atimahantopakārasamannāgato sanātano ca sassato ca hoti,
anya-e0812n:551_2: tathāpi na isi isi nāma na hoti,
anya-e0812n:551_6: Sumahā atimahanto eko ādo nāmādimhi isīti vuccati,
anya-e0812n:551_12: so nātano tanaiti akkharadvayarahito na hoti.
anya-e0812n:551_15: Tattha isipatananāmena isiādīnaṃ gamyamānatthattā nānatthakappanā hoti.
anya-e0812n:555_0: Udayā udayato pabhuti atthaṃ yāva atthaṃ dhāvantaṃ javantaṃ muhuttaṃ muhuttakālaṃ na nivattati na punāvattati.
anya-e0812n:557_0: Hitvā na sari so dhīro, karontopyu’yyamavhaya”nti karontomuttamavhayanti (ka.).
anya-e0812n:559_0: Kittimahīnāmaṃ kittimahīnaṃ dvinnaṃ nāmena samannāgataṃ deviṃ aggamahesiṃ kaḷāratthavhayaṃ puriṃ kaḷāraatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n:559_1: dvinnaṃ nāmena samannāgataṃ puriṃ nagarañca so dhīro hitvā pariccajitvā uyyamavhayaṃ uyyamanāmena samannāgataṃ
anya-e0812n:559_2: karonto api na sari sampattiṃ nānusari,
anya-e0812n:559_3: yasodharādeviñca kapilavatthupuriñca hitvā vīriyasaṅkhātapadhānaṃ karonto mahāsatto sampattiṃ na sari,
anya-e0812n:563_0: Sindhavā cattāro assā catuddisāmukhā yathā catuddisāsammukhā honti,
anya-e0812n:563_1: tathā bandhā majjhe nikkhittaṃ tiṇaṃ sayaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjanti,
anya-e0812n:563_2: aññamaññaṃ piṭṭhiṃ katvā bandhā viya khāyati,
anya-e0812n:563_3: te pana sammukhaṃ katvā bandhā honti.
anya-e0812n:563_4: Ettha “catuddisāmukhābandhā”ti niddiṭṭhattā piṭṭhiṃ katvā bandhāti sammuḷhatā hoti.
anya-e0812n:567_0: Jīvanajānandakarabandhussa jīvanato udakato jātānaṃ padumānaṃ ānandakarassa sūriyassa bandhussa sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0812n:567_1: bhāsitaṃ vacanaṃ sakkaronto pūjento jano puññārikkhayagocare puññānaṃ paṭipakkhattā puññārisaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0812n:567_2: akusalānaṃ khayassa nimittabhūtaṃ nibbānamārammaṇaṃ katvā uppanne maggaphale pappoti pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0812n:567_4: puññārīnaṃ khayanimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatteti ca iminā buddho maggaphalā ca pārampariyena sambandhena vuttāti sambandhānaṃ bāhullabhāvo.
anya-e0812n:568_0: “Na gaṇhāti mahantampi, saddaṃ na ca vibhūsanaṃ;
anya-e0812n:571_0: Kassāpi catuppadassa kaṇṇo mahantampi saddaṃ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e0812n:571_3: Tathāpi ayaṃ kaṇṇo aphalo na kila,
anya-e0812n:571_6: Ettha kaṇṇoti ādheyyaṃ katvā tadādhārassa avacanato nissayagutti.
anya-e0812n:575_0: Sassiriko sadevakaṃ bhuvanaṃ alaṅkarontoti buddho viya khāyati.
anya-e0812n:575_1: Bhuvanaṃ bhuvanasaṅkhātaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ sadā eva alaṅkaronto sassiriko lakkhiyasamannāgato kasmiṃ jale sañjātasaṃvaddho
anya-e0812n:575_2: ko kataro kena jalena na upalimpati na limpati.
anya-e0812n:575_5: Iha jalapadumānaṃ dvinnampi chāditattā ubhayacchannā nāma.
anya-e0812n:579_3: siddhaṃ nipphannaṃ tādīsu ariyesu vattantaṃ asaṅkhatapadaṃ vada kathehīti ayamaparattho.
anya-e0812n:579_4: Ādo ādimhi soyeva sakāro eva ante pariyosāne yo yakāroyeva,
anya-e0812n:579_5: majjhimo majjhimavaṇṇo majjhimassa saddassa ādi makāro,
anya-e0812n:579_6: siddhantādīsu matasamayakālādīsu vattantaṃ vācakabhāvena pavattantaṃ asaṅkhatapadaṃ saṅkhatato aññattā asaṅkhatabhūtaṃ paññattiṃ vada kathehīti.
anya-e0812n:579_8: Ettha siddhantasaddena ādisaddassa saṅgahitattā tādiattho labbhatīti atthassa guḷhatāya samāgatālakkhaṇena
anya-e0812n:579_9: ca “so”ti “yo”ti “asaṅkhatapada”nti aññattharuḷhasaddena vañcitattā vañcitālakkhaṇena ca samayasadde
anya-e0812n:579_10: nānatthakappanato nāmantarikālakkhaṇena cāti tīhipi lakkhaṇehi missitoti.
anya-e0812n:579_12: Tattha tattha vuttalakkhaṇānusāreneva samāgatādīnaṃ anvatthasaññatā veditabbā.
anya-e0812n:583_9: Tehi virodho assa atthīti desa…pe… virodhi.
anya-e0812n:583_12: Etañca padaṃ udāharaṇato lakkhiyato phuṭaṃ pākaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n:583_14: ratyādīsu sambhavantānaṃ kusumādīnaṃ divādīsu sambhavo ca,
anya-e0812n:583_15: “naccagītādicatusaṭṭhiyā kalāsu bhinnachajjo nāma sattasaro”tiādinā kalāsatthābhihitalakkhaṇātikkamavirodho ca,
anya-e0812n:583_19: yathāsakamāgamena virodho ca sukhena ca sakkā pākaṭattā viññātuṃ,
anya-e0812n:584_1: Evaṃ yamakapaheḷikānamadassane kāraṇaṃ vatvā idāni uddesakkamena sampattavirodhidosaṃ “desakāli”ccādinā vadati.
anya-e0812n:584_10: Tehi virodho assa atthīti desa…pe… virodhi.
anya-e0812n:584_12: Etaṃ virodhipadaṃ udāharaṇato lakkhiyato phuṭaṃ paribyattaṃ.
anya-e0812n:584_15: rattiādīsu labbhamānānaṃ kumudādīnaṃ divādīsu sambhavo ca,
anya-e0812n:584_16: naccagītādicatusaṭṭhiyā kalāsu “chajjo usabho gandhāro majjhimo pañcamo dhevato nisādo”ti dassitasattasarānamekadesassa
anya-e0812n:584_17: chajjassa bhinnasattasaro chajjo nāmāti samudāyavasena vohārakaraṇādīhi satthāgatataṃ,
anya-e0812n:584_24: yathāsakamāgamamatikkamma kathanañcāti sabbesaṃ viruddhasabhāvassa pākaṭattā udāharaṇaṃ na dassayissāmāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:584_25: Imesameva desādivirodhīnamaviruddhattaṃ ettheva virodhipadadosaparihāre “bodhisattappabhāvenā”ticcādinā dissati. Desa…pe…
anya-e0812n:587_0: Yathā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:588_6: Yaṃ kiñci padaṃ samānīya ānetvā vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n:588_9: Sabbāpi sakalāpi disā pubbadisādayo dasa disā rattiyaṃ rajanyaṃ dhavalā ujjalā rocanti dippantīti ettake niddiṭṭhe candamarīcino ettha neyyattaṃ.
anya-e0812n:589_6: Yathā tatthodāharaṇamīdisaṃ “sabbāpi dhavalā disā rocanti rattiya”nti.
anya-e0812n:589_7: Sabbāpi disā pubbadakkhiṇādayo dasa disā dhavalā setā rattiyaṃ rajanyaṃ rocanti dippanti.
anya-e0812n:589_8: Ettha disāya visesanaṃ dhavalaguṇaṃ kelāsakūṭasudhābhitticandaraṃsiādīsu kuto sañjātamiti anicchitattā
anya-e0812n:589_9: aññanivattanatthaṃ candakiraṇādivācakapadaṃ ānetvā dhavalatā imineti vattabbattā dhavala padaṃ neyyadosena
anya-e0812n:591_0: Nedisaṃ bahu maññanti, sabbe sabbattha viññuno;
anya-e0812n:593_2: Īdisaṃ anantare vuttappakāraṃ neyyaṃ sabbepi viññuno ñeyyavidū sabbattha gajjādike na bahu maññanti na sambhāventi nappayujjanti.
anya-e0812n:593_4: Tathā hi avagatī atthāvagamo saddaṃ vācakaṃ,
anya-e0812n:593_5: sāmatthiyañca ñāyaṃ vilaṅghayati cajati anupadassanatoti saddasāmatthiyavilaṅghinī dullabhā na labhyate.
anya-e0812n:593_6: Ñāyopattho vā saddopattho vā yottho na hoti.
anya-e0812n:593_7: So nappatīyate yathā manasi avaṭṭhitamattenāti attho.
anya-e0812n:594_1: Imaṃ appatītapadaṃ viññūhi nābhimatanti dassento āha “nedisa”miccādi.
anya-e0812n:594_2: Īdisaṃ yathāvuttappakāraṃ neyyaṃ sabbe viññuno sabbattha gajjapajjādike na bahu maññanti na sambhāventi nappayojenti.
anya-e0812n:594_3: Avagatī atthāvabodho saddasāmatthiyavilaṅghinī saddasaṅkhātavācakañca sāmatthiyasaṅkhātañāyañca atikkamma
anya-e0812n:594_7: so kattuno manasi patiṭṭhitamattena patīto na hotīti taṃ padaṃ neyyadosamiti sabbe kavino pariharantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:600_2: Yaṃ padaṃ visesanaṃ patvā atthena saha vattatīti sātthakaṃ.
anya-e0812n:601_2: Yaṃ padaṃ visesanaṃ patvā sātthakaṃ atthasahitaṃ,
anya-e0812n:601_5: Taṃ yathā tassodāharaṇamevaṃ “taṃ so bhiyyo passati cakkhunā”ti.
anya-e0812n:601_6: So puriso taṃ purisaṃ bhiyyo yebhuyyasā cakkhunā passati.
anya-e0812n:601_8: Cakkhunāti visesyapadaṃ visesanaṃ laddhāva sātthakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:601_10: saha atthena vattamānaṃ sātthakamiti ca samāso.
anya-e0812n:603_0: Hīnaṃ kare visesyaṃ yaṃ, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0812n:605_2: Yaṃ visesanapadaṃ visesyaṃ visesitabbaṃ hīnaṃ lāmakaṃ kare kareyya,
anya-e0812n:605_3: taṃ visesanapadaṃ hīnatthaṃ hīno attho yassa taṃ hīnatthaṃ nāma bhaveyya.
anya-e0812n:605_5: Nippabhīkato khajjoto yena so divākaro pabhākaro samudeti upagacchatīti.
anya-e0812n:606_6: Pabhārahitakatā khajjotā yena so divākaro sūriyo samudeti uggacchati.
anya-e0812n:606_7: “Nippabhīkatakhajjoto”ti iminā visesanena lāmakālokaladdhayuttassa khajjopanakassa abhibhavanappakāsanaṃ sahassaraṃsino nindāyeva,
anya-e0812n:610_0: 39. Hi api casaddānaṃ pādapūraṇamattattā anatthakattaṃ. Visesanavisesyapadadoso.
anya-e0812n:611_2: Yaṃ padaṃ pādapūraṇamattaṃ catutthaṃsasaṅkhātassa pādassa pūraṇamattameva hoti,
anya-e0812n:611_6: Ettha hi apicāti imesaṃ samattanādiatthesu appavattito kevalaṃ pādapūraṇamattato anatthakattaṃ.
anya-e0812n:615_0: Saddato atthato vuttaṃ, yattha bhiyyopi vuccati;
anya-e0812n:617_2: Saddato vācakena tasmiṃyevatthe tasseva saddassa puna payogato atthato abhidheyyena pubbapaṭipādikasseva
anya-e0812n:617_3: vatthussāvisesena puna paṭipādanato vuttaṃ payuttaṃ yaṃ padattharūpaṃ yattha yasmiṃ vākye bhiyyopi vuccati
anya-e0812n:618_2: Saddato vācakena atthato abhidheyyena vuttaṃ payuttaṃ yaṃ padattharūpaṃ yattha yasmiṃ vākye bhiyyopi punapi vuccati yujjate,
anya-e0812n:618_5: Vārido jaladāyako ayaṃ vārido megho ābhāti dippati.
anya-e0812n:618_6: Sampattisādhakaṃ “jaladāyako”ccādivisesanaṃ vinā jaladānamattassa vuttattā saddato ekatthaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:623_1: Titthiyasaṅkhātānaṃ aṅkurānaṃ bījāni uppattihetubhūtāni diṭṭhigatāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo jahaṃ jahanto
anya-e0812n:623_2: dūrīkaronto so mahāmuni sammāsambuddho iha loke attani pasanne pasādabahule mahājane pasādetīti aparamudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n:623_3: Pasādasaṅkhātassa atthassa “pasanne pasādetī”ti vuttattā idamatthato ekatthaṃ.
anya-e0812n:624_2: So mahāmuni titthiyaṅkurabījāni titthiyasaṅkhātānaṃ aṅkurānaṃ uppattikāraṇabhūtāni diṭṭhigatāni sassatādibhedabhinnā
anya-e0812n:624_3: dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo jahaṃ jahanto apanento iha loke pasanne attani pasanne mahājane pasādeti.
anya-e0812n:624_4: Pasannasaddena vuttappasādasaṅkhātassa atthassa pasādetīti kriyāpadenapi vuttattā sadde bhinnepi atthato ekanti atthato ekatthassudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n:627_0: Kāpi paññā, kopi guṇo, pakatīpi aho tava.
anya-e0812n:628_6: Mahāmuni tava te paññā kāpi sātisayattā aniddhāritaṃ sabhāvavisesā kāciyeva,
anya-e0812n:628_8: Ettha kāpi kopīti sabbanāmapadakkamassa pakatīti ettha vicchinnattā bhaggarīti.
anya-e0812n:629_2: Āraddhakkamavicchedā vatthumāraddhapadakkamassa vicchedahetu bhaggarīti bhave bhaggarītivākyadoso bhavati.
anya-e0812n:629_4: Mahāmuni tava tuyhaṃ paññā sātisayabhūtā paññā kāpi vacanavisayātikkantattā kāpiyeva.
anya-e0812n:629_5: Guṇo sīlasamādhiādianaññasādhāraṇaguṇasamūho kopi pamāṇapariggahassa kenaci lesenapi kattumasakkuṇeyyattā kopiyeva.
anya-e0812n:629_6: Pakatīpi acinteyyabhūtā pakatīpi evameva aho vijjamānānaṃyeva paññādīnaṃ sabhāvāvabodhassa dukkaratā acchariyā.
anya-e0812n:629_7: Kāpi kopīti padakkamassa “pakatī”ti ettha suññattā rītibhaṅgo.
anya-e0812n:633_2: Yattha yasmiṃ vākye padānaṃ syādyantākhyātikānaṃ dubbinikkhepā duṭṭhapanato byāmoho saṃmuḷhatā jāyati uppajjati,
anya-e0812n:634_2: Padānaṃ syādyantatyādyantapadānaṃ dubbinikkhepā duṭṭhapanato yattha vākye byāmoho saṃmoho jāyati,
anya-e0812n:634_4: Tadudāharaṇaṃ tassa byākiṇṇadosassa lakkhiyaṃ yathā iminā vakkhamānanayena.
anya-e0812n:638_1: Bahuanantattā bahubhūte guṇe sīlādike samanussaraṃ sammadeva uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya anussaranto guṇavisayasatiṃ
anya-e0812n:638_2: paccupaṭṭhāpento teneva kāraṇena pamudito haṭṭhapahaṭṭho ayaṃ jano sabbopi loko dujjanānaṃ sujanetarānampi
anya-e0812n:638_3: devadattādīnaṃ niccaṃ kālaṃ hitaṃ sugataṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ paṇamati namassatīti ayaṃ attho kavivañcito.
anya-e0812n:638_4: Tattha “bahuguṇe paṇamatī”tyādi byavahitapadappayogā moho jāyatīti byākiṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n:639_2: Bahuguṇe anantattā bahubhūte sīlasamādhiādiguṇe samanussaraṃ visesato anussaranto pamudito tatoyeva pahaṭṭho
anya-e0812n:639_3: ayaṃ jano sattanikāyo dujjanānampi asappurisānampi niccaṃ satataṃ hitaṃ mittabhūtaṃ sugataṃ sabbaññuṃ
anya-e0812n:639_5: Ettha padānaṃ aṭṭhānapayogato byākiṇṇattaṃ padatthānusāreneva gamyate.
anya-e0812n:642_0: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃ nvi’daṃ.
anya-e0812n:643_1: Visiṭṭhassa kassaci atthassa vacanato kathanato apetaṃ pariccattaṃ.
anya-e0812n:643_5: idaṃ kiṃ nu iti gāmikajanavacanattā “kaññi”ccādikaṃ gāmmaṃ.
anya-e0812n:644_2: Visiṭṭhavacanāpetaṃ piyabhūtena uttivisesena visesitabbassa kathanato parihīnaṃ vākyaṃ “gāmmadosa”nti kavīhi abhimataṃ.
anya-e0812n:644_4: Kaññe he kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ tuvaṃ icchayamānaṃ maṃ na kāmayasi tvaṃ na icchasi,
anya-e0812n:648_0: Sa manmathonyatra gato mato nu”iti viya.
anya-e0812n:649_0: Piyatthassa kathanābhāvato “kaññe”tyādikaṃ vacanaṃ milakkhukānaṃ vacanattā gāmmaṃ.
anya-e0812n:649_1: Ettha kaññāsaddo dasavassikāya vattatīti niyamo natthi.
anya-e0812n:653_2: Padasandhānato pubbāparānaṃ padānaṃ sandhivasena yaṃ kiñci vākyaṃ duṭṭhu asutisubhagaṃ patītimavabodhaṃ karotīti karaṃ bhave,
anya-e0812n:653_5: Bhavato yā kāci vanitā piyā hotīti ekottho.
anya-e0812n:654_2: Kiñci vākyaṃ padasandhānato pubbāparapadānaṃ ghaṭanato duppatītikaraṃ bhave asabbhabhūtaduṭṭhatthassa pakāsako hoti,
anya-e0812n:654_3: tampi gāmmanti yathāvuttagāmmadosena dūsitanti duppasitanti (ka.) sabbehi kavīhi abhimataṃ ñātaṃ.
anya-e0812n:654_5: Bhavato bhavantassa yā kāci itthī piyā bhavatīti ayaṃ kavinā icchitattho.
anya-e0812n:656_0: Vuttesu sūcite ṭhāne, padacchedo bhave yati;
anya-e0812n:657_0: Yaṃ tāya hīnaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, yatihīnanti sā pana.
anya-e0812n:658_2: Vuttesu chandosatthapariniddiṭṭhesu anuṭṭhubhādīsu sūcite ṭhāne “etthayatī”ti chandovicitiyā pakāsitaṭṭhāne
anya-e0812n:658_3: padānaṃ syādyantānaṃ chedo vicchiti vibhāgo anuvādo yaṃ yati bhaveti vidhīyati.
anya-e0812n:658_4: Tāya yatiyā hīnaṃ parihīnaṃ viruddhaṃ yaṃ vākyaṃ,
anya-e0812n:659_2: Vuttesu chandosatthe niddiṭṭhaanuṭṭhubhādīsu sūcite ṭhāne “ayamettha yatī”ti pakāsite ṭhāne padacchedo
anya-e0812n:659_3: syādyantatyādyantādīnaṃ padānaṃ vicchedo yati nāma bhave,
anya-e0812n:659_4: tāya yatiyā yaṃ vākyaṃ hīnaṃ abhimataṭṭhāne vaṇṇavicchedena parihīnaṃ,
anya-e0812n:659_5: taṃ vākyaṃ yatihīnanti yatihīnadosena duṭṭhanti viññūhi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:661_0: Yati sabbattha pādante, vuttaḍḍhe ca visesato;
anya-e0812n:663_2: Sabbattha pādante sabbasmiṃ catutthaṃsasaṅkhātānaṃ gāthāpādānaṃ ante avasāne ca visesato visesena ekantena
anya-e0812n:663_3: vuttaḍḍhe ca vuttānaṃ pādadvayasaṅkhāte aḍḍhe ca,
anya-e0812n:663_6: Nanu “padacchedo”ti vuttattā padamajjhe yati na hotevāti ceti āha “pubba”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:664_2: Sā pana yati sabbattha pādante catutthaṃsasaṅkhātagāthāpādānaṃ ante ca visesato niyamato vuttaḍḍhe ca vuttānaṃ pādadvayasaṅkhāte aḍḍhe ca,
anya-e0812n:664_4: Katthaci kismiñci ṭhāne pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhepi pubbāparabhūtaanekavaṇṇasamannāgatapadānaṃ majjhe ca siyā.
anya-e0812n:664_5: Padacchedassa “yatī”ti vuttattā padamajjhe na hotīti saṅkāpariharaṇatthaṃ “pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhe”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:669_3: Cāmīkarasseva suvaṇṇassa viya vaṇṇo yassa taṃ tathāgataṃ sirasā namāmi. Kīdisaṃ?
anya-e0812n:669_4: Yo tathāgato sakalāpi disā sabbāyeva dasa disā soṇṇarasehi cāmīkaravaṇṇattā rasehi suvaṇṇarasehi siñcatīva siñcatīti maññe,
anya-e0812n:669_6: Ettha pubbapādante vuttaḍḍhe ca niyatā yati.
anya-e0812n:669_11: Siñcatīti ettha pana pubbāparānekavaṇṇapadamajjhattābhāvā siñcaityatra yati duṭṭhāti.
anya-e0812n:670_1: Tattha pādantavuttaḍḍhesu yatiyā pākaṭattā tasmiṃ padamajjhe yatiyā udāharaṇapaccudāharaṇāni iṭṭhodāharaṇapaṭipakkhodāharaṇāni yathā.
anya-e0812n:670_3: Yo tathāgato sakalāpi disā soṇṇarasehi suvaṇṇarasadhārāhi siñcatīva siñcati maññe,
anya-e0812n:670_5: Cāmīkaravaṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇasadisachavivaṇṇaṃ taṃ tathāgataṃ sirasā name.
anya-e0812n:670_6: Ettha “cāmīkaravaṇṇa”nti yatiyā cāmīti akkharadvayamatikkamma ṭhitattā antepi karaiti akkharadvayenānūnattā
anya-e0812n:670_8: Siñcatīti pade siñcāti vaṇṇadvayamatikkamma yatiyā dissamānattepi tiiti parabhāge ekavaṇṇattā anekavaṇṇābhāvoti paccudāharaṇaṃ.
anya-e0812n:670_10: Cāmīkarassa vaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa soti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:672_0: Saro sandhimhi pubbanto, viya lope vibhattiyā;
anya-e0812n:674_2: Vibhattiyā lope sati sandhimhi saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ saro parapadādibhūto pubbanto viya pubbapadassa antabhūto yo saro,
anya-e0812n:674_4: anekavaṇṇattābhāvepi tato vihitayatiyā nevatthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:674_5: Aññathā tu vibhattiyā alope tu sati saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ pubbapadantabhūto saro ce,
anya-e0812n:674_8: Taṃ vibhattiyā saddhiṃ vihāya katayatiyā natthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:674_9: Tattha tassaṃ yatiyaṃ yādesādi ivaṇṇādīnaṃ kātabbo yakārādesādi parādiva parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti.
anya-e0812n:674_10: Katayādesādisahitaṃ byañjanaṃ vihāya katāya yatiyā natthi bhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:675_1: Idāni heṭṭhā vuttassa viruddhattepi yatibhaṅgābhāvaṃ dassento āha “saro”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:675_2: Vibhattiyā lope sandhimhi sati saro sandhisaro pubbanto viya pubbapadassa anto viya hoti,
anya-e0812n:675_3: aññathā tu vibhattiyā alope saṃhitāyaṃ katāyaṃ aññathā hoti,
anya-e0812n:675_4: pubbapadantabhūto saro parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti.
anya-e0812n:675_5: Tattha yatiyaṃ yādesādi ivaṇṇādīnaṃ kattabbayakārādesādi parādiva parapadassa ādisaro viya hoti,
anya-e0812n:675_7: yatiyā payuttāya sati anekavaṇṇattābhāvepi yatibhaṅgo na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:679_1: Niccaṃ anavarataṃ pubbapadaṃ sitā nissitā cādī cakārādayo nipātā pubbassa padassa antā avayavā viya honti,
anya-e0812n:679_2: te anto katvā yati kātabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:679_5: pādayo tu parādīva parapadassa ādī avayavā viya honti,
anya-e0812n:679_6: taṃ vihāya pubbapadante yati kātabbāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:680_2: Niccaṃ satataṃ pubbapadassitā pubbapadaṃ nissāya pavattā cādī cakārādinipātā pubbapadantāva pubbapadassa antā avayavā viya honti,
anya-e0812n:680_3: parena parapadena niccasambandhā nirantarayogino pādayo tu pādiupasaggā pana parādīva parapadassa ādī avayavāviya honti.
anya-e0812n:680_4: Cādayo āgamma te bahi katvāpi pādayo āgamma te anto katvāpi pavatto virāmo yatibhaṅgoti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:684_0: Yassa lokaggataṃ patta-sso’pamā na hi yujjati.
anya-e0812n:687_0: Yassa paññā ca mettā ca, nissīmāti vijambhati.

anya-e0812n:800_5: na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā”ti ceti iminā purātanehi niddiṭṭhasoḷasapaheḷikāyopi dassitāti siddhena asiddhasādhanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:800_6: Tattha kavinā uyyānasaddena gehañca latāpariyāyavallarīsaddena aṅganā ca pallavasaddena karacaraṇādharā
anya-e0812n:801_0: Vākyatthadosepi paduminīnaṃ rattiyaṃ pabujjhanādikaṃ viruddhaṃ virodhipadeyeva antogadhattā na vuttanti dassetuṃ “katotra saṅkhepanayā”ti vuttaṃ,
anya-e0812n:801_2: Ettha ocityahīnaduppatītikarānaṃ dvinnaṃ vākyatthadosatte sati bandhapharusassa vākyadosatte sati virodhino
anya-e0812n:801_6: paduminīnaṃ rattiyaṃ phullatādi dunniddatādi (ka.) vākyatthañceti ime cattāro dosā bhinnajātikesu ocityādīsu kathaṃ saṅgahitāti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n:801_7: tathāpi padānaṃ duṭṭhatte sati vākyavākyatthānamaduṭṭhatā nāma natthīti padadosena sandhivākyavākyatthadosānamanaññattaṃ
anya-e0812n:801_8: sissānaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ padadosādikaṃ vākyatthadosādīsu saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:801_9: Imināyeva purātanehi viruddhatthantarādipadehi vicaritaṃ vākyaṃ viruddhantiādinā duṭṭhāni bahūni vākyāni dassitānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:802_0: Imāyeva imissāyeva (ka.) gāthāya “tamatthi ce khedakaraṃ parampī”ti ettha parasaddenaasādhusandiddhapariyāyañeyyāppatītatthaappayojaka-
anya-e0812n:802_1: dubbodhadesiyādipadadose ca adhikaūnabhaggacchandādivākyadose ca upakkamopasaṃhāravisamasaṅkhāte vākyatthadose ca pariggaṇhāti.
anya-e0812n:802_3: Kriyānipphattikāraṇamupādāya atthantare pavattanāmaṃ visesanatthena vinā saññābhājane payuttaṃ sandiddhaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n:802_5: Ettha himahā ravīti visesane kate doso natthi.
anya-e0812n:802_8: Atisayā vinā bhāvitatthena visesyassa guṇavācakaṃ padaṃ appatītatthaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n:804_0: Kani he kaññe te tavapāde manuññaddhanayo manoharasaddasamannāgatā khādayo gaggharikā bhanti dibbantīti.
anya-e0812n:804_1: Kismiñci deseyeva siddhanāmaṃ desiyaṃ nāma. Yathā–
anya-e0812n:806_0: He lolavilocane te tava ime gallā kapolā lāvaṇyatallā manuññatallā jalāsayavisesā bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:806_1: Kenaci lesena pakāsitamatthamupādāya payuttamadhikaṃ nāma. Yathā–
anya-e0812n:809_1: nettamanañjana”nti imināyevathīnaṃ vidhavattaṃ gamyamānaṃ hotīti tappakāsanatthaṃ payuttaṃ “saggasevina”nti idaṃ adhikaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:809_5: Idaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ chandānaṃ akkharagaṇanato ūnādhikavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:809_7: Idaṃ āraddhakkamaṃ pariccajitvā kamantarena niyamanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:819_2: Sakalopi ayaṃ virodho viruddhatthantarādikato na koci eko eva dosesu,
anya-e0812n:819_3: dosānaṃ vā saṅkhyaṃ gaṇanaṃ dosabhāvaṃ atikkamma paricchijja guṇānaṃ vīthiṃ padaviṃ guṇasabhāvataṃ vigāhate abbhupagacchati kadāci,
anya-e0812n:819_8: tena kāraṇena vuttānaṃ viruddhatthantarādīnaṃ virodhānaṃ yathā yena pakārena avirodho niddosatā siyā bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n:819_9: tathā tena pakārena dosānaṃ parihāro dūrīkaraṇaṃ avabujjhati ñāyati etenāti avabodho,
anya-e0812n:819_11: tannāmiko paricchedo idāni nīyate ānīyate vuccateti attho.
anya-e0812n:820_1: Evaṃ dosavibhāgaṃ paricchinditvā idāni yathāvuttadosānaṃ parihāratthamārabhanto “kadācī”tyādimāha.
anya-e0812n:820_2: Sakalopi ayaṃ virodho padadosādiko dosasaṅkhyaṃ dosānaṃ,
anya-e0812n:820_3: dosesu vā gaṇanaṃ dosabhāvaṃ atikkamma kadāci kavikosallā kavino byākaraṇābhidhānachandoalaṅkatiādīsu
anya-e0812n:820_4: paricayalakkhaṇena paññāpāṭavena yato guṇavīthiṃ guṇapadaviṃ kevalaṃ guṇasabhāvaṃ vigāhate abbhupagacchati,
anya-e0812n:820_5: tena kāraṇena vuttavirodhānaṃ yathāvuttapadadosādivirodhānaṃ avirodho aviruddhatā yathā siyā yena pakārena bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n:820_6: tathā tena pakārena dosaparihārāvabodho yathāvuttapadadosādisambandhino pariharaṇakkamassa avabodhakāraṇattā
anya-e0812n:825_0: Taṃ kathaṃ nāma megho’yaṃ, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n:826_3: manuññānaṃ vā sālīnaṃ rattasāliādīnaṃ sālijātīnaṃ dassanā sukhaṃ cetasikaṃ somanassaṃ vindantaṃ taṃ janaṃ
anya-e0812n:826_4: visado ayaṃ megho ambudo kathaṃ nāma sukhayeti.
anya-e0812n:826_5: Ettha tādisassa janassa asukhappadānaṃ garaḷassa meghassānurūpanti viruddhatthantaratā parihaṭā.
anya-e0812n:827_4: manuññānaṃ vā sālīnaṃ rattasāliādīnaṃ dassanā dassanahetu sukhaṃ cetasikasomanassaṃ vindantaṃ anubhontaṃ
anya-e0812n:827_5: taṃ janaṃ taṃ kassakajanaṃ visado jaladāyako ayaṃ megho kathaṃ nāma sukhaye,
anya-e0812n:827_7: Tādisassa janassa dukkhadānaṃ garaḷadāyakassa meghassāpi anurūpamiti viruddhaññattho apanīto hoti.
anya-e0812n:834_7: pakkhantare tvaviruddhaṃ bhagavato āgussa rāgādino abhāvato.
anya-e0812n:834_8: Imesaṃ gunnaṃ atisayena go gotamo hīnapasu,
anya-e0812n:834_10: Hīnapasu ca tvaṃ mahāmati asīti viruddhaṃ accantahīnapasuno mahatiyā paññāya abhāvato.
anya-e0812n:834_15: bhagavato tu rasehi siṅgārādīhi apetoti yujjati. Me mama.
anya-e0812n:834_17: Te tava gati pavatti cittā abbhutāti.
anya-e0812n:834_18: Ettha viruddhatthantaraṃ virodhālaṅkāraṃ silāghanīyanti tena taṃ parihaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n:835_1: Yathā vā uttadosassa parihāro īdiso vā.
anya-e0812n:835_3: He sāmi tvaṃ vināyakopi garuḷopi nāgosi pannago asi. No ce,
anya-e0812n:835_4: vināyakopi satte vinento eva nāgosi nikkileso asi.
anya-e0812n:835_5: Gotamopi pasutamopi mahāmati mahāpaññavāsi. No ce,
anya-e0812n:835_7: Paṇītopi madhuropi rasāpeto madhurarasato apagatosi. No ce,
anya-e0812n:835_8: paṇītopi uttamo eva rasāpeto siṅgārādirasato apagatosi.
anya-e0812n:835_9: Te tuyhaṃ gati pavatti me mayhaṃ cittā acchariyā.
anya-e0812n:835_10: Ettha garuḷassa nāgattañca pasutamassa paññavantattañca paṇītassa nirasattañca viruddhaṃ,
anya-e0812n:835_11: tathāpi aññapakkhassa aviruddhattā viruddhatthantaradoso pasatthena viruddhālaṅkārena nirākato.
anya-e0812n:835_14: Natthi āgu ago (ka.) etassāti nāgo, buddho.
anya-e0812n:842_3: tādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ attani abhāve sati lokaṃ sattalokaṃ kathaṃ toseti,
anya-e0812n:842_5: Vuttamevatthantarena sādheti “khajjoto nāma obhāsitā dīpitā asesadisā yena tathāvidho kiṃ bhave,
anya-e0812n:842_7: Ettha khajjotassa adhikatthabhāvena sito obhāsitāsesadisattadoso “kathaṃ tādiguṇābhāve”tiādivacobhaṅgiyā parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n:843_4: Dujjano guṇahīnajano tādiguṇābhāve santosajananakāraṇānaṃ tādisānaṃ sīlādiguṇānaṃ attani avijjamānatte sati lokaṃ sattalokaṃ kathaṃ toseti,
anya-e0812n:843_6: tathā hi khajjoto nāma obhāsitāsesadiso kiṃ bhave,
anya-e0812n:843_9: Tādī ca te guṇā ceti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:846_0: Piyā sukhā’liṅgitaṃ ka-māliṅgati nu no iti.
anya-e0812n:847_2: Kiliṭṭhatā kiliṭṭhapadadoso paheḷikāya visaye āruḷhā sahī na hi no duṭṭho siyā.
anya-e0812n:847_5: Piyā vallabhāya āliṅgitaṃ kaṃ janaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca no āliṅgati na saṃyujjati nu.
anya-e0812n:847_7: Ettha piyāti kiliṭṭhaṃ paheḷikāya samāropena parihaṭaṃ.
anya-e0812n:848_2: Kiliṭṭhatā kiliṭṭhapadadosasaṅkhātā paheḷikāyaṃ visaye āruḷhā ce,
anya-e0812n:848_3: na hi duṭṭhā duṭṭhā na hoti.
anya-e0812n:848_5: Piyā sukhāliṅgitaṃ kamāliṅgati nu no iti,
anya-e0812n:848_6: itisaddassa nidassanatthattā sesaudāharaṇānametamupalakkhaṇanti ñātabbaṃ. No ce,
anya-e0812n:848_8: Piyā vallabhāya āliṅgitaṃ upaguhitaṃ kaṃ nāma janaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikamānasikaṃ no āliṅgati nu,
anya-e0812n:848_10: Ettha piyāti kiliṭṭhapadaṃ paheḷikāyamāropanena nirākataṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:852_4: Etaṃmayaṃ viyāti etena kiliṭṭhapadena nibbattaṃ viya.
anya-e0812n:853_2: Kiliṭṭhapadaṃ icchite yamake iṭṭhayamake no payojeyya nappayujjeyya,
anya-e0812n:853_3: tato iṭṭhayamakato aññaṃ sabbaṃ yamakaṃ pana etaṃmayaṃ viya iminā kiliṭṭhapadadosena kataṃ viya hoti.
anya-e0812n:858_2: Bodhisattassa māyādeviyā sutassa vakkhamānassa visesassa taduppannadine sambhavā pabhāvena puññappabhāvato
anya-e0812n:858_3: jalajāni ambujāni thalepi ahuṃ ahesuṃ acintanīyattā puññappabhāvassa.
anya-e0812n:858_4: Kiṃ pana vāpyādīsu kiṃ karontāva tahiṃ tasmiñca jale suciraṃ sabbadāva āvasanamāvāso tena jāto kleso taṃ nudantāniva dūrato jahantāniveti.
anya-e0812n:858_5: Acintanīyattā puññappabhāvassa īdisampi acchariyamahosīti na desavirodho.
anya-e0812n:859_1: Bodhisattappabhāvena bodhisattassa acinteyyānubhāvena jalajāni jalajasadisattā tannāmakāni padumakeravādīni
anya-e0812n:859_2: tahiṃ jale visayattena pasiddhe tasmiṃ udake sucirāvāsaklesaṃ aticiraṃ nivāsato jātaāyāsaṃ nudantāni
anya-e0812n:859_3: iva cajantāni iva thalepi ahuṃ ahesuṃ,
anya-e0812n:859_5: Ettha jalajānaṃ thaluppattikathanasaṅkhātaṃ desavirodhaṃ acinteyyapuññappabhāvena īdisānaṃ acchariyānaṃ
anya-e0812n:864_2: Mando mudubhūto māruto ayaṃ sabbotukaṃ sabbesu utūsu pupphanakaṃ kusumaṃ pupphaṃ samaṃ ekato katvā dhunanto
anya-e0812n:864_3: vikiranto munino munisadisattā bhavissantamunibhāvena ca bodhisattassa,
anya-e0812n:864_4: muninoyeva vā sammāsambodhisamadhigamasamaye mahānubhāvassa pisuno sūcako vāyi pavāyatīti.
anya-e0812n:864_5: Ettha yadyapekadā sabbotukāsambhavo nānāutūsu nānākusumassa sambhavā,
anya-e0812n:864_6: tathāpi bhagavato mahānubhāvapisunamīdisamekapadikaṃ sambhavatīti kālavirodho iminā parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n:865_2: Ayaṃ mandamāruto acaṇḍasamīraṇo sabbotukaṃ vasantādīsu sabbautūsu vikasantaṃ kusumaṃ pupphajātaṃ samaṃ
anya-e0812n:865_3: ekato katvā dhunanto kampento munino ekantabhāvittā munisaṅkhātassa bodhisattassa,
anya-e0812n:865_4: sammāsambodhisamadhigamasamaye bhūtattā munino sabbaññuno vā mahānubhāvapisuno mahantaṃ puññappabhāvaṃ pakāsento vāyi sampavāyīti.
anya-e0812n:865_5: Ettha nānākāle sambhavantānampi kusumānaṃ ekakāle sambhavassa kālavirodhattepi bhagavato puññānubhāvo
anya-e0812n:865_6: tādisamacchariyamekakkhaṇe janetuṃ samatthoti kālavirodhaṃ “mahānubhāvapisuno”ti iminā nirākaroti.
anya-e0812n:869_0: Tantissaravirodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0812n:870_2: Buddhassa guṇe sīlādike aparimāṇe nimuggaṃ ogāḷhaṃ manaṃ cittaṃ yassa tassa pañcasikhassa gandhabbadevaputtassapi
anya-e0812n:870_3: vīṇāya tantiyā saro kiriyākālamānalakkhaṇavilambitadutamajjhabhedabhinno chajjādiko tassa virodho kalāsatthapariniddiṭṭhakamavesamaṃ
anya-e0812n:871_2: Buddhaguṇe sabbaññuno vimhayajanakasīlādiguṇasambhāre nimuggamanaso otiṇṇacittassa pañcasikhassapi gandhabbadevaputtassāpi
anya-e0812n:871_5: hatthādīnaṃ sannivesalakkhaṇo mānoti imehi tīhi lakkhaṇehi yuttassa mandasīghamajjhimappamāṇehi bhinnassa
anya-e0812n:871_6: chajjādisattasarassa kalāsatthāgatakkamassa vināsasaṅkhāto virodho kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇeti,
anya-e0812n:871_8: Ettha akantiyā kāraṇabhūto kalāsatthāgatakkamabhaṅgo lokuttarabuddhaguṇānugatabuddhiyā jātoti so bhaṅgo
anya-e0812n:871_9: “nimuggamanaso buddhaguṇe”ti vuttattā pītiyā kāraṇameveti na virodho.
anya-e0812n:876_2: Candanāya api sītalaṃ gaṇaye cintesi. Kintaṃ?
anya-e0812n:876_4: Sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇe sattaṃ paribaddhaṃ hadayaṃ cittaṃ yassa so.
anya-e0812n:876_5: Sabbaññutaññāṇānubandhabuddhino hi tādiso manobandhoti na lokavirodho.
anya-e0812n:877_2: Sambodhisattahadayo sabbaññutaññāṇe āsattacitto so bodhisatto padittaṅgārapūritaṃ ādittaṅgārehi paripuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:877_3: cakkavāḷaṃ cakkavāḷagabbhaṃ candanāyapi candanato api sītalaṃ atisītalaṃ katvā gaṇaye cinteyyāti.
anya-e0812n:877_4: Iṭṭhatthaluddhassa cittappavattiyā īdisattā aggino candanatopi adhikasītattakappanā “candanaṃ sītalaṃ,
anya-e0812n:877_5: aggi uṇho”ti pavattalokasīmāya viruddhā na hoti.
anya-e0812n:882_2: Munipuṅgava munīnaṃ uttama pariccatto visaṭṭho bhavo sugatiduggatisaṅkhāto yenāti pariccattabhavopi tvaṃ
anya-e0812n:882_3: upanīto ānīto pavattito bhavo vuḍḍhi yenāti upanītabhavo asi.
anya-e0812n:882_4: Tasmā kāraṇā acintyaguṇasārāya te namo atthūti seso.
anya-e0812n:883_2: Munipuṅgava muniseṭṭha tvaṃ pariccattabhavopi apanītasugatiduggatibhavopi upanītabhavo lokassānītaabhivuddhiko asi bhavasi,
anya-e0812n:883_3: acintyaguṇasārāya tato eva cintāvisayātikkantasāraguṇassa te tuyhaṃ namo atthūti sabbākārato bhavassa
anya-e0812n:883_4: pariccattattā attani avijjamānaṃ sugatibhavaṃ lokassa detīti etaṃ ñāyāgataṃ na hotīti paṭibhāti,
anya-e0812n:883_5: tathāpi ca sabbaññūnaṃ pavatti īdisāyevāti ñāyavirodho nirākato.
anya-e0812n:888_2: Yatīti bhikkhu kenāpi saha nevālapati na vadatyeva,
anya-e0812n:888_3: tathāpi vacīviññattito copanavācāsaṅkhātena vacīviññattihetunā pavattito sampajānantassa musāvādato kāraṇā
anya-e0812n:888_5: Ettha anālapato vacīviññattiyā kathaṃ musāvādoti abhidhammāpannavirodho natthi,
anya-e0812n:889_2: Yati samaṇo kenāpi kenaci saddhiṃ nevālapati no bhāsati,
anya-e0812n:889_3: tathāpi vacīviññattito copanavācāsaṅkhātaviññattikāraṇā pavattanato sampajānamusāvādā sampajānantassa
anya-e0812n:889_5: Ettha anālapantassa vacīviññattito musāvādo kathaṃ sambhavatīti abhidhammāpannavirodho,
anya-e0812n:889_7: sampajānamusāvāda’ssa hotī”ti nidānuddese niddiṭṭhavacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā dukkaṭāpatti hotīti āgamavirodho nirākato.
anya-e0812n:889_9: Yathā kāle avassamānameghato sañjātadubbhikkhaṃ “meghakataṃ dubbhikkha”nti vattabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:889_10: evaṃ kathetabbakāle akathanato sañjātā vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānā dukkaṭāpattipi tato sañjātāti vattabbā hoti.
anya-e0812n:893_0: Imā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti nibbharaṃ.
anya-e0812n:894_2: Sītamarīcino candassa marīciyo dīdhitiyo eva candanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:894_4: tassa lābhena imā sabbāpi disā nibbharamatisayaṃ dhavalā setā rocantīti natthettha neyyatā marīciyā saddopāttatthāya tu.
anya-e0812n:895_2: Sītamarīcino candassa marīcicandanālepalābhā marīcisaṅkhātacandanālepassa paṭilābhato imā sabbāpi disā
anya-e0812n:895_4: Disānaṃ dhavalakāraṇassa “marīcicandanālepalābhā sītamarīcino”ti vuttattā neyyadoso na patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0812n:900_3: māraṅganānaṃ siṅgārakato vibbhamo vilāso jinena asamanuññāto abbhupagato mārassa vasavattino hadayānalo hadayaggi jāto.
anya-e0812n:900_4: Soko cettha analatthe niruppito tassa tādisatthānativattanato,
anya-e0812n:900_7: tathāpi “siṅgāravibbhamo mārassa hadayaggī”ti vutte sāmatthiyā māraṅganāparājayo gamyate,
anya-e0812n:901_2: Manonurañjano dassanasavanānussaraṇaṃ karontānaṃ janānaṃ cittamattani anurañjanto māraṅganāsiṅgāravibbhamo
anya-e0812n:901_4: asamanuññāto anabbhupagato asampaṭicchito mārassa vasavattino hadayānalo hadayaggi ahosīti.
anya-e0812n:901_5: Analattena kappitakāriyabhūto soko māraṅganāsiṅgāravibbhamasaṅkhātakāraṇena saddhiṃ abhedakappanāya analattakappanāya (ka.) “guḷo semhaṃ,
anya-e0812n:901_6: tipusaṃ jaro”tiādīsu viya tulyādhikaraṇabhāvena vutto hoti.
anya-e0812n:901_7: Ettha kiñcāpi māraṅganānaṃ parājayavācako saddo natthi,
anya-e0812n:901_8: tathāpi “siṅgāravibbhamo mārassa hadayānalo”ti vutte māraṅganāparājayaṃ vinā tādisasokuppattikāraṇassa
anya-e0812n:901_9: anadhigatattā aññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyena tāsaṃ parājayo pakāsito hotīti īdisavaṅkavuttiyā bandhaguṇattā
anya-e0812n:906_2: Ayaṃ verī jano apayātāparādhampi jananti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:907_2: Ayaṃ verī jano apayātāparādhampi apagatāparādhampi janaṃ kodhapāṭalabhūtena kodhena bhūtasetalohitavaṇṇayuttena cakkhunā bhiyyo yebhuyyena passatīti.
anya-e0812n:914_2: Budho paṇḍitaposo appakānaṃ pāpānampi kimutamadhikānaṃ pabhāvaṃ ānubhāvaṃ nāsaye appavattiṃ pāpeyya.
anya-e0812n:914_4: Bhāṇumā sūriyo nippabhataṃ ānīto khajjoto yena tathāvidho api hoti.
anya-e0812n:915_2: Budho paññavā appakānampi atimandānampi pāpānaṃ akusalānaṃ pabhāvaṃ vipākadānasāmatthiyasaṅkhātānubhāvaṃ nāsaye ahosikammatāpādanena nāseyya,
anya-e0812n:915_5: Bhāṇumā sūriyo nippabhatānītakhajjoto api nippabhatamāpāditajotiriṅgaṇehi samannāgatopi hotīti.
anya-e0812n:915_6: Hīnapabhāvo hoti khajjopanake pahāya attano ālokaṃ karonto na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:915_7: Ettha api nippabhaticcādivacanavilāsavasena hīnapakkhaṃ gahetvāpi sūriyaudārattasseva positattā “nippabhatānītakhajjoto”ti
anya-e0812n:915_11: taṃ ānītā khajjotā yeneti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:920_0: 85. “Na pāde”ccādi. Ettha vandeiccādo heṭṭhā viya pādapūraṇassa kassaci abhāvena anatthābhāvo.
anya-e0812n:921_2: Pādapūraṇatthāya gāthāpādānaṃ pūraṇasaṅkhātapayojanatthāya padaṃ nāmādikaṃ katthaci na yojeyya viññūti,
anya-e0812n:921_3: yathā niratthakapadāyojane udāharaṇamevaṃ “munindassa varaṃ pādapaṅkeruhaṃ vande”ti.
anya-e0812n:921_4: Heṭṭhā duṭṭhodāharaṇe viya pādapūraṇatthaṃ kassaci padassa ayojitattā sātthakapadehi niratthakadoso nirākatoti.
anya-e0812n:927_2: Bhayañca cittutrāso kodho ca doso pasaṃsā ca thuti,
anya-e0812n:927_3: tā ādi yassa turitādino so tādiso viseso yadi vattuṃ kāmīyate icchīyate,
anya-e0812n:927_4: tattha tasmiṃ bhayādivisese visaye ekatthatāya ekatthabhāvena kato doso natthi.
anya-e0812n:928_2: Bhayakodhapasaṃsādi cittutrāsapaṭighathutiādīhi samannāgato tādiso viseso vattuṃ yadi kāmīyate ce viññūhi icchīyate,
anya-e0812n:928_3: tattha bhayakodhādike visese ekatthatākato ekatthabhāvena kato doso vākyadoso na bhavati.
anya-e0812n:928_4: Bhayādivisese vattumicchite pubbuccāritapadassa punuccāraṇe ekatthadoso na hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:928_5: Bhayañca kodho ca pasaṃsā cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:928_6: tā ādi yassa turitakotūhalaaccharāhāsasokapasādasaṅkhātassa atthavisesasseti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:928_7: Tagguṇasaṃviññāṇaaññapadatthasamāsattā bhayādīsu kathitamapi gahetvā punappunaṃ kathanamavirodhaṃ.
anya-e0812n:928_8: Eko attho yesaṃ padādīnaṃ te ekatthā,
anya-e0812n:931_0: Sappo sappo ayaṃ handa, nivattatu bhavaṃ tato;
anya-e0812n:933_2: “Ayaṃ sappo sappo”ti bhayenāmeḍitaṃ handāti khede tato tamhā ṭhānā,
anya-e0812n:933_3: sappato vā bhavaṃ bhavanto nivattatu gatamaggābhimukho āvattatu.
anya-e0812n:934_3: ayaṃ sappo sappo bhavaṃ tato ṭhānato,
anya-e0812n:934_4: sappato vā nivattatu āvattatu yadi jīvitukāmo asi,
anya-e0812n:943_3: atisayo ādhikkaṃ vācāgocarabhāvātikkamena avacanīyattā yo kociyeva.
anya-e0812n:943_4: Mano anekalokassa cittaṃ haratīti manoharā cittamavaharantī kanti sobhā kāpi avacanapathā kāpiyeva.
anya-e0812n:943_6: tasmā buddhassa mahanto udayo abhivuḍḍhi aho abbhutoti.
anya-e0812n:943_7: Ettha kiṃsaddenāraddhā rīti na katthaci bhaggā.
anya-e0812n:944_3: alaṅkatassa byāmappabhāketumālāhi ujjalassa rūpakāyassa ādhikyaṃ yo kociyeva manogocarabhāvaṃ vinā vacanavisayātikkantattā
anya-e0812n:944_5: Manoharā lokassa cittaṃ harantī kanti sobhā kāpiyeva vacīvisayātikkantattā kāpiyeva.
anya-e0812n:944_6: Vilāsātisayo visayabhūtapiyabhāvasaṅkhātassa gamanādivilāsassa ādhikyampi kopiyeva vuttakāraṇenevakopiyeva.
anya-e0812n:944_7: Tato buddhamahodayo buddhassa mahābhivuddhisaṅkhāto udayo aho acchariyoti.
anya-e0812n:944_8: Ettha sabbanāmikena kiṃ saddena vattumāraddhakkamo na katthaci bhinnoti bhaggarītidoso natthīti.
anya-e0812n:948_4: tesaṃ vinyāso yāthāvato ṭhapanaṃ yassa taṃ.
anya-e0812n:948_6: So abyākiṇṇatāya eva manoharo cāti abyākiṇṇaṃ manoharaṃ.
anya-e0812n:948_7: Teneva “ayamettha attho ayaṃ vā”ti evaṃ byāmohaṃ na karotīti abyāmohakaro, taṃ.
anya-e0812n:949_2: Adūrapadavinyāsaṃ nāmādipadānaṃ vohārakāle adūrasambandho yathā siyā,
anya-e0812n:949_5: tatoyeva viññūnaṃ cittamārādhentaṃ abyāmohakaraṃ “imassattho imassattho eso eso vā”ti saṃsayamanuppādentaṃ
anya-e0812n:949_6: bandhaṃ pasādālaṅkārasaṃyuttaṃ bandhanaṃ kavissarā kavīnaṃ padhānā paṇḍibhajanā,
anya-e0812n:949_14: tesaṃ vinyāso ṭhapanaṃ yassa bandhassāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:956_2: Yassa jinassa nayanaṃ nettaṃ nīluppalābhaṃ indīvaradvayanibhaṃ,
anya-e0812n:956_3: adharo adharoṭṭho bandhukamiva bandhukakusumamiva ruciro kanto,
anya-e0812n:956_5: tena kāraṇena ayaṃ jino piyaṃ madhuraṃ dassanamassāti piyadassano.
anya-e0812n:957_5: tena kāraṇena ayaṃ jino piyadassano manuññadassano hotīti.
anya-e0812n:957_7: Ābhāsaddo nibhāsaddo viya ivattho. No ce,
