anya-e0812n:957_11: Iha dassanassa kattubhūtasādhujanasambandhattepi visayatteneva jinasambandho hotīti aññapadatthena tathāgato gahitoti.
anya-e0812n:961_4: Yāsaṃ kantānaṃ madhurānaṃ vācānaṃ tāhi abhisaṅkhataṃ racitaṃ bandhanaṃ rasassa mādhuriyassa hetuttā kāraṇabhāvena
anya-e0812n:962_2: Samatikkantagāmmattakantavācābhisaṅkhataṃ visesato atikkantagāmmabhāvāhi kantavācāhi racitaṃ bandhanaṃ
anya-e0812n:962_3: muttakādibandhanaṃ rasahetuttā paṇḍitānaṃ pītirasassa kāraṇattā yathāvuttagāmmadosaṃ ativattati atikkamma
anya-e0812n:969_2: Kāmāturā kāci vanitā attano piyaṃ patiṃ viravati “dunoti”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n:969_3: Dayāya saha pavattīti sadayaiti anunayavasena piyassa āmantanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:969_5: so kāmo kandappo eva caṇḍālo akaṇḍo vā asayhopatāpāvahattā.
anya-e0812n:969_6: Kāme caṇḍālattāropanañca ucitameva yatonena kayiramānamasahanamupatāpamasahamānā taṃ paribhavantaṃ vippalapati,
anya-e0812n:969_16: Ekākittāyevāhamappaṭisaraṇattānena dusāmīti duññāmīti (?) tava kāmaṃ tvaṃ sukhī hosi.
anya-e0812n:969_17: Sanāthānaṃ tādisī vuttīti evaṃ sukhīpi tvaṃ īdisaṃ byasanamāpannaṃ kiṃ kasmā upekkhaseti.
anya-e0812n:969_19: taṃ visayamanubhavantassa ca vimukhattaṃ nidassetītīdisaṃ na gāmmaṃ.
anya-e0812n:970_2: Kāmataṇhābhibhūtā aṅganā attano vallabhaṃ nissāya evaṃ vilapati “sadaya he kāruṇika so kāmacaṇḍālo so
anya-e0812n:970_3: anaṅganīco niddayo nikkāruṇiko maṃ dunoti pīḷeti,
anya-e0812n:970_4: sukhīpi mama viya anāthabhāvābhāvato sukhitopi tvaṃ īdisaṃ byasanāpannaṃ evaṃ kāmacaṇḍālena akāruṇena
anya-e0812n:970_6: Attano dukkhāturattā dukkhadūrīkaraṇaṃ kāruṇikānaṃyeva visayanti “sadaye”ti anunayavasena āmantanucitaṃ
anya-e0812n:970_7: attano dukkhāturataṃ posetuṃ pīḷākārake kāme caṇḍālattāropanañca niddayattakathanañca ucitameva attani
anya-e0812n:970_9: Sukhīpīti iminā tassa paravisayāsattatāya aticāraṃ abbhupagameti.
anya-e0812n:970_10: Evaṃ vaṅkavuttiyā attano vallabhe sānurāgattañca attani tassa tadabhāvattañca dassetīti.
anya-e0812n:970_12: na kāmayasi kiṃnvida”nti ettha viya iha gāmmadoso natthīti gāmmadosaparihāramidaṃ.
anya-e0812n:973_0: Yato na savanubbegaṃ, heṭṭhā yetaṃ vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0812n:975_2: Yato yasmā savanubbegaṃ “dosānamuddesakkamena dosaparihārakkamo na vutto”ti evaṃ viññūnamuppajjamānaṃ imassa ganthassa savanāsahanaṃ natthi,
anya-e0812n:975_3: tato yatihīnaparihāro yatihīnadosassa pariharaṇavasena pavattamudāharaṇaṃ idāni puna na nīyate nāharīyateti.
anya-e0812n:975_5: Heṭṭhā yetaṃ vicāritanti evaṃ yatihīnadosapariharaṇaṃ heṭṭhā anantaraparicchede vicāritaṃ “taṃ name sirasā cāmī-
anya-e0812n:975_7: Ādo yatihīnadosapātubhāveyeva parihārakkamassāpi dassitattā ihādassanepi ganthassa ūnatā natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:979_0: Desaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, khettaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:980_2: Udāraṃ udārattaṃ cāgātisayasambandhato caritaṃ atiguṇapavatti yassāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:980_3: Ettha ucitattā desādīnaṃ yācanakkamassa kamaccutassa parihāroyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:981_3: teneva tena kāraṇeneva ārādhanā mama yācanā tvayi hoti.
anya-e0812n:981_5: gāmaṃ vā saṃvasathaṃ vā, no ce,
anya-e0812n:981_6: sobhanaṃ khettaṃ vā kedāraṃ vā mama dehīti anupubbaṃ hīnapadatthayācanā dāyakassa dānassāpi yācakassa
anya-e0812n:988_7: Vijambhane byāpane nāvakāso tādisattā tāsaṃ marīcinanti nātivuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:989_3: vijambhane byāpane ayaṃ sakalopi ākāso nāvakāso na okāso hotīti.
anya-e0812n:989_4: Hetuphalādiekekakāraṇenāpi appameyyānaṃ sabbaññuguṇānaṃ pavattiyā appameyyasāmaññabhūtākāsassa niravakāsassa
anya-e0812n:989_5: iva kathanamucitanti ativuttadoso iha na bhavati.
anya-e0812n:989_8: tato sambhūtānaṃyeva yasānaṃ rāsī ca tā marīciyo cāti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:993_2: Byāpannaṃ naṭṭhaṃ ayathāpavattaṃ cittaṃ yesaṃ, tesaṃ.
anya-e0812n:993_4: Apeto apagato suñño attho abhidheyyaṃ saṃvohārikaṃ yassa, taṃ.
anya-e0812n:993_8: so ādi yesaṃ bālādīnaṃ tesaṃ vacanā asaṅgatāya vācāya aññatra aññasmiṃ abyāpannacittavisaye dussati duṭṭhaṃ jāyate,
anya-e0812n:994_2: Byāpannacittānaṃ viruddhabhāvamāpannacittānaṃ vākyaṃ syādyantatyādyantapadasamudāyarūpaṃ vākyaṃ apetatthaṃ
anya-e0812n:994_3: apagatasamudāyatthaṃ aninditaṃ viññūhi garahitaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n:994_4: tena kāraṇena ummattādikānaṃ ummattavedanaṭṭādīnaṃ vacanāññatra vacanaṃ vinā anummattādivacane taṃ samudāyatthasambandharahitaṃ
anya-e0812n:999_2: Na hettha “samuddo pīyate”iccādino padasamudāyassa koci eko attho gayhati,
anya-e0812n:999_4: Avayavatthā eva tu ayosalākākappāpaṭibhantīti īdisamapetatthamaninditaṃ viññeyyaṃ byāpannacittānaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1000_2: So ayaṃ samuddo pīyate yena kenaci pīyate,
anya-e0812n:1000_7: Idaṃ vākyaṃ avayavatthamantarena samudāyato gamyamānatthassābhāvā apetatthaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1000_8: Īdisaṃ vākyaṃ ummattakādīhi vuttamappītikaraṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n:1000_9: aññehi vuttaṃ pana kaṇṇe ayosalākā viya appītikaraṃ.
anya-e0812n:1004_5: tena pabhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ saṃyuttaṃ taṃ bandhanaṃ bandhapharusadosaṃ saṃdūsayeyya nāsayeti attho.
anya-e0812n:1005_3: vaṇṇānaṃ aññamaññasaṅgabhilakkhaṇena dittabhāvena piyabhāvena anubrūhitaṃ taṃ bandhanaṃ bandhapharusadosaṃ
anya-e0812n:1010_0: 99. “Yathe”tyudāharati “passantā”iccādi. Keḷiyā kīḷāya parammukhā vigatacchandā carantīti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:1011_2: Sādhū sajjanā sambuddhakāle sambuddhassa dharamānakāle rūpavibhavaṃ tassa rūpasampattiṃ passantā cakkhuṃ
anya-e0812n:1011_3: santappetvā olokentā madhuraṃ giraṃ tasseva bhagavato aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ madhuravacanaṃ suṇantā keḷiparammukhā
anya-e0812n:1011_4: kīḷāya vimukhā kīḷābhiratirahitā caranti gacchanti pavattantīti.
anya-e0812n:1011_7: Keḷiyā parāni parivattitāni mukhāni etesanti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1011_10: Loko pana visuṃ eko padatthoyevāti voharati.
anya-e0812n:1018_2: Ettha bhāvanādīni niddisitvā yathākkamaṃ nibbānādīnaṃ niddesena apakkamadoso parihaṭo.
anya-e0812n:1019_2: Iha manussaloke sammā sampāditāni kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā yathāvidhi sampāditāni attano santāne pavattāpitāni
anya-e0812n:1019_6: Iha bhāvanādayo uddisitvā uddesakkamaṃ anatikkamma nibbānādīnamanuddesassa katattā apakkamavākyatthadosassa okāso na hoti.
anya-e0812n:1021_0: Uddiṭṭhavisayo koci kopi, viseso tādiso yadi;
anya-e0812n:1023_2: Uddiṭṭhā paṭhamaṃ yuttā atthā visayo gocaro yassa uddesānuddesasambandhavijānanalakkhaṇassa visesassa
anya-e0812n:1023_3: so tādiso koci viseso anuddiṭṭhesu yathākkamamuddesakamānamatikkamena puna atthantaranissayena parāmaṭṭhesu
anya-e0812n:1023_5: kamassa yathoddiṭṭhesu anukkamassa vilaṅghane atikkame doso nevatthi.
anya-e0812n:1024_2: Uddiṭṭhavisayo paṭhamaṃ payuttatthavisayo tādiso koci viseso uddesānuddesānaṃ “idamassa pubbakathanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1024_4: atthantaraṃ nissāya puna vuttesu yadi “bhaveyyā”ti seso.
anya-e0812n:1024_5: Kamavilaṅghane uddesānuddesānaṃ kamātikkame doso satthaññūnaṃ sutikāle asahanakāraṇaṃ nevatthīti.
anya-e0812n:1024_6: Uddiṭṭhā paṭhamuccāritā atthā visayo gocaro asseti ca,
anya-e0812n:1029_4: abyākataṃ vipākakriyāsaṅkhātamiti etesu tīsu pacchimaṃ abyākataṃ,
anya-e0812n:1030_2: Kusalaṃ kāmāvacarādiekavīsatikusalañca akusalaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ akusalañca abyākataṃ vipākakriyārūpanibbānavasena
anya-e0812n:1030_3: catubbidhamabyākatañca iccesu evametesu tīsu pacchimaṃ uddesakkamena pacchimamabyākataṃ pākadaṃ na vipākadāyakaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n:1030_4: paṭhamadvayaṃ kusalākusalaṃ pākadaṃ yathāsakaṃ vipākadāyakaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1030_7: pacchā uccārito iccattho “samānaṃ”iti sambandhechaṭṭhī (katvabodhinī) vuttattā uddiṭṭhehi samānamanuddiṭṭhānameva
anya-e0812n:1030_9: Ettha pana kusalādisabhāvato tividhattepi vipākadānādānavasena duvidhakusalākusalādivisayabhūtavisesassa
anya-e0812n:1030_10: pavattiyā vatticchāto paṭhamaṃ vattabbataṃ vinā kamena nissayanaṃ nāma natthīti apakkamadoso na hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1034_2: Sotūnaṃ attatthanipphādanādike tādise kāraṇe hetumhi sati bhūtaṃ yathāpavattaṃ atthaṃ attano caritalakkhaṇaṃ saṃsino vadantassa sassa attano,
anya-e0812n:1034_3: sānaṃ vā guṇānaṃ āvikaraṇe adhikāravasena “pūjanīyataro loke”iccādikathane ocikyahīnatāya āpatti pāpuṇanaṃ sambhavo natthi.
anya-e0812n:1035_2: Tādise kāraṇe sati sotūnaṃ attatthanipphādanādike tādise hetumhi vijjamāne bhūtatthasaṃsino attani vijjamānakāyādisaṃvaralakkhaṇaguṇasaṅkhātamatthaṃ
anya-e0812n:1035_3: “pūjanīyataro loke ahameko”iccādinā tādisāvasare vadantassa saguṇānaṃ sassa attano,
anya-e0812n:1035_4: sānaṃ vā sakānaṃ guṇānaṃ āvikaraṇe pākaṭīkaraṇe ocityahīnatāpatti ocityahīnasaṅkhātadosassāpatti natthīti.
anya-e0812n:1035_5: Sasaddassa attaattaniyavācakattā sassa attano guṇā se ca te guṇā ceti vā viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1039_2: Loke sattaloke vikhyātaṃ pasiddhaṃ ābālajanaṃ ābālajanānaṃ (ka.) yathāsakamanurūpaṃ vijānanato ocityaṃ
anya-e0812n:1039_3: ucitabhāvo nāmeti pasiddhiyaṃ ādarā ādarena ussāhena tato paramādaraṇīyassābhāvato,
anya-e0812n:1039_4: na hi anucitaṃ kiñci kenāpyādaraṇīyaṃ sabbathā anassādanīyattā,
anya-e0812n:1039_6: Tattha tasmiṃ ocitye upadesassa paṭhamuccāraṇassa uggaṇhāpanavasena pavattassa pabhavā uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā sujanā suṭṭhujanā kavipuṅgavā uttamā,
anya-e0812n:1040_2: Loke sattaloke vikhyātaṃ ābālapasiddhaṃ ocityaṃ nāma ādarā gāravena viññeyyaṃ viññūhi ñātabbaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:1040_3: tattha ocityavisaye upadesapabhavā paṭhamuccāraṇassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā sujanā sādhujanabhūtā kavipuṅgavā uttamakavayo bhavantīti,
anya-e0812n:1040_6: pumāno ca te gāvo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1046_2: Viññāto avabuddho yathāvuttakavivarapasādā ocityameva vibhavo sampatti yena so ocityahīnaṃ nāma dūsanaṃ parihare parivajjeyya.
anya-e0812n:1046_3: Tato tasmā parihārato hetuto ocityassa sampose suṭṭhu vaḍḍhibhāve vaḍḍhane kate rasassa assāditabbatāsaṅkhātassa mādhuriyassa samposo siyā bhaveyya.
anya-e0812n:1047_2: Viññātocityavibhavo tādisakavīnamanuggahena viññātaocityasaṅkhātasampattisamannāgato kavi ocityahīnaṃ nāma dūsanaṃ parihare nirākareyya,
anya-e0812n:1047_3: tato dosaparihārato ocityassa sampose upabrūhane kate sati rasaposo mādhuriyasaṅkhatassa assādetabbassa pūraṇaṃ siyā bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0812n:1047_6: rasassa poso puṭṭhabhāvo vuddhabhāvo (ka.) posetabbabhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1051_0: Tiṇāyapi na maññittha, so vo detu jayaṃ jino.
anya-e0812n:1052_2: Vijayo parābhibhavo āsanno vijayo eva ussavo abbhudayo nippaṭipakkhā pavatti yassa ediso yo āsannaṃ attano
anya-e0812n:1052_3: samīpamupagataṃ mārasenaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññittha tiṇampi na maññittha,
anya-e0812n:1052_5: so jino māraji vo tumhākaṃ jayaṃ detūti vidadhātu.
anya-e0812n:1052_9: “Mārasenamāsannaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññitthā”ti idaṃ panettha atisamucitaṃ yato samīpamupagatampi tādisaṃ mārasenaṃ tiṇatopi hīnaṃ maññi,
anya-e0812n:1053_1: Iha satthe sabbattha saṅkhepakkamamicchantopi ācariyo ocityaṃ nāma ādarena saggarūhi uggaṇhitvā payujjitabbamiccevaṃ
anya-e0812n:1053_2: vitthārena sisse anusāsitvā idāni ocityahīnapariharaṇatthaṃ “yo mārasenamāsanne”ccādinā lakkhiyamudāharati.
anya-e0812n:1053_4: atha vā accāsannapaṭipakkhavirahappavattisaṅkhātaabhivuddhiyā samannāgato yo jino āsannaṃ anekappakārabhiṃsanakarūpena
anya-e0812n:1053_5: attano samīpamāgataṃ mārasenaṃ mārabalaṃ tiṇāyapi tiṇalavaṃ katvāpi na maññittha sallakkhaṇaṃ nākāsi,
anya-e0812n:1053_6: so jino so jitapañcamāro vo tumhākaṃ jayaṃ detūti.
anya-e0812n:1053_7: Ettha yo pañcamāre jitattā jino nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n:1053_8: so parābhibhavane asahāyakiccattā paresaṃ jayadāne sāmatthiyayuttoti “jayaṃ detū”ti kataṃ jayāsīsanamatiucitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:1053_10: “Mārasenamāsannaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññitthā”ti idaṃ vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0812n:1057_2: Kattā ca kammañca tāni ādīni yesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ āraddhāni vattuṃ paṭṭhapitāni kattukammādīni tesaṃ kamo tassa atikkamo pariccāgo tassa laṅghane sati,
anya-e0812n:1057_4: Ayaṃ yathāvutto bhaggarītivirodho kvāpi katthacipi ṭhāne gatiṃ na vindati patiṭṭhaṃ na labhate.
anya-e0812n:1058_3: kvāpi katthacipi ṭhāne gatiṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na vindati na labhateti.
anya-e0812n:1058_4: Āraddhāni ca tāni kattukammādīni yesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ tesaṃ kamassa atikkamo tassa laṅghananti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1066_4: Bahūnamatthānañhi samuccayatthaṃ vākye eko vā cakāro kātabbo paṭipadaṃ vā.
anya-e0812n:1067_2: Sujanaññānaṃ sajjanehi aññesaṃ dujjanānañca itthīnañca visassa jīvitaharaṇasamatthassa siṅgino visāṇavato
anya-e0812n:1067_3: ca roganadīrājakulassa ca vissāso saṃsaggo na upapajjate kiñcikāle virujjhanato na yujjateti.
anya-e0812n:1067_4: Ettha āraddhassa chaṭṭhuntakkamassa sabbattha apariccāgato attharītibhaṅgo ca,
anya-e0812n:1067_5: yuttaṭṭhāne ekasseva cakārassa yuttattā saddarītibhaṅgo ca natthi.
anya-e0812n:1068_2: Vihite pathye bhesajje osadhe ca suddhabuddhādiratanattaye ca sajjane sādhujane ca api punapi saguṇe
anya-e0812n:1068_3: vijjamānaguṇe ca pasādaṃ attano cittapasādaṃ niccaṃ satataṃ ācare sappuriso kareyya seveyyāti.
anya-e0812n:1076_3: ettha raṃsisaddena suṇantānaṃ uppajjamānasaṃsayena sasaṃsayabhūtaṃ bandhadosamohatīti.
anya-e0812n:1080_3: kīḷādihetunā yaṃ kiñci saṃsayāyeva yadi payujjateti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:1081_2: Kīḷādihetunā kīḷāsambādhasammantanādikāraṇena yaṃ kiñci saṃsayuppādanasamatthaṃ yaṃ kiñci padaṃ saṃsayāya
anya-e0812n:1081_3: eva sotūnaṃ uppajjamānasaṃsayatthameva yadi payujjate tasmiṃ bandhane vattārehi payujjate ce,
anya-e0812n:1081_4: sasaṃsayasamappito sasaṃsayadosasahito bandho na dosova aduṭṭhovāti.
anya-e0812n:1086_2: Gurumhi ajjhāpake sakagehato attano mūlanilayato dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ gharaṃ yāte sati niyatamekantamajjhayanādinā
anya-e0812n:1086_4: Gurumhi surācariye suraccācariye (ka.) sakagehato attano jātarāsito dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ rāsiṃ yāte
anya-e0812n:1086_5: sati niyatamajjhayanādinā sukhaṃ pāpuṇeyyāmāti ayamettha icchitattho.
anya-e0812n:1087_2: Gurumhi ācariye sakagehato attano vāsāgārato dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ gharaṃyāte sati,
anya-e0812n:1087_4: Gurumhi surācariye sakagehato attano jātarāsito dutiyaṃ nilayaṃ dutiyaṃ rāsiṃ yāte gate sati anukūlattā
anya-e0812n:1087_8: Ettha ajjhayanasaddasannidhānena payuttagurusaddassa ācariyatthavācakattepi icchitatthagopanatthaṃ payuttattā aduṭṭhoti.
anya-e0812n:1092_2: Etassa purisassa sā ayaṃ bhaginī subhagā sundarāti iccevamādikaṃ sakalehi kavīhi api na gāmmamiti gāmmadosena na duṭṭhamiti niddiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0812n:1092_3: Subhaṃ sundarabhāvaṃ gatāti “subhagā”ti aggahetvā bahubbīhisamāse kate labbhamānatthassa asabbhabhāvepi kavīnaṃ cittakhedaṃ na janetīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:1092_4: Iti evaṃ ayaṃ pakāro ādi assa īdisassa vākyassāti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1096_0: 114. “Duṭṭha”iccādi. Duṭṭhālaṅkārassa dosadūsitassa alaṅkārassa vigame apagame sati.
anya-e0812n:1097_2: Duṭṭhālaṅkāravigame dosaduṭṭhassa alaṅkārassa apagame sati sobhanālaṅkatikkamo pasatthānamalaṅkārānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1097_3: pavattiākāro alaṅkāraparicchede alaṅkārapakāsakattā tannāmake paricchede āvibhāvaṃ pakāsattaṃ gamissati
anya-e0812n:1097_6: Alaṅkārapakāsakattā tadatthena alaṅkāro ca so paricchedo ceti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1107_2: Dose yathāvutte padadosādike pariharituṃ pariccajituṃ eso varo uttamo upadeso satthantarānaṃ bahūnaṃ
anya-e0812n:1107_3: anusaraṇena anugamena anupagamena (ka.) mayā evaṃ kato nipphādito,
anya-e0812n:1107_4: imaṃ upadesaṃ guruvarānaṃ adhikappasādā mahatā pasādena na appakena,
anya-e0812n:1107_6: viññāya jānitvā ādarato kareyya dose yathāvutte dose yaso parisuddhabandhanaṃ kriyālakkhaṇato ekantena kittihetuttā,
anya-e0812n:1107_8: taṃ abhilasati sīleneti yasobhilāsī paraṃ accantameva parihareyya dūrato kareyya.
anya-e0812n:1110_2: Dose yathāvuttapadadosādike pariharitumapanetuṃ varo uttamo eso upadeso satthantarānusaraṇena bahūnaṃ
anya-e0812n:1110_3: bāhirasatthānaṃ anussatiyā mayā evaṃ anantaruddiṭṭhakkamena kato viracito,
anya-e0812n:1110_4: imaṃ upadesaṃ guruvarānaṃ adhikappasādā adhikappasādena viññāya sabhāvato ñatvā yasobhilāsī yasapaṭilābhakāraṇattā
anya-e0812n:1110_5: kāraṇe kāriyopacārena dosāpagamena parisuddhabandhanaṃ vā tādisabandhanahetu uppajjamānakittiṃ vā icchanto
anya-e0812n:1110_6: paññavā dose yathāvuttadose paraṃ atisayena parihareyya dūrato kareyyāti.
anya-e0812n:1120_1: Evaṃ dosaparihāropadesaṃ dassetvā idāni dosaparihārā samupagataguṇaṃ upadassitumadhikāraṃ viracayanto āha “sambhavanti”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:1120_2: Dosānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ padadosādīnaṃ evaṃ yathāvuttanayena atikkame sati guṇā dhammā saddālaṅkārasabhāvā
anya-e0812n:1120_4: tañca “pasādo kiliṭṭhādīnaṃ vajjanā sambhavatī”tyādinā yathāyogaṃ viññeyyaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1120_5: tato tasmā kāraṇā ye guṇā sadde sambhūsayanti alaṅkaronti,
anya-e0812n:1120_6: te saddālaṅkārasaṅkhāte guṇe idāni dassessaṃ upadisissāmi.
anya-e0812n:1121_1: Evaṃ dosaparihārapavesopāyaṃ dassetvā idāni yathāvuttadosānaṃ parihārena “bandhanissitaguṇā ete”ti dassetuṃ
anya-e0812n:1121_3: Dosānaṃ niddiṭṭhapadadosādīnaṃ evaṃ anantaraparicchede niddiṭṭhakkamena atikkame sati guṇā pasādādisaddālaṅkārasaṅkhātā
anya-e0812n:1121_5: tato ye saddadhammā sadde sambhūsayanti sajjanti,
anya-e0812n:1128_1: Idāni te vibhajati “pasādo”iccādinā pasatthi pasādo pakāsatthatā,
anya-e0812n:1128_8: udāratā ukkaṃsatā kenaci atthena sanāthatā visiṭṭhavisesanayuttatā ca,
anya-e0812n:1128_10: atthabyatti siddhena ñāyena vā abhidheyyassa gahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1129_1: Idāni “pasādojo”iccādinā te saddālaṅkāre kamena vibhajituṃ uddisati.
anya-e0812n:1129_2: Pasādo pasannaphaḷikāvali attani āvunitarattakambalasuttamiva saddānaṃ atthassa pasādanasaṅkhāto pasādālaṅkāro ca,
anya-e0812n:1129_5: samatā pajje pādassa sutito sadisatā ca,
anya-e0812n:1129_6: gajje padānaṃ tatheva sadisatāti evaṃ pādānaṃ padānañca tulyaguṇatā ca,
anya-e0812n:1129_7: sukhumālatā vaṇṇānaṃ atipharusaatisithilabhāvaṃ vinā samappamāṇamuduguṇo ca,
anya-e0812n:1129_9: udāratā ukkaṭṭhena kenaci atthena bandhassa sajjitabhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n:1129_12: atthabyatti icchitatthassa siddhena vā nyāyena vā supākaṭabhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n:1129_13: samādhayo lokappatītianatikkantaaññadhammāropanena amukhyatthatā cāti ime saddatthaguṇā dasa honti.
anya-e0812n:1129_18: ete sabbepi alaṅkaronti bandhamanenāti vākyena alaṅkārā nāma.
anya-e0812n:1134_2: Etehiyeva vuttehi dasahi guṇehi dhammehi saddālaṅkārasabbhāvehi sampanno yutto samiddho vā kavīnaṃ mano
anya-e0812n:1134_3: harati savase vattetīti kavimanoharo kavihadayahilādakārī bandho kattūnaṃ bandhantānaṃ kavīnaṃ accantanimmalaṃ
anya-e0812n:1134_4: atisayaparisuddhaṃ aguṇalesenāpa’nālimpattā kittiṃ guṇaghosaṃ sampādayati nipphādeti.
anya-e0812n:1135_2: Etehi guṇehi imehi saddālaṅkārasaṅkhātadasavidhasaddadhammehi sampanno samannāgato samiddho vā bandho
anya-e0812n:1135_3: pajjādibandho kavimanoharo attano niravajjattā kavīnaṃ cittaṃ pīṇento kattūnaṃ racayantānaṃ accantanimmalaṃ
anya-e0812n:1135_4: appakadosenāpi asammissattā atiparisuddhaṃ kittiṃ bandhanavisayabhūtayasorāsiṃ sampādayati nipphādetīti.
anya-e0812n:1135_5: Iminā kāraṇena bandhassa yathāvuttadasavidhaguṇapariggaho saussāhaṃ kātabboti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:1140_1: Idāni yathoddesānamesaṃ niddesaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ karonto āha “adūra”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:1140_2: Adūre āsanne adūrena vā adūrāhitakriyākattukammādipadavasena āhito ṭhapito kato sambandho anvayo,
anya-e0812n:1140_3: tena subhagā manoharā supasiddho suppakāso sugammo abhidheyyo attho yassā sāti tathā,
anya-e0812n:1145_0: Tādisā yā padāvali padapanti ayaṃ pasādaṃ tannāmakaṃ guṇaṃ janaye uppādayati. Yathāti tamudāharati.
anya-e0812n:1146_1: Idāni uddesakkamena etesaṃ saddālaṅkārādīnaṃ niddesaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ dassento āha “adūrāhite”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:1146_2: Adūre āsannapadese tadupacārena āsanne vā āhito kriyāya,
anya-e0812n:1146_4: no ce vinyāsavasena ṭhapito vā sambandho icchitatthapatītikkamena aññamaññāpekkhalakkhaṇakriyākārakayogo tena subhagā manoharā,
anya-e0812n:1146_5: supasiddho pasiddhatthavisaye saddapayogato atipākaṭo abhidheyyo saddattho yassā sā ayaṃ padāvali padapanti
anya-e0812n:1146_9: upacaritattā adūro ca so āhito cāti vā,
anya-e0812n:1146_10: so ca so sambandho ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1151_1: asaddagocaraṃ saddassa avisayaṃ hutvā mudukamhi pade kevalaṃ visuṃ phurantaṃ cāpentaṃ kavīnadhippāyaṃ
anya-e0812n:1151_2: kavīnamajjhāsayaṃ katassamā saddatthavisaye kataparicayā paṇḍitā bhāvāvagamā padatthāvabodhena visanti
anya-e0812n:1151_4: tādisā ākatiyo tu saddasaddatthānaṃ ākārā pakāsayanti adhippāyatthaṃ jotentīti.
anya-e0812n:1155_2: Munino sammāsambuddhassa vadanaṃ sabhāvamadhurapakatimukhaṃ alaṅkarontā sajjantā sobhayamānā adharānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1155_4: Ambujodare tā kālopanatapupphakāsaramaṇīye padumabbhantare sampatantā pavattamānā aruṇaraṃsīva bālasūriyaraṃsiyo viya sobhante virājanti.
anya-e0812n:1156_2: Munino vadanaṃ pakatisundaramukhaṃ alaṅkarontā sajjantā adhararaṃsiyo tasseva munino oṭṭhadvayato nikkhantakantisamūhā
anya-e0812n:1156_3: ambujodare vikasanānurūpakālābhimukhe padumagabbhe upaḍḍhavikasiteti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1156_4: Sampatantā pavattamānā aruṇaraṃsī iva bālasūriyaraṃsīva sobhante dibbantīti.
anya-e0812n:1156_5: Ettha adūrasambandhaṃ pasiddhatthañca nissāya pasādaguṇo pākaṭo.
anya-e0812n:1156_6: Adhararaṃsīnaṃ munisambandho sutānumitasambandhesu sutasambandhassa balavattā sutānumitesu sutasambandho balavā (paribhāsendusere 112),
anya-e0812n:1162_2: Samāsassa ekatthavuttiyā bāhulyaṃ bhiyyobhāvo ityanuvaditvā puna ojo vidhīyate,
anya-e0812n:1162_3: eso ojo samāsabāhullalakkhaṇo gajjassa vuttirūpassa jīvitaṃ hadayaṃ sāraṃ tappadhānattā gajjassa,
anya-e0812n:1162_5: soyaṃ ojo anākulo agahano atoyeva kanto hadayaṅgamo,
anya-e0812n:1162_6: pajjepi na kevalaṃ gajje kāmīyate payujjate.
anya-e0812n:1163_2: Ojo nāma samāsabāhulyaṃ bhinnatthesu pavattasaddānaṃ ekatthapavattilakkhaṇassa samāsassa bahulatā,
anya-e0812n:1163_3: eso ojo gajjassa gajjabandhassa jīvitaṃ hadayaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1163_5: So ayaṃ ojo anākulo nibyākulo kanto tatoyeva viññūnaṃ piyabhūto pajjepi pajjabandhepi kāmīyate kavīhi payujjateti.
anya-e0812n:1167_2: Munindassa mandaṃ īsakaṃ sañjāto pavatto taṃsabhāvattā bhagavato hāsassa yasassa (ka.) hāso hasitaṃ sova candanamiva candanaṃ dhavalattarūpattā,
anya-e0812n:1167_3: tena limpitā upadehitā pallavā sabbāni kilasayāni “idameve”ti niyamābhāvato,
anya-e0812n:1167_4: dhavalā pakativaṇṇapariccāgena sukkā ahesuṃ gāhāpitattā saguṇassa tādisavisiṭṭhassa paṭilābhato,
anya-e0812n:1167_5: evaṃ santepi tassa munindasseva eko aññassa tādisassābhāvā adharapallavo na dhavalo dhavalo nāhosi.
anya-e0812n:1170_0: Kiṃ tena vo na vihitaṃ hita’muggadugga-
anya-e0812n:1172_4: tasmā kathaṃ “tasseveko nādharapallavo”ti ettha yasaddābhāvoti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1172_7: anubhūtavisayo ca tasaddo yasaddaṃ nāpekkhate. Yathā –
anya-e0812n:1178_0: Yadi vakkhati kattabbaṃ, ñātakārīhi so jino”.
anya-e0812n:1184_0: Yasaddo tuttaravākyaṭṭho pubbavākye tasaddameva gamayati. Yathā –
anya-e0812n:1190_0: Pubbavākyopātto tu yasaddo uttaravākyetasaddopādānaṃ vinā sākaṅkhe vākyassa ūnattaṃ janeti.
anya-e0812n:1191_1: Munindassa mandaṃ īsakaṃ sañjāto pavatto hāsoyeva sitaṃ candanacuṇṇamiva tena limpitā ālepitā pallavā
anya-e0812n:1191_2: rukkhalatādīnaṃ pakatirattāni kisalayāni dhavalā saguṇapariccāgena setā ahesuṃ,
anya-e0812n:1191_3: tathāpi tasseva tathāgatassa eko atulo asahāyo vā adharapallavo dantāvaraṇasaṅkhātapallavo na raṃsisaṃsaṭṭhopi samīpaṭṭhopi dhavalo seto nāhosi.
anya-e0812n:1194_0: Kiṃ tena vo na vihitaṃ hita’muggadugga-
anya-e0812n:1196_2: kumatayo he aññāṇā! Pemāvabandhahadaye sabbesu tumhesu niccaṃ pavattitadaḷhapemānubandhacitte sadaye
anya-e0812n:1196_3: tatoyeva dayāsahite tasmiṃ jinasmiṃ visayabhūte kiṃ nu kasmā appasannā bhavatha,
anya-e0812n:1196_4: tathā hi vo tumhākaṃ tena jinena uggo dāruṇo ca,
anya-e0812n:1196_6: soyeva saṃsārasāgaro tassa samuttaraṇaṃ pariyantappattiyeva avasānaṃ yassa taṃ na vihitaṃ akataṃ hitaṃ vuddhi nāma kiṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:1196_8: Etthāpi samāsassa pākaṭattā ojo guṇo kanto hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1197_1: tasaddānaṃ niccasambandhoti kathaṃ “tasseveko”ti ca “tasmiṃ nu kiṃ kumatayo”ti ca iccādīsu heṭṭhā vuttayasaddo natthīti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1200_0: Evamādīsu “so”ti niddiṭṭhatasaddo “buddhānussatimādito”ti ettha atītena buddhasaddena vacanīyavisayo hoti.
anya-e0812n:1202_0: Yadi vakkhati kattabbaṃ, ñātakārīhi so jino”ti.
anya-e0812n:1206_1: tasmā tīsupi ṭhānesu tasaddo yasaddaṃ nāpekkhate.
anya-e0812n:1206_3: Apica uttaravākye ṭhito yasaddo pubbavākye tasadde asatipi tameva dīpeti.
anya-e0812n:1211_0: Yo budhānaṃ cakkhusotasatīnaṃ gocarataṃ visayabhāvaṃ sameto patto,
anya-e0812n:1211_1: tesaṃyeva dosārīnaṃ kilesapaccatthikānaṃ dappamathane dappamaddane ekaraso padhānakicco samiddhivanto vā hoti,
anya-e0812n:1211_3: Pubbavākye payojito yasaddo uttaravākye tasaddopādāne asati saṃsayamuppādayamāno vākyassa ūnattaṃ karoti.
anya-e0812n:1217_2: Padassa abhidheyyo attho so visayo yassa.
anya-e0812n:1217_5: Yatthappakehi padehi abhidheyyattho pacurapadehi vuccate, so byāso.
anya-e0812n:1217_7: Taṃ tathāvidhaṃ yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ pariṇatabhāvo hotīti anuvaditvā sopi iha sasatthe ojovāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n:1218_2: Padānaṃ bahūnaṃ appakānaṃ vā padānaṃ abhidheyyavisayaṃ vitthārasaṃkhittatthavisayavantaṃ samāsabyāsasambhavaṃ
anya-e0812n:1218_3: yathākkamaṃ saṅkhepavitthāradvayena nipphannaṃ nipphattivantaṃ vā yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ kattūnaṃ ganthavisaye
anya-e0812n:1218_6: sopi iha subodhālaṅkāre ojo nāma saddaguṇo atthaguṇo.
anya-e0812n:1218_8: padānaṃ abhidheyyo visayo yassa pāriṇatyasseti ca,
anya-e0812n:1218_12: pariṇatassa kattuno ganthassa eva vā bhāvoti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1218_13: Kattu pāriṇatyapakkhe tappakāsakaganthassa tadatthena pāriṇatyaṃ siddhaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1224_0: 124. “Jotayitvāne”ccādi. Iminā heṭṭhā pacurapadābhihito buddhavaṃso saṅkheparūpena vutto.
anya-e0812n:1225_2: So tathāgato saddhammaṃ sapariyattikaṃ navalokuttarasaddhammaṃ jotayitvāna ñāṇālokena obhāsetvā sadevake
anya-e0812n:1225_3: satte santāretvā saṃsārasāgarapariyantamupanetvā aggikhandhova mahātejena aggikkhandho viya jalitvā anaññasādhāraṇarūpakāyasampattiyā
anya-e0812n:1225_4: pajjalitvā ante sasāvako sāvakehi saha nibbuto khandhaparinibbānena parinibbutoti.
anya-e0812n:1225_5: Iminā sakalabuddhavaṃse bahūhi padehi vuttattho saṅkhepakkamena vutto.
anya-e0812n:1228_0: Yato puññena te senti sentu (ka.), jenapādambujadvaye.
anya-e0812n:1229_2: Matassāpi maraṇamāpannassāpi me matthake muddhani aṭṭhī rajobhāvaṃ dhūlittaṃ vajantu pāpuṇantu.
anya-e0812n:1229_4: Yato yasmā kāraṇā puññena kusalena kammena hetunā te rajā jinassa ime jenā, pādā,
anya-e0812n:1229_9: Ettha “kathamahaṃ bhagavato pāde niccaṃ sirasā paṇamāmī”tyadhippāyo vitthārena vutto.
anya-e0812n:1230_2: matassāpi me mayhaṃ matthakaṭṭhī muddhani aṭṭhīni rajobhāvaṃ atisukhumarajattaṃ vajantu pāpuṇantu.
anya-e0812n:1230_4: Yato yasmā kāraṇā puññena mayhaṃ tathāvidhena kusalakammena hetunā te rajā jenapādambujadvaye jinapaṭibaddhacaraṇapadumayugaḷe senti pavattanti,
anya-e0812n:1230_5: buddhassa siripāde kiñcipi rajojallaṃ na upalimpateva,
anya-e0812n:1230_7: Ettha “kathamahaṃ bhagavato siripāde muddhanā niccaṃ paṇamāmī”tyabhilāso vitthārena vutto.
anya-e0812n:1230_11: jenā ca te pādā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1234_2: Iccevaṃ atra gāthāyaṃ paṇatiyaṃ paṇāme gedho adhikacchando sādhu sundaraṃ padissati viññāyate,
anya-e0812n:1234_3: ayaṃ yathāvutto ojo guṇo pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhāto tikkhapaññānaṃ sātisayamatīnaṃ evaṃ santepi abhiyogato
anya-e0812n:1235_2: Iti iminā anantaragāthāyaṃ vuttakkamena atra imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ niccaṃpaṇatigedho nirantarapaṇāme adhikakattukāmatākusalacchando
anya-e0812n:1235_3: sādhu vibhūto vibhūtaṃ vā padissati paññāyati,
anya-e0812n:1235_4: ayaṃ guṇo yathāvutto ayaṃ pariṇatabhāvasaṅkhāto ojo nāma saddatthaguṇo tikkhapaññānaṃ sukhumabuddhimantānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1235_6: vattu pāriṇatyeneva bhavanato yesaṃ kesañci yena kenaci pakārena na sijjhatīti.
anya-e0812n:1235_10: abhi punappunaṃ yogo yuñjananti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1238_0: Siyā samasuti pubbā, vaṇṇāvutti paro yathā.
anya-e0812n:1239_4: tesaṃ āsatti ṭhānādināyathākathañci samasutīnaṃ āsannatā padāsatti,
anya-e0812n:1239_9: Pubbā paṭhamābhihitā padāsatti samā yena kenaci ṭhānamattāsaṃyogādinā padantarena suti vaṇṇo yassā sā siyā bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n:1239_10: paro pacchimo anuppāso tu vaṇṇassa sarabyañjanalakkhaṇassa āvutti punappunuccāraṇaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0812n:1239_11: Evaṃ katthaci bandhe samānapadāsatti katthaci anuppāso katthaci tadubhayaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1239_12: dvayena rahito viraso bandho nassādīyate kavīhi,
anya-e0812n:1239_14: silesasamatānvitantuccantameva ramaṇīyaṃ siyāti lakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā “yathe”ti lakkhiyamubhayatthodāharati “yade”ccādinā,
anya-e0812n:1240_3: padānaṃ vākyāvayavasaṅkhātānaṃ syādyantādīnaṃ uparūparipadehi samānānaṃ āsatti ṭhānakaraṇādinā yena kenaci pakārena aññamaññaṃ āsannatā,
anya-e0812n:1240_4: anuppāso pubbuccāritavaṇṇānaṃ puna pakkhipanañcāti dvinnaṃ vasā vibhāgena dvidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1240_7: paro anuppāso pana vaṇṇāvutti sarabyañjanasabhāvānaṃ pubbuccāritavaṇṇānaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ siyāti.
anya-e0812n:1240_9: Evaṃ katthaci bandhe padāsatti katthaci anuppāso katthaci tadubhayaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1240_10: dvīhi vinimutto pana bandho viññūhi assādanīyo na hoti.
anya-e0812n:1240_11: Upari vakkhamānāhi silesasamatāhi yuttaṃ madhurattaṃ pana visesato assādanīyaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1246_1: Eso munipuṅgavo yadā yato pabhuti abhisambodhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sampatto samadhigato,
anya-e0812n:1246_2: tadā pabhuti tato ārabbha dhammassa catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedassa sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyasaṅkhātassa mahussavo
anya-e0812n:1246_3: mahanto abbhudayo nippaṭipakkhā pavatti loke tividhe jāto ahosīti.
anya-e0812n:1247_2: Eso munipuṅgavo yadā abhisambodhiṃ sabbaññutaṃ sampatto sasantāne uppādanavasena sampāpuṇi,
anya-e0812n:1247_3: tadā pabhuti tato paṭṭhāya dhammassa kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānādipabhedassa sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammassa
anya-e0812n:1247_8: “bhi dhi”nti dhanitato āsannatāti iccādinā padāsatti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0812n:1247_12: mahanto ca so ussavo cāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1251_3: munindassa mandahāsā manuññā hasitāni candassa kantiyo sobhāyo hasantā viḍambayantā disantamanudhāvanti anuvicaranti.
anya-e0812n:1255_2: Kundasandohavibbhamā supupphitakundakusumarāsisadisalīlāvantā te munindamandahāsā buddhassa manuññā hasitā
anya-e0812n:1255_3: candakantiyo nimmalacandakiraṇe hasantā nindantā disantaṃ taṃ taṃ disaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1255_7: Mandā ca te hāsā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1259_0: Tattha indanīladaladvandasundaraṃ indanīlamaṇisakalikāyugaḷamiva manoharaṃ sirimandiraṃ tatoyeva sobhāya
anya-e0812n:1259_1: nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ munindanayanadvandaṃ indīvarajjutiṃ nīluppalakantiṃ vindati anubhoti,
anya-e0812n:1263_3: Sabbehi komalehi sukumārehi vaṇṇehi akkharehi anuppāso na pasaṃsiyo silāghanīyo na hoti silesavirodhittā.
anya-e0812n:1263_5: Ayaṃ mālatīmālā jātikusumadāmaṃ linānaṃ byādhitānaṃ lolānaṃ kusumarasārabbha lolupānaṃ alīnaṃ bhamarānaṃ mālā panti sā assā atthīti linalolālimālinī.
anya-e0812n:1264_1: Vuttānuppāsopi sabbakomalavaṇṇehi viracito na pasaṃsiyoti dassetuṃ “sabbakomalavaṇṇehī”tiādimāha.
anya-e0812n:1264_2: Sabbakomalavaṇṇehi sabbehi sukumārakkharehi kato anuppāso vaṇṇāvuttilakkhaṇo na pasaṃsiyo silesālaṅkāraviruddhattā pasattho na hoti.
anya-e0812n:1264_4: Ayaṃ mālatīmālā esā jātisumanamālikā linānaṃ byāvaṭānaṃ patantānaṃ lolānaṃ gandhaluddhānaṃ alīnaṃ bhamarānaṃ mālinī pantiyuttāti.
anya-e0812n:1264_7: lolā ca te alayo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1264_8: linā ca te lolālayo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1270_2: Kevalehi kevalaphuṭādibhāvāpavattehi sakalehi mudūhi catūsupi pādesu sajātiyehi asithilakomalehi vā kakārādīhi
anya-e0812n:1270_3: vā sithilakomalassa silesapaṭipakkhattā kevalehi phuṭehi vā adhimattasutīhi bhakārādīhi rāgādīhi (ka.)
anya-e0812n:1270_4: vā akicchavacanīye kicchavacanīyassa sukhumālavipariyayattā missehi vā majjhimasutīhi mudubhūtasaṃsaṭṭhehi
anya-e0812n:1270_5: vā vaṇṇehi akkharehi karaṇabhūtehi samatā tidhā hoti gajje pajje vā.
anya-e0812n:1271_2: Kevalehi phuṭamissehi aññattā sakalehi mudūhi sithilakomalehi vaṇṇehi kakārādīhi vā kevalehi phuṭehi
anya-e0812n:1271_3: kevalakomalavaṇṇarahitattā sakalehi akicchuccāraṇīyehi adhimattasutīhi bhakārādīhi vaṇṇehi vā missehi
anya-e0812n:1271_4: yathāvuttamuduphuṭasammissehi vaṇṇehi vā karaṇabhūtehi samatā gajje vā pajje vā tidhā hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1271_6: kicchuccāraṇīyehi phuṭavaṇṇehi kataṃ sukhumālālaṅkārassa ca virujjhatīti.
anya-e0812n:1278_5: munindassa ālāpo visaṭṭhādiaṭṭhaṅgiko saro tassa vibbhamo vilāso sataṃ sappurisānaṃ hadayaṅgamataṃ manonusāritaṃ madhurabhāvaṃ yāti,
anya-e0812n:1279_2: Kokilānaṃ karavīkasakuṇānaṃ ālāpaṃ nādalīlaṃ saṃvādī pakāsanasīlo,
anya-e0812n:1279_4: munindassa sabbaññuno ālāpassa visaṭṭhādiaṭṭhaṅgikanādassa vibbhamo vilāso sataṃ sappurisānaṃ hadayaṅgamataṃ cittārādhitabhāvaṃ yāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1279_5: nibbutiṃ sutasambandhena tesaṃyeva sādhūnaṃ nibbānaṃ deti ca dentopi hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1279_6: Ettha kokilālāpasaddena nissite nissayavohārena līlā gahitā.
anya-e0812n:1286_3: Sadevake loke santo sobhano bhāvo adhippāyo yassa taṃ.
anya-e0812n:1287_2: Sambhāvanīyasambhāvaṃ sadevakena lokena ādaraṇīyasobhanādhippāyaṃ bhavantaguṃ bhavassa antasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0812n:1287_3: nibbānaṃ gataṃ vibhuṃ pabhuṃ bhagavantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ bhavantasādhanākaṅkhī nibbānasādhanābhilāsī
anya-e0812n:1287_4: ko katamo saṃsāravattijano na sambhāvaye ādaraṃ na kareyya,
anya-e0812n:1287_6: Santo ca so bhāvo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1292_2: Laddho candanatarūnaṃ saṃsaggo paricayo tena sobhano gandho assāti sugandhī surabhi malayānilodakkhiṇapavamāno
anya-e0812n:1292_3: munindassa mukhamārutā bhītova tādisamuduttasītalattasugandhasampattiyā attano dūratarattā āyāti anuvattati.
anya-e0812n:1293_3: malayadesato āgacchamānamāluto munindamukhamārutā buddhassa mukhasurabhivāsitapavanato bhīto iva tādisamudusurabhisītalattassa
anya-e0812n:1293_4: attani asambhavato bhītova mandaṃ saṇikaṃ yāti abhimukhametīti.
anya-e0812n:1293_12: Ettha tividhasamatāyaṃ “kokilālāpasaṃvādi”ccāditividhalakkhiyassāpi “mudūhi vā kevalehi”ccādinā dassitalakkhaṇattayena tulyatā supākaṭāvāti.
anya-e0812n:1297_2: Aniṭṭhurāni apharusāni akkharāni vaṇṇāni pāyāni bahūni yassā sā tathā,
anya-e0812n:1297_4: tatoyeva sabbehi kevalehi komalehi sithilehi laghūhi akkharehi nissaṭā niggatā kicchena dukkhena uccāraṇā
anya-e0812n:1297_5: tato apetāni apagatāni byañjanāni yassā sāti anuvaditvā sukhumālatā vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n:1298_5: Aniṭṭhurāni akkharāni pāyāni bahūni yassanti ca,
anya-e0812n:1298_6: sabbe ca te komalā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1302_2: Rūpavibhavaṃ rūpasampattiṃ passantā madhuraṃ giraṃ vācaṃ suṇantā sādhavo keḷiparammukhā kīḷāya nicchantā carantīti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:1307_2: Alaṅkārehi vihīnāpi edisī sukhumālatā sataṃ paṇḍitajanānaṃ sammukhataṃ abhimukhabhāvaṃ vācāgocarattaṃ ārohati upagacchati,
anya-e0812n:1307_4: Tena sabhāvavutyādinā alaṅkārena ujjalā dittā pana visesenātisayena ramaṇīyā manuññāti.
anya-e0812n:1308_2: Edisī evaṃvidhā sukhumālatā alaṅkāravihīnāpi atthālaṅkāravirahitāpi sataṃ paññavantānaṃ sammukhataṃ abhimukhabhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n:1308_4: Tadujjalā tena sabhāvavuttivaṅkavuttisambhūtena atthālaṅkārena jotamānā visesena atisayena ramaṇīyā manuññā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1312_2: Romañcā lomahaṃsā iva romañcā eva vā,
anya-e0812n:1312_3: piñchāni barihāni parihārāni (ka.) tesaṃ racanā chattākārena vidhānaṃ yesaṃ te tathā,
anya-e0812n:1312_5: āhito dhani kekāsaṅkhāto yesaṃ te tathā,
anya-e0812n:1312_6: munimeghena munisadisena munisaṅkhātena vā vāridena ummadā mattā sādhusadisā sādhu eva vā sikhāvalā mayūrā laḷanti līlopetā vicaranti,
anya-e0812n:1313_2: Romañcapiñcharacanā lomahaṃsasadisā romā eva vā piñchānaṃ barihānaṃ racanā chattākārena vitthāravantā
anya-e0812n:1313_3: sādhuvādāhitaddhanī “sādhū”ti vacanasadisehi sādhuvādehi vā pavattakekāninnādehi samannāgatā munimeghummadā
anya-e0812n:1313_4: munisadisena munisaṅkhātena vā meghena sañjātamadā ime sādhusikhāvalā sajjanasadisā sādhuno eva vā mayūrā
anya-e0812n:1313_6: Idaṃ asesavatthuvisayaṃ samāsarūpakaṃ amukhyapakkhe “romañcā viya sādhuvādo viya muni viya sādhavo viyā”ti ca,
anya-e0812n:1313_7: mukhyapakkhe “piñcharacanā viya āhitaddhanī viya megho viya sikhāvalā viyā”ti upacaritabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1313_11: āhito ca so dhani ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1317_6: Matādisaddesu vattabbesu kittisesādīnaṃ saddānaṃ kittanaṃ kathanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1318_3: Sukhumālattamattheva padatthavisayampi ca padābhidheyyagocarampi sukhumālattaṃ attheva,
anya-e0812n:1318_7: Mato itiādi yesaṃ “jīvitakkhayaṃ patto” iccādīnamiti ca,
anya-e0812n:1324_2: Siliṭṭhānaṃ bandhalāghavābhāvena aññamaññaṃ siliṭṭhānaṃ padānaṃ saṃsaggena ramaṇīyo manuñño guṇo tassa ālayo pavattiṭṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1324_4: saha tena vattatīti sabandhagāravoti anuvaditvā soyaṃ sileso nāmāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n:1325_2: Siliṭṭhapadasaṃsaggaramaṇīyaguṇālayo ṭhānakaraṇādīhi āsannavaṇṇānaṃ vinyāsahetu aññamaññanissitānaṃ padānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1325_3: samavāyena manuññaguṇassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūto sabandhagāravo bandhagāravasaṅkhātaracanāya asithilabhāvena
anya-e0812n:1325_4: saha pavatto so ayaṃ bandho sileso nāmāti.
anya-e0812n:1325_7: Siliṭṭhā ca te padā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1329_2: Bālinduno pañcamī pañcamīcandassa (?) pañcadasakalassa vibbhamo manoharattaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1329_3: taṃ chindati sīlenāti bālinduvibbhamacchediyo pañcamīcandassa kalāsannibhānaṃ nakharānaṃ nakhānaṃ āvaliyo
anya-e0812n:1329_4: tāsaṃ kantibhi sobhāhi saha valitā saṃyuttā sā,
anya-e0812n:1329_5: munindassa padāniyeva ambhojāni padumāni tesaṃ kanti.
anya-e0812n:1330_2: kantibhi taruṇacandavilāsavināsanasabhāvasamannāgatanakhapantisobhāhi saha valitā saṃyuttā sā munindapadambhojakanti
anya-e0812n:1330_3: sā sambuddhapādapadumasobhā vo tumhe avataṃ rakkhatūti.
anya-e0812n:1330_4: Bālo ca so indu cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1330_9: bālinduvibbhamacchediyo ca tā nakharāvalikantiyo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1336_2: Yo koci “idameve”ti niyamābhāvā guṇo cāgātisayādiko ukkaṃsavanto adhimatto yadi patīyate viññāyate bandheti
anya-e0812n:1336_7: Tena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena bandhapaddhati racanakkamo nāthabhūtena udāraguṇena saha vattatīti sanāthā,
anya-e0812n:1337_2: Ukkaṃsavanto atisayavā yokoci guṇo cāgātisayādiko saddāvaliyā paṭipādanīyo ānubhāvo yadi patīyate sace katthaci bandhe viññāyate,
anya-e0812n:1337_5: Bandhabandhati padāvali tena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena sanāthā sappatiṭṭhā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1340_0: Aho te jantavo yanti, sabbathā nirajattanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1341_4: tehi littāni upadehitāni gattāni yesanti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1341_5: Ye janā te jantavo sabbappakārena rajolavenāpyanupalittattā rajehi kilesasaṅkhātehi niggatā nirajā,
anya-e0812n:1341_6: tesaṃ bhāvo nirajattanaṃ nikkilesabhāvaṃ yanti pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0812n:1341_7: Aho acchariyaṃ yato rajasā littā nāma saṃkiliṭṭhāyeva siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n:1341_8: bhavaṃ pana pādarajasā vilepane jane niraje karoti.
anya-e0812n:1342_2: Bho gotama ye sattā tava tuyhaṃ pādambhojarajolittagattā pādapadumareṇulittamatthakanalāṭādisarīrāvayavayuttā
anya-e0812n:1342_3: te jantavo sattā sabbathā kilesasaṅkhātarajojallehi anupalittattā sabbappakārena nirajattanaṃ vigatakilesarajobhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n:1342_7: tvaṃ pana pādarajasā upalittepi satte niraje karosīti bhāvo.
anya-e0812n:1346_1: Ko panettha ukkaṃsavanto guṇo yena bandho sanātho siyāti ce?
anya-e0812n:1346_3: Evamiti jinānubhāvassa sammāsambuddhapabhāvassa samukkaṃso atisayo dissati padissate atra bandhe,
anya-e0812n:1346_4: tasmā jinānubhāvena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena bandho sanātho siyāti.
anya-e0812n:1346_6: Paññavā paññāsampanno anena vidhinā iminā pakārena edisaṃ evarūpaṃ paraṃ aññaṃ cintaye vitakkeyya.
anya-e0812n:1347_2: Atra imissaṃ anantaragāthāyaṃ evaṃ yathāvuttakkamena jinānubhāvassa tathāgatappabhāvassa samukkaṃso ādhikkaṃ dissati padissate,
anya-e0812n:1347_3: tasmā jinānubhāvasaṅkhātena ukkaṃsavatā guṇena bandho sanātho bhaveyya.
anya-e0812n:1347_4: Paññavā pasatthañāṇavanto anena vidhinā iminā kamena īdisaṃ paraṃ aññaṃ cintaye kappeyya.
anya-e0812n:1353_3: sopi na pana yathāvuttova udāro viññeyyo.
anya-e0812n:1354_12: tāni ādīni yesaṃ kusumadāmamaṇimekhalādīnanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1361_3: taṃ lokiyaṃ atthaṃ abhidheyyaṃ anatikkantā anatītā sabbesaṃ kavīnamitaresaṃ vā janānaṃ eva kantā manoharā kanti nāmāti vuccati.
anya-e0812n:1361_4: Ayaṃ pana saddaguṇo ativuttassa vākyadosassa pariccāgena sambhavati.
anya-e0812n:1362_2: Lokiyatthānatikkantā loke pasiddhasaddatthamanatikkantā sabbajanānaṃ sakalakavīnaṃ kantā manuññā kanti nāma vuccate,
anya-e0812n:1362_3: sā ativuttassa ativuttadosassa parihārato vuttā dosaparihāraparicchede kathitā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1362_4: Ativuttadosaparihārato eva kantiyā siddhattā tassa lakkhiyo eva etissā hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:1362_6: so ca so attho ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1369_2: Abhidheyyassa sambandhaatthassa saddato atthato vā sāmatthiyato vā aneyyatā patīti aññathā vagamo gatyantarābhāvā,
anya-e0812n:1369_7: Tadubhayā jātā sāyaṃ aneyyatā neyyaparihāre padassitā pakāsitā.
anya-e0812n:1370_2: Abhidheyyassa atthassa saddato atthato atthasāmatthiyato ca aneyyatā tattheva vijjamānattā saddassa atthassa
anya-e0812n:1370_3: vā āharitvā vattabbassa abhāvo atthabyatti nāma,
anya-e0812n:1370_4: tadubhayā tehi dvīhi jātā sā ayaṃ aneyyatāsaṅkhatā atthabyatti neyyaparihāre neyyadosaparihārapadese padassitā pakāsitāti.
anya-e0812n:1370_6: sāmatthiyavilaṅghinī”ti vuttattā atthapatīti pana vinā saddañca sāmatthiyañca aññathānupalabbhatīti iha “saddato atthato”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1370_8: natthi neyyaṃ āharitabbaṃ assa abhidheyyassāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1370_10: te ca te ubho saddatthā cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1377_2: Te tava pādanakhesu sabhāvāmalatā pakatiparisuddhatā mudhā tucchā.
anya-e0812n:1377_4: Yato yasmā kāraṇā te pādanakhā avanatassa sannatassa anantassa nāgarājassa moḷino kirīṭassa avanatānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1377_5: vā naramarānaṃ anantānaṃ moḷīnaṃ chāyā chaviyo no jahanti na pariccajanti,
anya-e0812n:1377_7: Ettha nakhesu sañchavittā pādanakhassa moḷīnaṃ nirantarappaṇāmābyabhicārānaramarādīnaṃ bhagavato pādāravindavandanaṃ sāmatthiyā phuṭaṃ gamyate.
anya-e0812n:1378_2: Dhīra te tava pādanakhesu sabhāvāmalatā pakatiparisuddhatā mudhā tucchā.
anya-e0812n:1378_4: Yato yasmā te caraṇanakhā avanatānantamoḷicchāyā pādānatassa anantanāgarājassa kirīṭassa sambandhinī,
anya-e0812n:1378_5: avanatānaṃ vā anantānaṃ devamanussānaṃ moḷīnaṃ chāyā kantiyo no jahanti na vijahanti,
anya-e0812n:1378_7: tasmā ettha candakiraṇasannibhānaṃ nakharaṃsīnaṃ samīpe moḷīnaṃ nakharaṃsīhi amadditasakakantiyuttabhāvamāpajjanaṃ
anya-e0812n:1378_8: tādisānaṃ nirantarappaṇāmābhāvābhāvato khattiyādīnaṃ munindapādāravindadvande nirantarappaṇāmo sāmatthiyā
anya-e0812n:1378_13: paṭhamapakkhe avanato ca so ananto cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1378_16: dutiyapakkhe anantā ca te moḷī ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1382_2: Yanti yaṃ samādhiṃ bandhassa gajjapajjamissabhāvassa sāroti sabbassa jīvitaṃ tapparāyattā bandhassa samaggāpi
anya-e0812n:1382_3: viññuno sabbepi kavino maññanti cintenti jānanti,
anya-e0812n:1382_4: ayaṃ samādhi nāma samādhikhyo guṇo dassane pakāsane avasaraṃ okāsaṃ anottarattā parassa sampatto uddiṭṭhānukkamenāti.
anya-e0812n:1383_2: Samaggā api viññuno sabbepi kavayo yaṃ samādhiṃ “bandhasāro”ti pajjagajjavimissasaṅkhātassa bandhassa jīvitamiti maññanti,
anya-e0812n:1383_3: ayaṃ samādhi nāma guṇo dassanāvasaraṃ patto uddiṭṭhānukkamena dassanokāsaṃ patto hoti.
anya-e0812n:1389_2: Aññassa vatthuno pakatāpekkhāya dhammo guṇo pasiddho,
anya-e0812n:1389_3: tato tasmā mukhyavisayā aññattha amukhye visaye lokasīmānurodhato lokappatītyanuvattanena sammā sādhu
anya-e0812n:1389_5: iti iminā kāraṇena eso evaṃvidho dhammo “samādhī”ti niruccatītidha sammā ādhīyatīti evaṃ nīharitvā vuccatīti attho.
anya-e0812n:1390_1: “Samādhī”ti ayaṃ vohāro bandhavisaye kathaṃ pavattatīti āsaṅkāyaṃ paṭhamaṃ nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ āha “aññi”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:1390_2: Yasmā aññadhammo samādhānassa visayabhūtaamukhyato aññassa mukhyavatthuno pasiddhaguṇo,
anya-e0812n:1390_3: tato mukhyavisayato aññattha amukhyavisaye lokasīmānurodhato lokavohāramariyādāvirodhabhāvena lokappatītyanuvattaneneva sammā ādhīyati ṭhapīyati,
anya-e0812n:1390_4: iti iminā kāraṇena eso yathāvuttaguṇo “samādhī”ti niruccati vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n:1393_0: Apāṇe pāṇinaṃ dhammo, sammā ādhīyate kvaci;
anya-e0812n:1398_2: Kvaci ṭhāne pāṇinaṃ pāṇavantānaṃ padatthānaṃ dhammo guṇo apāṇe pāṇavirahite vatthuni sammā lokapatītyanuvattanena ādhīyate āropyate,
anya-e0812n:1398_6: Asarīre aghane asaṃhate vatthuni kaṭhinassa daḷhassa,
anya-e0812n:1398_7: tesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ samādhīnaṃ rūpaṃ udāharaṇaṃ kamā uddiṭṭhānukkamena.
anya-e0812n:1399_2: Kvaci kismiñci ṭhāne pāṇinaṃ dhammo indriyabaddhānaṃ guṇo apāṇe pāṇarahitavatthumhi sammā lokapatītianusārena ādhīyate āropyate,
anya-e0812n:1399_3: kvaci rūpayuttassa rūpavantavatthuno dhammo nirūpe rūparahitavatthumhi,
anya-e0812n:1399_4: kvaci sarasassa rasavantassa vatthuno dhammo nirase rasarahite ca,
anya-e0812n:1399_5: kvaci dravayuttassa dravavantavatthuno dhammo adrave dravarahite ca,
anya-e0812n:1399_7: kvaci kaṭhinassa thaddhassa vatthuno dhammo asarīrepi sarīrarahitepi sammā ādhīyate.
anya-e0812n:1399_8: Tesaṃ channaṃ samādhīnaṃ rūpaṃ udāharaṇaṃ kamā “apāṇe pāṇina”nti uddiṭṭhānukkamena siyā bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0812n:1405_3: Tava uṇṇāromadhātusaṅkhātena puṇṇindunā saha saṅgamā saṃyogena kumudinī kumudiniyo kumudākarā divāpi
anya-e0812n:1405_4: viniddā vigatasoppā sampamodanti maññe suṭṭhuyeva pamodantīti parikappemīti.
anya-e0812n:1405_5: Ettha pāṇidhammassa suratarūpassa saṅgamassa viniddāya sampīṇanassa ca apāṇini āropitapumbhāve uṇṇāpuṇṇindumhi,
anya-e0812n:1405_6: tathā āropitaitthibhāvāsu kumudinīsu lokasīmānurodhena samādhānato soyaṃ pasiddho dhammo “samādhī”ti vuccati.
anya-e0812n:1405_7: Tadabhidhāyī saddo ca upacārato atthānugāmittā saddikavohāraṃ dasseti,
anya-e0812n:1406_2: Nātha tava tuyhaṃ uṇṇāpuṇṇindunā uṇṇāromamaṇḍalasaṅkhātapuṇṇacandena saha saṅgamā aññamaññasamavāyahetunā
anya-e0812n:1406_3: kumudinī keravākarasaṅkhātā kumudiniyo divāpi viniddā vikasitā sampamodanti maññe atisantuṭṭhā hontīti
anya-e0812n:1406_5: Ettha pāṇidhammasaṅkhāto suratasaṅgamo ca niddāpagamo ca sampamodanañcāti tiṇṇaṃ uṇṇāpuṇṇindukumudinīsaṅkhātesu
anya-e0812n:1406_6: apāṇesu lokavohārānatikkamma buddhiyā āropanena pāṇidhammato pasiddhā tayo atthā idha samādhayo nāma,
anya-e0812n:1406_8: Puṇṇo ca so indu ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1411_2: Nātha te pādambujesu ānatā paṇāmavasena janā tilokakuharapavattino sattā amatarasesviva pīyūsarasesu viya dayārasesu karuṇārasesu guṇesu.
anya-e0812n:1411_4: guṇe rāge drave raso”ti amarakosa 3.3.226 hi nighaṇṭu.
anya-e0812n:1411_5: Mujjantā nimujjamānā hatā naṭṭhā dosā vātādayo amatapakkhe,
anya-e0812n:1411_6: aññattha tu hatā naṭṭhā dosā rāgādayo yesanti viggaho,
anya-e0812n:1411_7: tatoyeva sukhitā sukhaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ itā pattā gatāti attho.
anya-e0812n:1412_2: Nātha te tava pādambujānatā caraṇapadume paṇatā janā devamanussā amatarasesu iva sudhājalesu viya dayārasesu
anya-e0812n:1412_3: anaññasādhāraṇakaruṇāguṇesu mujjantā nimujjamānā hatadosā vinaṭṭhavātapittādayo vinaṭṭharāgādidosā vā
anya-e0812n:1412_5: Ettha rūpayuttajale labbhamānaṃ mujjanaṃ nirūpe dayāguṇe āropitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1412_8: hatā vātādayo rāgādayo vā dosā yesanti ca,
anya-e0812n:1413_0: “Siṅgārādovise vīriye, guṇe rāge draveraso”ti amarakosa 3.3.226 ettha rasasaddo guṇajalesu vattati.
anya-e0812n:1416_0: Madhurepi guṇe dhīra, nappasīdanti ye tava;
anya-e0812n:1418_3: bho dhīra tava madhurepi manoharepi guṇe karuṇādike ye nappasīdanti pasādaṃ na karonti,
anya-e0812n:1418_4: khāraguṇānaṃ amadhuraguṇānaṃ tesaṃ janānaṃ manaso vutti cittappavatti kīdisīti kimiva dissati,
anya-e0812n:1419_2: Bho dhīra tava te madhure api guṇe pakatisundare karuṇāpaññāguṇepi ye hīnādhimuttikā janā nappasīdanti,
anya-e0812n:1419_3: khāraguṇānaṃ amadhuraguṇānaṃ tesaṃ janānaṃ manaso vutti cittappavatti kīdisī kathaṃ ruhati.
anya-e0812n:1419_7: Ettha samādhi nāma rasahīne āropitarasayuttadhammabhūtaṃ madhurakhāraguṇadvayaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1424_2: Sabbatthasiddhassa mahāmunino cūḷakapuṭena peyyā pātabbā kundasobhāsalakkhaṇā kundakusumassa sobhāsavantā
anya-e0812n:1424_3: jutivijambhino mahāguṇā samantā parito disā disantāni dhāvanti.
anya-e0812n:1425_3: nipphannehi sabbatthehi vā samannāgata he tathāgata tava cūḷakapuṭapeyyā cūḷakapuṭena pātabbā kundasobhāsalakkhaṇā
anya-e0812n:1425_4: kundasobhāhi samānalakkhaṇā kundasobhāsadisā vā mahāguṇā saṅkhyāmahantattā ānubhāvamahantattā vā mahantā
anya-e0812n:1425_5: vā arahattādayo guṇā samantā samantato disā dasadisāsu dhāvantīti.
anya-e0812n:1425_6: Ettha dravayuttaguṇabhūto cūḷakapuṭapeyyabhāvo dravarahite guṇe āropito samādhi nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1425_7: Sabbe ca te atthā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1425_11: mahantā ca te guṇā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1425_13: tāhi samānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yesanti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1430_4: tassa vā balena senāya vissaṭṭhā abhimukhaṃ chaḍḍitā nānāvidhā anekappakārā āyudhā bhindivāḷādayo kuṇṭhā
anya-e0812n:1430_6: evarūpaṃ jāta”nti lajjantā aññavesena “kathaṃ nāma pare amhe na jāneyyu”nti attano āvudhavesaṃ parivattitvā
anya-e0812n:1431_2: He jina mārāribalavissaṭṭhā mārasattunā attano sattiyā vissaṭṭhā,
anya-e0812n:1431_3: mārārino vā senāya vissaṭṭhā abhimukhe pātitā nānāvidhāyudhā anekappakārabhindivāḷaususattitomarādayo
anya-e0812n:1431_4: āvudhā kuṇṭhā atikhiṇā lajjamānā “kasmā evaṃ lokapasiddhānubhāvānamamhākampi īdisaṃ vippakāramahosī”ti
anya-e0812n:1431_5: lajjantā aññavesena “kathamamhe pare na jāneyyu”nti āvudhavesaṃ hitvā tadaññabhūtena pupphavesena tava
anya-e0812n:1431_7: Ettha kattudhammabhūtaṃ lajjanañca aññavesena parivattanañca ānatañceti ime lajjanādīnaṃ akattubhūtesu visayesu āropitā samādhayo nāma honti.
anya-e0812n:1431_10: mārārinā balavissaṭṭhāti ca mārārino balaṃ senāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1431_14: añño ca so veso cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1438_2: Bodho sabbaññutaññāṇasadiso soyeva vā udayācalo udayapabbato tasmiṃ kāle rattipariyante abhinikkhantasamaye
anya-e0812n:1438_3: udito pātubhūto munindo munindasadiso soyeva vā bhāṇumā sūriyo andhatamaṃ andhakāraṃ mohaṃ vā paraṃ accantameva
anya-e0812n:1438_4: saddhammaraṃsinā saddhammasadisena saddhammasaṅkhatena vā raṃsinā bhindaṃ padālento bhāti sobhatīti.
anya-e0812n:1439_2: Bodhodayācale sabbaññutaññāṇasadise sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhāte vā udayapabbate kālodito rattikkhaye māraparājitasamaye
anya-e0812n:1439_3: vā udito pātubhūto munindabhānumā munindasadiso munindoyeva vā sūriyo andhatamaṃ pakatighanandhakāraṃ
anya-e0812n:1439_4: bahalamohandhakāraṃ saddhammaraṃsinā saddhammasadisena saddhammabhūtena vā kiraṇena paramatisayena bhindaṃ
anya-e0812n:1439_6: Ettha thaddhadhammabhūtaṃ bhedanaṃ asarīrabhūte andhakāre buddhiyā āropitaṃ samādhi nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1443_5: Etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ guṇā padhānetarā pasiddhavisayā visayantarapariggahalakkhaṇā vutti payogarūpā,
anya-e0812n:1443_6: tato apariccutaṃ aparigaḷitaṃ santaṃ amukhyabhūtaṃ atisundaraṃ accantamanoharamalaṅkārarūpattā,
anya-e0812n:1443_7: aññaṃ tu itaraṃ pana mukhyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1443_8: Kāmaṃ ekantena gāmmataṃ asabbhasabhāvaṃ bandhe tassānucitabhāvato vindati paṭilabhati pasavatīti attho.
anya-e0812n:1444_1: Idāni imesuyeva pāṇidhammādīsu koci dhammo amukhyavisaye payutto pasattho,
anya-e0812n:1444_3: Etaṃ vamanuggiranādi vamanauggiranavirecanādikaṃ guṇavutyapariccutaṃ amukhyapayogato agaḷitaṃ amukhyabhūtaṃ atisundaraṃ sabbesaṃ atipiyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:1444_4: aññaṃ tu uttato byatirekaṃ mukhyavisaye payuttaṃ vamanuggiranādikaṃ pana kāmaṃ ekantena gāmmataṃ sabhāvaappiyagāmmadosataṃ vindati sevatīti.
anya-e0812n:1448_2: Munino sammāsambuddhassa pādanakhānaṃ āvalī seṇiyo kantīnaṃ attano nirantaraṃ nissarantīnaṃ sobhāvisesānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1448_3: vamanabyājā uggiranalesena candakantī candacchaviyo sabbattha patthaṭattā pivantīva pānaṃ karontīti takkemi.
anya-e0812n:1448_5: Taṃ candaṃ nippabhaṃ pabhāvirahitaṃ karontiyo vidahamānā.
anya-e0812n:1448_6: Idañhi kappanābījaṃ yato nakhasobhāliṅganena candassa sobhāvato nippabhattaṃ passitvā mahattañca tassā
anya-e0812n:1448_7: nakhāvaliyo candakantī pivantīti parikappeti kantīnañca vamanabyājaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1449_2: Munipādanakhāvalī munipādanakhaseṇiyo kantīnaṃ attano candamarīcisadisasobhānaṃ vamanabyājā uggiranalesena
anya-e0812n:1449_3: taṃ nimmalacandaṃ nippabhaṃ karontiyo attano sabbattha patthaṭattā nippabhaṃ karontiyo candakantī candaraṃsiyo
anya-e0812n:1449_5: Nakharaṃsīnaṃ sabbattha patthaṭattā sappabhassāpi candassa nippabhattañca nakharaṃsīnaṃ adhikattañca
anya-e0812n:1449_6: disvā candakantī pivanti iveti nakhāvalīnaṃ candakantipivanañca sakakantivamanañca pakati na hoti,
anya-e0812n:1449_8: Ettha bhattasitthādimukhyavisayato aññakantisaṅkhataamukhyavisaye payuttaṃ vamanaṃ guṇavuttīti ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1453_2: Iccevaṃ acitto kattā yassa taṃ acittakattukaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1454_1: Anantarodāharaṇassa pasatthattañca kammani guṇe sati sacittakattukavamanādikañca iṭṭhamiti dassento “acittakattuka”miccādimāha.
anya-e0812n:1454_2: Iccevaṃ iminā pakārena acittakattukaṃ nakhāvalisaṅkhātaaviññāṇakakattuvantaṃ guṇakammaṃ nakhakantisaṅkhātaappadhānakammavantaṃ
anya-e0812n:1454_3: vamanādikaṃ rujhaṃ racanāya ucitattā rucijanakaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:1454_4: etaṃ vamanādikaṃ sacittakattukampi saviññāṇakakattuvantampi yadi guṇakammaṃ amukhyakammaṃ ce,
anya-e0812n:1454_6: “kantīna”nti bhāvasambandhe chaṭṭhiyā satipi vamanakriyāya kammattaṃ nātivattati.
anya-e0812n:1454_12: atha vā vacanavacanīyānaṃ vacanavacanīyādīnaṃ (ka.) nigamārambhe nipātasamudāyo.
anya-e0812n:1457_0: Bhāsanto madhuraṃ dhammaṃ, kaṃ na sampīṇaye janaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1458_2: So jinavaro jane sakalasattanikāye sneharasaṃ attano pemasaṅkhātaṃ anurāgaṃ uggirantova vamanto viya
anya-e0812n:1458_3: madhuraṃ atipaṇītaṃ dhammaṃ bhāsanto kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇaye,
anya-e0812n:1459_2: So jinavaro jane sakalasattanikāye sneharasaṃ attano pemasaṅkhātaanurāgaṃ uggiranto iva vamanto viya
anya-e0812n:1459_3: madhuraṃ ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ saddhammaṃ bhāsanto desento yathāsayaṃ vadanto kaṃ janaṃ
anya-e0812n:1459_6: Ettha uggiranaṃ jinavarasaṅkhatasacittakakattuvantampi sneharasasaṅkhātaamukhyakammayuttattā pasatthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1468_2: tadanubandhapaṭibhāne cāvijjamānepi sutena abhiyogabalena kavitā kitti ca tadanugatā samupalabbhatīti samanusāsati “yo”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n:1468_3: Saddasatthe byākaraṇe kismiñci “idameve”ti niyamābhāvā kusalo cheko nighaṇṭumhi abhidhānasatthe ca chandasi
anya-e0812n:1468_4: vuttijātippapañcapakāsakachandovicitisatthe ca alaṅkatisu alaṅkārasatthe ca kusalo na kevalaṃ saddasattheyeva,
anya-e0812n:1468_5: atha ca pana niccamanavarataṃ divā ca ratto ca kato abhiyogo vāyāmo racanāvisaye yassa soyaṃ kavittavikalopi
anya-e0812n:1468_6: bandhakaraṇasaṅkhātakaviguṇaparihīnopi kavīsu kaviguṇopetesu saṅkhyaṃ gaṇanaṃ ogayha paṭilabhitvā amandarūpaṃ
anya-e0812n:1468_7: atibahuṃ kittiṃ parisuddhabandharacanālakkhaṇaṃ tappabhavaṃ khyātaṃ vindati paṭilabhatevāti.
anya-e0812n:1472_1: Idāni uddesakkamena saddālaṅkāre niddisitvā byākaraṇanighaṇṭuchandoparivārite imasmiṃ nirantarābhiyogo
anya-e0812n:1472_3: Yo theranavamajjhimesu koci saddasatthakusalo saddānusāsanabyākaraṇavisaye pakatipaccayādivibhāgakappanāya
anya-e0812n:1472_4: cheko nighaṇṭuchandoalaṅkatīsu abhidhānachandoalaṅkārasatthesupi kusalo taṃtaṃvibhāgabuddhīnaṃ paṭipādanena
anya-e0812n:1472_5: cheko niccakatābhiyogo dhāraṇamanasikāravasena niccaṃ katussāho hoti.
anya-e0812n:1472_6: So ayaṃ appamādī kavittavikalopi pakatisiddhakabbaracanaguṇarahitopi kavīsu saṅkhyaṃ kabbakattūsu gaṇanaṃ
anya-e0812n:1472_7: ogayha kabbakaraṇaṭīkākaraṇādipakārena ogāhetvā taṃ gaṇanaṃ pāpuṇitvā amandarūpaṃ anappakasabhāvaṃ atibahuṃ
anya-e0812n:1477_0: Tattha sābhāvikī sabhāvasiddhā paṭibhā ca paññā ca bahu nimmalaṃ anappakaṃ nijjaṭaṃ sutañca amando abhiyogo
anya-e0812n:1477_1: ca anappako abhyāso ceti ayameso sabbopi iha bandhane imissaṃ kabbaracanāyaṃ hetu hoti kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n:1477_2: Sadde sāsati ettha etenāti imasmiṃ atthe tappaccayañca tassa thādesañca katvā saddasatthanti ñātabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1477_4: nighaṇṭu ca chando ca alaṅkati alaṅkārañceti ca viggaho,
anya-e0812n:1477_9: amandaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1484_2: Saguṇā yathāvuttehi pasādādīhi saddaguṇehi sahitā bandhapaddhati kabbaracanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1484_3: Alaṅkarīyati kantiṃ nīyati bandho etehi sarīramiva hārādīhīti alaṅkārā,
anya-e0812n:1484_4: tehi atthālaṅkārehi jātyādilakkhaṇehi sahitā saṃyuttā satī saguṇā patibbatādiguṇopetā atthena dhanena
anya-e0812n:1484_5: alaṅkārena ābharaṇena sahitā yuttā kantāva aṅganā viya.
anya-e0812n:1484_7: tato tena kāraṇena ye atthālaṅkārā avasaraṃ pattā,
anya-e0812n:1485_1: Evaṃ saddālaṅkāravibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni tannissayaṃyeva atthālaṅkārabandhamārabhanto “atthālaṅkāri”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n:1485_2: Saguṇā yathāvuttapasādādisaddaguṇayuttā bandhapaddhati pajjagajjādipabhedā racanāvali atthālaṅkārasahitā
anya-e0812n:1485_3: sabhāvavuttivaṅkavuttisaṅkhātena atthālaṅkārena saṃyuttā saguṇā atthālaṅkārasahitā kantā iva patibbatādīhi
anya-e0812n:1485_4: guṇehi yuttā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādidhanehi gīveyyakaṭakanūpurādīhi ābharaṇehi ca yuttā aṅganāva accantakantā
anya-e0812n:1485_6: tato tasmā te atthālaṅkārā adhunā dāni vuccante.
anya-e0812n:1485_7: Alaṅkaronti bandhaṃ sarīraṃ vā etehīti ca,
anya-e0812n:1489_2: Sabhāvavutti vaṅkavuttīti imesaṃ bhedā pabhedena alaṃkriyā atthālaṅkārādvidhādvippakārā.
anya-e0812n:1489_4: Tattha tāsu paṭhamā sabhāvavutti vatthūnaṃ padatthānaṃ jātiguṇakriyādabbasabhāvānaṃ nānā vicittā,
anya-e0812n:1489_5: na dvekāva avatthā avasarā vibhāvinī pakāsikā viññeyyā.
anya-e0812n:1489_6: Jātyādīnaṃ padatthānaṃ yathāsabhāvamanekappakāraṃ sammadeva vivarantī sabhāvaṃ padatthānaṃ vicittaṃ vadatīti sabhāvavutti nāmāti adhippāyo,
anya-e0812n:1489_7: sāva jātiyā padatthasarūpassa tathātathāpaṭipādakattena vuttiyā dattiyā (ka.) jātipi vuccati.
anya-e0812n:1490_2: Alaṃkriyā atthālaṅkārā sabhāvavaṅkavuttīnaṃ bhedā pabhedato dvidhā dvippakārā honti.
anya-e0812n:1490_3: Tattha tāsudvīsu paṭhamā sabhāvavutti vatthūnaṃ jātiguṇakriyādabbalakkhaṇānaṃ padatthānaṃ nānāvatthāvibhāvinī anekappakārassa pakāsinī hoti.
anya-e0812n:1490_4: Ettha jātyādīnaṃ padatthānaṃ anekappakārasabhāvapakāsinī sabhāvavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n:1490_5: Esāva jāti guṇādicatubbidhapadatthānaṃ sarūpasaṅkhātajātiyā tehi ākārehi paṭipādanato upacārato jāti nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1490_6: Jātyādipadatthānaṃyeva yathāsabhāvaṃ hitvā vatthuparikappitaatisayopamārūpakādisarūpasaṅkhātaṃ vaṅkasabhāvaṃ pakāsentī vaṅkavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n:1490_10: nānā anekā ca sā avatthā cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1497_2: Līlāya vilāsena vihitāya vikantiyā gamanena sattapadavītihārasaṅkhātena subhago sundaro disāsu dasasu
anya-e0812n:1497_3: thiramacalaṃ vilokanaṃ yassa so bodhisattaṅkuro tadahujāto mahābodhisatto āsabhiṃ vācaṃ “aggohamasmī”tiādikamuttamaṃ
anya-e0812n:1497_4: nibbhayavacanaṃ bhāsaṃ vadanto viroci visesena ramaṇīyattaṃ patto.
anya-e0812n:1498_3: Līlāvikantisubhago vilāsagamanena sattapadavītihārena sundaro disāthiravilokano dasadisāsu acalaolokano
anya-e0812n:1498_4: bodhisattaṅkuro mahābodhisattaṅkuro āsabhiṃ vācaṃ “aggohamasmī”tiādinā abhītavacanaṃ bhāsaṃ vadanto viroci asobhīti.
anya-e0812n:1498_5: Iha bodhisattasaṅkhātassa dabbassa līlāvikantidisāthiravilokanavaconicchāraṇasaṅkhatānaṃ avatthānaṃ pakāsitattā dabbasabhāvavuttīti ñātabbā.
anya-e0812n:1498_15: Usabhassa bhāvasaṅkhātā akampanīyā ṭhiti āsabhaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n:1498_16: akampabhāvato tena samāpi vācā upacārato āsabhī nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1502_2: Vatthuno jātyādirūpassa padatthassa sabhāvo yassaṃ avatthāyaṃ yādisaṃ rūpaṃ tassa aññathābhāvena tassa rūpassa tathetaṃ dabbāpanena vutti vacanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1502_3: Parā bhave aññā vaṅkavutti nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:1502_4: Kiṃ sā sākallena vattuṃ sakkāti āha “tassā”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:1502_5: Tassā vaṅkavuttiyā anantavikappattā aparimitabhedakattā bījassa kāraṇattā sakalabyattibyāpisāmaññarūpassa yato pare vicittālaṅkārā pasavanti,
anya-e0812n:1503_2: Vatthusabhāvassa jātyādipadatthasambandhino tāsu tāsu avatthāsu yo sabhāvo vijjati,
anya-e0812n:1503_3: tassa sabhāvassa aññathā vijjamānākāraṃ hitvā vattuparikappitena atisayaupamārūpakādiaññapakārena yā vutti yaṃ kathanaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n:1503_4: sā parābhave sabhāvavuttito aññā vaṅkavutti nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:1503_5: Tassā vaṅkavuttiyā anantavikappattā appamāṇapakkhattā kathanena parisamāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā nayato tassa
anya-e0812n:1503_6: anantapakkhassa pariggahaṇatthaṃ bījopadassanaṃ kāraṇamattassa nidassanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1503_7: Vakkhamānabhedato ekamekampi attanā sadisaṃ anantabhedapariggahajānanatthaṃ pahotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:1523_0: Vaṅkavuttīsu poseti, sileso tu siriṃ paraṃ.
anya-e0812n:1524_2: Tatthāti tassaṃ vaṅkavuttiyaṃ “ete bhedā samuddiṭṭhā”ti iminā sambandho.
anya-e0812n:1524_7: jīvitamuccateti tadabhāve bandhassa chavasseva heyyattā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1524_8: sileso tu vaṅkavuttīsu sabhāvavuttiṃ hitvā vatthusabhāvato aññathā yathā tathā parikappanarūpāsu atisayādīsu
anya-e0812n:1524_9: vuttīsu paraṃ siriṃ kantiṃ poseti taṃ pūreti āvahatīti.
anya-e0812n:1525_1: Bhedavantānaṃ padatthānaṃ sabhāvakathanaṃ uddesakkamena pākaṭaṃ hotīti vattamānehi alaṅkārehi uddisanto “tatthātisaya…pe…
anya-e0812n:1525_3: Tattha tatthāti tissaṃ vaṅkavuttiyaṃ iti evaṃ ete pañcatiṃsa bhedā samuddiṭṭhā saṅkhepena vuttāti.
anya-e0812n:1525_4: Etesaṃ pana padānaṃ attho niddese āvibhavissati.
anya-e0812n:1525_5: Iminā bhāvo ca sileso ca atippasatthoti dīpeti.
anya-e0812n:1525_6: Bhāvo bhāvālaṅkāro jīvitaṃ bandhassa pāṇabhūtoti vuccate,
anya-e0812n:1525_8: sileso tu silesālaṅkāro pana vaṅkavuttīsu atisayopamādivaṅkavuttīsu paramukkaṃsabhūtaṃ siriṃ sobhaṃ poseti pūreti.
anya-e0812n:1532_2: Visesassa vatthugatassātimattassa pakāsikāyāti anuvaditvā sā atisayavutti siyāti vidhīyate,
anya-e0812n:1532_3: atisayassa vatthuno ukkaṃsassa paṭipādikā vutti atisayavutti.
anya-e0812n:1532_5: Lokaṃ lokappatītiṃ atikkanto visayo gocaro yassā sā lokātikkantavisayā ca loke bhavā lokaṭhitimanatikkantattāti
anya-e0812n:1532_6: lokiyā cāti atisayavutti dvidhā dvippakārā bhavati.
anya-e0812n:1533_5: lokātikkanta visayāti ca lokiyāti ca yathāvuttalokamanatikkamma pavattanato lokiyāti cevaṃ dvidhā dvippakārā honti.
anya-e0812n:1533_10: “Visesassa pakāsikā”ti pasiddhaguṇānuvādena sā atisayavutti siyāti apasiddhaṃ atisayavuttividhānaṃ karoti,
anya-e0812n:1539_1: Ayaṃ dvippakārā atisayavutti sabhāvavutyādīhi bhinnāti ce?
anya-e0812n:1539_3: Jātiādayo yato padatthassa vicittaṃ sarūpaṃ vadatīti vicittasarūpapaṭipādikā sabhāvavuttipi alaṅkāro,
anya-e0812n:1539_16: tato lokātikkantavisayā ca visuṃ dassanīyāti āha “paṭī”tiādi.
anya-e0812n:1539_18: Ajja tu idāni pana lokātikkantagocarā paṭipādīyateti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:1540_1: Idāni esā dvippakārāpi atisayavuttisabhāvavutyādīhi anaññāti dassetuṃ “lokiye”ccādimāha.
anya-e0812n:1540_2: Jātiādayo jātiguṇādipadatthagatavicittasarūpassa pakāsanato nissayavohārena “jātyādayo”ti niddiṭṭhā jātisabhāvavuttiguṇasabhāvavutyādayo
anya-e0812n:1540_7: Evaṃ lokiyātisayavuttiyā “līlāvikantisubhago”ti udāharaṇassa gamyamānattā vakkhamānaṃ paṭijānāti “paṭipādīyate”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n:1540_8: Ajja tu idāni pana lokātikkantagocarā atisayavutti paṭipādīyate udāharaṇato nipphādīyati.
anya-e0812n:1546_2: Jina te dehakantī sarīrasobhāyo ye janā nettañjalipuṭena attano nayanadvandasaṅkhātena añjalipuṭena pivanti,
anya-e0812n:1546_3: esaṃ janānaṃ taṇhaṃ pipāsaṃ lobhameva vā harati anupatati apanayati (?).
anya-e0812n:1546_4: Taṇhāharopi samāno tvaṃ hantuṃ nivattituṃ kiṃ nālaṃ kasmā asamatthosi.
anya-e0812n:1546_6: Atra hanantāmapiha sampanudati lokaṭhitiṃ atikkamma dehakantiyā bahuttanadhammo vutto.
anya-e0812n:1547_2: Bho jina te tuyhaṃ dehakantī sarīrasobhāyo ye janā nettañjalipuṭena nettasaṅkhātena hatthapuṭena pivanti,
anya-e0812n:1547_3: esaṃ sādhujanānaṃ taṇhaṃ pipāsaṃ lobhameva vā taṇhāharopi tvaṃ sabbesaṃ taṇhāvināsakopi hantuṃ nivāretuṃ kiṃ nālaṃ kasmā asamatthosīti.
anya-e0812n:1547_4: Ettha pivanaṃ nāma pipāsaṃ vinetīti lokasabhāvo.
anya-e0812n:1547_7: tassa vutti pana taṇhaṃ hantuṃ nālamiti lokātikkantaatthaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavatto hoti.
anya-e0812n:1547_8: Sā pana kathetumicchitaṃ kantīnaṃ adhikapiyataṃ taṇhāhanane asamatthaṃ vatvā dīpetīti vaṅkavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n:1547_9: Vuccamānānaṃ upamārūpakādīnampi vaṅkavuttitā icchitatthassa pakārantarena pakāsanatoyeva.
anya-e0812n:1547_10: Yathā nāma sarīrasahajaṃ pīnattādisundarattaṃ uddīpanākārena ṭhitā kaṭakauṇhīsahārādayo alaṅkārā nāma bhavanti,
anya-e0812n:1547_11: evaṃ bandhasarīrasaṅkhāte alaṅkaraṇīyavatthumhi vijjamānaatipiyatādimeva uddīpetvā alaṅkurumānā “taṇhāharosi
anya-e0812n:1547_12: tvaṃ esaṃ kantī pivantānaṃ taṇhaṃ hantuṃ nāla”miti vācābhaṅgī alaṅkāro nāma.
anya-e0812n:1547_14: Uttaripi alaṅkāraalaṅkāriyavibhāgo ca anurūpato yojanakkamo ca evameva daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n:1551_9: Sadhammattanti samāno dhammo kantimantatā yassa so sadhammo,
anya-e0812n:1551_10: tassa bhāvo sadhammasaddassa pavattinimittasamānena dhammena saha sambandho sadhammattaṃ upamānopameyyapatiṭṭhitaṃ upamā siyā,
anya-e0812n:1551_17: Tassa attho visayo gocaro yassā vākyatthavisayāti ca sā upamā tividhā saddagammaatthagammavākyatthavisayāti tidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1552_2: Upamānopameyyānaṃ candanīluppaladalābhādīnaṃ ānananayanādīnañca padatthānaṃ sadhammattaṃ kantimantatāpīnatāditulyadhammasambandho upamā nāma siyā,
anya-e0812n:1552_3: sā alaṅkaraṇīyavatthuno ādhikkapaṭipādanappakārā upamā saddatthagammā saddagammā ca atthagammā ca vākyatthavisayā ca,
anya-e0812n:1552_6: padatthānaṃ upamatthassa patiṭṭhitattā upaṭṭhānatāya upamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n:1552_7: tannissayacandādayo pana nissitavohārena upamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n:1552_8: upamānabhūtacandādiatthapaṭipādako candimādisaddopi tadatthena upamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n:1552_10: Upamīyate anenāti upamānanti katvā candādi upamānaṃ vuccati,
anya-e0812n:1552_13: samāno ca so dhammo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1552_18: so visayo yassā upamāyāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1556_2: Samāso ca paccayo ca ivādi ca,
anya-e0812n:1556_5: Tesaṃ samāsādīnaṃ vasā saddagammā tidhā hoti samāsasaddagammā paccayasaddagammā ivādisaddagammāti,
anya-e0812n:1556_6: samāsena samāsasaddena gammā upamā vuccatīti seso.
anya-e0812n:1556_8: candimā viya ruciramānanaṃ mukhaṃ yassa so candimānano.
anya-e0812n:1556_13: tesu sādhāraṇadhammavācakassa viyasaddassa copamājotakassāppayogo samāseneva vuttattā,
anya-e0812n:1556_14: ettha pana viyasaddo candimāsaddena upamānavācakena sambandhamupagato candagatameva sadisattaṃ vadati,
anya-e0812n:1557_1: Tesu yathāvuttesu saddagammassa tividhattaṃ dassetuṃ āha “samāse”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:1557_5: tesaṃ samāsādīnaṃ vasā bhedena saddagammā tidhā samāsasaddagammā paccayasaddagammā ivādisaddagammāti tividhā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1557_7: Munindo sammāsambuddho candimānano candasamānamanoharamukhamaṇḍalena yutto hoti,
anya-e0812n:1557_8: samāso ca paccayo ca ivaiti idaṃ ādi yesaṃ vādīnanti ca,
anya-e0812n:1557_11: candimā viya ruciraṃ ānanaṃ mukhaṃ yasseti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:1557_15: “viyā”ti saddo candānanānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānanagatarucirattaṃ cande ca,
anya-e0812n:1557_16: candagatarucirattaṃ ānane ca atthīti samānadhammasambandhaṃ joteti,
anya-e0812n:1557_18: tulyadhammasaṅkhātopamājotakassa viyasaddassa ca appayogo tesaṃ atthānaṃ samāsena vuttattā.
anya-e0812n:1557_19: Ettha upamānavācakena candimāsaddena yutto viya saddo candagatasadisattaṃ joteti,
anya-e0812n:1557_21: Tathā hi mukhaṃ candasamānamāgacchantaṃ candassa mukhasadisattaṃ vinā na bhavatīti aññathānupapatti sāmatthiyanti.
anya-e0812n:1561_10: Tattha rucira ivasaddānaṃ pubbe viyāppayogo paccayena vuttattāti sabbattha viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1562_2: Āyādī “āya īya ka”itiādayo paccayā paccayasaddā nāma,
anya-e0812n:1562_5: Vadanaṃ mukhaṃ paṅkajāyate padumamiva ruciraṃ ācarati.
anya-e0812n:1562_6: Munindanayanadvandaṃ sabbaññuno nettayugaḷaṃ nīluppaladalīyati nīluppalapattamiva ruciramācarati.
anya-e0812n:1564_0: Ivādī iva vā tulya-samāna nibha sannibhā;
anya-e0812n:1576_0: Tassa coreti sobhaggaṃ, tassa kantiṃ vilumpati;
anya-e0812n:1581_2: Ivo ca vā ca tulyo ca samāno ca nibho ca sannibho cāti dvande iva…pe… sannibhā.
anya-e0812n:1582_1: Ivādisaddagammopamādhikāre paṭhamaṃ tāva “ivādayo nāma ete”ti dasseti “ivādi”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n:1582_2: Ivādīti padassa chaṭṭhamagāthāya imeti iminā sambandho,
anya-e0812n:1582_3: tassa cāti casaddaṃ yujjanaṭṭhāne yojetvā sannibhā cātiādayo yojetabbā.
anya-e0812n:1582_7: “Jayati akkosati hasati”iccādikaṃ taṃtaṃkriyāpadasaṅkhataanukāriyānaṃ anukaraṇanti katvā dvandoyeva,
anya-e0812n:1582_8: “sandhisamāsā addhassā”ti sandhisamāso tadaddhassāti (ka.) vuttattā sandhisamāsānaṃ gāthaddhassa vinā
anya-e0812n:1582_9: ubhayaddhamajjhe alabbhanato dūbhatipadato pubbeyeva samāso kātabbo, no ce,
anya-e0812n:1582_11: Tassa coreti sobhaggamiccādikampi vākyānukaraṇanti katvā tattha samāso,
anya-e0812n:1582_13: Imesaṃ sabbesampi iva saddapariyāyattā sadisatthāti sabbattha bhāvattho,
anya-e0812n:1586_1: Ivādīnaṃ viniyogavisayaṃ dassetvā upamābhedaṃ dassetuṃ paṭijānāti “upamāna”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:1587_4: Imehi ivādīhi saddehi jānitabbā keci upamābhedā apariyantattā sampati dāni laddhāvasare niyyanti udāharaṇamattena paṭipādīyanti.
anya-e0812n:1591_2: Sugatānanaṃ munindassa vadanaṃ atisundaraṃ accantaramaṇīyaṃ. Kimiva?
anya-e0812n:1591_4: Iti ayamevaṃvidhā dhammopamā nāma hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n:1591_5: Ānanapadumānaṃ samānassa dhammassa guṇassa sundarassa lakkhaṇassa nidassanā sundarattanti paṭipādanato.
anya-e0812n:1592_2: Sugatānanaṃ bhagavato mukhaṃ vikāsipadumaṃva bujjhamānapaṅkajamiva atisundaraṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1592_3: Iti īdisā upamā tulyadhammanidassanā atisundaramiti samānaguṇadassanena dhammopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1592_4: Padumānanānaṃ sādhāraṇaguṇassa pakāsanato atisundaramiti tulyadhammo nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1592_5: Ettha padumagatatulyadhammasambandhasaṅkhātāya upamāya ivasaddena jotiyamānattepi atisundaranti vuttattā
anya-e0812n:1592_6: yathāvuttopamāya dhammena yuttattā dhammopamā nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:1596_2: Munino sammāsambuddhassa mukhaṃ ambhojena padumena sadisaṃ samānaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1596_3: Iti ayaṃ dhammahīnopamā nāma sundarasaṅkhātassa guṇassa aniddiṭṭhattā,
anya-e0812n:1596_6: Ettha pana sadisasaddo upameyyassa mukhassa visesananti mukhagatameva sadisattaṃ vadati,
anya-e0812n:1596_11: bho muni tava ānanena mukhena ambujaṃ tulyanti ayaṃ viparītopamā.
anya-e0812n:1597_6: Ettha mukhassa ambhojasamānattaṃ mukhambhojānaṃ sādhāraṇadhamme asati kathaṃ bhavatīti?
anya-e0812n:1597_8: ivapariyāyo sadisasaddo mukhassa visesanaṃ yasmā hoti,
anya-e0812n:1597_11: He muni tava tuyhaṃ ānanena ambhojaṃ tulyaṃ samānanti ayaṃ viparītopamā.
anya-e0812n:1597_12: “Ambujena ānanaṃ tulya”nti lokappasiddhiyā vipariyayena “ānanena ambujaṃ tulya”nti vuttattā dhammahīnatte satipi viparītopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1597_13: “Sutānumitesu sutasambandho balavā”ti paribhāsendusekhara 112 vuttattā ettha “munī”ti avijjamānepi pubbaddhe
anya-e0812n:1597_15: Ettha ivapariyāyo tulyasaddo ambujavisesanabhūto ambujagatasadisattaṃ vadati,
anya-e0812n:1597_16: ānanagatasadisattañca ambujānanānaṃ sādhāraṇadhammo ca sāmatthiyā ñāyaticcādikaṃ vuttanayena ñātabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1601_2: Aññamaññopamānatoti aññamaññassa mukhassa ambhojassa ca aññamaññena taṃdvayena upamānato.
anya-e0812n:1602_4: Aññamaññopamānato aññamaññassa upamānattā aññamaññopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1602_9: Samāsalakkhaṇena aññatthassa apekkhāsiddhattā mukhāpekkhāya aññaṃ ambhojañca,
anya-e0812n:1602_10: ambhojāpekkhāya aññaṃ mukhañca kamena upameyyā nāma.
anya-e0812n:1608_5: Tamīdisamambhojaṃ tava mukhasobhaṃ vadanakantiṃ dhāretuṃ nisijjhate.
anya-e0812n:1608_6: Kiṃ nvacchariyamīdisanti abbhutatthavibhāvanena vadanamambujenopamīyatīti ayamabbhutopamā ñātabbāti.
anya-e0812n:1609_2: Locanabbhamuvibbhamaṃ locanabhamūnaṃ līlāvantaṃ kiñci ambhojaṃ kiñci acchariyaṃ padumaṃ yadi bhave ce siyā,
anya-e0812n:1609_3: tamambhojaṃ tava mukhasobhaṃ vadanakantiṃ dhāretuṃ samattho hoti.
anya-e0812n:1609_4: Iti īdisī upamā abbhutopamā abbhutadhammapakāsakattā abbhutopamā nāma.
anya-e0812n:1609_5: Ettha avijjamānopi vijjamānattena parikappito padumagato locanabbhamuvibbhamasambandho ambhojavisesanena “locanabbhamuvibbhama”nti iminā jotito.
anya-e0812n:1609_7: mukhaṃ upameyyanti mukhagato locanabbhamuvibbhamasambandho yadi mukhe na bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n:1609_8: tādisaṃ mukhasobhaṃ dhāretuṃ kathaṃ samatthoti sāmatthiyā ñāyati.
anya-e0812n:1609_10: tāsaṃ vibbhamo yasmi”nti ca viggahe nipphannena bhinnādhikaraṇaaññapadatthasamāsena guṇībhūtassapi gahitattā viññāyati gahaṇassa viññāyamānattā (ka.).
anya-e0812n:1613_2: Tava mukhaṃ ambhojamiva sisiraṃsunocandassa virodhi paccanīkaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1613_6: Sugandho assa atthīti sugandhi ca dvayamapīti evaṃ silesapariggahena mukhambujānaṃ upamāyogato sā yathāvuttā silesopamā matā.
anya-e0812n:1614_2: Tava mukhaṃ ambhojamiva sisiraṃsuvirodhi candassa viruddhaṃ hoti tulyattā.
anya-e0812n:1614_3: Padumaṃ pana candodayena attano saṅkocanattā tassa viruddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1614_6: Sugandhi ca catujjātisugandhavahanato …vamanato (ka.) sugandhi ca hoti.
anya-e0812n:1614_8: Iti īdisī upamā silesopamā ekapadātihitaubhayatthalakkhaṇena silesavasena vuttattā silesopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1614_9: Sisirā sītalā aṃsu kanti asseti ca,
anya-e0812n:1614_11: paccayasāmatthiyavasena dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ labbhanato silissati aparopi attho ettha alaṅkāreti ca,
anya-e0812n:1614_13: Ettha sugandho ca sotasambandho ca sisiraṃsuvirodhittañceti ime upamānopameyyānamambujamukhānaṃ tulyadhammo,
anya-e0812n:1614_14: tesu ambujagatatulyadhammasambandho sadhammattā upamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n:1614_16: mukhagatatulyadhammo pana assatthitassīlatthe katapaccaye satipi sāmatthiyāyeva gamyate.
anya-e0812n:1618_3: Sālakānanasobhinī bālā tāva sahālakena kesasannivesavisesena vattate sālakamānanaṃ tena sobhate.
anya-e0812n:1618_4: Sālakānanasobhinī uyyānamālāpi sālānaṃ rukkhavisesānaṃ kānanena gahanena sobhate,
anya-e0812n:1618_5: evarūpā sā tādisī santānopamā ākhyāyate, kasmā?
anya-e0812n:1618_6: Silesopamattasabhāvepi sarūpena sadisena saddena “sālakānanasobhinī”tvevaṃvidhena saddasantānena visesabhūtena vāccattā pakāsiyattā tassāiti gamyate.
anya-e0812n:1619_2: Sarūpasaddavāccattā tulyasutiyā acchinnasambandhavacanamālāya vuccamānattā sā upamā santānopamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n:1619_3: silesatte satipi katasamāsehi padasantānehi vuccamānattā santānopamā nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:1619_5: Ayaṃ uyyānamālā esā uyyānapanti sālakānanasobhinī alakasaṅkhātakesasannivesasahitena mukhena sobhamānā
anya-e0812n:1619_6: bālāva aṅganā iva sālakānanasobhinī sālavanehi sobhamānā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1619_8: sarūpā ca te saddā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1621_0: Khayī cando bahurajaṃ, padumaṃ tehi te mukhaṃ;
anya-e0812n:1623_3: padumaṃ bahurajaṃ bahūni rajāni parāgāvayavā yasminti,
anya-e0812n:1623_4: tehi evaṃbhūtehi candapadumehi kantiādinā samānampi sadisampi santaṃ tava mukhaṃ samukkaṃsi paramukkaṃsavantaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1623_5: khayasaddassa ca rajassa ca dosepi vattanato,
anya-e0812n:1623_6: saddacchalena khayassa dosarūpassa bahurajattassa ca tatthābhāvatoti.
anya-e0812n:1623_7: Iti evarūpā ayaṃ nindopamā matā ninditena candādinā khayassopamitattā.
anya-e0812n:1624_2: Cando khayī pāṭipadato paṭṭhāya dine dine ekamekāya kalāya sūriyassa āsannahetu khīyanasabhāvayutto hoti,
anya-e0812n:1624_4: tehi candapadumehi samānampi kantisugandhādīhi sadisampi te mukhaṃ tavānanaṃ samukkaṃsi khayarajasaddehi
anya-e0812n:1624_5: dosassāpi vāccattā saddacchalehi gamyamānassa tādisassa dosassa mukhe avijjamānattā adhikukkaṃsaguṇavantaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:1624_6: iti īdisī ayaṃ upamā nindopamā ninditānaṃ candapadumānaṃ mukhassa upamitāti nindopamā nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n:1624_7: mukhavisesanena ivasaddapariyāyena samānasaddena mukhagatasadhammo jotito hoti,
anya-e0812n:1628_2: Jina te mukhena jaḷo sīto akusalo ca kalaṅko migalañchanalakkhaṇo doso assa atthīti kalaṅkī.
anya-e0812n:1628_4: Tādiso indu cando paṭigajjituṃ vivadituṃ asamattho,
anya-e0812n:1628_5: mukhantu visadaṃ alaṅkatañceti kathamanenāyaṃ sadisoti nisedhadvārena sadhammatāva gammate,
anya-e0812n:1629_2: He jina te tuyhaṃ mukhena paṭigajjituṃ vivadituṃ jaḷo sītalo avisado kalaṅkī sasalakkhaṇo vā sadoso vā indu cando asamattho hotīti,
anya-e0812n:1629_5: Ettha visadena kalaṅkarahitena mukhena sītalo avisado sadoso cando samāno bhavitumasamatthoti evaṃ paṭisedhadvayena
anya-e0812n:1629_6: indamukhasaṅkhātānaṃ upamānopameyyānaṃ tulyadhammasambandhassa pakāsitattā satipi nindopamābhāve paṭisedhopamā
anya-e0812n:1633_2: Candassa aravindassa ca kacchaṃ padaviṃ atikkamma avatthariya tesa’mavakaṃsato avatthuyatesamaṇaṃsato (ka.),
anya-e0812n:1633_3: tava mukhaṃ attano sarūpeneva samaṃ jātamiti evarūpā asādhāraṇatābhidhānena sadisattapatītiyā asādhāraṇopameti nigadyate.
anya-e0812n:1634_2: He muni tava mukhaṃ candāravindānaṃ lokapūjitānaṃ sasiambujānaṃ kacchaṃ padaviṃ avatthaṃ vā atikkamma
anya-e0812n:1634_3: attano atulyattena attanā eva samānattavatthuno abhāvā samaṃ jātaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1634_4: iti īdisā upamā asādhāraṇopamā atulyadhammabhāvassa pakāsanato asādhāraṇopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1634_5: Iha upamābhūtānaṃ candāravindānaṃ mukhassa hīnabhāvapaṭipādanadvārena candāravindehi mukhaṃ tulyanti
anya-e0812n:1638_2: Katthaci ekaṭṭhāne rāsibhūto sabbesamambhojānaṃ pabhāsārova tavānanaṃ vibhātīti evaṃbhūtā ayaṃ abhūtopamā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1639_2: Katthaci ṭhāne rāsibhūto sabbambhojappabhāsārova sakalapadumānaṃ uttamakantipuñjo viya tavānanaṃ vibhāti visesena pabhāti,
anya-e0812n:1639_3: iti īdisī upamā abhūtopamā avijjamānavatthuno upamitattā abhūtopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1643_2: Atthagammā tu’pamā kvaci kismiñci ṭhāne samāsādisaddānaṃ yogaṃ vinā api saddānaṃ payogavisesādigāḷhena
anya-e0812n:1644_1: Tividhaṃ saddagammopamaṃ dassetvā idāni atthagammopamaṃ dasseti “patīyate”tyādinā.
anya-e0812n:1644_2: Atthagammā tu atthagammopamā pana kvaci ṭhāne samāsapaccayevādisaddayogaṃ vināpi tesaṃ saddānaṃ sambandhaṃ
anya-e0812n:1644_3: hitvāpi saddasāmatthiyā sambandhe payuttāvasesasaddānaṃ atthasattiyā patīyate.
anya-e0812n:1648_5: kintu mukhamevidanti evarūpā sā sarūpopamā matā bhiṅgādīnamaviparītasarūpassa dīpanato.
anya-e0812n:1648_7: Subyattena bhiṅgacakkhūnaṃ ambujamukhānañca pariphuṭena sadisattena cañcalattakantyādilakkhaṇena tenevābhedasaṅkāpubbameva
anya-e0812n:1648_9: tassa paccakkhānato upamājotakānamivādīnamabhāvepi bhiṅgalocanādīnaṃ sadisattaṃ patīyate sāmatthiyato.
anya-e0812n:1649_4: Ambujaṃ na idaṃ padumaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n:1649_6: Īdisī sā upamā subyattasadisattena supākaṭena bhiṅgalocanānaṃ ambujamukhānañca tulyabhāvena sarūpopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1649_8: viparītapavattabuddhiṃ paṭisedhetvā cakkhumukhavidhānato cañcalattakantimattādīsu subyattaṃ tulyattaṃ
anya-e0812n:1649_9: vinā cakkhumukhesu bhiṅgambujabuddhiṃ kīdisamuppajjatīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇasāmatthiyā upamānabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1649_13: samānaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassā upamāyāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1649_14: sā ca sā upamā cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1653_4: nāññatrāti evarūpā vikatthanā atthapasaṃsanena alamiti paṭisedho. Kimiti?
anya-e0812n:1653_5: Yato yasmā kāraṇā sā mukhasobhā ambujepi na kevalamindumhi atthi,
anya-e0812n:1653_6: no natthīti asatopi tathā vikatthanassa parikappanato vadanamindunopamīyatīti evarūpā ayaṃ parikappopamā.
anya-e0812n:1654_2: He indu assa imassa lokasāmino mukhasobhā vadanakanti ekake mayi eva,
anya-e0812n:1654_5: Yato sā mukhasobhā ambujepi atthi, tasmāti.
anya-e0812n:1654_6: Iti īdisā ayaṃ upamā parikappopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1654_7: Yatoti aniyamaniddiṭṭhakāraṇaṃ pana ambujepi sā atthīti dassiyamānaṃ padumepi tassa atthittameva.
anya-e0812n:1654_9: Idha candassa avijjamānavikatthanassa vijjamānattena parikappanato sadhammajotakasaddantare asatipi upamānabhūtainduno
anya-e0812n:1654_10: ca upameyyabhūtamukhassa ca sadisattaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ sadisattaṃ vinā vattuno tādisakappanā kathaṃ hotīti
anya-e0812n:1660_6: Jina tavedaṃ mukhaṃ kinti mama cittaṃ dolāyate dolevācarati.
anya-e0812n:1661_2: Antobhantāli abbhantare bhamamānabhamaravantaṃ ambujaṃ kiṃ vā,
anya-e0812n:1661_3: tuyhaṃ lolanayanaṃ cañcalanettaṃ mukhaṃ kiṃ vāti mama cittaṃ dolāyate ubhayasambhamajananato dolā viya hoti.
anya-e0812n:1661_4: Iti ayaṃ evarūpā upamā saṃsayopamā dvinnaṃ sadisattassa saṃsayena pakāsitattā saṃsayopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1661_9: Ihāpi sadhammapakāsake saddantare asatipi yathāvuttavisesanadvayena visiṭṭhānaṃ dvinnaṃ ambujamukhānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1661_10: saṃsayanimitte tulyatte asati kathaṃ saṃsayo uppajjatīti iminā sāmatthiyeneva tulyadhammasambandho gamyate.
anya-e0812n:1667_2: Kiñci vatthumicchitaṃ sambuddhādikaṃ upadassetvā sadhammassa tena vatthunā kenaci ākārena sadisassa aññassa
anya-e0812n:1667_3: vatthuno abhidhānato sāmyassa tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sadisattassa patītiyā avasāyassa sambhāvā vijjamānattena
