anya-e0812n:1668_2: Kiñci vatthumicchitaṃ jinādikiñcipadatthaṃ upadassetvā paṭhamaṃ nidassetvā sadhammassa paṭipādanīyaatthena
anya-e0812n:1668_3: saha kiñci ākārena sadisabhāvassa kassaci vatthuno abhidhānato kathanato sāmyappatītisabbhāvā sadisatāsambandhino
anya-e0812n:1668_4: parijānanassa vijjamānattā pativatthūpamā vatthuno upaṭṭhitassa jinādipadatthassa tulyatthapakāsanato
anya-e0812n:1668_6: Samāno dhammo yassa vā pārijātādino iti ca,
anya-e0812n:1674_2: Jāyamānesu janesu majjhe ekopi jano guṇavā jinasādiso sammāsambuddhasamāno na vijjatītyekaṃ tāva vatthu upadassitaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1674_5: pārijātassa dibbarukkhavisesassa dutiyo samāno pādapo nattheva.
anya-e0812n:1675_2: Jāyamānesu janesu ekopi jinasādiso sambuddhasadiso natthi,
anya-e0812n:1675_3: pārijātassa rukkhassa dutiyo tena samo dutiyo pādapo rukkho natthi eva nanu,
anya-e0812n:1675_6: Iha pārijātarukkhassa aññehi rukkhehi uttamattañca buddhassa aññesu sattesu uttamattañcāti idaṃ dvayaṃ
anya-e0812n:1675_8: etaṃ sāmyaṃ vuttatthassa samatthanavasena pativatthubhūtapārijātassa rukkhehi asamānattakathaneneva jotitaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1681_3: na padatthamattena vākyattho vuttalakkhaṇo koci vattumicchito koci yadi upamīyate sadiso kathyate,
anya-e0812n:1682_2: Vākyattheneva kriyākārakasambandhavisesasaṅkhatasamudāyabhūtena vākyatthena koci vattumicchito yo koci
anya-e0812n:1682_3: vākyattho vuttalakkhaṇo yadi upamīyate sadisabhāvena kathīyate,
anya-e0812n:1682_6: Ettha “ivā”ti ivādīnamatthassa gahitattā ivasaddopi tappariyāyasaddāpi gayhante.
anya-e0812n:1689_2: Saṃklesehi dasavidhehi tattānaṃ santāpaṃ anuppattānaṃ janānaṃ ayaṃ jino sammāsambuddho āvibhūto katakiccattā sammāsambodhādhigamena loke pātubhūto.
anya-e0812n:1689_5: Ghammasantāpena tattānaṃ janānaṃ ghammakāle gimhānasamaye ambudo megho viyāti dutiyavākyamupamānabhūtamityayamivayuttā vākyatthopamā.
anya-e0812n:1690_2: Ayaṃ jino eso jitapañcamāro satthā saṃklesatattānaṃ anekappakāra kilesasantāpatattānaṃ janānaṃ āvibhūto
anya-e0812n:1690_5: Ghammasantāpatattānaṃ janānaṃ ghammakāle gimhasamaye ambudoviya megho iva.
anya-e0812n:1690_8: Evaṃ vākyabhede satipi vākyattho ekoveti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n:1690_10: Uttaravākye ivasaddo tasmiṃyeva guṇaguṇīpadatthānaṃ sadisattaṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0812n:1690_11: pubbavākye guṇaguṇīnaṃ sadisattaṃ pana uttaravākyatthassa pubbavākyena samānattaṃ vinā aññathānupapattiyā ñāyati.
anya-e0812n:1694_0: Uddhaṃ samuggatassāpi, kiṃ te canda vijambhanā.
anya-e0812n:1695_2: Vilāsena ekamatulyaṃ manoharaṃ dutiyassa tādisassābhāvato munindānanaṃ ābhāti atisayena sobhateti ekaṃ tāva vākyamupameyyabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1695_3: Bho canda uddhaṃ gaganatalaṃ samuggatassāpi abbhuṭṭhitassāpi te tava vijambhanā sāhaṃkāraparibbhamanena kiṃ payojanaṃ na kiṃpi,
anya-e0812n:1695_5: Asadisattaṃ munindānanassa tassa tatopi uddhamuggacchato vilāsamattameva piyāsamattameva (ka.) phalasambhavatoti dutiyavākyamupamānabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1695_6: Tathā hettha sabbathā sadisatāpatītiyā kariyamānānamuggamanavijambhanānaṃ paṭikkhepena kathañcipi mukhacandānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1696_2: Vilāsekamanoharaṃ līlāya atulyaṃ tatoyeva manoharaṃ munindānanaṃ sabbaññuno vadanaṃ ābhāti atidibbati,
anya-e0812n:1696_3: tasmā he canda uddhaṃ uccaṃ nabhaṃ samuggatassāpi te tuyhaṃ vijambhanā ahaṃkārena paribbhamanena kiṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1696_4: Iha pubbavākyatthassa uttaravākyattho ivaviyuttopamā nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:1696_5: Tathā hi “sabbathā mukhena sadiso bhavāmī”ti mānaṃ karontassa candassa gaganatalārohopi vijambhanañceti
anya-e0812n:1696_6: imesaṃ dvinnaṃ paṭikkhepena mukhacandānaṃ vilāsekamanoharattaṃ kantimattasaṅkhātasadisattaṃ ivādīnamabhāvepi
anya-e0812n:1696_7: viññāyatīti katvā uttaravākyattho pubbavākyatthassa upamā ca visesanañca hoti.

anya-e0812n:1729_6: Kvacideva tu payoge dhīrā kavayo ādaraṃ karonti cāti.

anya-e0812n:1730_4: Iti evaṃ ayaṃ pakāro ādi yesamiti ca,

anya-e0812n:1737_6: Accitā sañcitā vijjā byākaraṇanighaṇṭuādayo dhanamiva hontīti.

anya-e0812n:1741_5: Evaṃvidhe samucite visaye liṅgavacanabhedādikaṃ nopamaṃ dūsetīti dassetīti (ka.).

anya-e0812n:1746_2: Upamānopameyyānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ abhedassa nānattābhāvassa nirūpanā āropanena upamānopameyyānamabhedaṃ rūpayati dassetīti rūpakamuccate.
anya-e0812n:1746_3: Upamānassa upamānopameyyānamabhedāropanena tirobhūto apākaṭo bhedo nānattaṃ yassāti tādisī upameva yathāvuttalakkhaṇā rūpakamuccate “rūpaka”nti.
anya-e0812n:1746_5: Ityupameyyopamānabhūtānaṃ padambujānamabhedāropanena upamānopameyyagatasādhammasaṅkhātāyapi upamāya bhedo vijjamānopi tirohito.
anya-e0812n:1746_7: Sā copamā tathāvidhā upamānopameyyānamabhedamāyāti nāmāti rūpakamuccateti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:1747_2: Upamānopameyyānaṃ anantaraniddiṭṭhaupamānopameyyānaṃ abhedassa sabhāvato bhede satipi vibhūtasadisattaṃ nissāya “so eso,
anya-e0812n:1747_3: eso so”ti vattārehi parikappitassa abhedassa nirūpanā upamānopameyyapadatthesu buddhiyā āropanaṃ nissāya
anya-e0812n:1747_4: tirobhūtabhedā “padaṃ ambujamivā”ti evaṃ pākaṭanānattaṃ vinā “padambuja”nti tirohitabhedā upameva padatthānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1747_5: sādhammasaṅkhātā upamā eva rūpakaṃ iti vuccate.
anya-e0812n:1747_7: Tesamabhedaggahaṇeneva te nissāya pavattamānabhinnasādhammasaṅkhātāya upamāyapi bhedo tirohito hoti.
anya-e0812n:1747_8: Evaṃ tirobhūtanānattavantasādhammasaṅkhātā upamā eva vatthūnamabhedaṃ dīpetīti rūpakaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyo.

anya-e0812n:1844_2: Ekattha vākyassādo majjhe ante vā vattamānampi kriyājātyādikaṃ sabbassa abhimatassa kassaci vākyassa
anya-e0812n:1844_3: kriyākārakasambandhābhidhāyino padasantānassa upakārakaṃ vākyatthānvayavasena dīpakaṃ nāma,
anya-e0812n:1844_4: dīpo viya ekadese vattitopi sakalapadatthavasena sabbavākyaṃ dīpayati pakāsetīti.
anya-e0812n:1844_5: Tañca dīpakaṃ ādi ca majjhañca antañca visayo gocaro yassa tādisaṃ tidhā ādidīpakaṃ majjhadīpakaṃ antadīpakanti tividhaṃ hotīti attho,
anya-e0812n:1844_6: tampi kriyādīnaṃ vasena paccekaṃ tividhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:1845_2: Ekattha vākyassa ādimajjhāvasānesvekasmiṃ vattamānampi kriyājātiguṇattayaṃ sabbavākyopakārakaṃ vattumicchitakriyākārakasambandhappakāsakapadasantānasaṅkhātavākyassa
anya-e0812n:1845_3: vākyatthāvabodhavasena payojanaṃ dīpakaṃ nāma ekaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā visayībhūtasabbaṭṭhānagatadabbapakāsakapadīpasamānattā
anya-e0812n:1845_5: Tañca dīpakaṃ ādimajjhantavisayaṃ vākyassa ādivisayaṃ majjhavisayaṃ antavisayañceti tidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1845_6: Etesu ekekamapi kriyājātiguṇabhedena punapi tividhaṃ hotīti viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1845_9: Vākyassa ādi ca majjhañca antañceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1850_2: Buddho veneyyā vinetabbāyeva bandhavo tesaṃ amitamaparimitaṃ udayamabhivuddhiṃ akāsi.
anya-e0812n:1850_4: sabbapāpehi samaṃ ekato anekānaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanañca akāsīti.
anya-e0812n:1850_5: Iha “akāsī”ti kriyāpadenādivattinā sabbameva vākyaṃ dīpayatīti kriyādidīpakametaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1851_5: Vākyādimhi kriyāya ṭhitattā idaṃ kriyādidīpakaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:1851_6: Amito ca so udayo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1851_7: anekā ca te titthiyā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1856_2: Munino dassanaṃ sādhujanānaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ nāma jāyate amatassa sādhanato,
anya-e0812n:1856_3: tehi sādhujanehi aññesaṃ jantūnaṃ niccamupatāpetīti niccopatāpanaṃ visaṃ jāyate,
anya-e0812n:1857_2: Munino dassanaṃ sādhujanānaṃ amataṃ amatasaṅkhātanibbānassa ekantakāraṇattā kāriyopacārena amataṃ bhūtaṃ jāyate,
anya-e0812n:1857_3: tadaññesaṃ tehi sādhujanehi aññesaṃ jantūnaṃ tu niccopatāpanaṃ satatamupatāpakaraṇato visaṃ jāyate visatulyapaṭighakāraṇattā
anya-e0812n:1857_6: Sādhavo ca te janā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1861_0: Jinānanindu indu ca, kassa nā’nandako bhave.
anya-e0812n:1862_2: Accantaṃ kantaṃ manuññaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ piyabhāvo, tameva,
anya-e0812n:1862_4: tena manoharo jinānanindu indu cando ca kassa janassa ānandako na bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n:1863_2: Accantakantalāvaṇyacandātapamanoharo atisayena manuññapiyabhāvasaṅkhātavilāsanāmakena candakiraṇena, no ce,
anya-e0812n:1863_3: atisayena manuññapiyatāsaṅkhātavilāsasadisena candakiraṇena manoharo jinānanindu sambuddhassa mukhacando
anya-e0812n:1863_4: ca indu ca pakaticando ca kassa ānandako na bhave.
anya-e0812n:1863_5: Idaṃ kriyāya ante ṭhitattā kriyāntadīpakaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:1863_13: candapakkhe accantakantalāvaṇyamiva ca so candātapo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1870_4: so avippaṭisāro pāmojjassa uppannamattāya pītiyā hetu hoti,
anya-e0812n:1870_5: taṃ pāmojjaṃ pītiyā balavabhūtāya hetu hoti,
anya-e0812n:1870_6: sā cāyaṃ pīti passaddhādīnaṃ passaddhisukhādīnaṃ pasiddhiyā nipphattiyā hotīti yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1871_1: Idāni navasu dīpakesu payogavisesena sādhetabbe aññappakāre dasseti “hoti”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n:1871_3: so avippaṭisāro pāmojjahetu hoti uppannamattāya taruṇapītiyā kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0812n:1871_5: sā ayañca pīti passaddhādipasiddhiyā kāyapassaddhicittapassaddhiādīnaṃ siddhiyā hetu hoti.
anya-e0812n:1875_4: Yajjapyādidīpakametaṃ pubbaṃ pubbaṃ vākyaṃ “hotāvippaṭisārāya sīla”ntiādikaṃ apekkhinī apekkhamānā vākyānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ mālā paramparā pavattāti.
anya-e0812n:1876_2: Ādidīpakattepi kriyādidīpakabhāve satipi vākyamālā anekavākyena sambajjhamānā paramparā pubbaṃ pubbaṃ
anya-e0812n:1876_6: visayopacārena ādi ca taṃ dīpakañcāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1880_2: Aneneva anantarā vuttena pakārena vidhinā dīpake dīpakavisaye dīpakavisese (ka.) sesānamavuttānaṃ vikappānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1880_3: jātyādidīpakādibhedānaṃ anugati avabodho suddhabuddhibhi parisuddhamatīhi kavīhi vidhātabbā kātabbāti.
anya-e0812n:1881_2: Aneneva pakārena yathāvuttadīpakappakārena dīpake dīpakavisaye sesānaṃ api vikappānaṃ avuttajātidīpakaguṇadīpakasaṅkhātānaṃ
anya-e0812n:1881_3: pakkhānaṃ jātyādidīpakaguṇādidīpakādīnaṃ channaṃ mālādīpakānañca anugati avabodho suddhabuddhibhi kavīhi
anya-e0812n:1887_2: Visesassa yassa kassaci vacanicchāyaṃ yaṃ nisedhassa paṭisedhassa vacanaṃ vutti,
anya-e0812n:1887_3: so akkhepo nāma akkhipanaṃ paṭisedhoti katvā.
anya-e0812n:1887_4: Soyamakkhepo ca kālappabhedato atītādito tidhā tippakāro.
anya-e0812n:1888_2: Visesavacanicchāyaṃ tu yassa kassaci padatthavisesassa kathanicchāya eva yaṃ nisedhavacanaṃ paṭisedhavacanaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n:1888_3: so paṭisedho akkhepo nāma akkhepālaṅkāro nāma.
anya-e0812n:1888_4: Ayañca akkhepo kālappabhedato atītādikālavisesena tidhā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1888_9: kālassa kriyāya vā pabhedoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1893_2: So jino ekākī eko samāno anekasenaṃ taṃ māraṃ vijayi parājesi,
anya-e0812n:1893_5: yato tassa jinassa pāramī samatiṃsavidhā pāramitā eva balaṃ īdisaṃ yādisaṃ tassa vijayakāraṇanti.
anya-e0812n:1893_6: Ettha ekākittakāraṇasāmatthiyā māravijayāyogabuddhi “sasenaṃ māraṃ vijitavāti kathaṃ yujjatī”ti evamākārā atītā akkhittāti atītakkhepoyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1894_2: Sa jino so sabbaññū ekākī asahāyo adutiyo anekasenaṃ taṃ māraṃ vijayī ajinīti,
anya-e0812n:1894_5: tassa jinassa pāramībalaṃ samatiṃsapāramībalaṃ samatiṃsapāramītāsaṅkhatasenā īdisamīdisāti.
anya-e0812n:1894_6: Buddhassa adutiyabhāvañca mārassa saparivārabhāvañca nissāya kassaci uppannā “ekākinā kathamanekaseno
anya-e0812n:1894_7: māro jito”ti viparītabuddhi atītamāravijayavisayattā atītā hoti,
anya-e0812n:1894_8: “tassa pāramībalaṃ īdisa”nti atthavisesassa kathanicchāya “atha vā”ti niddiṭṭhapaṭisedhavacanena akkhittanti atītassa akkhepanato atītakkhepo nāma.
anya-e0812n:1901_2: Citta ejāya taṇhāya samugghātaṃ sabbathā appavattiṃ appattosmīti kiṃ khijjase,
anya-e0812n:1901_4: Sugate sakimpi ekavārampi kato paṇāmo soyeva taṇhāya samugghātoyeva nanu ekantakāraṇattā tassāti vattamānakkhepoyaṃ vattamānassa khedassākkhitattā.
anya-e0812n:1902_2: He citta ejāsamugghātaṃ ejāsaṅkhatāya taṇhāya samucchedapahānaṃ appattosmīti kiṃ khijjase,
anya-e0812n:1902_4: Tathā hi sugate buddhavisaye sakimpi kato paṇāmo soyeva nanu taṇhāsamucchedassa ekantakāraṇattā kāraṇakāriyānamabhedabuddhiyā
anya-e0812n:1902_7: “Paṇāmo”tyādivisesakathanādhippāyena “kiṃ khijjase”ti cittassa vattamānakhedassa paṭisedhitattā ayaṃ vattamānakkhepo nāma.
anya-e0812n:1904_0: Saccaṃ na te gamissanti, sivaṃ sujanagocaraṃ;
anya-e0812n:1907_2: Sujanagocaraṃ sivaṃ santipadaṃ te saccaṃ niyataṃ na gamissanti.
anya-e0812n:1907_3: Ye micchādiṭṭhiyā sassatādikāya parikkantaṃ abhibhūtaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yesaṃ tādisā suṭṭhu atisayena dujjanāti yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1909_0: Gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā kanta, mamāvatthā niveditā”ti kābyādāsa 2.139.
anya-e0812n:1911_2: Sujanagocaraṃ sādhūnaṃ visayagataṃ sivaṃ santipadaṃ te saccamekantena na gamissanti. Ke?
anya-e0812n:1911_4: “Micchādiṭṭhī”tiādivisesassa kathanādhippāyena “te na gamissantī”ti titthiyānaṃ bhāvino nibbānagamanassa
anya-e0812n:1911_6: Micchā viparītā ca sā diṭṭhi cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:1911_7: tāya parikkantaṃ mānasaṃ yesanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1913_0: Gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā kanta, mamāvatthā niveditā” –
anya-e0812n:1914_0: Tyādiko anādarakkhepopi dassitātītakkhepādīhi anaññattā visuṃ na vutto.
anya-e0812n:1914_2: he kanta vallabha mama jīvitāsā balavatī hoti,
anya-e0812n:1914_6: “Ettha mamāvatthā niveditā”ti visesassa kathanādhippāyena “gaccha vā tiṭṭha vā”ti iminā anādaravacanena
anya-e0812n:1914_7: attano vallabhassa vattamānassa anāgatassa vā gamanassa paṭisedhitattā vattamānakkhepo vā anāgatakkhepo vā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1920_2: Aññavākyatthasādhano aññassa vattumicchitassa kassaci vākyatthassa sādhano samatthako kassacideva atthassa parassa nyāso yo,
anya-e0812n:1920_3: so atthantaranyāso ñeyyo atthantarassa kassaci vatthuno nyāso payogoti katvā.
anya-e0812n:1920_5: Assa atthantaranyāsassa bhedato vikappato hivisiṭṭhā hisaddena visesitā sabbabyāpī ca visesaṭṭho cāti ime bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:1920_6: Nanu pativatthūpamāya imassa ca ko bhedoti? Saccaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1920_7: tathāpi ubhayattha atthantaranyāsamattena sadisattepi yattha mukhyato sāmyappatītisabbhāvo,
anya-e0812n:1921_4: so atthantaranyāso sādhiyavākyatthato aññatthassa ṭhapanaṃ kathanaṃ “atthantaranyāso”ti ñeyyo,
anya-e0812n:1921_5: assa atthantaranyāsassa bhedato pabhedena sabbabyāpī visesaṭṭho ca,
anya-e0812n:1921_7: Attho ca so antaro añño ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:1924_0: Tepi lokahitāsattā, sūriyo candimā api candimārapi (sī.);
anya-e0812n:1925_0: Atthaṃ passa gamissanti, niyamo kena laṅghyate.
anya-e0812n:1926_2: Lokassa hite abhivuddhiyaṃ āsattā abhirattā sūriyo candimā apīti te mahantāpi atthaṃ udayavipariyāsa’mabhāvaṃ gamissanti,
anya-e0812n:1926_5: Tathā hi niyamo “bhāvo nāma na pāyini.
anya-e0812n:1926_7: Kena nāma vatthunā laṅghyate atikkamituṃ sakkāti.
anya-e0812n:1926_8: Ayaṃ hisaddarahito sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso tādisassa niyamassa sabbagatattā.
anya-e0812n:1927_2: Lokahitāsattā lokābhivuddhiyaṃ laggā sūriyo api candimā api tepi mahānubhāvā atthaṃ vināsaṃ gamissanti,
anya-e0812n:1927_4: Tathā hi niyamo “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti sabbapadatthamanatikkamma pavattaniyamo kena laṅghyate paccayasamuppannena kena padatthena atikkamyateti.
anya-e0812n:1927_5: Ayaṃ hisaddarahito atthagamanasaṅkhāto niyamo sabbattha gatoti sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso.
anya-e0812n:1927_6: Pativatthūpamāya ca atthantaranyāsassa ca atthantaranyāsattena tulyattepi tattha sādhammapakāsattasabhāvo,
anya-e0812n:1927_7: ettha vuttatthassa sādhanasabhāvoti evamimesaṃ nānattaṃ subyattaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1931_0: Gatova nibbutiṃ sabbe, saṅkhārā na hi sassatā.
anya-e0812n:1932_2: Devamanussānaṃ devānañca manussānañca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena satthā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikehi paramatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsatīti,
anya-e0812n:1932_3: vasī pañcahi vasitāhi atisayavasīhi vasippatto sopi munissaro nibbutiṃ khandhaparinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ gato pattoyeva,
anya-e0812n:1932_5: Sabbe saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā na sassatā na niccā uppādavayadhammattā aniccā.
anya-e0812n:1933_2: Devamanussānaṃ ukkaṭṭhavasena satthā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi yathārahamanusāsako vasī vuṭṭhānaadhiṭṭhānādīsu
anya-e0812n:1933_3: pañcasu vasibhāvesu sātisayaṃ issariyavā so munissaro api nibbutiṃ khandhanibbānaṃ gato eva.
anya-e0812n:1933_6: Ayaṃ hisaddasahito aniccatāya sabbagatattā sabbabyāpī atthantaranyāso.
anya-e0812n:1938_3: tato janaṃ sakalampi lokaṃ nibbutiṃ pāpeti.
anya-e0812n:1939_2: Jino janaṃ sattalokaṃ saṃsārakantārā nibbutiṃ pāpeti,
anya-e0812n:1939_3: sā ayaṃ gati pavatti vesārajjasamaṅgīnaṃ catuvesārajjaguṇasamannāgatānaṃ tathāgatānaṃ yuttā nanūti.
anya-e0812n:1939_4: Ayaṃ janānaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpanā vesārajjasamaṅgīnaṃyeva āveṇikattā visesaṭṭho hisaddarahito atthantaranyāso.
anya-e0812n:1943_0: Sayaṃ rāgaparītā hi, pare rañjenti saṅgate.
anya-e0812n:1944_2: Jina te tava surattaṃ bimbaphalasamānavaṇṇattā adharapuṭaṃ mānasaṃ passataṃ yesaṃ kesañci rañjeti pīṇetīti.
anya-e0812n:1944_5: Sayaṃ yena kenaci rāgena rattavaṇṇena anurāgena vā parītā gatā saṅgate attanā saṃsaṭṭhe pare aññe rañjenti
anya-e0812n:1944_6: rattavaṇṇe anuratte vā karontīti sasileso sādhano.
anya-e0812n:1944_7: Ayañca hisaddasahito visesaṭṭho atthantaranyāso tathābhāvassa tathāvidhānameva sambhavato.
anya-e0812n:1945_2: Bho jina te tava surattaṃ adharapuṭaṃ oṭṭhayugaḷaṃ mānasaṃ passantānaṃ pasannacittaṃ (ka.) cittaṃ rañjeti pīṇayati.
anya-e0812n:1945_4: sayaṃ rāgaparītā rattavaṇṇena anurāgena vā yuttā saṅgate attanā saṃsaṭṭhe pare aññe rañjenti rattavaṇṇe anuratte vā karonti.
anya-e0812n:1945_6: Ayaṃ īdisānameva āveṇikattā visesaṭṭho hisaddasahito atthantaranyāso.
anya-e0812n:1951_2: Vatthūnaṃ vattumicchitānaṃ kesañci vatthūnaṃ sadisatte kathañci vatthūnaṃ tulyatte vācce saddena vācakena
anya-e0812n:1951_3: paṭipādite atha gamme asaddapaṭipādite sabbatthabalena pakaraṇādinā ñāte vā,
anya-e0812n:1951_5: Pabhedanaṃ tesameva vatthūnaṃ visesakathanaṃ byatireko byatirecanaṃ puthakkaraṇanti katvā.
anya-e0812n:1951_6: Ayaṃ byatirekopi ekobhayabhedā ekabyatireko ubhayabyatirekoti vāccagammānaṃ paccekaṃ visesena catubbidho.
anya-e0812n:1952_2: Vatthūnaṃ vattumicchitānaṃ kesañci padatthānaṃ sadisatte yena kenaci ākārena samānatte vācce vācakasaddena
anya-e0812n:1952_3: paṭipādanīye atha puna gamme tasmiṃyeva sadisatte atthasattisaṅkhātasāmatthiyena gammamāne pabhedanaṃ
anya-e0812n:1952_5: Ayampi byatireko ekobhayabhedā byatirecanasaṅkhātaputhakkaraṇasāmaññena abhinnopi vāccagammānaṃ dvinnaṃ
anya-e0812n:1952_6: paccekameva ekabyatireko ubhayabyatirekoti visesena catubbidho hoti.
anya-e0812n:1959_2: Tvaṃ gambhīrattaṃ agādhatā ajjhāsayavisiṭṭhatā ca mahattaṃ vepullaṃ guṇamahantatā ca taṃ ādi yassa upakāritādino,
anya-e0812n:1959_6: Bhedo tu viseso pana sāgarena saha īdisena dissamānena karacaraṇādimatā rucirena te sarīreneva hetunā, nāññathā,
anya-e0812n:1959_8: Sadisatte paṭipādite ekabyatirekoyaṃ ekasmiṃ jine vattamānena dhammena upameyyopamānabhūtajinasāgarānaṃ tassa bhedassa patīyamānattā.
anya-e0812n:1960_2: He jina tvaṃ gambhīrattamahattādiguṇā jaladhinā tulyo asi.
anya-e0812n:1960_3: Iminā vākyena jinasāgarānaṃ dvinnaṃ saddena vāccasadisattaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1960_4: Bhedo tu sāgarena saha tava viseso pana te tuyhaṃ īdisena evarūpena dissamānahatthapādādiavayavayuttena sarīrena sarīrahetunā hoti.
anya-e0812n:1960_5: Dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ vattabbasadisattaṃ vatvā iminā vākyena “īdisena sarīrenā”ti ekasmiṃyeva jinapadatthe
anya-e0812n:1960_6: visesakathanena jaladhito jinapadatthassa visuṃ katattā sadisatte saddena vācce sati ayamekabyatireko nāma.
anya-e0812n:1960_7: Gambhīrassa gambhīraguṇayuttassa sāgarassa vā gambhīrajjhāsayasamaṅgino jinassa vā bhāvoti ca,
anya-e0812n:1960_8: mahato pakatiyā mahato sāgarassa vā guṇehi mahato jinassa vā bhāvoti ca,
anya-e0812n:1960_11: so ca so guṇo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:1965_2: Sāgaro sugatopi cāti te ubho mahantā sattā makarādayo yattha sāgare,
anya-e0812n:1965_3: mahantaṃ vā sattaṃ sammappadhānaṃ yassa sugatassa,
anya-e0812n:1965_8: Jino tu cāmīkarassa suvaṇṇasseva juti sobhā asseti cāmīkarajjuti.
anya-e0812n:1965_9: Vācce sadisatte ubhayabyatirekoyaṃ ubhayattha vattamānena guṇena ubhinnamupamānopameyyānaṃ bhedassa patīyamānattā.
anya-e0812n:1966_2: Sāgaro sugatopi cāti ime dve mahāsattā kamena timitimiṅgalādimahāsattā ca,
anya-e0812n:1966_8: Ettha pubbaddhena dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ sadisattaṃ vatvā aparaddhena tadubhayavatthugatavisesena tesaṃ dvinnamaññamaññato
anya-e0812n:1966_9: visesitattā sadisatte saddena vattabbe sati ayaṃ ubhayabyatireko nāma.
anya-e0812n:1966_10: Mahantā sattā macchakacchapādayo yattha sāgareti vā,
anya-e0812n:1966_11: mahantaṃ sattaṃ samānabhāvo yassa sugatassāti vā,
anya-e0812n:1966_14: cāmīkarassa iva juti asseti ca vākyaṃ.

anya-e0812n:1971_4: Muninda tava nayanānaṃ dvandaṃ yugaḷaṃ tu tehi yathāvuttehi santāpāpahattaicchitadattaguṇehi bhūsitamalaṅkataṃ.
anya-e0812n:1971_5: Ettha pana migalocananayanānaṃ dīghattādinā sadisattaṃ patīyate.

anya-e0812n:1972_3: Icchitadaṃ lokehi patthitalokiyalokuttaratthānaṃ dāyakaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0812n:1972_4: He muninda tava nayanadvandaṃ pana tagguṇabhūsitaṃ janasantāpāpahānādiyathāvuttaguṇehi sobhitaṃ hoti,

anya-e0812n:1972_10: te ca te guṇā cāti ca,

anya-e0812n:1982_2: Yattha alaṅkatiyaṃ pasiddhaṃ lokappatītaṃ kāraṇaṃ kiñci nivattetvā nirasya aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ pasiddhakāraṇato aññaṃ nimittaṃ vibhābyaṃ avagamyate.

anya-e0812n:1983_3: atha vā no ce pasiddhakāraṇato aññakāraṇe labbhamāne sābhāvikattaṃ dhammatāsiddhaguṇaṃ vibhābyaṃ pakāsanīyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:1983_10: vibhāvīyati aññakāraṇaṃ sābhāvikattaṃ vā etāya vibhāvanāya,
anya-e0812n:1988_2: Jina tava nettañca anañjitaṃ añjanasalākāya yavataṭṭhīnamaphuṭṭhameva asitaṃ kaṇhaṃ,
anya-e0812n:1988_3: adharo ca anañjitoyeva lākhārāgādinā aruṇo ratto,
anya-e0812n:1988_4: ayaṃ bhamu ca anāvañchitā ussāhena yena kenaci anāmitā samānā samānatā suṭṭhu ānatā,
anya-e0812n:1989_2: He jina tava nettaṃ pakatimadhuraṃ nayanayugaḷañca anañjitaṃ vilocanānaṃ kaṇhattasādhanatthaṃ lokappasiddhaañjanehi
anya-e0812n:1989_3: anañjitaṃ samānaṃ asitaṃ bhavantarasiddhena kusalakammena nīlaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:1989_4: adharo ca arañjito kenaci rāgena arañjito samāno aruṇo rattohoti,
anya-e0812n:1989_5: ayaṃ bhamu ca anāvañchitā kenaci vāyāmena anāmitā samānā samānatā suṭṭhu ānatā hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1989_6: Ettha nayanaadharabhamūnaṃ kaṇharattakuṭilaguṇasādhane lokappasiddhāni añjanāni kāraṇāni paṭisedhetvā
anya-e0812n:1989_7: nettādīnaṃ asitādibhāvakathaneneva kāraṇavinimuttassa kāriyassa loke avijjamānattā atthappakaraṇādinā
anya-e0812n:1989_8: asitādibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ nāma pubbajātiyaṃ siddhakusalakammamevāti patīyamānattā ayaṃ kāraṇantaravibhāvanā nāma.
anya-e0812n:1996_2: Dujjanehi saha saṅgame samāgame satyapi sādhujantūnaṃ sappurisānaṃ sabhāvena tādisena payogena vināva
anya-e0812n:1996_3: nimmalatare atisayena nimmale cetasi dujjanyaṃ sujanetarabhāvo na hoti tādisātisayasādhuttasamāyogatoti.
anya-e0812n:1996_4: Iha kiñcāpi sabhāvasaddena sabbathā hetunivattanaṃ kataṃ,
anya-e0812n:1996_7: pasiddhañca kāraṇaṃ tādisamapassanto sābhāvikaṃ phalaṃ voharati,
anya-e0812n:1997_2: Dujjanasaṅgame api dujjanehi saha vāse satipi sādhujantūnaṃ sabhāvanimmalatare kiñci payogaṃ vinā pakatiyā
anya-e0812n:1997_3: eva atinimmale cetasi dujjanyaṃ dujjanaguṇaṃ khalu ekantena na hotīti.
anya-e0812n:1997_4: Iha cittanimmalahetubhūtānaṃ yonisomanasikārādīnaṃ vijjamānattepi lokena taṃ kāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā aññampi
anya-e0812n:1997_5: pasiddhakāraṇaṃ cittanimmalakāraṇamadisvā sabhāvasiddhaṃ nimmalanti vohariyamānattāteneva lokavohārānusārena
anya-e0812n:1997_6: “sabhāvanimmalatare”ti sabbākārena kāraṇaṃ paṭisedhaṃ katvā sabhāvasiddhanimmalattasaṅkhātaphalassa pakāsitattā
anya-e0812n:2003_2: Janako bhāvābhāvarūpassa nibbatyādikāriyassa kārako ñāpako vijjamānasseva kassaci sambandhato kutoci paṭibodhako cāti hetavo duvidhā siyuṃ.
anya-e0812n:2003_5: na tu (?) viseso tu na na tu (?) koci visesarūpo vācālaṅkāroti visesaṃ yojayati “paṭī”tiādinā.
anya-e0812n:2003_6: Tesaṃ kāriyuppādayogīnaṃ hetūnaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ upabrūhanaṃ visiṭṭhabhāvena pariphuṭaṃ katvā yāthāvato
anya-e0812n:2003_7: kathanaṃ alaṅkāratāya bandhabhūsanarūpena uditaṃ abhihitaṃ visesarūpattā,
anya-e0812n:2004_2: Janako ca kassaci “sattā asattā”ti vuttassa bhāvābhāvasaṅkhātakāriyassa janakahetu ca ñāpako ca kassaci
anya-e0812n:2004_3: vijjamānattaṃ aññena kenaci sambandhena avabodhento ñāpakahetu cāti evaṃ hetavo duvidhā siyuṃ.
anya-e0812n:2004_4: Iha phalapakāsakahetumhi vuccamāne “iminā hetunā idaṃ phalaṃ jāta”nti sarūpakathanamattaṃ vinā visesarūpālaṅkāro
anya-e0812n:2004_5: idha natthīti āsaṅkiya alaṅkārasarūpaviseso esoti dassetumaparaddhamāha.
anya-e0812n:2004_6: Tesaṃ phalapakāsanakhamānaṃ hetūnaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ visiṭṭhabhāvena pakāsaṃ katvā tatvato kathanaṃ alaṅkāratāya
anya-e0812n:2004_9: Sāliaṅkurādīnaṃ sālibījādayo viya janyassa accantopakārako janakahetu nāma,
anya-e0812n:2004_10: vijjamānaaggiādīnaṃ dhūmādayo viya kassaci vijjamānattañāpako ñāpakahetu nāma.
anya-e0812n:2010_5: cittā pasiddhahetuviparītā acchariyārahā hetavo tesaṃ vasenāpi ca bhedā hetuvikappā anantā anavaviyo anavadhayo (?),
anya-e0812n:2010_6: yato evaṃ tasmā tesaṃ hetūnaṃ idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2011_3: cittahetuvasāpi ca pasiddhahetuno viruddhena acchariyahetūnaṃ pabhedena ca,
anya-e0812n:2011_4: bhedā hetuvisesā anantā yasmā apariyantā honti,
anya-e0812n:2011_5: tasmā idaṃ vakkhamānaṃ tesaṃ hetūnaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ avasesahetūnaṃ ogāhaṇadvāramattassa nidassanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2011_9: cittā vicittā ca te hetavo cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2011_12: mukhañca taṃ vā mattaṃ sāmaññañceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2018_2: Paramatthasabhāvassa nāmarūpādino pakāsoyeva ekaraso asahāyakiccaṃ yassā sā tādisī.
anya-e0812n:2018_3: Sabbesaṃ mano haratīti sabbamanoharā munino ayaṃ desanā me mānasaṃ cittaṃ kāmamekantena tosetīti ayaṃ bhāvakicco kārakahetu santosasattāya kāraṇato.
anya-e0812n:2019_3: vohārānurūpena visayabhāvūpagamanena sabbesaṃ manoharā munino ayaṃ desanā me mayhaṃ mānasaṃ kāmaṃ ekantena tosetīti.
anya-e0812n:2019_4: Buddhassa dhammadesanā pubbe avijjamānassa santosassa sattāsaṅkhātasamuppādaṃ karotīti kārakahetu nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:2019_5: Sā ca desanā “mānasaṃ tosetī”ti ettakena adassetvā “paramatthapakāsekarasā”ti savisesanaṃ katvā vuttattā alaṅkāroti abhimatā.
anya-e0812n:2019_6: Eko ca so raso ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2019_8: Bhāvakicco bhāvasaṅkhātaṃ sattākiccaṃ katvā pavatto kārakahetu janakahetu.
anya-e0812n:2024_2: Dhīrehi sappaññehi saha saṃvāsā saṃsaggena ca,
anya-e0812n:2024_4: indriyānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ niggahena visayappavattinirodharūpena vijayena ca hetunā dukkhassa pañcakkhandhasaṅkhatassa
anya-e0812n:2024_5: anuppādanirodhasaṅkhāto upasamo siyā bhaveyyāti ayaṃ abhāvakicco kārakahetu anuppādanirodhasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n:2025_4: indriyānaṃ cakkhuādīnaṃ niggahena rūpādiārammaṇesu subhādiggahaṇassa nivāraṇena cāti imehi kāraṇehi dukkhassa
anya-e0812n:2025_5: khandhāyatanādikassa upasamo anuppādanirodho khandhaparinibbānaṃ vā siyāti.
anya-e0812n:2025_7: Abhāvakicco dukkhassa upasamasaṅkhātaṃ asattākiccaṃ katvā pavatto kārakahetu avijjamānasaṅkhātāya asattāya uppādanato janakahetu nāma.
anya-e0812n:2025_9: kārako ca so hetu cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2030_3: Te tava candasaṃvādinā candasadisena kantabhāvena upasobhinā sobhamānena mukheneva pāpehi rāgādīhi abhinissaṭaṃ
anya-e0812n:2030_4: byapagataṃ manaṃ cittaṃ subodhaṃ suṭṭhu viññāyatīti ayaṃ bhāvakicco ñāpakahetu avabodhasattāya ñāpanato.
anya-e0812n:2031_2: He muninda te tava candasaṃvādikantabhāvopasobhinā candakantabhāvasadisena kantabhāvena sobhamānena mukhena
anya-e0812n:2031_3: manaṃ tuyhaṃ cittaṃ pāpābhinissaṭaṃ rāgādīhi kilesehi nikkhantanti subodhaṃ suṭṭhu viññāyatīti.
anya-e0812n:2031_4: Iha mukhaṃ manakantabhāvasambandhena samannāgataṃ sayaṃ vijjamānameva kilesāpagamassa avabodhasattaṃ ñāpetīti bhāvakicco ñāpakahetu nāma jāto.
anya-e0812n:2031_5: Candena abhedopacārato candalāvaṇyena saṃvādī sadisoti ca,
anya-e0812n:2031_6: so ca so kantabhāvo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2036_2: Muninda te caraṇānaṃ dvandassa rāgo bālo ca so ātapo ceti rāgabālātapo taruṇakiraṇasamūho lohitattādinā
anya-e0812n:2036_3: sādhūnaṃ hatthāravindāni kantādinā phusaṃ visārittenā’masanto kathaṃ saṅkocayati makulayati,
anya-e0812n:2036_6: ayaṃ tu apubbo bālātapo yo padumāni nimīletīti anucitakāriyakāraṇā ayuttakārī cittahetu,
anya-e0812n:2037_2: He muninda te tava caraṇadvandarāgabālātapo pādayugaḷassa aruṇavaṇṇasaṅkhataabhinavasūriyakiraṇo sādhuhatthāravindāni
anya-e0812n:2037_3: sujanānaṃ karapadumāni phusaṃ attano sabbabyāpittā phusanto kathaṃ saṅkocayati karasampuṭarūpena makulayatīti.
anya-e0812n:2037_4: Bālātapo nāma padumavikasanaṃ vinā saṅkocanaṃ na karoti,
anya-e0812n:2037_5: eso ātapo acchariyo vicittoti gamyamānattā ayuttasaṅkocasattākaraṇato ayaṃ ayuttakārī cittahetu nāma.
anya-e0812n:2037_7: cittañca taṃ hetu cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2042_2: Munindassa pādānaṃ dvande nakhā eva candā kantādinā tesaṃ aṃsavo kiraṇā iha loke jantūnaṃ sattānaṃ pāṇayo
anya-e0812n:2042_3: eva paṅkeruhāni kantādinā saṅkocayanti paṇāmakaraṇasampuṭarūpena milīyantīti milāyayantīti (?) yuttakārī
anya-e0812n:2043_2: Munindacaraṇadvandanakhacandānaṃ sambuddhassa pādadvande nakhāvalisaṅkhātānaṃ candānaṃ aṃsavo raṃsayo
anya-e0812n:2043_3: iha loke jantūnaṃ pāṇipaṅkeruhāni saṅkocayanti karasampuṭākārena saṅkocayanti makulaṃ karontīti.
anya-e0812n:2043_4: Candakiraṇehi kattabbāya eva padumasaṅkocasattāya katattā ca,
anya-e0812n:2043_5: pakaticandakiraṇakattabbakiccassa candamarīcisamānaaññādiṭṭhapubbavicitraaṃsūhi katattā ca ayaṃ yuttakārī cittahetu nāma.
anya-e0812n:2043_6: Pāṇayo ca te paṅkeruhāni ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2047_2: Uddiṭṭhānaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ padatthānaṃ vatthūnaṃ kesañci yathākkamaṃ uddesakkamānatikkamena anuddeso
anya-e0812n:2048_2: Uddiṭṭhānaṃ paṭhamakathitānaṃ padatthānaṃ yathākkamaṃ uddiṭṭhakkamamanatikkamma anuddeso atthantaraṃ nissāya punakathanaṃ “saṅkhyāna”miti ca,
anya-e0812n:2048_5: Ettha pasiddhaṃ anuddesaṃ pubbaddhena anuvaditvā appasiddhaṃ kamampi kamapariyāyaṃ saṅkhyānayathāsaṅkhyadvayampi aparaddhena vidadhāti.
anya-e0812n:2048_6: Ettha vidhātabbaṃ dassetuṃ anuvādassa āhariyamānattā anuvādo appadhāno,
anya-e0812n:2048_12: yathāsaṅkhya”nti dvayaṃ apekkhāya (tassa appadhānattā) idaṃ padadvayaṃ sīhaḷabyākhyāyaṃ na dissati napuṃsakaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2052_2: Muninda tava ālāpahāsā ca tesaṃ līlāhi,
anya-e0812n:2052_4: Vijayā kokilakumudānaṃ parābhavena kokilā karavīkā kumudāni ca,
anya-e0812n:2052_10: Iti vatthuto eva sambhavo iveti parikappate.
anya-e0812n:2052_14: Tatthuddesānurūpānuddesasambhave saṅkhyānamevālaṅkāro voharīyate tasseva mukhyato vattumicchitattā.
anya-e0812n:2053_2: He muninda te tava ālāpahāsalīlāhi madhurasaralīlāhi saddhiṃ mandahasitalīlāhi sañjātā vijayā jayahetu
anya-e0812n:2053_3: kokilā karavīkā ca kumudāni keravāni ca vanaṃ jalañca kamena upasevante iva nissayaṃ karontīti maññeti.
anya-e0812n:2053_7: tatvato īdisavijayena kokilādīnaṃ vanādinissayakāraṇābhāvato ivasaddapayogena niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0812n:2053_8: Evaṃ sati ayaṃ parikappanā na bhavati. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n:2053_9: Nānālaṅkārasannipāte sati yo yo alaṅkāro vattunā icchito,
anya-e0812n:2053_11: Evaṃ parikappanālaṅkārasaṃsagge satipi uddesakkamena dassitassa anuddesassa mukhyattā ayaṃ kamālaṅkāro nāma.
anya-e0812n:2057_2: Atisayena piyassa kassaci attharūpassa abhidheyyasabhāvassa yaṃ paṭipādanamākhyānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:2058_2: atisayena piyassa kassaci attharūpassa abhidheyyasabhāvassa yaṃ paṭipādanaṃ kathanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:2058_3: etaṃ paṭipādanaṃ piyataraṃ nāma piyatarālaṅkāro nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:2058_5: attho eva rūpaṃ sabhāvoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2060_0: Pīti yā me samuppannā, santa sandassanā tava;
anya-e0812n:2061_0: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, taveva puna dassanā.
anya-e0812n:2062_2: Santa sappurisa mahāmuni tava sandassanā cakkhupathāpāthamattena madhurakathāsavanā yā pīti me mama samuppannā,
anya-e0812n:2062_3: ayaṃ pīti kālena īdisena sukhena sukhaṇane (?) taveva nāññassa kassaci,
anya-e0812n:2063_2: He santa sappurisa tathāgata tava sandassanā mama nette āpāthagamanato yā pīti me samuppannā,
anya-e0812n:2063_3: ayaṃ pīti kālena īdisakkhaṇena tayā sadisassa aññassābhāvā taveva puna dassanā dassanato bhaveti.
anya-e0812n:2063_4: Ettha pītiyā’tisayahetubhūtaṃ atiiṭṭhārammaṇañca dassane atigedhañca pakāsanena atipītīti padatthaṃ atipiyaṃ pībhipadatthaṃ (ka.),
anya-e0812n:2063_6: “Ayaṃ pīti bhave”ti pubbakāle uppannapītiyā punāsambhavato taṃsadisāyeva pīti gahitā yathā “soyeva vaṭṭako vaddhako,
anya-e0812n:2067_2: Vaṇṇitena pasaṃsitena upamānena adhippetassa manasi nihitassa vatthuno atthassa vutyā kathanena ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇā samāsavutti nāma. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n:2067_3: Atthassa vattumicchitassa saṅkhepo saṅkhipitvā kathanaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo,
anya-e0812n:2067_4: tasmā tatoyamanvatthasaññā saṅkhepavutti samāsavuttīti katvā. Kasmā?
anya-e0812n:2068_2: Vaṇṇitena pasaṃsitena upamānena upamānavatthunā karaṇabhūtena adhippetavatthuno icchitatthassa vutyā
anya-e0812n:2068_3: kathanena atthasaṅkheparūpato vattumicchitatthassa saṅgaharūpattā ayaṃ yathāvuttalakkhaṇā samāsavutti
anya-e0812n:2068_5: Ettha vattumicchitatthaṃ saṅgahetvā manasi katvā tassa upamābhūtatthassa vaṇṇanāya manasi katassa pakāsanato ayaṃ samāsavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n:2072_2: Sā ayaṃ samāsavutti yaṃkiñci vatthu sāmaññākārappatītaṃ “īdisamidaṃ nāññathā”ti kutoci byavacchijjate kenaci guṇādinā vavatthāpīyate,
anya-e0812n:2072_6: Abhinnaṃ tulyākāraṃ visesanaṃ yassaṃ sā abhinnavisesanāpi attheva.
anya-e0812n:2073_2: Sā ayaṃ samāsavutti visesyamattena guṇādisadisadhammena karaṇabhūtena kenaci upamānavatthunā manasi kataṃ
anya-e0812n:2073_3: “idaṃ upameyyavatthu īdisa”nti sāmaññāvatthato visuṃ katavisesyena bhinnā visuṃ jātā,
anya-e0812n:2073_5: abhinnavisesanā tulyavisesanayuttā attheva bhinnābhinnavisesanā atulyatulyavisesanayuttā bhinnavisesyayuttā aparāpi atthi.
anya-e0812n:2073_8: avayavena sambhavabhedasabhāvassa samudāyepi pavattattā bhinnāti vuttā.
anya-e0812n:2080_2: Ayamambhodhi sāgaro puññena cirānucitakusalamūlena hetunā mayā āpādito patto, kīdiso?
anya-e0812n:2080_3: Visuddhaṃ lokavohārato devāsurānaṃ mathane visenāsammissattā amataṃ pīyūsaṃ sandadātīti visuddhāmatasandāyī, ambhodhi.
anya-e0812n:2080_4: Visuddhaṃ dosalesenāpyasamphuṭṭhattā accantanimmalaṃ amataṃ maraṇābhāvena amatasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ
anya-e0812n:2080_13: Gambhīro ca agādhattā sāgaro saddhammo ca ayamāpāditoti pakataṃ.
anya-e0812n:2080_14: Ayaṃ visesyamattabhinnā abhinnavisesanā visesyassa ambhodhino vivacchitā saddhammā bhinnattā,
anya-e0812n:2081_2: Visuddhāmatasandāyī lokavohārato devāsurānaṃ samuddamathane visena amissattā visuddhabhūtapīyūsadāyako,
anya-e0812n:2081_3: upamābhūtasamuddavaṇṇanāya buddhiyaṃ vattamānassa saddhammassa pakāsanato visuddhāmatasandāyī kāmāmisādidosalavenāpi
anya-e0812n:2081_4: amissitattā atinimmalaṃ jarāmaraṇarahitaṃ nibbānaṃ upadesadānena veneyyānaṃ dāyako,
anya-e0812n:2081_5: pasattharatanālayo niddosattā pasatthānaṃ muttāmaṇiādīnaṃ ratanānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhūto samuddapakkhe,
anya-e0812n:2081_6: saddhammapakkhe pana pasattharatanālayo buddhādīhi pasatthānaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhataratanānaṃ pavattidesabhūto,
anya-e0812n:2081_8: ekattanayādicatubbidhanayehi gambhīro ayaṃ ambhodhi ca eso samuddo ca,
anya-e0812n:2081_9: cittena gahitasaddhammo ca puññena bhavantaropacitakusalakammena mayā āpādito pattoti visesyabhūtassa
anya-e0812n:2081_11: “visuddhāmatasandāyī”ti iccādikānaṃ visesanānaṃ ubhayavisesyepi yathāvuttanayena abhinnattā ca ayaṃ samāsavutti
anya-e0812n:2088_2: Ayamapubbova vuttaguṇayogena acchariyarūpattā kapparukkho samuṭṭhito, kīdiso?
anya-e0812n:2088_3: Icchitaṃ lokiyaṃ yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ padadātīti icchitatthapado,
anya-e0812n:2088_5: Icchitaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ padadātīti icchitatthapado, jino.
anya-e0812n:2088_13: Jino tu pubbe vuttāya kāyakantādirūpāya chāyāya yuttoti sacchāyoti.
anya-e0812n:2088_14: Ayaṃ visesyamattabhinnā bhinnābhinnavisesanā jinato visesyassa kapparukkhassa bhinnattā,
anya-e0812n:2088_16: icchitatthapadatthassa sāratāya sacchāyatāya ubhayattheva bhāvato vuttavidhināti.
anya-e0812n:2089_2: Icchitatthapado sattehi icchitānaṃ lokiyaaviññāṇakavatthābharaṇādīnaṃ dāyako kapparukkhavaṇṇanāya citte
anya-e0812n:2089_3: patiṭṭhitassa jinapadatthassa kathetukāmatāya icchitatthapado sattehi patthitānaṃ lokiyalokuttarānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2089_4: sakalatthānaṃ anurūpavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ dāyako,
anya-e0812n:2089_10: apubbo pubbe asañjāto ayaṃ kapparukkho eso paccakkho kappapādapo samuṭṭhito sattānaṃ puññānubhāvena loke pātubhūtoti.
anya-e0812n:2089_13: phalapupphopasobhitatāya rukkhasseva visesanattā ca ayaṃ samāsavutti visesyabhinnāva bhinnābhinnavisesanā hoti.
anya-e0812n:2089_14: Icchito ca so attho ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2095_2: Saddhammo sambuddhabhāsito sāgarattena sāgaraguṇasadisattā sāgararūpena uditoti sambandho,
anya-e0812n:2095_4: Jino rukkhattena yathāvuttanayena udito taṃ patto anupekkhitassa kakkhavuttiyā ambhodhiādisaddānaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2095_7: Bhedo tu ayaṃ pubbatra “visuddhāmatasandāyi”ccādike sabbe ye keci tatropāttā visuddhāmatasandāyittādayo
anya-e0812n:2095_8: sādhāraṇā tulyā dhammā visesanāni ubhayatrāpi sambhavā,
anya-e0812n:2095_9: aññatra tu anantaravutta “icchitatthapado”iccādo pana tayaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dvayaṃ sādhāraṇañca (ka.),
anya-e0812n:2096_1: Idāni tehi dvīhi samāsavuttehi vuttatthadvayaṃ pakāseti “sāgari”ccādinā.
anya-e0812n:2096_2: Sāgarattena sāgararūpena saddhammo sammāsambuddhena desitapariyattisaddhammo udito kathito,
anya-e0812n:2096_4: Sāgarakapparukkhādisaddā attano abhidheyyabhūtasāgararukkhādike atthe mukhyabhāvena apavattitvā buddhiyaṃ
anya-e0812n:2096_7: Tathā hi yadi ete mukhyatthena na pavattanti,
anya-e0812n:2096_8: ambhodhikapparukkhasaddā saddhammajinapadatthe kathaṃ pakāsentīti tesu dvīsu udāharaṇesu pubbatra “visuddhāmatasandāyī”iccādipubbudāharaṇe
anya-e0812n:2096_9: sabbe dhammā “visuddhāmatasandāyī”ti sabbe visesanadhammā sādhāraṇā ambhodhisaddhammānaṃ samānā,
anya-e0812n:2096_10: aññatra tu “icchitatthapado”tiādike aññasmiṃ udāharaṇe pana tayaṃ “icchitatthapado, sāro,
anya-e0812n:2096_14: Tathā hi iminā rukkhadhammabhūto koci viseso pakāsito na hotīti visesanattaṃ aññesuyeva vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2100_2: Vatthuno sajīvassa nijjīvassa vā vutti avatthā aññappakārena vattumicchitappakārāpekkhāya aññeneva rūpena ṭhitā,
anya-e0812n:2100_3: tasseva tato yathāvaṭṭhitappakārato aññathā aññena pakārena parikappīyate yattha vuttiyaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2100_5: parikappīyate aññathā karīyate vatthuṭṭhiti etissanti katvā.
anya-e0812n:2101_2: Vatthuno yassa kassaci saviññāṇakaaviññāṇakapadatthassa vutti pavatti aññappakārena kappanīyappakārato aññena vijjamānappakārena ṭhitā pavattamānā,
anya-e0812n:2101_3: tadaññathā tato vijjamānappakārato aññenāvijjamānappakārena yattha vuttiyaṃ parikappīyate,
anya-e0812n:2101_5: Parikappīyate aññathā karīyate vatthuṭṭhiti etissamiti viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2105_4: kiriyādivasena ca vividhā nānappakārā parikappanā idāni kamena udāharissāmi.
anya-e0812n:2106_2: Upamābbhantarattena upamāya abbhantare vijjamānattā ca kiriyādivasena ca vividhā parikappanā kamena udāharissāmi.
anya-e0812n:2106_5: aneke vidhā pakārā yāsamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2113_2: Icchābhaṅgena “buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ vase vattessāmā”ti bodhimūle katābhilāsavināsena āturā dukkhitā atiniccalasabhāvappattā
anya-e0812n:2113_3: atiniccalaṃ nāsikagge nayane katānatāvasena accantamakriyamāsīnā nisinnā tā accharā yoginisaṅkāsā māraṅganāti
anya-e0812n:2113_4: yathāvaṭṭhitāya sacetanānaṃ māraṅganālakkhaṇānaṃ māraṅganāvalakkhaṇānaṃ (ka.) vatthūnaṃ vutti vuttā,
anya-e0812n:2113_9: tattha abhiyogato yuñjanena vasamattano āyattabhāvaṃ tadā nentīva vahanti maññeti.
anya-e0812n:2113_10: Ettha iva saddasutiyā upamāsandeho na kātabbo,
anya-e0812n:2113_11: savasānayanamakubbantiyo māraṅganā vasaṃ nentīvāti parikappīyante. Hoti ca–
anya-e0812n:2116_2: tathābhūtāya copavesanakriyāya dhīrassāpi tādisassa bhagavato avasānayanattanti parikappanatoti.
anya-e0812n:2117_2: Icchābhaṅgāturā ajapālanigrodhamūle nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ “palobhessāmā”ti māraṅganā attanāyeva katāya icchāya anibbattiyā pīḷitā,
anya-e0812n:2117_3: atiniccalaṃ hutvā nāsikagge patitadiṭṭhehi samannāgatānaññavuttiyā kriyantaravirahato.
anya-e0812n:2117_4: Āsīnā jhāyamānā nisinnā tā accharā yoginisadisā taṇhāaratiragāsaṅkhātā māraṅganāyo dhīraṃ siṅgārādhippāyena
anya-e0812n:2117_5: katānekalīlāvilāsenāpi akampamānaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ yogābhiyogato mantajappanasaṅkhātayoge yuñjanena vasaṃ
anya-e0812n:2117_6: attano vasaṃ tadā attano parājitakāle nentīva pāpenti maññeti.
anya-e0812n:2117_8: Puna aparaddhena tesameva avijjamānayogābhiyogena vasīkaraṇaṃ kappitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2117_9: Māraṅganānaṃ niccalanisajjāya yoginīnaṃ mantajjhayanasadisattā māraṅganānaṃ yoginīnaṃ upamānopameyyattaṃ
anya-e0812n:2117_11: “Nenti ivā”ti payoge katepi kriyāparikappanaṃ na hoteva.
anya-e0812n:2117_14: niggataṃ calaṃ calanaṃ asmā āsanasmāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2118_0: “Nenti ivā”ti idha ivasaddasutiyā upamājotanatthaṃ ceti saṃsayo na kātabbo,
anya-e0812n:2121_0: “Vasaṃ nentīva dhīra”nti ettha nayane gamyamāne pāpane upamānatā upamānabhāvo natthi,
anya-e0812n:2121_2: kattukriyāya kattusambandhiyā kriyāya upamānopameyyatā upamānabhāvo upameyyabhāvo natthīti ayaṃ hetthattho.
anya-e0812n:2126_2: Yuddhāya accantamatisayena unnatamuccaṃ gajaṃ hatthiṃ samāruḷho māro vasavattī taṃ jinātīti atthena jinato
anya-e0812n:2126_3: bhīto palāyituṃ kiñci nilīyanaṭṭhānaṃ maggaṃ pathaṃ anvesati nūna maññe.
anya-e0812n:2127_2: Yuddhāya yuddhatthaṃ accantaṃ atisayena unnataṃ diyaḍḍhasatayojanāyāmānurūpauccaguṇasamannāgataṃ gajaṃ
anya-e0812n:2127_3: girimekhalaṃ samāruḷho māro jinā bhīto palāyituṃ maggaṃ nibbhayaṃ pathaṃ anvesati nūna gavesati maññe.
anya-e0812n:2127_4: Yuddhatthaṃ kurumāno gajārohanaṃ maggānvesanatthamiti kavinā parikappitattā esā kriyāparikappanā nāma.
anya-e0812n:2127_5: Accantamiti asaṅkhya sasaṅkhyabhāvepi pakaraṇato ādhikke eva vattati.
anya-e0812n:2132_1: Muninda te cāru ca taṃ rājīvaṃ padumañca tamiva sundaraṃ tasmiṃte pādadvande soṇimā lohitattaguṇo,
anya-e0812n:2132_2: iti yathāvaṭṭhitā acetanassa lohitattalakkhaṇassa vatthuno vutti vuttā,
anya-e0812n:2132_4: Pāpānaṃ kilesārīnaṃ abhisammaddena atisayaṃ sampisanena jātaṃ soṇaṃ rudhiraṃ,
anya-e0812n:2133_2: He muninda te tava cārurājīvasundare manuññapadumasundare pādadvande soṇimā rattavaṇṇaṃ pāpābhisammaddajātasoṇena
anya-e0812n:2133_3: maññe saparasantānagatapāpānaṃ sammaddanena jātena rudhirenāti maññe.
anya-e0812n:2133_4: Sabbaññuno pāde bhavantarasiddhapuññakammānubhāvena jātarattavaṇṇaṃ “pāpābhisammaddanenā”ti parikappitattā ayaṃ guṇaparikappanā nāma.
anya-e0812n:2136_0: Sā’yaṃ byañjīyate kvāpi, kvāpi vākyena gamyate.
anya-e0812n:2137_6: tehi sāyaṃ parikappanā kvāpi yathāvutte byañjīyate pakāsīyate,
anya-e0812n:2137_7: kvāpi katthaci pana vākyena gamyate maññeiccādīnamabhāvepīti.
anya-e0812n:2138_1: Vohārasukhatthaṃ parikappanāpakāsake sadde dasseti “maññe”ccādinā. Maññe, saṅke, dhuvaṃ, nūna, iva,
anya-e0812n:2138_2: evamādīhi saddehi sāyaṃ parikappanā kvāpi ettha viya katthaci byañjīyate pakāsīyate,
anya-e0812n:2138_3: kvāpi katthaci vākyena kriyākārakasambandhasahitapadasamudāyena gamyate ivādisaddayogābhāvepi kevalaṃ vākyasāmatthiyeneva ñāyate.
anya-e0812n:2138_5: Iti evaṃ pakāro saddasamudāyo ādi yesaṃ “takkemi,
anya-e0812n:2142_0: Pīṇentā jina te sādhu-janaṃ sarasataṃ nayuṃ.
anya-e0812n:2143_6: Jina te dehā sarīrato nikkhantakantiyo sādhujanaṃ pīṇentā tappentā tameva janaṃ sarasataṃ sapemataṃ nayuṃ pāpesuṃ,
anya-e0812n:2143_8: Gammamānaparikappanāyaṃ yato kantiyo laddhasarasasarīrasaṃsaggā sayampi sarasā iva attānaṃ sevamānampi sādhujanaṃ sarasataṃ nentīti gamyate.
anya-e0812n:2144_2: He jina te dayāsañcārasarasā dukkhitasattavisayāya karuṇāya savisaye nirantarappavattiyā sañjātasnehato
anya-e0812n:2144_3: dehā sarīrato nikkhantakantiyo dasadisāsu niggatā nīlādichabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo sādhujanaṃ katapuññaṃ uttamajanaṃ
anya-e0812n:2144_4: pīṇentā sarasataṃsasnehabhāvaṃ pemasahitattaṃ nayuṃ tameva sādhujanaṃ pāpesuṃ.
anya-e0812n:2144_6: Karuṇāsinehasommadehasaṃsaggato kantiyo sayampi nissayaguṇato sommabhūtā attānaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattajanepi
anya-e0812n:2144_8: Ettha acetanānaṃ kantivatthūnaṃ janapasādasaṅkhātavatthuṭṭhiti “dayāsañcārasarasā ivā”ti evamādiaññappakārena parikappito.
anya-e0812n:2144_12: nikkhantā ca tā kantiyo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2144_13: sādhu ca so jano ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2146_0: Ārabhantassa yaṃ kiñci, kattuṃ puññavasā puna;
anya-e0812n:2148_2: Yaṃ kiñci kāriyaṃ kattuṃ sattubhaṅgādikaṃ ārabhantassa sajjībhūtassa yassa kassaci pumuno puññavasā kusalabalena
anya-e0812n:2148_3: kāraṇena kusalasāmatthiyena puna sādhyate sādhiyamaneneti sādhanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2149_2: Yaṃ kiñci amittavijayādikaṃ kattuṃ ārabhantassa yassa puññavasā kusalabalena puna yo sādhanantaralābho
anya-e0812n:2149_3: tasseva kāriyasiddhiyā upakārakassa aññasādhanassa yo lābho atthi,
anya-e0812n:2149_4: taṃ kāraṇalābhaṃ samāhitaṃ vadanti tasseva kāriyassa samādhānattā patiṭṭhitattā samāhitaṃ iti kavino kathenti.
anya-e0812n:2153_2: Mārārino mārasattuno bhaṅge abhibhave abhimukhaṃ na parammukhaṃ manaṃ yassa tassa satthuno upakārikā
anya-e0812n:2153_3: āraddhamārabhaṅgakriyānuggāhikā mahāmahī ayaṃ mahārāvaṃ mārāridussahaṃ mahānādaṃ ravī akāsi.
anya-e0812n:2153_5: tassa puññavaseneva mahīrāvo aparaṃ sādhanaṃ samāpannanti lakkhaṇaṃ yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2154_2: Mārāribhaṅgābhimukhamanaso mārasaṅkhātassa sattuno maddane abhimukhacittassa tassa satthuno upakārikā
anya-e0812n:2154_3: āraddhamāravijayassa upatthambhikā ayaṃ mahāmahī mahārāvaṃ mārassa hadayavatthuṃ maddanto maddantī (?)
anya-e0812n:2154_6: tasseva siddhiyā hetubhūtaṃ aññakāraṇaṃ nāma mahīrāvo.
anya-e0812n:2154_10: mahantī ca sā mahī ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2158_2: Abhimataṃ kiñci atthaṃ dhanadānādilakkhaṇaṃ avatvā añjasā vācakabyāpārena anākhyāya tassābhimatassatthassa
anya-e0812n:2158_3: siddhiyā nipphādanatthaṃ aññathā aññena pakārena tannibbattianuguṇena yaṃ dassanaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2159_2: Abhimataṃ iṭṭhaṃ dhanadānādisarūpaṃ dhanadhaññādiṃ (sīhaḷabyākhyāyaṃ) yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ avatvā ujumakathetvā
anya-e0812n:2159_3: tassa abhimatatthassa siddhiyā nipphattiyā aññathā vattumicchitatthassānurūpenāññappakārena dassanaṃ
anya-e0812n:2163_2: Dhanaṃ vivaṭe kenaci anāvaṭattā aṅgaṇe pakāsappadese nikkhittaṃ atha ca pana ārakkhavajjitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2163_4: Tuvaṃ yadi icchasi gantuṃ dhanaṃ vā,
anya-e0812n:2163_5: yathākāmaṃ gaccheti dhanāvaharaṇamicchitamañjasā avatvā taṃsiddhiyā byājena vadati.
anya-e0812n:2164_2: Dhanaṃ muttāmaṇiādi vivaṭaṅgaṇanikkhittaṃ pākārādiparikkheparahitattā nirāvaraṇaṭṭhāne yena kenaci ṭhapitaṃ apica ārakkhavajjitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2164_3: Bho dhanakāma tuvaṃ yadicchasi dhanaṃ gamanaṃ vā,
anya-e0812n:2164_4: yathākāmaṃ gacchāti cittenicchitadhanāvaharaṇavidhānaṃ “dhanamāharā”ti ujumavatvā evaṃ byājena vuttattā idaṃ pariyāyavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n:2164_9: kāmaṃ taṇhaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ vā cittamanatikkammāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2166_0: Thutiṃ karoti nindanto, viya taṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ;
anya-e0812n:2168_2: Nindanto viya dosaṃ nidassento viya thutiṃ karoti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
anya-e0812n:2168_5: Atra vuttivisese dosā viya ābhāsanti paṭibhanti.
anya-e0812n:2168_6: Tādisapadādinā dosābhāsā guṇā eva iddhimantatādayo na dosopi koci sannidhimavaṭṭhānaṃ yanti.
anya-e0812n:2169_2: Nindanto viya dosaṃ dassento viya thutiṃ karoti vaṇṇanaṃ karoti,
anya-e0812n:2169_5: Atra asmiṃ vuttivisese dosābhāsā dosā viya paṭibhāsamānā guṇā eva tādisapadappayogena iddhimantatādayo
anya-e0812n:2169_8: dosā iva ābhāsanti paṭibhāsantīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2172_0: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha, guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ.
anya-e0812n:2173_2: Nātha tvaṃ akhilaṃ kuvalayaṃ uppalaṃ pathavīvalayañceti siliṭṭhaṃ sañcāletuṃ bhamayitumito cito ca bhusamaccantaṃ
anya-e0812n:2173_3: alaṃ samatthopi tāvatā taṃmattena te guṇānaṃ visesaṃ atisayalakkhaṇaṃ kiṃ kena kāraṇena vadāma.
anya-e0812n:2173_5: tāva nikhilabhūmaṇḍalasañcālāvikaraṇato paramāya thutiyā saṃyojitoyaṃ bhagavā mahānubhāvaṃ vicitavāti bhuvanamaṇḍalasikhāmaṇīti.
anya-e0812n:2174_2: Nātha tvaṃ akhilaṃ kuvalayaṃ nissesaṃ nīluppalavanaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ vā sañcāletuṃ kampetuṃ bhusamatisayena alaṃ samattho,
anya-e0812n:2174_3: tāvatā te guṇānaṃ visesamatisayaṃ kiṃ vadāma kathaṃ bhaṇāmāti.
anya-e0812n:2174_5: tasseva saddassa pathavīmaṇḍalavācakattā “iddhimato tava idaṃ kiṃ visesa”nti uttamaguṇavaṇṇanā katā hoti.
anya-e0812n:2174_7: sā ca sabbathā silesaṃ nissāya pavattatīti.
anya-e0812n:2178_2: Visese atisaye kismiñcipi kāriyavisese icchāyaṃ dabbādīnaṃ yatra vekallassa abhāvassa dassanaṃ vacanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2178_3: ayaṃ viseso nāma visesavutti nāma bhave.
anya-e0812n:2179_2: Visesicchāyaṃ atisaye kāriyavisese icchāyaṃ sati dabbassa ca kriyājātiguṇassa ca yatra yasmiṃ vuttivisese vekalladassanaṃ abhāvakathanamatthi,
anya-e0812n:2179_3: ayaṃ viseso nāma bhave visesavutti nāma siyāti.
anya-e0812n:2181_0: Na rathā na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā na padātayo;
anya-e0812n:2185_2: Rathā tayo antamaso saparivārānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rathānaṃ anīkavohārato tādisā tayo rathā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n:2185_3: Mātaṅgā tayo vuttanayena anīkasaṅkhātā tayo mātaṅgā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n:2185_4: Na hayā tayo tādisā anīkasaṅkhātā tayo assā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n:2185_5: Padā na antamaso sāyudhānaṃ catunnaṃ purisānaṃ anīkavohārato tādisā cattāro purisā padā ca natthi.
anya-e0812n:2185_6: Tathāpi muninā sambhārāvajjanena hi samatiṃsapāramidhammānaṃ ābhogakaraṇeneva mārāri mārapaccattiko jito abhibhavito.
anya-e0812n:2185_7: Iha jayopakaraṇabhāvena ṭhitānaṃ rathānīkādīnaṃ dabbānaṃ vekallaṃ dassetvā sattuvijayasabhāvānaṃ sambhārānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2185_16: Iha rathādīsu ṭhitā viya sīghaṃ pādabalena gantvā yujjhamānā purisā pādopacārena “pādā”ti vuttā.
anya-e0812n:2185_17: Rathādīnaṃ pamāṇaṃ tayoti anīkaṭṭhāne dassetvā purisapamāṇassāvuttepi antamaso cattāro purisā anīkaṃ nāma hontīti pakaraṇato cattāroti ñāyati. No ce?
anya-e0812n:2185_21: Dabbavisesavutti dabbena dabbapaṭisedhanato visesakathanaṃ visesassa vuttīti ca,
anya-e0812n:2190_2: Bhūkuṭi bhamubhaṅgo kopajanito na baddhā na racitā,
anya-e0812n:2190_3: dasanacchado cādharo neva phurito neva kampito kopena.
anya-e0812n:2190_4: Tathāpi ca varo uttamo munivīro sayaṃ mārārino bhaṅgaṃ parājayaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0812n:2191_2: Bhūkuṭi kopavikārabhūto bhamubhaṅgopi na baddhā na katā,
anya-e0812n:2191_3: dasanacchado dantāvaraṇo neva phurito na kampāpito.
anya-e0812n:2191_4: Tathāpi varo uttamo munivīro muniguṇavīraguṇayutto tathāgato sayaṃ mārāribhaṅgañca akāsīti.
anya-e0812n:2191_5: Ettha bhamubhaṅgaracanādikaṃ kriyaṃ akatvā nibbikārassa mārabhaṅgasabhāvavisesassa nibbikāramārabhaṅgassa (ka.) vuttattā esā kriyāvisesavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n:2198_2: Disāsu dasasu byattā patthaṭā raṃsi na bhavati.
anya-e0812n:2198_3: Loke sakalasmiṃ patthaṭo vitthato ālokona bhavati.
anya-e0812n:2198_5: tajjātikattābhāvepi sādhūnaṃ subhāsitaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ paramaccantameva andhatamaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhāvekallato
anya-e0812n:2198_7: Raṃsiyā andhakārāpahārasamatthāya nivattiyā viseso subhāsitassa dassito.
anya-e0812n:2199_4: Tathāpi sādhusubhāsitaṃ saddhammo paramaccantaṃ andhatamaharaṃ atthānatthatīraṇakkhamassa paññācakkhussa andhakārakamohatamaṃ haraṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n:2199_5: Idha andhakāraviddhaṃsane samatthaṃ raṃsijātyādikaṃ paṭisedhetvā subhāsitassa andhakārāpaharaṇasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n:2201_0: Na kharaṃ na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda vacanaṃ tava;
anya-e0812n:2204_2: Muninda tava vacanaṃ na kharaṃ na lūkhaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2204_3: na thaddhaṃ vā kaṭhinañca na hi.
anya-e0812n:2204_4: Tathāpi tādisakharattādiguṇābhāvepi janatāya janasamūhassa madaṃ gāḷhaṃ daḷhaṃ taṇhaṃ (ka.) katvā nimmūlaṃ khanatīti.
anya-e0812n:2205_2: He muninda tava vacanaṃ kharaṃ kakkasaṃ na hoti,
anya-e0812n:2205_4: Tathāpi janatāmadaṃ janasamūhassa jātyādiṃ nissāya pavattaṃ gabbaṃ gāḷhaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā nimmūlaṃ mūlamasesetvā khanatīti.
anya-e0812n:2205_5: Khaṇanakkhamaayosaṅkuādīsu labbhamānaṃ kharattādiguṇaṃ paṭisedhetvā buddhavacanassa madakhaṇanasabhāvasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0812n:2205_6: visesassa vuttattā ayaṃ guṇavisesavutti nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:2205_10: “Gāḷhaṃ nimmūla”nti khaṇanakriyāya visesanattā gāḷhaṃ nimmūlaṃ khaṇanaṃ karotīti yojanā.
anya-e0812n:2212_2: Sūravīrattanaṃ sūrabhāvavīrabhāvaṃ atidittaṃ tu atisayena pana dittaṃ yahiṃ vākye dassīyate,
anya-e0812n:2212_3: īdisaṃ vacanaṃ viññū kavayo ruḷhāhaṅkāramiti vadantīti.
anya-e0812n:2212_6: ruḷho uggato ahaṅkāro ettha vuttiviseseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2218_2: Nandopanandassa nāgarājassa appameyyamahānubhāvassa dame damane me mama niravadhisarantippameyyappabhāvānucaritakittinopi
anya-e0812n:2218_3: parassa byāpāradassanā payogapaṭipādanena kiṃ payojanaṃ, na kimpi,
anya-e0812n:2218_4: yato me pādasambhattā pādāvanatā tādise kammani sajjā baddhakacchā santeva vijjanteva,
anya-e0812n:2219_2: Nandopanandassa nāgarañño dame damakaraṇe byāpāradassanā bhuvanattaye pavattamānaānubhāvena ca sampavattitakittisamūhena
anya-e0812n:2219_3: ca samannāgatassa mayhaṃ tādisapayogadassanena kiṃ payojanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2219_4: Yasmā me pādasambhattā mayhaṃ caraṇāvanatā tādise kicce sajjā sannaddhā puttā bahavo santi eva, tasmāti.
anya-e0812n:2219_5: Cetovasitāya sūravīrabhāvo iha atiditto dassito hoti.
anya-e0812n:2225_3: Ekena samānena padena sarūpena āyutamanvitaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttīti anuvaditvā so silesoti vidhīyate,
anya-e0812n:2226_2: Anekābhidheyyaṃ ekapadāyutaṃ ubhayattha sādhāraṇattā tulyena saddarūpena yuttaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n:2226_4: So pana yena kenaci sādhammarūpena upamānopameyyabhūtānamatthānaṃ siliṭṭhattā aññamaññaṃ phusitvā ṭhitattā sileso nāma.
anya-e0812n:2226_5: Ayaṃ vuttalakkhaṇo sileso abhinnapadavākyādivasā akatavikārānaṃ syādyantatyādyantapadasamannāgatānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2231_6: sūriyo mahodayaṃ mahantaṃ udayaṃ pabbataṃ samāruḷho,
anya-e0812n:2231_7: mahāmuni tu mahodayaṃ mahantamabbhudayaṃ sammāsambodhisamadhigamarūpaṃ samāruḷho patto.
anya-e0812n:2231_11: Jane bodhayaṃ niddāpagamanena kilesaniddāpagamanena vā pabodhayanto rājate dibbatīti.
anya-e0812n:2232_6: ñāṇalocanassa andhakaraṇato andhakāroti vuttamohassa vā viddhaṃsako,
anya-e0812n:2232_7: hārī teneva manuñño raṃsimālī attano raṃsimālāya samannāgato jane pakatiniddāya kilesaniddāya vā samannāgate
anya-e0812n:2232_8: satte bodhayaṃ bodhayanto ayaṃ bhagavā divākaro,
anya-e0812n:2232_9: chahi bhagadhammehi samannāgato buddho vā rājate dibbatīti.
anya-e0812n:2232_10: Dvīsu pakkhesu padānaṃ samānabhāvena ṭhitattā ayaṃ abhinnapadavākyasileso.
anya-e0812n:2232_11: Andho ca so tamo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2232_13: mahanto ca so udayo pabbato cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2232_14: mahanto ca so udayo abbhudayo abhivuddhi cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2232_17: bhago sirī assa sūriyassa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n:2232_18: bhago sirīkāmapayatanādippakāro assa satthuno atthīti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2237_3: Sobhanā sabbaññutaññāṇarūpaṃ buddhi assa atthīti sudhī,
anya-e0812n:2237_5: Sārado saradakāle sambhūto amalako nimmalo ābhā sobhā yassa so, cando.
anya-e0812n:2237_8: amalakassa hatthāmalakasseva vā ābhāso asesañeyyāvabodho yassa so,
anya-e0812n:2237_10: Saṃ sammā kamenānīyamānattā ānīto parikkhayo kaṇhapakkho yena so, cando.
anya-e0812n:2237_11: Samaṃ vūpasamaṃ ānīto parikkhayo hāni kilesasattukato adhigatakkhayattā yenaso,
anya-e0812n:2237_13: Kumudākarassa kumudassa raṃsiyā sambodhi vikāso yassa raṃsiyo sambodhi vikāsa’ssa (ka.) so, cando.
anya-e0812n:2237_14: Kuyā pathaviyā mudaṃ pītiṃ karotīti kumudākaro,
anya-e0812n:2237_18: Ayaṃ bhinnapadavākyasileso vuttena vidhinā padānaṃ bhinnattā.
anya-e0812n:2238_9: Samānītaparikkhayo kaṇhapakkhe suṭṭhu kamena ānīto parikkhayo paripuṇṇo vā cando,
anya-e0812n:2238_16: Ubhayapakkhesu padaṃ bhinditvā atthassa yojanato ayaṃ bhinnapadavākyasileso.
anya-e0812n:2238_23: sārado amalako ābhāso yassa candassa bhagavato vāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2238_24: sārado āmalakassa viya ābhāso ñeyyāvabodho assa bhagavatoti ca,
anya-e0812n:2238_25: saṃ sammā ānīto parikkhayo kalāhāni aneneti ca,
anya-e0812n:2238_26: samaṃ vūpasamaṃ ānīto parikkhayo hāni kilesasattuto yeneti ca,
anya-e0812n:2238_32: sudhā amataṃ assa candassa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n:2238_33: su sobhanā dhī buddhi assa sambuddhassāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2241_0: Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.
anya-e0812n:2243_2: Saṃ sammā āhito patiṭṭhāpito attassa vinayo vinayanaṃ sabbattha savisaye appaṭihatacāravasena yassa so, garuḷo.
anya-e0812n:2243_10: Sundaraṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ samuddaṃ bhinditvā jalasaṅgamato paṭhamamevauggamanasāmatthiyayogato yassa so, garuḷo.
anya-e0812n:2243_15: Visaṃ dadātīti visadaṃ pāṇinaṃ nāgalokaṃ pātu ahiṃsanavasena pālayatu,
anya-e0812n:2244_2: Samāhitattavinayo sammā āhitāya ṭhapitāya sarīrassa savisaye gatiyā samannāgato,
anya-e0812n:2244_3: sammā āhitena ṭhapitena cittadamanena samannāgato vā,
anya-e0812n:2244_6: sugato pakkhavātavegena samuddajalaṃ dvidhā katvā tasmiṃ jale anekībhūteyeva nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā nāge gahetvā gamane samatthattā sundaragamano,
anya-e0812n:2244_8: vināyako pakkhīnaṃ nāyako so garuḷarājā visadaṃ ghoravisattā visadāyakaṃ pāṇinaṃ nāgalokaṃ pātu ahiṃsanavasena pāletu. No ce,
anya-e0812n:2244_9: vināyako veneyye vinento so sammāsambuddho pāṇinaṃ sakalasattalokaṃ visadaṃ visāradaṃ katvā pātu ahitāpanayanahitopanayanena rakkhatūti.
anya-e0812n:2244_10: Ubhayapakkhesu “ahīnamadamaddano”iccādikehi bhinnehi ca “samāhitattavinayo”iccādikehi abhinnehi ca padehi
anya-e0812n:2244_13: samāhito attavinayo yassa garuḷassa tathāgatassa vāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2251_10: Virodho asaṅgati ettha vijjatīti virodhi, sopi.
anya-e0812n:2251_15: Esaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ nidassanesu payogesveva rūpaṃ sabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ āvibhavissatīti.
anya-e0812n:2252_2: Viruddhāviruddhābhinnakammā api ubhayatthassa viruddhena ca aviruddhena ca abhinnena ca kammena samanvitā tayo silesā ca,
anya-e0812n:2252_3: paro añño niyamavāpi avadhāraṇena yuttasileso ca,
anya-e0812n:2252_7: padajādi padena jāto vākyena jāto ocityasamposakādisilesopīti esaṃ silesānaṃ nidassanesveva nidassanasaṅkhataudāharaṇesveva
anya-e0812n:2252_8: rūpaṃ sarūpaṃ tesaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vā āvibhavissati,
anya-e0812n:2252_9: nidassiyamānaudāharaṇeneva lakkhaṇassa gammamānattā visuṃ na kathessāmīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2252_10: Viruddhāni ca aviruddhāni ca abhinnañceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2252_11: tameva kammaṃ kriyā yesaṃ silesānamiti ca,
anya-e0812n:2252_13: niyamassa akkhepo paṭisedho assa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n:2252_14: taṃ vacanaṃ abhidhānaṃ yassa silesassāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2252_19: so ādi yassa vākyassāti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2255_0: Savase vattayaṃ lokaṃ, akhilaṃ kallaviggaho kalaviggaho (sī.);
anya-e0812n:2257_2: Akhilaṃ lokaṃ savase vattayaṃ mārāri dhammarājā ca,
anya-e0812n:2257_3: kallo manuñño viggaho kalaho yassa mārārino,
anya-e0812n:2257_5: tesu mārāri parābhavati parābhavamapeti bodhiyaṃ paṭiladdhaparājayavasena,
anya-e0812n:2257_6: dhammarājā samantabhaddo tu vijambhate lokattayabyāpisamullapitavijayaddhanipavattivasena samaṃ bhavatīti
anya-e0812n:2258_2: Akhilaṃ lokaṃ savase vattayaṃ anatthe yuñjanato attano vase vattayanto, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2258_3: sakalalokaṃ hite yuñjanato attano vase vattayanto kallaviggaho manuññakalaho, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2258_4: manuññasarīrasampattiyutto mārāri parābhavati bodhimūle laddhaparājayavasena parābhavaṃ pāpuṇāti,
anya-e0812n:2258_5: dhammarājā tathāgato pana vijambhate lokattaye patthaṭajayaghosavasena vijambhatīti.
anya-e0812n:2258_8: kallo manuñño viggaho vivādo deho vā yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2262_0: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
anya-e0812n:2263_8: tassayaṃ amatañca tassa ca nissayaṃ amatanti (ka.) passantīti ayamaviruddhakammasileso savanadassanānaṃ aviruddhattāti.
anya-e0812n:2264_2: Sabhāvamadhuraṃ “vācāmadhuraṃ karissāmī”ti kattabbapayogaṃ vināpi madhurattā pakatimadhuraṃ, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2264_3: kenaci paccayena anuppannattā saṅkharavisesaṃ vināpi pakatipaṇītaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2264_4: puññavisesodayasambhavaṃ puññavisesadesakassa munino kassaci kusalavisesassa abhivuddhiyā sambhūtaṃ, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2264_5: veneyyajanānaṃ nibbānādhippāyena katakusalavisesassa abhivuddhiyā ārammaṇattena paṭiladdhaṃ munino vācaṃ saddhammasaṅkhātaṃ suṇanti,
anya-e0812n:2271_2: Andhakāraṃ mohasaṅkhātaṃ pakatiandhakāraṃ vā apaharatīti andhakārāpahārā, vācā, bhā ca.
anya-e0812n:2271_4: sobhāya ca jino jantūnaṃ mano cittaṃ pīṇetīti ayamabhinnakammasileso pīṇanalakkhaṇāyekāya kriyāya vācāya bhāya ca sampannoti.
anya-e0812n:2272_2: Andhakārāpahārāya mohandhakāraṃ pakatiandhakāraṃ vā apaharaṇāya sabhāvamadhurāya ca sabhāvato kaṇṇasukhāya,
anya-e0812n:2272_3: sabhāvato nettābhirāmāya vācāya bhāya sarīrakantiyā ca jino jantūnaṃ mano cittaṃ dhinoti pīṇetīti.
anya-e0812n:2272_4: Pīṇayanasabhāvāya ekāya kriyāya saddhiṃ karaṇabhūtānaṃ dvinnaṃ vācābhānaṃ yojitattā ayaṃ abhinnakammasileso.
anya-e0812n:2278_8: “Kesakkhīnaṃvā”tiādīsu niyamasaṅkhātaavadhāraṇapadassa vijjamānattā kaṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ pāpattassa ca,
anya-e0812n:2278_10: rattaguṇena saddhiṃ rāgassa ca siliṭṭhattā ayaṃ niyamavantasileso nāma.
anya-e0812n:2278_14: pāṇayo ca pādāni ca adharāni cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2283_2: Nātha tava pāṇipādādharesveva sārāgo sobhano rattavaṇṇo dissati, na citte,
anya-e0812n:2283_6: yato so ayaṃ sārāgo sādhūnaṃ guṇesveva virāgalakkhaṇo dissate iti.
anya-e0812n:2284_2: He nātha tava sārāgo sobhano rattavaṇṇo pāṇipādādharesveva dissati,
anya-e0812n:2284_4: Atha vā so ayaṃ sārāgo kattukamyatākusalacchandabhūto sādhuguṇesvapi sajjanānaṃ sīlādiguṇesupi dissati.
anya-e0812n:2284_5: “Evā”ti dassitaniyamassa paṭisedhakena “atha vā”ti vacanena samannāgatattā rattavaṇṇasaṅkhātarāgena lobhassa
anya-e0812n:2291_2: Saha lakkhaṇena sasarūpena dvattiṃ savarapurisalakkhaṇena vā vattamāno salakkhaṇo,
anya-e0812n:2291_6: niyato patidinamudayo pabhālakkhaṇo yassa so niyatodayo, sūriyo,
anya-e0812n:2291_7: niyato thiro udayo sammāsambuddho sambodhirūpo yassa so niyatodayo, munindo,
anya-e0812n:2291_9: jito saṃkleso jhānarativasena kāyacittābādho yena so, brahmā,
anya-e0812n:2291_10: jito saṃkleso dasavidho aggamaggaññāṇalābhā yena so.
anya-e0812n:2292_3: atisubhago atisundarāya lakkhiyā samannāgato, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2292_6: niyatodayo patidinaṃ pubbaṇhakāle niyamitagaganuggamano, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2292_11: samaṇissaro so uttamo maṇi vibhāti sobhati, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2292_14: paṭhamapāde candena dutiye sūriyena tatiye brahmunā catutthe maṇinā ca sabbaññupadatthassa siliṭṭhattā ca ayaṃ avirodhisileso nāma.
anya-e0812n:2292_16: atisobhano bhago sirī vā sirīkāmapayatanādiko vā assāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2292_21: maṇīnaṃ samaṇānaṃ vā issaroti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2299_6: tadā loke samoti viruddhaṃ asamattā tassa.
anya-e0812n:2299_9: loke devadattādīnaṃ virodhisattānaṃ rāhulādīnaṃ avirodhisattānañca samattā,
anya-e0812n:2299_18: Tattha puriso dāyako pāpe jane kathamadayoti virujjhati.
anya-e0812n:2299_20: Tasmā munino ayaṃ yathāvuttā gati pavatti cittā abbhutāti ayaṃ vuttanayena virodhisileso udāhaṭo.
anya-e0812n:2300_2: Asamopi atulyopi koci rājādiko loke samo tulyo, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2300_3: sadisapuggalarahito eva rāhulabhadradevadattādisabbaloke anunayapaṭighābhāvena samo hoti.
anya-e0812n:2300_4: Lokesopi brahmabhūtopi naruttamo naravaro hoti, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2300_6: Sadayopi yācakesu dayasaṅkhātena dānena yuttopi pāpe pāpiṭṭhe adayo dānarahito, no ce,
anya-e0812n:2300_8: Munino ayaṃ gati pavatti cittā vicittāti rājādino asamasamatā ca,
anya-e0812n:2300_10: dānasahitassa kassaci purisassa dānarahitabhāvo ca viruddho hoti.
anya-e0812n:2300_11: Tasmā rājabrahmapurisehi munino siliṭṭhattā ayaṃ virodhisileso nāma.
anya-e0812n:2300_16: naro ca so uttamo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2300_17: saha dayena dayāya vā vattamānoti ca,
anya-e0812n:2300_18: natthi dayo dayā vā asseti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2305_2: Saṃsāro abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā khandhapaṭipāṭiyeva dukkhaṃ dukkhamattādinā,
anya-e0812n:2305_4: amataṃ sukhaṃ amataṃ vā nibbānaṃ dadātīti amatandadāti āmantanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2305_5: tvayi avanatā paṇāmavasena icchitamatimataṃ dukkhāpagamanibbattaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ accantaṃ vindati paṭilabhatīti.
anya-e0812n:2305_7: amatandado dukkhopahate sukhayatīti ucitanti “amataṃ dadātī”ti padamadhigate vatthuni ocityaṃ samposayatīti ocityasamposako padasilesoyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2306_2: Saṃsāradukkhopahatā khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ nirantarapavattisaṅkhātena dukkhena upahatā janatā,
anya-e0812n:2306_4: nibbānadāyaka tathāgata tvayi avanatā paṇamanavasena onatā icchitaṃ abhimataṃ sukhaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ accantaṃ atisayena vindati sevatīti.
anya-e0812n:2306_5: Amatadāyakā dukkhite sukhite karontīti idaṃ ucitameveti ubhayatthassāpi vācakaṃ “amataṃ dadātī”ti padaṃ
anya-e0812n:2306_6: tādisajanassa sukhadāne ocityaṃ posetīti ayaṃ ocityasamposakapadasileso.
anya-e0812n:2306_9: amataṃ sudhaṃ nibbānaṃ vā dadātīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2309_0: Saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ, sā matā tulyayogitā.
anya-e0812n:2310_3: tena yuttehi vatthūhi saha samaṃ katvāna vatthuto asāmyepi tathābhāvamāropya kassaci purisādino thutinindatthaṃ yaṃ kittanamākhyānaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2310_5: vattumicchitena guṇena tādisānaṃ tulyayogitāpaṭipādanato tadatthiyena tulyayogitā tathā dvidhā vattati.
anya-e0812n:2311_2: Guṇayuttehi sundarāsundarehi yehi kehici guṇehi yuttehi vatthūhi,
anya-e0812n:2311_3: samaṃ katvāna tatvato asamānesupi samānattabuddhiyā āropanaṃ katvā,
anya-e0812n:2311_4: kassaci purisādino thutiṃ nindaṃ vā nissāya yaṃ saṃkittanaṃ guṇāguṇakathanaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0812n:2311_10: Ettha tulyaguṇayuttapadatthānaṃ tagguṇasambandhassa tulyayogitābhāvato tappaṭipādako uttiviseso tadatthiyena tulyayogitāti ñeyyā.
anya-e0812n:2317_4: atha vā sammāsambuddho cāti ubhohi karaṇabhūtehi hetubhūtehi vā loko sattaloko,
anya-e0812n:2317_5: sampatto sammado pīti yena tathāvidho ca,
anya-e0812n:2317_6: sampatto ālokassa sampadā yena tathāvidho cāpīti.
anya-e0812n:2317_7: Ettha pītidānādiguṇayuttena raṃsimālinā samaṃ katvā bhagavato thutivasena kittananti lakkhaṇaṃ yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2318_2: Tamonudo andhakāraṃ paharanto raṃsimālī ca bhagavā ca ubhohi karaṇabhūtehi hetubhūtehi vā,
anya-e0812n:2318_3: loko sattaloko sampattasammado paṭiladdhapītiko ca sampattālokasampadā ca hotīti.
anya-e0812n:2318_4: Ettha pītidānālokakaraṇasaṅkhātaguṇayuttena sūriyena tulyaṃ katvā bhagavato thutivasena guṇakathanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2318_9: Udāharaṇe adassitepi asādhuguṇayuttena kenaci vatthunā samaṃ katvā kassaci kātabbanindāpi evameva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0812n:2321_0: Dassīyate asantaṃ vā, santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2322_2: Atthantaraṃ nidassetabbāpekkhāya aññaṃ kiñci ucitaṃ kāriyaṃ sādhayatā kenaci vatthunā hetubhūtena,
anya-e0812n:2322_3: tena atthantareneva sadisaṃ tulyaṃ phalaṃ kiñci asantaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ vā santaṃ iṭṭhaṃ vā dassīyate paṭipādīyate,
anya-e0812n:2323_3: (ka.) sādhayatā sādhayantena kenaci vatthunā taṃsadisaṃ tena atthantarena samānaṃ asantaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ vā
anya-e0812n:2323_4: santaṃ iṭṭhaṃ vā kiñci phalaṃ dassīyate vatthūhi paṭipādīyate,
anya-e0812n:2323_6: Attho ca so antaro añño cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2328_2: Samaṇindassa mahāmunino udayā pātubhāvena pāpā lobhādayo parābhavaṃ nidhanaṃ yanti,
anya-e0812n:2328_11: taṃ sūcayantāti dhammarājavirodhahetukaṃ asantaphalametaṃ nidassanaṃ parābhavassāniṭṭhattā.
anya-e0812n:2329_2: Samaṇindassa munindassa udayā loke pātubhāvena pāpā lobhādayo dhammarājaviruddhānaṃ rājadhammehi samannāgatarājūhi,
anya-e0812n:2329_3: dhammādhipatinā munindena vā viruddhānaṃ durantataṃ aniṭṭhāvasānataṃ sūcayantā pakāsento parābhavaṃ parihāniṃ yanti pāpuṇantīti.
anya-e0812n:2329_4: Ettha pubbaddhena udayapubbako pāpaparābhavanasaṅkhāto atthantaro dassito,
anya-e0812n:2329_8: dhammena yutto rājāti vā dhammesu rājāti vāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2329_10: duṭṭho virūpo anto pariyosānaṃ yesamiti ca,
anya-e0812n:2336_2: Acchariyānaṃ bhagavato caraṇāravindadvandasampaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā samuggatānamacchariyaguṇopetānamambujānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2336_3: sirasi matthake nikkhittā caraṇā yena so jino.
anya-e0812n:2337_2: Ayaṃ jino acchariyānaṃ attano pādapaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā uggatattā accharāpaharaṇayoggānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2337_3: ambujānaṃ sironikkhittacaraṇo matthake ṭhapitapādo loke sattaloke attano paramabbhutataṃ atiacchariyaguṇaṃ
anya-e0812n:2337_5: Ettha acchariyapadumānaṃ matthake caraṇanikkhepasaṅkhātena atthantarena paramabbhutataṃ viññāpetīti ayaṃ
anya-e0812n:2337_9: paramo uttamo abbhuto guṇo asseti ca,
anya-e0812n:2341_2: Vibhūtiyā sampattiyā adhippāyassa vā ajjhāsayassa vā paramukkaṃsataṃ paramātisayabhāvaṃ yātaṃ upagataṃ mahantattaṃ nāma īritaṃ kathitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2342_2: Vibhūtiyā sampattiyā vā adhippāyassa ajjhāsayassa vā paramukkaṃsataṃ atyukkaṃsabhāvaṃ yātaṃ yaṃ mahantattaṃ siyā,
anya-e0812n:2347_2: Abhinikkhamā purā pubbe bodhisatto māyādeviyā putto paramukkaṭṭhaṃ anāññasādhāraṇaṃ siriṃ vibhūtiṃ vindi paṭilabhi. Kīdiso?
anya-e0812n:2347_3: Kirīṭe makuṭe ratanānaṃ chāyāhi sobhāhi anuviddho churito ātapavāraṇo setacchattaṃ yassa so tādisoti
anya-e0812n:2348_2: Bodhisatto antimajātiyaṃ mahābodhisatto abhinikkhamā abhinikkhamanato purā pubbe kirīṭaratanacchāyānuviddhātapavāraṇo
anya-e0812n:2348_3: moliratanaraṃsīhi rañjitasetacchatto paramukkaṭṭhaṃ siriṃ vibhūtiṃ vindi anubhavīti.
anya-e0812n:2348_4: Ettha moliratanakantiyā setacchattassa oviddhabhāvakathanena vibhūtiyā mahantattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2348_7: tāhi anuviddho churito ātapavāraṇo yasseti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2355_2: Snehena piyabhāvena jātena rasena rāgena ābaddhamattani rāhulamātaraṃ bimbādevimpi,
anya-e0812n:2355_4: hitvā anapekkhitvā anāsatto hutvā sattānaṃ hitāya lokiyalokuttarāya vaḍḍhiyā bodhisatto siddhattho sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇeyeva satto āsatto,
anya-e0812n:2356_2: So bodhisatto sneharasābaddhaṃ piyabhāvasaṅkhātarāgena ābaddhaṃ rāhulamātaraṃ api bimbādevimpi hitvā
anya-e0812n:2356_3: sattahitāya sattānaṃ lokiyalokuttaratthāya sambodhiyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇeyeva satto laggoti.
anya-e0812n:2356_4: Tādisaitthiratanepi alaggatākathanena bodhisattassa ukkaṭṭhajjhāsayamahantattaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2356_8: snehena piyabhāvena jāto raso rāgoti ca,
anya-e0812n:2362_2: vaṇṇanīyaṃ kiñci vatthuṃ gopetvā niraṃkatvā tassa vaṇṇanīyassa asamaṃ visamaṃ visadisaṃ paramaññaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0812n:2362_3: kiñci vatthu yadi dassīyate kavināti anuvaditvā sā vañcanā matāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n:2363_2: Vaṇṇanīyaṃ kiñci vatthuṃ gopetvā tassa vaṇṇanīyassa samaṃ sadisaṃ vā asamaṃ visadisaṃ vā paraṃ yaṃ kiñci vatthu yadi dassīyate kavinā,
anya-e0812n:2370_2: Māro kāmo tādino lobhādīsu tādisattā munino purato sammukhe sahassaṃ isavo assāti sahassesu ca na hoti.
anya-e0812n:2370_3: Pañca isavo assāti pañcesu ca na hotīti vaṇṇanīyo mārotra gopyate.
anya-e0812n:2370_5: Paresu aññasattesu sarāgesu esamisūnaṃ dasavaḍḍhitaṃ dasahi guṇitaṃ sahassaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2370_6: kathamaññathābhuvanattayaṃ jayeyyāti māraṃ gopetvā dasasahassopalakkhitavatthantarassa dassitattā asamavañcanāyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2371_2: Māro tādino lābhālābhādīsu avikārino tathāgatassa purato abhimukhe sahassesu ca sahassasaropi na hoti,
anya-e0812n:2371_3: pañcesu pañca isu ca tādise ṭhapetvā pañca isu na hoti.
anya-e0812n:2371_4: Paresu sugatasammukhe īdisesupi aññesu saṃkilesesu tassa tilokajetuno mārassa esaṃ sarānaṃ dasavaḍḍhitaṃ
anya-e0812n:2371_5: dasagaṇanāya vaḍḍhitaṃ sahassaṃ hoti dasasahassaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n:2371_6: Vaṇṇanīyaṃ māraṃ gopetvā dasasahassasaṅkhyāhi gaṇitassa aññassa sarasaṅkhātavatthuno dassitattā ayaṃ asamavañcanā nāma.
anya-e0812n:2379_2: Munindavadanindunā sabbaññuno mukhacandena vivādaṃ anuyuñjanto sampuṇṇo ayaṃ paccakkho candimā na hoti.
anya-e0812n:2379_3: Kiñcarahi etaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ manobhuno anaṅgassa ubbhūtiyaṃ chattaṃ samussitasetacchattanti.
anya-e0812n:2379_4: Vaṇṇanīyaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ ṭhapetvā tato aññassa candasadisassa chattassa dassitattā ayaṃ vutti samavañcanā nāma.
anya-e0812n:2383_3: tamādi yesaṃ tehi nibbindena virattena appakate asannihite buddhivisayeyeva iha kismiñci vatthumhi katā yā thuti saṃrādhanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2384_2: Parānuvattanādīhi aññassa yassa kassaci anuvattanādīhi nibbindena ubbegaṃ pattena appakate anadhigate
anya-e0812n:2384_3: buddhivisaye eva iha imasmiṃ kismiñci vatthumhi katā yā thuti saṃrādhanasaṅkhātā pasaṃsā atthi,
anya-e0812n:2388_5: Paramaññaṃ kiñci na sevanti sīleneti aparasevino.
anya-e0812n:2388_6: Paracittārādhanabyasanaparammukhā hariṇā vanesu sukhaṃ nirākulaṃ jīvantīti.
anya-e0812n:2389_2: Hariṇā migā aparasevino vuttiṃ nissāya paraṃ asevamānā anāyāsopalābhehi parapariggahābhāvato parasevāparissamaṃ
anya-e0812n:2389_3: vinā labbhanīyehi jaladabbaṅkurādibhi udakadabbaṅkurarukkhalatāpallavādīhi vanesu icchiticchitāraññesu
anya-e0812n:2389_5: Ettha rājasevābyasanappattena kenaci anadhigatāpi migajīvikā pasaṃsitā hoti.
anya-e0812n:2389_11: tāni ādi yesaṃ pallavādīnamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2393_2: Yattha vuttiyaṃ uttaraṃ uttaraṃ upariṭṭhānamupariṭṭhānaṃ pubbassa pubbassa visesanaṃ vidhinisedhanavasena ekāvali nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:2393_3: Ayaṃ ekāvali vidhinisedhato vidhivasena nisedhanavasena ca dvidhā.
anya-e0812n:2394_2: Yattha uttiyaṃ uttaraṃ uttaraṃ uparūparibhavaṃ padaṃ pubbapubbavisesanaṃ pubbapubbapadassa vidhinisedhanavasena visesanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:2394_4: Ayaṃ ekāvali vidhinisedhato vidhinisedhavasena dvidhā hotīti.
anya-e0812n:2394_5: Uttaraṃ pubbanti ṭhānūpacārena ṭhānībhūtaṃ padameva vuccati.
anya-e0812n:2394_7: ekato āvaliyanti saṃvaliyanti padāni etāyāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2394_8: vidhividhānañca nisedho paṭisedho cāti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2394_9: Ettha “uttaraṃ uttara”nti ca “pubbassa pubbassa”iti ca kamena visesanavisesyaguṇena byāpanicchāyaṃ nibbacanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2401_2: Ettha pādādīnaṃ visesyānaṃ nakhālirucirattādividhānena visesanena visesitabbattā ayaṃ vidhiekāvali.
anya-e0812n:2402_2: Satthuno pādā nakhālirucirā nakhapantīhi manuññā nakhālī nakhapantiyo raṃsibhāsurā raṃsīhi dibbamānā
anya-e0812n:2402_3: raṃsī kantiyo tamopahānekarasā andhakāravidhamane asahāyakiccā hutvā sobhantīti.
anya-e0812n:2402_4: Ettha pādādīnaṃ pubbapadānaṃ nakhālirucirattādividhāyakehi uttarauttaravisesanehi visesitattā ayaṃ vidhiekāvali nāma.
anya-e0812n:2402_9: so eko raso kiccaṃ etāsaṃ raṃsīnamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2409_2: Asantuṭṭho catupaccayasantosavasena yo koci yati nāma neva siyā.
anya-e0812n:2409_5: Yo jantūnaṃ sattānaṃ anantabyasanāvaho na hoti,
anya-e0812n:2409_7: Asantuṭṭhādīnaṃ yatittādinisedhanavasena visesanānaṃ pavattiyā nisedhaekāvali ayaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2410_2: Asantuṭṭho cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu dassitadvādasavidhasantosānaṃ aññatarena asantuṭṭho yati na eva bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
anya-e0812n:2410_3: Ālayāhato taṇhāya pahato santoso na hoti.
anya-e0812n:2410_4: Yo jantūnaṃ anantabyasanāvaho na yo sattānaṃ apariyantapīḷāpāpako na hoti,
anya-e0812n:2410_6: Asantuṭṭhādīnaṃ yatibhāvādipaṭisedhavasena visesanānaṃ pavattattā ayaṃ nisedhaekāvali nāma.
anya-e0812n:2410_8: yati na bhavatīti yatito aññesu sakalasattasaṅkhātesu avayavesu patiṭṭhāpanato “asantuṭṭho”ti visesyo,
anya-e0812n:2410_14: tāni ca tāni byasanāni ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2414_2: Yahiṃ sadisattaṃ vinā eva vatthunaṃ padatthānaṃ aññamaññaṃ bhūsiyabhūsattaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2415_2: Yahiṃ alaṅkāre sadisattaṃ vinā eva vatthunaṃ aññamaññaṃ tu bhūsiyabhūsattaṃ alaṅkāriyaalaṅkārattaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:2415_8: sasaṅkhye ceti “bhūsiyabhūsatta”nti imassa visesanaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2418_0: Mahantiṃ vindatī kantiṃ, sopi teneva tādisiṃ.
anya-e0812n:2420_2: Byāmaṃsumaṇḍalaṃ byāmapabhāmaṇḍalaṃ lokabandhunā tena muninā karaṇabhūtena mahantiṃ mahatiṃ pūjanīyaṃ vā kantiṃ sobhaṃ vindati sevati,
anya-e0812n:2420_3: sopi muni tena eva byāmaṃsumaṇḍalena tādisiṃ kantiṃ vindatīti.
anya-e0812n:2420_4: Aññamaññaṃ asadisānaṃ byāmaṃsumaṇḍalamunisaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnaṃ vatthūnaṃ byāmaṃsumaṇḍalaṃ paṭhamavākye alaṅkāriyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:2420_6: Aparavākye ime dve vipallāsena alaṅkāriyaalaṅkārā honti.
anya-e0812n:2422_0: Kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa, kriyāya ca guṇassa ca;
anya-e0812n:2425_2: Kriyāya guṇassa cāti dvinnaṃ sahabhāvassa sahattassa kathanaṃ sahavuttīti viññeyyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2425_3: Tadudāharaṇaṃ yathā tassa udāharaṇaṃ evaṃ vakkhamānanayena daṭṭhabbanti.
anya-e0812n:2425_8: Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ taṃsahattaṃ yassaṃ kriyāyaṃ guṇe vā bhavatīti sahattaṃ kriyāguṇānaṃ hotīti katvā “kathanaṃ
anya-e0812n:2425_9: sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa cā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2430_5: Ettha jalanavijambhanānaṃ ubhayasādhāraṇānaṃ kriyānaṃ sahabhāvo vihitoti kriyāsahavutti ayanti.
anya-e0812n:2431_2: Satthu satthuno nakhaṃsavo nakhakiraṇā candaraṃsīhi samaṃ jalanti,
anya-e0812n:2431_4: Ettha ubhayapadatthānaṃ sādhāraṇabhūtajalanavijambhanakriyānaṃ sahabhāvassa vuttattā esā kriyāsahavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n:2436_3: hetubhūtena vā dujjanacetasā saha pāpaṃ malinaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2436_4: sajjanacetasā saha disā dasavidhāpi suvimalā accantanimmalā suvimalayasomālāvalayitattā sajjanaceto pāpāpagameneti.
anya-e0812n:2436_5: Ettha malinattassa ca suvimalattassa ñāyasambandhino sahabhāvo vuttoti ayaṃ guṇasahavutti.
anya-e0812n:2437_3: karaṇabhūtena hetubhūtena vā pāpaṃ lobhādidhammaṃ dujjanacetasā dujjanānaṃ cittena saha malinaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2437_4: Imināyeva jinodayena disā dasa disāyo sajjanacetasā saha suvimalā sajjanacetasantānato pāpānaṃ apagamena
anya-e0812n:2437_6: guṇassa sahabhāvassa vuttattā esā guṇasahavutti nāma.
anya-e0812n:2437_11: santo ca te janā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2441_2: Virodhīnaṃ aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ kriyādīnaṃ yattha vuttivisese saṃsaggassa sannidhino dassanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2442_2: Yattha uttivisese samukkaṃsābhidhānatthaṃ vaṇṇanīyavatthugataadhikakathanāya virodhīnaṃ aññamaññaviruddhānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2442_3: padatthānaṃ kriyāguṇādīnaṃ saṃsaggadassanaṃ sanniṭṭhānadassanaṃ sambandhadassanaṃ hoti,
anya-e0812n:2446_2: Lokekabandhuno lokanāthassa sabhāvamadhurā sādhujanasampīṇanekacāturā api guṇā arahantatādayo sevitā
anya-e0812n:2446_3: pāpasevīhi tesaṃ pāpasevīnaṃ mānasaṃ sampadūsenti dosaduṭṭhāpādanavasenāvikaronti “tādiso guṇātisayo tassā”ti.
anya-e0812n:2446_4: Ettha guṇānaṃ sabhāvamadhurānaṃ pītivisesuppādanayoggānaṃ sampadūsanena saha virodhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2447_2: Lokekabandhuno buddhassa guṇā arahattādayo sabhāvamadhurā api pakatimadhurā api sevitā pāpasevīhi sevitā
anya-e0812n:2447_3: samānā pāpasevīnaṃ mānasaṃ sampadūsenti atisayena kopentīti.
anya-e0812n:2447_4: Evaṃ hīnādhimuttikehi sahitumasakkuṇeyyo tassa guṇātisayo vattati.
anya-e0812n:2447_5: Nanu sabhāvamadhuro guṇo pītiṃ vinā sampadūsanaṃ na kareyya,
anya-e0812n:2447_6: sampadūsanampi tādisasabhāvamadhuraṃ vinā na bhaveyyāti aññoññaviruddhānamesaṃ madhuraguṇasampadūsanakriyānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2447_10: eko ca so bandhu cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2449_0: Yassa kassaci dānena, yassa kassaci vatthuno;
anya-e0812n:2452_2: Yassa kassaci vatthuno khuddakavatthuno yassa kassaci paṭiggāhakassa dānena hetubhūtena visiṭṭhassa uttamavatthuno yaṃ ādānaṃ gahaṇaṃ atthi,
anya-e0812n:2455_0: Muninā samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsirī muninda samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsiriṃ (ka.).
anya-e0812n:2456_2: Ettha nayanādidānena sabbaññutāsiriyā ādānanti parivutti ayaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2457_2: Muninā purā pubbe paresaṃ manuññaṃ nayanādikaṃ datvāna idāni sabbaññutāsirī sabbaññutāsaṅkhātā anaññasādhāraṇā sirī samanupattāti.
anya-e0812n:2457_3: Iha yassa dinnaṃ tato eva gahaṇe parivuttisaddassa niruḷhattā nayanādīnaṃ dānena sabbaññutāsiriyā ādānato,
anya-e0812n:2457_4: dānābhāve ādānābhāvato ca paṭiggāhakajane avijjamānepi sabbaññutā vijjamānattena parikappitāti parivutti hoti.
anya-e0812n:2459_0: Ciraṃ citābhaṭo tesaṃ, yaso kumudapaṇḍaro”ti kābyādāsa 2.356.
anya-e0812n:2460_0: Imasmiṃ udāharaṇe paccatthikānaṃ āyudhappahāraṃ datvā tava bāhunā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ ciraṃ rāsikato keravanimmalo yaso ābhaṭoti.
anya-e0812n:2460_1: Dadāti kammayuttato eva ādānaṃ dassetvā parivuttiphuṭā katā.
anya-e0812n:2466_2: Viññātā puriso kiñci disvā ujjalanādikaṃ disvāna taṃsamaṃ tassa pure dissamānassa padatthassa sadisamaññaṃ
anya-e0812n:2466_3: vatthuṃ saṃsayāpagataṃ asannidhiṃ katvā paṭipajjati jānāti yattha visese,
anya-e0812n:2467_2: Yattha uttivisese viññātā avabodhakārako kiñci disāvilocanādikaṃ disvāna taṃsamaṃ vatthuṃ tena dissamānavatthunā
anya-e0812n:2467_3: tulyamaññaṃ vatthuṃ saṃsayāpagataṃ nissaṃsayaṃ katvā paṭipajjati jānāti,
anya-e0812n:2471_2: Jinassa pādesu nakhaṃsunā disāsu sabbāsu samaṃ ekato ujjalāsu sajotīsu tā ujjalā disā passantā janā,
anya-e0812n:2472_2: Jinapādanakhaṃsunā karaṇabhūtena disāsu dasasu samaṃ ekakkhaṇe ujjalāsu tā ujjalā disā passantā janā
anya-e0812n:2472_4: Vijjamānanakhamarīciyaṃ buddhimakatvā candātape buddhiyā pavattāpanato bhamo nāma.
anya-e0812n:2479_2: Kavīnaṃ vattūnaṃ bhāvabodhanaṃ adhippāyapakāsakaṃ yaṃ nāmādi nāmapadavisesanapadādi yena kenaci vaṇṇena
anya-e0812n:2479_3: ākārena sāgarādiatthantaraṃ paṭisedhetvā vā no vā pavuccate,
anya-e0812n:2479_7: Kavīnaṃ adhippāyasaṅkhātabhāvapakāsako uttiviseso tadatthena bhāvo nāma,
anya-e0812n:2479_8: tassa nissayabhūtaṃ nāmādipadasantānaṃ iha nissitopacārena bhāvo nāmāti īritaṃ.
