anya-e0812n:2485_6: Ettha na ime pakatisamuddādayo samuddādayo honti,
anya-e0812n:2485_7: ye palayakāle attano velānullaṅghanasaṅkhātaṃ acalattasaṅkhātañca mariyādaṃ pariccajanti.
anya-e0812n:2485_11: Koci vipattiṃ patto niratisayaṃ dhīrattamattanovabodhetīti aññanisedhena kathitaṃ nāmaṃ kavisabhāvaṃ yathāvuttaṃ bodhetīti bhāvoyamiti.
anya-e0812n:2486_2: Sāgarā saṃvaṭṭakāle tīramariyādaṃ atikkamentā pakatisamuddā sāgarā na bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:2486_3: Kulācalā tādisakāle acalasaṅkhātamariyādamatikkamentā satta kulapabbatā kulācalā nāma na bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:2486_5: Ye sādhavo saṃvaṭṭepi sabbavatthuvināsakakappavināsakālepi mariyādaṃ attano ācāramariyādaṃ manampi īsakampi no jahanti.
anya-e0812n:2486_6: Santā eva te sāgarādayo nāma honti nanūti.
anya-e0812n:2486_7: Koci byasanaṃ patto attano anaññasādhāraṇaṃ dhīrattaṃ pakāsetīti iha sāgarādiatthantarapaṭisedharūpena
anya-e0812n:2486_8: dassitasāgarādinā vattuno akampanādhippāyaṃ avabodhetīti ayaṃ bhāvālaṅkāro nāma.
anya-e0812n:2490_4: tesaṃ bhāvo aṅgaṅgibhāvo sādhiyasādhanattaṃ, tato ca.
anya-e0812n:2490_6: tesaṃ bhāvo aṅgaṅgibhāvamantarena appadhānabhāvenāvaṭṭhānaṃ tato ca hetuto.
anya-e0812n:2491_3: sādhiyasādhanabhāvaṃ vinā samānabalavantabhāvena ca bandhane pajjādibandhanavisaye alaṅkatīnaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2491_6: Aṅgaṃ sādhanaṃ assa sādhiyassa atthīti ca,
anya-e0812n:2495_0: Aho gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
anya-e0812n:2496_2: Munino pādesu nakhā tesaṃ raṃsi eva mahānadīsadisattā mahānadī,
anya-e0812n:2496_3: sā pasatthā acchariyappattisabbhāvato gāḷhamaccantaṃ nimuggepi te jane sukhayatyeva,
anya-e0812n:2496_5: “Ayaṃ attani gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi sukhayatī”ti ettha “nimuggepī”ti samādhino sādhiyattenaṅgitāyāvaṭṭhitassa
anya-e0812n:2497_2: Munino pasatthā acchariyattā pasaṃsanīyā pādanakharaṃsimahānadī caraṇanakhakiraṇasaṅkhātamahāgaṅgā gāḷhaṃ
anya-e0812n:2497_3: atisayena nimuggepi te jane sādhusappurise sukhayati eva sukhite kato eva.
anya-e0812n:2497_6: sādhanabhāvena aṅganti katvā aṅgāaṅgībhāvena imesaṃ alaṅkārānaṃ missitā.
anya-e0812n:2497_9: mahatī ca sā nadī ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2497_10: mahānadī viya mahānadī pādanakharaṃsiyo eva mahānadīti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2497_14: Sukhasamaṅgino janā sukhite sukhe karotīti vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2501_0: Madhūvamunino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2503_2: Munino sabhāvamadhuro pakatimadhuro veso jināveṇiko buddhaveso ca nettarasāyanaṃ rūpaṃ lakkhaṇānubyañjanasampannaṃ
anya-e0812n:2503_3: rūpañca madhūva madhurattena madhusamānā vācā bhāratī ca kaṃ janaṃ na sampīṇetīti.
anya-e0812n:2503_6: “madhūvā”ti upamālaṅkāro cāti ime tayo pīṇane aññamaññāpekkharahitattā tulyabalāti imesaṃ missattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2503_9: raso rasabhūto āyanaṃ gati pavatti assāti rasāyanaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2509_2: Iṭṭhassa abhimatassa vatthuno āsīsanaṃ patthanamityanuvaditvā āsī nāma siyāti vidhīyate.
anya-e0812n:2509_4: Tilokassa lokattayavattino janassa ekagati asahāyagati paṭisaraṇabhūto nātho lokaṃ sattalokaṃ apāyato pātu pāletūti.
anya-e0812n:2510_2: Iṭṭhassa atthassa icchitavatthuno āsīsanā patthanā āsī nāma siyā.
anya-e0812n:2510_4: Tilokekagati tibhavassa asahāyasaraṇabhūto nātho lokasāmi lokaṃ sattalokaṃ apāyato pātu rakkhatūti.
anya-e0812n:2514_2: Yaṃ vibhūsanamalaṅkaraṇaṃ rasābhāsādino patītijanakaṃ avagamasampādakaṃ jāyate,
anya-e0812n:2514_3: taṃ vibhūsanaṃ rasavantavidhānato sampādanato “rasavanta”nti viññeyyaṃ yathā atthappatīti janako saddo “atthavā”ti.
anya-e0812n:2515_2: Yaṃ vibhūsanaṃ vuttālaṅkārānamantare yo koci alaṅkāro rasappatītijanakaṃ siṅgārādinavavidharasesu ekassa
anya-e0812n:2515_3: rasassa vā tasseva rasābhāsassa vā avabodhanaṃ sampādento jāyate,
anya-e0812n:2515_4: taṃ vibhūsanaṃ rasavantavidhānato attano rasasahitabhāvassa pakāsanato rasavantanti rasīti ñeyyanti.
anya-e0812n:2515_6: evaṃ rasappatītijanako alaṅkāro rasavanto “rasī”ti ca vuccati.
anya-e0812n:2521_6: Dutiye tu rāgānatañca taṃ abbhutasarojaṃ pathaviṃ bhinditvā sirīpādasampaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ uṭṭhahamacchariyapadumañca,
anya-e0812n:2521_13: raṃsinā vā gāḷhaṃ ādāya gahetvā satataṃ niccaṃ āhito sambhamo ādaro,
anya-e0812n:2521_24: Tatra pādānaṃ kāmukattaṃ dharāya kāminittañca vākyasāmatthiyā viññāyate.
anya-e0812n:2521_27: ratyukkaṃsābhāso yadi kavinā paṭipādetabbo na bhaveyya,
anya-e0812n:2521_28: tadā gāthāyamananupapannaṃ siyāti evaṃvidhavacanatova pādā ratyābhāsavantoti gamyate.
anya-e0812n:2521_30: rammadesādivisesābhāve acchariyapadumuggamanābhāvato abbhutasarojasaddasavanena gammamānā rammadesādayo uddīpanavibhāvābhāsā,
anya-e0812n:2521_32: Tathā hi “niccasarasena karena gāḷhaṃ ādāyā”ti karassa sarasatāgāḷhaggahaṇakathanena harisādayo gamyante.
anya-e0812n:2521_33: “Satatāhitasambhamenā”ti iminā ussukkattādayo pahīyantīti evaṃ bandhavuttīti vibhāvādīhi bandhatthābhāsānaṃ manasi yo uppajjati ānandābhāso,
anya-e0812n:2522_1: Idāni udāharaṇaṃ dassento uttaripi dassetabbasiṅgārahassakaruṇādirasuddesassa anurūpato siṅgārarasayuttameva dasseti “rāgā”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n:2522_2: Dharāya mahīaṅganāya rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ rāgena anurāgena abhimukhaṃ katvā namitaṃ acchariyaguṇopetapadumasadisānanaṃ no ce,
anya-e0812n:2522_3: rattavaṇṇaṃ ānataṃ abbhutasarojasaṅkhatamukhaṃ tilokaguruno bhuvanattayānusāsakassa sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0812n:2522_5: pubbakammena kataadhikarattavaṇṇā niccasarasena karena satatānurāgayuttena hatthena no ce,
anya-e0812n:2522_6: avikalattā satatasampattisahitena kiraṇena gāḷhaṃ ādāya gāḷhaṃ gahetvā no ce,
anya-e0812n:2522_7: phusitvā satatāhitasambhamena niccaṃ katādarena no ce,
anya-e0812n:2523_2: tena sadisatāya abbhutasarojañca taṃ mukhañceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2523_10: rāgo anurāgo rattavaṇṇo vā yesamiti ca,
anya-e0812n:2523_11: rasena anurāgena sampattiyā vā saha vattamānoti ca,
anya-e0812n:2523_12: āhito vihito ca so sambhamo ādaro tadabhimukhabhāvo vā ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2524_0: Ettha “rāgānatā”tiādikena silesālaṅkārena ca “abbhutasarojamukha”nti rūpakālaṅkārena ca sambhogasiṅgārarasābhāso uppādīyati.
anya-e0812n:2524_2: tadākārena ca kappitattā rasābhāso nāmāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n:2524_3: Siṅgārassa āyogavippayogasambhogavasena tividhattepi āyogavippayogadvayaṃ vippalambhamevāti vippalambho,
anya-e0812n:2524_8: Evaṃ sante payogaṃ katvā kurumānāya vaṇṇanāya ucitabhāvena ihādhigatasambhogasiṅgārarasābhāsena rasibhūtālaṅkārassa
anya-e0812n:2524_10: Pādānaṃ kāmukabhāvābhāse ca dharāya kāminībhāvābhāse ca vācakapadena avuttepi “dharāya pādā tilokaguruno”ti
anya-e0812n:2525_0: Dvinnaṃ aññamaññaṃ ratiābhāso “adhikabaddharāgā rāgānata”nti imehi vutto.
anya-e0812n:2525_1: Ayaṃ ratiābhāso idha ṭhāyībhāvo purisaratiyā itthiyā ca,
anya-e0812n:2525_2: itthiratiyā purisassa ca ālambaṇattā pādakāmukadharākāminiyo dve aññamaññaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvābhāsā honti.
anya-e0812n:2525_3: Rammadesādivisesaṃ vinā acchariyapadumodayassa abhāvato abbhutasarojasaddassa uccāraṇena gammamānā rammadesādayo
anya-e0812n:2525_5: “Niccasarasena karena gāḷhamādāyā”ti iminā karassa sarasabhāvassa ca gāḷhaṃ gahaṇassa ca vuttattā harisādayo ñāyante.
anya-e0812n:2525_8: Te byabhicārībhāvābhāse pakāsentāni yathāvuttakavivacanāni anubhāvābhāsā nāmāti evaṃ bandhe dissamānaṭhāyībhāvabyabhicārībhāvavibhāvaanubhāvehi
anya-e0812n:2525_9: atthāvabodhaṃ karontānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ uppajjamāno yo santosābhāsasaṅkhāto rasābhāso atthi,
anya-e0812n:2535_1: Evamuddesānukkamena yathāpaṭiññātaṃ niṭṭhapetvā idāni nigamanapubbakaṃ bahuttamesaṃ niddisitumāha “icci”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:2535_2: Iti iminā vuttappakārena purimānaṃ daṇḍīādīnaṃ ācariyānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ bandhalakkhaṇāni anugamma anugantvā
anya-e0812n:2535_3: alaṅkatīnamalaṅkārānaṃ ayaṃ bhedo saṅkhepato nigadito kathito.
anya-e0812n:2535_6: Uparūpari dīghakālamārabbha yāvedāni matthakamatthake kavīhi vikappiyānaṃ pabhediyamānānaṃ tāsamalaṅkatīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:2535_7: antaṃ pariyantaṃ passituṃ khalu ekantena ko nāma jano alaṃ samattho.
anya-e0812n:2538_1: Evaṃ uddesakkamena yathāpaṭiññāte atthālaṅkāre niṭṭhapetvā idāni nigamanamukhena esaṃ atthālaṅkārānaṃ bahubhāvaṃ dasseti “iccānugamma”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n:2538_2: Iti yathāvuttanayena purimācariyānubhāvaṃ pubbakālikānaṃ daṇḍībhaddapāṇādīnaṃ alaṅkārasatthasaṅkhātānubhāvaṃ
anya-e0812n:2538_3: anugamma alaṅkatīnaṃ ayaṃ bhedo saṅkhepato nigadito mayā vutto saṅgahito.
anya-e0812n:2538_5: Uparūpari dīghakālato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā kavīhi racanākattārehi vikappiyānaṃ anekappakārato kappiyamānattā
anya-e0812n:2538_6: puthakkariyamānānaṃ tāsamalaṅkatīnaṃ antaṃ pariyantaṃ passituṃ khalu ekantena ko nāma puggalo alaṃ samatthoti.
anya-e0812n:2538_7: Saṅgahamanādiyitvā kenāpi pariyantaṃ adhigantuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2538_9: purimā ca te ācariyā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2545_1: Tadeva yathāpaṭiññātamalaṅkāravibhāgaṃ bodhetvā sampati rasavantālaṅkārappasaṅgenādhigataṃ rasaṃ sakala
anya-e0812n:2545_12: Yato ocityaṃ nāma kavīnaṃ paramaṃ rahassaṃ lokavohārepi ucitaññūyeva pasaṃsīyate,
anya-e0812n:2545_13: samucitalokavohārānusāreneva ca vakkhamānānukkamena viracitā racanā sacetanānaṃ rasassādāya sampajjate,
anya-e0812n:2545_14: tasmā ocitye samullasattaṃ dittaṃ phuṭameva bandhanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0812n:2546_3: luddhānaṃ saddhābāhullasuddhasaṃyamānaṃ vimukhepi lakkhaṇamattapariññāṇena lokavohāresu asammohatthaṃ
anya-e0812n:2546_5: Paṭibhānavatā sarasaracanāya accantopakāraṭṭhānocitapaññāvisesavatā lokavohāramanusārinā sakalaloke vohārānurūpamanugatena
anya-e0812n:2546_6: tato yasmā ocityaṃ nāma hadayato abahi kātabbaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2546_8: Tasmā paramatisayena ocityasamullāsavedinā ucitabhāvena vattumicchitatthassa uddīpanasseva anurūpappakārena
anya-e0812n:2546_9: iṭṭhatthassa samullāsanaṃ dittiṃ jānantena kavinā bandhakārakena nibandhāti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:2546_11: tato jātakabbassapi paṭibhāti vuccamānattā ayaṃ paññāviseso racanāya accantopakāroti ñātabbo.
anya-e0812n:2550_2: Ṭhāyino vakkhamānaratyādayo tehi saha sambandho vibhāvādīhi yoge ratyādīnamassādiyattamānīyamānattā etesamatthīti ṭhāyīsambandhino.
anya-e0812n:2551_3: tena vāccaratihāsādiatthena vā sambandhupagatā sānubhāvakā vakkhamānānubhāvehi saha pavattā bhāvavibhāvā
anya-e0812n:2551_4: vakkhamānabhāvavibhāvā nibandhā vuttaguṇopetakavinā bandhitā ekattha āharitvā dassitā sādhunaṃ issādidosarahitānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2551_5: sajjanānaṃ rasassādāya siṅgārādivakkhamānarasassa assādanatthaṃ sampajjanti pavattantīti.
anya-e0812n:2551_6: Imāya gāthāya ṭhāyībhāvo byabhicārībhāvo kevalabhāvo vibhāvo anubhāvo raso ceti ime uddiṭṭhā bhavanti,
anya-e0812n:2551_9: tena bhāvassa ṭhāyī ca so bhāvo ceti ca ṭhāyīpadena sambandhattā ṭhāyībhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n:2551_10: puna byabhicārībhāve sati “ṭhāyībhāvo”ti imassa sādhakattā imasseva ṭhāyībhāvapadassa payogasāmatthiyena gammamāno byabhicārībhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n:2551_11: puna ṭhāyīpadena samāsamakatvā visuṃ dassitabhāvasaddasutiyā ṭhāyībhāvabyabhicārībhāvehi añño bhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n:2551_12: tathā eva ṭhāyīpadena vāccaratihāsādiatthassa uppattiuddīpanadvayaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā sajjetvā ṭhitattā
anya-e0812n:2551_13: tehi ratihāsādīhi atthehi sambandhino ālambaṇauddīpanasaṅkhatavividhavibhāvā ca,
anya-e0812n:2551_15: “rasassādāyā”ti iminā niddiṭṭharaso cāti evamime ṭhāyībhāvādayo uddiṭṭhā honti.
anya-e0812n:2556_1: Idāni yathāuddiṭṭhesu ṭhāyādīhi bhāvavibhāvānubhāvarasesu paṭhamaṃ bhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ bhāvasaddamanvatthayati “citta”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n:2556_8: Ettha hi ṇyanto bhūdhātu karaṇe vattate.
anya-e0812n:2556_9: Yato cāyaṃ na kevalaṃ karaṇeyeva vattate,
anya-e0812n:2556_13: Atha vā kavino lokaṭṭhitiñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ adhippāyaṃ bhāvayanti paṭipādentīti bhāvāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n:2557_1: Idāni uddiṭṭhesu ṭhāyībhāvādīsu ṭhāyīādīnaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ (ka.) tiṇṇaṃ sādhāraṇo bhāvo nāma esoti dassento anvatthavasena dasseti “citta”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:2557_4: thambhādīhi ca ākārehi pavattisaṅkhātā aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarākārasaṅkhātā visesā pana ṭhāyībyabhicārīsāttikā
anya-e0812n:2557_5: yato yasmā rase siṅgārādirase bhāvayanti nipphādenti karonti. No ce,
anya-e0812n:2557_6: rase siṅgārādirasavisaye paṇḍitānaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayanti byāpanaṃ karonti. No ce,
anya-e0812n:2557_7: tasmiṃyeva rasavisaye kavino lokasabhāvaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattañāṇalakkhaṇaṃ adhippāyaṃ bhāvayanti paṭipādanaṃ karonti.
anya-e0812n:2557_8: Tato bhāvasaddena hetukattari nipphannena ratyādayo ratihāsādayo parikittitā bharatādīhi vuttā hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2564_2: Virodhinā aññena jigucchādinā bhāvena yo bhāvo ratyādiko na tirohito nacchādito,
anya-e0812n:2564_3: eso bhāvo anucchijjamānattā eva tiṭṭhati sīlenāti,
anya-e0812n:2564_4: ṭhāyī eva bhāvoti ṭhāyībhāvoti saddito kathito.
anya-e0812n:2565_2: Virodhinā aññabhāvena ratihāsādīnaṃ viruddhena jigucchādinā aññabhāvena yo bhāvo ratihāsādiko tirohito na byavahito na hoti,
anya-e0812n:2565_3: eso viruddhabhāvena abyavahito bhāvo tiṭṭhati sīlenāti iminā atthena ṭhāyī nāma hotīti katvā ṭhāyībhāvoti saddito kathitoti.
anya-e0812n:2565_4: Yo vibhāvānubhāvādīhi assādanīyattaṃ pāpito sabbhehi assādanīyattā rasoti vuccati,
anya-e0812n:2565_6: Añño ca so bhāvo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2565_8: ṭhāyī ca so bhāvo ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2572_2: Samo ceti evaṃ ṭhāyino navāti yojanā.
anya-e0812n:2572_3: Navevete sakasakavibhāvānubhāvehi samullāsitā visumpi bandhitabbā kavinā,
anya-e0812n:2572_6: Tattha yadi panāyaṃ rati asesaitthipurisaguṇayuttānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ aññamaññaṃ janitā,
anya-e0812n:2572_9: sakasakānubhāvasāmatthiyā patīyamānehi anekarūpehi byabhicārīhi cittatā siyā,
anya-e0812n:2572_12: Evaṃ yathāyogaṃ hāsādiṭhāyībhāvānaṃ hassarasādibhāvāpajjane yuttiṃ samanneyya.
anya-e0812n:2573_2: Ratihāsā ca soko ca kodhussāhabhayampi ca jigucchāvimhayā ceva samo santaguṇo cāti evaṃ ṭhāyino nava honti.
anya-e0812n:2573_3: Imesaṃ ratyādīnaṃ navannaṃ sarūpakathanaṃ “siṅgārahassakaruṇā”tiādikāya uddesagāthāya anantare niddese pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0812n:2573_5: kodho ca ussāho ca bhayañceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2573_6: jigucchā ca vimhayā ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2573_7: Ime nava ca evaṃ byabhicārībhāvasāttikābhāvo ceti ime yathāsakamanurūpavibhāvānubhāvehi dittaṃ katvā paccekaṃ kavinā bandhitabbā,
anya-e0812n:2573_9: Imesu tividhabhāvesu ayaṃ rati asesapumitthiguṇehi yuttehi naranārīhi aññamaññaṃ uppāditā,
anya-e0812n:2573_13: Īdisā’yaṃ rati naṭassa abhinayena ca pasatthabandhasavanena ca sabbhehi assādiyamānasiṅgārādirasattaṃ pāpuṇātīti viññātabbā.
anya-e0812n:2573_14: Hāsādīnaṃ sesaṭhāyībhāvānaṃ hassarasādibhāvāpattiyaṃ yutti evaṃ yathārahaṃ veditabbāti.
anya-e0812n:2580_2: Tirobhāvo ṭhāyīnaṃ ekassāpi bhāvassa nibbedādino aciraṭṭhāyitā ca āvibhāvo pākaṭatā ca nānārasanissayattā te ādayo yassa.
anya-e0812n:2580_7: Tathā hi ratiyaṃ parisamo sukhānuviddho bhavati,
anya-e0812n:2580_9: Ratiyaṃ sukhasabhāvāpi gilānippabhutayo byabhicārino sakammaṃ dukkhamimaṃ samāropayanteva.
anya-e0812n:2580_10: Tato tena abhimukhabhāvena ye ete bhāvā sīlena caranti pavattanti,
anya-e0812n:2581_2: Tirobhāvāvibhāvādivisesena byabhicārībhāvānaṃ attano anekarasaṃ nissāya pavattattā,
anya-e0812n:2581_3: lokassa bhinnarucikattā ca kismiñci ṭhāyībhāve byabhicārībhāvānamattano guṇassa līnattañca kismiñci tasseva
anya-e0812n:2581_4: guṇassa pākaṭattañcātiādikena visesena abhimukhyato ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ sukhadukkharūpaṃ attani ca attano sukhadukkharūpaṃ
anya-e0812n:2581_5: ṭhāyībhāvesu ca āropanasaṅkhātena abhimukhabhāvena yete bhāvā sīlena caranti pakatiyā pavattanti,
anya-e0812n:2581_7: Evameva evarūpā (ka.) pīḷā sarūpena eko parisamasaṅkhatabyabhicārībhāvo ratiyaṃ saguṇena līno sukhānuviddho hutvā,
anya-e0812n:2581_8: soke saguṇena pākaṭo dukkhānuviddho ca hutvā pavattate.
anya-e0812n:2581_9: Evameva sukhasabhāvaratiyaṃ gilānādayo byabhicārino sakiyaṃ dukkhasarūpaṃ āropentīti katvā tirobhāvavibhāvādivisesena abhimukhaṃ pavattanti.
anya-e0812n:2581_13: te ādayo yassa ṭhāyībhāvesu vijjamānānaṃ sukhadukkhasabhāvānaṃ attani āropanasseti ca,
anya-e0812n:2581_16: Byabhicārīpade visaddo visesatthe abhisaddo abhimukhabhāve vattati.
anya-e0812n:2592_8: Tañca saha biḷāya vattatīti sabiḷanti ete yathāvuttabyabhicārībhāvā tettiṃsa hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2592_10: Bhīrunā tu sova bhayānakarasavaseneti lokasabhāvassa anekattā tadatthamete byabhicārino ekekassarasassa bahavo vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n:2592_11: yato taṃvaṇṇanādvārena sabbopi tesu kiñci assādetīti.
anya-e0812n:2592_12: Tattha yasmā pana māraṇopagataveridassanamekameva taṅkhaṇeyeva bhinnaṃ pakativasena bhīruno bhayassa hetu,
anya-e0812n:2592_14: Tathā naṭena kataṃ vikatamābharaṇaṃ kriyāvā nīcapakatīnaṃ ṭhāyino hāsassa hetu,
anya-e0812n:2592_16: tasmā bhāve vaṇṇayatā kavinā bhāvā tathā vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n:2593_1: Tassa ca itthīnañca nīcānañca dāliddiyaṃ vibhāvo,
anya-e0812n:2594_0: Takko vitakkanaṃ. Tassa sandeho vibhāvo, sirokampādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2596_0: Samo khedo. Tattha gatyādi vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2597_0: Dhiti santoso. Ñāṇādi vibhāvo, anubhāvo bhogālolatādi.
anya-e0812n:2598_0: Jaḷatā appaṭipatti. Tassā iṭṭhāniṭṭhadassanādi vibhāvo, animisanayanālocanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2599_0: Dīnatā cetaso anojatā. Tassā vibhāvo duggatatādi, anubhāvo malinavatthatādi.
anya-e0812n:2600_0: Uggatā dāruṇattaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo balavāparādhādi, tassa anubhāvo tajjanādi.
anya-e0812n:2603_0: Tāso cittakkhobho. Vibhāvo assa gajjitādi, kampanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2605_0: Kālakkhamatā ussukaṃ. Vibhāvo tassa ramaṇīyadassanicchādi, anubhāvo turitatādi.
anya-e0812n:2606_0: Cetopasādo harito. Tatra ussavādi vibhāvo, assusedādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2608_0: Paresamukkaṃsāsahanatā issā. Tassā dujjanattagabbādayo vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2609_0: Visādo khedo. Vibhāvo tassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhādi, bādhayatāpādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2610_0: Abahitthā kāyasaṃvaraṇaṃ. Tassā vibhāvo lajjādi, anubhāvo’ññavikriyā.
anya-e0812n:2612_0: Gabbo abhimāno. Vibhāvossa issariyādi, anubhāvo avajānanādi.
anya-e0812n:2613_0: Apamāro gāharukkhādīhi gāharukkhapatanādīhi (?), bhūpātādayo ettha anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2614_0: Amariso akkhamatā. Vibhāvo assāvamānanādi, sirokampanatajjanādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2615_0: Mado pamādukkaṃso. Tassa vibhāvo pānaṃ, calamānaṅgavacogatihāsādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2616_0: Mati kaṅkhacchedo. Upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhavikāsādi ettha anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2617_0: Asamekkhitakāritā ummādo. Tassa vibhāvo sannipātagahaṇādi, aṭṭhānaruditagītahāsādayo anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2621_0: Capalatā rāgadosādīhi, sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo. Byādhi pākaṭo.
anya-e0812n:2622_0: Ye vā panaññe idha niddiṭṭhā cittavuttivisesāpi saṃvijjanti sukhumabhedā,
anya-e0812n:2622_2: Yathā hi icchāsabhāvā sabbe kāmā ratiyaṃ antogadhā,
anya-e0812n:2622_12: tathā mohā palayo vakkhamāno aññoti mantabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2623_4: samadhitijaḷatā parisamo santosalakkhaṇā dhiti jaḷatā ca,
anya-e0812n:2623_16: sabiḷaṃ lajjāsahitaṃ maraṇasacapalābyādhi maraṇañca cāpalyasahitā byādhi ceti.
anya-e0812n:2623_19: samo ca dhiti ca jaḷatā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2623_20: dīnatā ca uggo ca alasattañcāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2623_21: ussukañcahariso ca sati ca issā ca visādo ca abahitthā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2623_22: amariso ca mado ca mati ca ummādo ca moho ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2624_0: Lokasabhāvassa anekavidhattā ekoyeva vīraraso ussāhavatā vīrarasākārena assādanīyo hoti,
anya-e0812n:2624_2: Tasmā ekekassa rasassa ime bahū byabhicārino vaṇṇetabbā honti.
anya-e0812n:2624_3: Evaṃ sati anekādhippāyako loko tesu kiñci assādeti.
anya-e0812n:2624_4: Evaṃ sati bandho sabbajanassa kanto hoti.
anya-e0812n:2624_5: Tassaṃ bhāvavaṇṇanāyaṃ yasmā māretumāgacchantānaṃ sattūnaṃ dassanamekameva taṅkhaṇe janādhippāyato bhijjitvā
anya-e0812n:2624_6: pakatibhīrūnaṃ purisānaṃ bhayassa ca yuddhalolassa ussāhanassa ca kāraṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2624_7: Evaṃ naṭena hasanatthaṃ katavikatamābharaṇañca tādisakiriyā ca uttānapakatikānaṃ purisānaṃ ṭhāyīhāsassa
anya-e0812n:2624_8: ca gambhīrapakatikānaṃ byabhicārīhāsassa ca hetu bhaveyya.
anya-e0812n:2624_9: Tasmā bhāve vaṇṇentena kavinā ocityabhaṅgamakatvā sakkaccamocityaṃ sajjetvā bhāvappakāsakāni savibhāvānubhāvakavivacanāni vaṇṇetabbāni.
anya-e0812n:2624_10: Ettha bhāvāvabodhakavibhāvādīnaṃ jānitabbattā tehi tehi bhāvehi saddhiṃ evaṃ veditabbā.
anya-e0812n:2626_0: Vitakkassa sandeho uddīpanavibhāvo nāma, sirokampādikaṃ anubhāvo nāma.
anya-e0812n:2627_2: Upari “vibhāvo”ti vutte ālambaṇuddīpanesu dvīsu yaṃ yujjati,
anya-e0812n:2628_0: Khedalakkhaṇassa samassa gamanādikaṃ vibhāvo, sedādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2629_0: Santosalakkhaṇāya dhitiyā ñāṇādi vibhāvo, bhogesu alolabhāvādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2631_0: Cittassanittejalakkhaṇāya dīnatāya duggatatādi vibhāvo, malinavatthatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2636_0: Pīḷāsaṅkhātassa gilānassa āyāsapipāsādi vibhāvo, dubbaṇṇatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2637_0: Anurūpakālassa anolokanassa ussukkassa rammavatthudassanicchādi vibhāvo, turitatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2638_0: Cetopasādalakkhaṇassa harisassa maṅgalakīḷādi vibhāvo, santosavacanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2639_0: Saraṇalakkhaṇāya satiyā saññāṇadassanādi vibhāvo, bhamukkhepādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2640_0: Parasampattiasahanalakkhaṇāya issāya dujjanabhāvagabbādi vibhāvo, dosakathanāvajānanādi anubhavo.
anya-e0812n:2641_0: Khedalakkhaṇassa visādassa āraddhakāriyāsiddhikāriyabyāpattiādi vibhāvo, manosantāpādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2643_0: Cintāya iṭṭhatthālābhādī vibhāvo, makulitanayanādi adhokhittacakkhādi vā anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2646_0: Akkhamalakkhaṇassa amarisassa avamānanādi vibhāvo, sirokampanatajjanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2648_0: Kaṅkhācchedanalakkhaṇāya matiyā upadesādi vibhāvo, mukhasantosādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2650_0: Muyhanalakkhaṇassa mohassa adhikabhayādi vibhāvo, sabhāvānavabodhanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2651_0: Niddāpagamasaṅkhātassa vibodhassa kālapariṇāmādi ālokasaraṇādi vā vibhāvo, akkhimaddanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2652_0: Manosampīḷanalakkhaṇāya niddāya kassaci acintanaakaraṇādi vibhāvo, akkhipidahanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2653_0: Bhayāgamanalakkhaṇassa āvegassa paccatthikadassanādi vibhāvo, utrāsakampādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2654_0: Lajjālakkhaṇāya biḷāya durācārādi vibhāvo, adhomukhatādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2656_0: Cāpallassa rāgadosādi vibhāvo, attano sacchandacaraṇādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2657_0: Byādhiyā vātapittādīnaṃ ussadabhāvādi vibhāvo, nitthunanādi anubhāvo.
anya-e0812n:2658_0: Imasmiṃ subodhālaṅkāre adassitasukhumabhedā aññāpi cittavuttivisesā santi,
anya-e0812n:2658_5: Evaṃ samānānaṃ saṅgahe satipi tāsato bhayassa ca,
anya-e0812n:2658_11: mohato vakkhamānapalayassa ca pākaṭavisesena aññathā visuṃ visuṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2663_2: Samāhito ekaggatābhāvāpādanena katasamādhāno attā cittaṃ tato pabhavaṃ uppannaṃ yaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2663_4: Tena sattena upapāditā nibbattitā thambhādayo sāttikā vuccante.
anya-e0812n:2663_8: Evaṃ satyapi te sāttikā visuṃ puthageva bhāvā bhavanti,
anya-e0812n:2664_2: Samāhitattappabhavaṃ ekaggatābhāvāpādanena katasamādhānacittato sambhūtaṃ sattaṃ nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:2664_3: Tena lābhālābhādīsu ekākārassa hetunā thirabhāvena upapāditā nipphāditā thambhādayo sāttikā nāma bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:2664_5: satipi visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti yathāvutta “cittavuttivisesā tu,
anya-e0812n:2664_6: bhāvayanti rase yato”tiādinā bhāvā nāma hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2664_8: Samāhito ca so attā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2664_10: santo upasanto ca so attā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2672_2: Thambho kāyacittānaṃ avisarabhāvasaṅkhāto ca palayaromañcā niddāya uppajjamānaassāsapassāsamattātirittasuttāvatthā
anya-e0812n:2672_3: ca pasādādisambhavo romuggamo ca tathā evaṃ sedassuvepathu ca bhayādīhi uppajjamānadāho ca santosādīhi
anya-e0812n:2672_4: uppajjamānaassu ca kampā ca vevaṇṇiyaṃ virūpatā ca vissaratā virūpasaddatā cāti ete aṭṭha sāttikā bhāvā
anya-e0812n:2672_9: sedo ca assu ca vepathu cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2678_3: Bhavanti byabhicārinoti yathāyogaṃ yathāsambandhaṃ byabhicārino hontīti attho.
anya-e0812n:2679_1: Idāni nibbedādayo viya ratihāsādayopi kismiñci kāle byabhicārinopi hontīti dasseti “yadā” iccādinā.
anya-e0812n:2679_2: Ratyādayo ratihāsādayo bhāvā nava ṭhāyībhāvā yadā ṭhitisīlā na honti ce virodhīhi tehi tehi bhāvantarehi
anya-e0812n:2679_3: byavahitattā sabhāvato ṭhitisabhāvā yadi na honti,
anya-e0812n:2679_4: tadā te bhāvā ratyādayo sabbepi byabhicārino bhavantīti.
anya-e0812n:2679_7: ṭhiti sīlaṃ yesaṃ ratyādīnamiti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2685_3: tathā uddīpane ca kāraṇaṃ ālambaṇauddīpanavasena duvidho vibhāvo nāma.
anya-e0812n:2685_6: Tesaṃ bodhako ñāpako kāyiko ca vācasiko ca byāpāro siyā,
anya-e0812n:2686_2: Tesaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ uppattiyā ca tathā uddīpane ca uppannānaṃ dīpane ca kāraṇaṃ ālambaṇauddīpanavasena duvidho hetu vibhāvo nāma,
anya-e0812n:2686_3: tesaṃ ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ bodhako kāyikavācasiko yo siyā naṭakavīnaṃ byāpāro atthi,
anya-e0812n:2686_7: Ettha vibhāvo nāma rativisaye naranārīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ ālambaṇavibhāvo,
anya-e0812n:2686_10: Anubhāvo nāma ṭhāyībhāvādīnaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāvānaṃ pakāsakavācasikabyāpārasaṅkhātakavipayogo ca kāyikapayogabhūto
anya-e0812n:2686_11: naṭānaṃ abhinayasaṅkhāto taṃtaṃbhāvasarūpanirūpako ceti duvidho byāpāro.
anya-e0812n:2690_2: aññathā “devadattassa sāssulocanayugaṃ sañjāta”miti vutte sokā ānandā rogā ceti ko nāma sakkoti kāraṇaṃ nicchituṃ,
anya-e0812n:2690_3: cittavuttivisesañca bhāvaṃ vinā vibhāvānubhāvaṃ kavi vaṇṇetuṃ naṭobhinetuṃ sāmajjiko vā viññātuṃ ko sakkotīti dassetumāha “neka”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:2690_4: Nekahetuṃ bahuhetuṃ manovuttivisesañca bhāvaṃ vibhāvituṃ pakāsetuṃ vibhāvānubhāvā vuttalakkhaṇā bandhane sabhāvanirūpakapade phuṭaṃ vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n:2691_1: “Devadattassa cakkhūni assupuṇṇānī”ti vutte sokena santosena rogena vāti yathā assukāraṇakathanaṃ vinā na jānāti,
anya-e0812n:2691_2: evaṃ cittassa pavattisaṅkhātā ratihāsādayo te te bhāvā attano patītiyānurūpaṃ vibhāvānubhāvakathanaṃ vinā kavīhi vaṇṇetabbā,
anya-e0812n:2691_4: sabbhehi assādanīyā natthīti ṭhāyīādīnaṃ vaṇṇanameva kātabbanti idāni anusāsento āha “neka”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:2691_5: Nekahetuṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāvānaṃ uppatyādo ālambaṇavibhāvādibahukāraṇavantaṃ manovuttivisesaṃ bhāvañca
anya-e0812n:2691_6: cittassa pavattivisesasaṅkhātabhāvañca vibhāvituṃ pakāsetuṃ vibhāvānubhāvā anantaraniddiṭṭhā bandhane
anya-e0812n:2691_7: rasabhāvappakāsane phuṭaṃ pakāsaṃ katvā vaṇṇiyā kavinā vaṇṇanīyā hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2691_12: vibhāvo ca anubhāvo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2695_1: Idāni te bhāvā lokasabhāvānatikkamena vibhāvādīhi vaṇṇanīyāti āha “savibhāve”ccādi.
anya-e0812n:2695_3: te ca te anubhāvā ca, tehi.
anya-e0812n:2695_4: Yathārahanti attano sambandhīnaṃ vasena yathārahaṃ vaṇṇanīyā.
anya-e0812n:2696_1: Idāni vibhāvānubhāve nissāya vaṇṇanīyā te bhāvā lokasabhāvamanatikkamma kātabbāti anusāsanto āha “savibhāvā”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:2696_2: Lokarūpānugāminā lokavohāramanuvattamānena te te bhāvā ṭhāyībhāvādayo tayo yathocityaṃ ocityānurūpaṃ
anya-e0812n:2696_3: savibhāvānubhāvehi vibhāvasahitehi anubhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi yathārahaṃ tehi tehi bhāvehi sambandhīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:2696_4: vibhāvādīnaṃ vasena anurūpato vaṇṇanīyā vaṇṇetabbā hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2696_6: te ca te anubhāvā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2700_4: tasmā mānasā manasi bhavā sāttikā aṅgato sarīrato bahinissaṭehi niggatehi sedādīhi anubhāvehi vaṇṇanīyā,
anya-e0812n:2701_1: Evaṃ sāmaññena bhāvavaṇṇanakkamaṃ dassetvā idāni visesena sāttikabhāvavaṇṇanā īdisāti dasseti “citta”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n:2701_2: Cittavuttivisesattā cittassa pavattivisesattā mānasā citte bhavā sāttikābhāvā aṅgato sarīrato bahinissaṭasedādianubhāvehi
anya-e0812n:2701_3: bahinikkhantasedādīhi anubhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi vaṇṇiyā vaṇṇanīyā hontīti,
anya-e0812n:2701_4: aṅgato bahi nissaṭanti visesanena visiṭṭhabhūtasedādīnameva bhāvānubhāvattaṃ vinā kevalaṃ sedādayo vuttā samānā bhāvādayo nāma na hontīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2701_6: sā eva viseso yesaṃ sāttikānamiti ca,
anya-e0812n:2701_10: nissaṭā niggatā ca te sedādayo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2706_1: Idāni “rasassādāya sādhūna”nti vuttattā rase niddisanto āha “sāmajjikāna”miccādi.
anya-e0812n:2706_4: tesaṃ sāmajjikānaṃ sabbhānaṃ manasi yo ānando,
anya-e0812n:2706_5: ayaṃ lokamadhurādiraso viya bandhe siṅgārādi raso nāma īrito taññūhi rasaññūhi.
anya-e0812n:2706_8: Yathā nānābyañjanasaṅkhatamannaṃ bhuñjamānā rase assādiyanti sumānasā purisā santosañcādhigacchanti,
anya-e0812n:2706_9: tathā nānābhinayabyañjite vācaṅgasatthopete ṭhāyībhāve assādenti sumānasāpekkhakā,
anya-e0812n:2707_1: Idāni “rasassādāya sādhūna”nti vatvā uddiṭṭhakkamena sampattaṃ rasaṃ dasseti “sāma”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n:2707_2: Bandhatthānusārinaṃ bandhassa atthānurūpasārīnaṃ buddhiyā pavattānaṃ sāmajjikānaṃ sabbhānaṃ citte bhavo yo ānando santoso atthi,
anya-e0812n:2707_3: ayaṃ loke madhurādiraso viya assādanīyo hotīti atthayuttena “rasīyatī”ti iminā vacanatthena raso nāmāti taññūhirasaññūhi īrito kathitoti.
anya-e0812n:2707_8: Yathā nānābyañjanehi abhisaṅkhatamāhāraṃ paribhuñjantā sattā lavaṇambilādayo te te rase assādeyyuṃ,
anya-e0812n:2707_10: evameva nānappakāraabhinayehi pakāsitavaṇṇanāya aṅgabhūtehi anurūpehi satthehi yutte ṭhāyībhāve issādirahitapaññavantā assādenti,
anya-e0812n:2707_11: tasmā ime ṭhāyībhāvā naṭābhinayehi byañjitattā ca sabbhānaṃ santosasaṅkhatarasassa hetuttā ca naṭarasātipi vuccanti.
anya-e0812n:2714_2: Ṭhāyeva soti so yathāvutto raso ṭhāyībhāvoyeva,
anya-e0812n:2715_2: So raso anantaraniddiṭṭho savibhāvānubhāvehi tesaṃ tesaṃ ṭhāyīnaṃ anurūpehi vibhāvasahitehi anubhāvehi ca,
anya-e0812n:2715_4: ānīyamāno kavino sāmatthiyā pāpuṇiyamāno ṭhāyeva ṭhāyībhāvo evāti kāriyopacārena raso nāmāti veditabboti.
anya-e0812n:2715_6: savibhāvā ca te anubhāvā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2719_2: Ṭhāyīnanukkamāti “ratihāsā ca soko cā”tiādinā vuttānaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā,
anya-e0812n:2720_1: Rasāvatthāsampattaratihāsādīnaṃ ṭhāyībhāvānaṃ idāni kamena nāmantaraṃ dasseti “siṅgāra”iccādinā.
anya-e0812n:2720_2: Ṭhāyīnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ ratihāsādiṭhāyībhāvānaṃ anukkamā paṭipāṭiyā siṅgārahassakaruṇā siṅgāro hasso
anya-e0812n:2720_3: karuṇā ca ruddavīrabhayānakā ruddo vīro bhayānako ca bībhacchabbhutasantā ca bibhaccho abbhuto santo
anya-e0812n:2720_6: Siṅgāro ca hasso ca karuṇā ceti ca viggaho.
anya-e0812n:2720_8: Ime siṅgārādīnaṃ ratyādīhi anaññattā upari ratyādivivaraṇeyeva ñātabbā.
anya-e0812n:2726_2: Vessantarassa puttadāraviyogā karuṇā sokarūpo dukkhameva ahosi,
anya-e0812n:2726_3: sampati pana sotūnaṃ sabbhānaṃ ānandoyevāti etthādhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2727_2: sokakodhādilakkhaṇo karuṇāruddādiko kathaṃ raso nāma bhaveyyāti āsaṅkāyamāha “dukkharūpe”iccādi.
anya-e0812n:2727_3: Ayaṃ ānando “sāmajjikānamānando”tiādinā niddiṭṭho dukkharūpe dukkhalakkhaṇe karuṇādike karuṇāruddādike visaye kathaṃ bhaveyyāti ce,
anya-e0812n:2727_4: nesa doso hi tatheva vessantarassa bodhisattassa soko puttadāravirahato jātasoko sotūnaṃ idāni suṇantānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2727_5: sabbhānaṃ ānando siyā ānandassa kāraṇattā kāriyopacārena santoso nāma bhaveyyāti.
anya-e0812n:2727_6: Vattuno sāmatthiyā karuṇārasādikaṃ pāpetvā pakāsiyamānassa sokādikassa dukkharūpena ṭhitattā suṇantānaṃ pīti uppādiyatevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2727_7: Dukkhaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassa karuṇādinoti ca,
anya-e0812n:2727_8: karuṇā ādi yassa ruddādinoti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2734_4: ādisaddena niddiṭṭhabhāsitamihitādiceti imesaṃ diṭṭhasutamutādīsu diṭṭhādimattamakatvā paññāya tena tenākārena
anya-e0812n:2734_5: punappunānubhavanena aññoññarattānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nimittānubyañjanasaṅkappavasenātirattānaṃ yuvānaṃ taruṇitthi
anya-e0812n:2734_6: purisānaṃ pamodo abhiramaṇavasena santoso pīti rati ruccate ruccanato “ratī”ti vuccatīti.
anya-e0812n:2734_8: Deso ca kalā ca kālo ca veso ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2740_2: Te yathāvuttā bhāvānubhāvā yutyā ālasiyauggatājigucchāvajjitā ye saṅkāussukkādayo bhāvā taṃbyañjakā tadanurūpā
anya-e0812n:2740_3: anubhāvā ca ayogādike siṅgāre yathā yathā yuñjanti,
anya-e0812n:2740_4: tādisiyāva yuttiyā nibandhā naṃ ratiṃ samposayanti,
anya-e0812n:2740_5: soyevamevaṃ posito siṅgāro nāma raso sampajjate.
anya-e0812n:2740_7: Tattha ayogo nāma pubbe asaṅgatānaṃ anurāgena saṅgamamicchantānaṃ itthipurisānamasaṅgamo.
anya-e0812n:2741_2: Te bhāvānubhāvā niddiṭṭhabyabhicārībhāvesu ratyānurūpabyabhicārībhāvo tappakāsako anubhāvo ceti ime dve
anya-e0812n:2741_3: yutyā hetubhūtāya ayogavippayogasambhogasaṅkhatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ siṅgārānaṃ anukūlatthena ratiyā viruddhattā
anya-e0812n:2741_4: ālasiyauggajigucchādike parivajjetvā saṅkāussukkādīnaṃ ratyānukūlabhāvānaṃ vasena yathāyogaṃ nibandhā
anya-e0812n:2741_5: kavīhi bandhā naṃ ratiṃ posayanti yathā tappakāsanena pūrenti sajjenti,
anya-e0812n:2741_6: evaṃ sajjito ratisiṅgāro nāma raso hoti.
anya-e0812n:2741_7: Sopi sāmaññena niddiṭṭhasiṅgārarasopi ayogavippayogasambhogānaṃ siṅgārānaṃ vasā bhedena tidhā bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n:2741_8: Tattha ayogo nāma pubbe aññamaññasaṅgamarahitānaṃ abhinavānurāgabalena saṅgamaṃ patthentānaṃ thīpumānaṃ asaṅgamo.
anya-e0812n:2741_9: Vippayogo nāma saṅgamātisayena viruḷhapemānaṃ thīpumānaṃ aññamaññavisileso.
anya-e0812n:2741_10: Sambhogo nāma balavakāmataṇhāvisesavasena yuttānaṃ kāminikāmukānaṃ aññamaññaṃ dassanādiassādo.
anya-e0812n:2741_12: ayogo ca vippayogo ca sambhogo ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2742_1: tapodhanānaṃ aññarasāvabodhane payojanābhāvepi lokiyesu tesu tesu vohāresu asammohatthaṃ siṅgārādinavavidharasānaṃ
anya-e0812n:2742_2: lakkhaṇamattasseva dassitattā tadanurūpalakkhiyapariggahe asati lakkhaṇāvabodhassa subyattābhāvato vuttalakkhaṇāvabodhatthaṃ
anya-e0812n:2742_3: taṃtaṃlakkhaṇakathanānantaraṃ tassa tassa lakkhiyassa mukhamattaṃ dassetabbaṃ hoti.
anya-e0812n:2742_4: Heṭṭhā “rāgānatabbhutasarojamukhaṃ dharāyā”tiādinā niddiṭṭhasambhogasiṅgārarasābhāseneva hasābhāsādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ rasābhāsarūpassa bhāvābhāsassa,
anya-e0812n:2742_6: anubhāvābhāsassa ca ñātabbattā siṅgārarasassa lakkhiyamevaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2747_0: Gītassarena hatthīnaṃ gītikāya piyattā gītikādhaninā upakaḍḍhiya attano samīpaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā nettarasmibandhaṃ
anya-e0812n:2747_1: nettasaṅkhātahatthācariyassa rajjunā bandhaṃ karaggahena hatthaggāhena soṇḍaggahaṇena vivasañca apagataicchācāraṃ
anya-e0812n:2747_2: paravasaṃ karaṃ iva hatthaṃ iva gītassarena attano līlopetagītikādhaninā upakaḍḍhiya attano samīpaṃ netvā
anya-e0812n:2747_3: nettarasmibandhaṃ attano nayanakantiyā paṭibandhaṃ karaggahena hatthaggāhena vivasañca apagatadhitiṃ
anya-e0812n:2747_4: mūḷhaṃ maṃ yā kantā tādisepi dukkare viniyojayi,
anya-e0812n:2747_5: sā irandatī irandatī nāma nāgamānavikā mayā ajja vidhinā bhāgyena adhigatā laddhāti.
anya-e0812n:2748_0: Ettha gītassaranettarasmikaraggahasaṅkhatāhi imāhi padāvalīhi uddīpanavibhāvo dassito.
anya-e0812n:2748_2: purisassa thī ca ālambaṇaṃ hotīti “sā irandatī mayā”ti iminā ārammaṇavibhāvo dassito.
anya-e0812n:2748_3: “Upakaḍḍhiya bandhaṃ vivasa”nti imehi kāmena uddīpitaṭhāyībhāvasaṅkhatā rati dassitā.
anya-e0812n:2748_4: “Tādisepi dukkare viniyojayī”ti imehi ussāhādikā ca “vidhinā adhigatā mayajjā”ti imehi harisādikā ca byabhicārībhāvā dassitā.
anya-e0812n:2748_5: Ratiyā viruddhe nibbedaālasiyauggatajigucchādike byabhicārībhāve vajjetvā vuttappakāravibhāvādike pakāsanto
anya-e0812n:2748_6: “gītassarene”ccādikā ratippatītiyā anurūpaṃ payuttā kavippayogā idha anubhāvā nāma honti.
anya-e0812n:2748_8: Rammadesarammakālarammavesādayo tadabhāve ratiyā anuppajjanato sāmatthiyā gamyā bhavantīti evaṃ lakkhaṇānugatalakkhiyapariggāho sabbattha kātabbo.
anya-e0812n:2748_9: Evaṃ satibandhatthāvabodhakānaṃ sabbhānaṃ uppajjamānāyapītiyā kāraṇattā kāriyopacārena eso bandho raso nāma hotīti.
anya-e0812n:2757_5: sopi attano sambandhī vā atha parassa sambandhī vā,
anya-e0812n:2757_8: Yo pana vibhāvadassanā uppannāpi purisassa gambhīrattādinā chādito samāno purisantare hasatyābhibyatto,
anya-e0812n:2757_12: Paripose sati hasso nāma raso siyā.
anya-e0812n:2757_13: So hasso bhiyyo itthipabhutīnaṃ siyāti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:2758_3: naccagītaādikehi ca duvidhehi ākatisaṅkhatehi hetubhūtehi attano vā atha parassa vā sambandhī so hāso
anya-e0812n:2758_5: sutasambandhena teheva niddāsamālasyamucchāsaṅkhatabyabhicārīhi karaṇabhūtehi paripose sati hasso hasso
anya-e0812n:2758_9: Vikārā ca sā ākati ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2758_11: niddā ca samo ca ālasyañca mucchā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2758_12: te ādi yesaṃ akkhiphandanādīnaṃ anubhāvānanti ca,
anya-e0812n:2758_14: itthī pabhuti yesaṃ nīcapakatīnanti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2770_2: Iha hasse vikāsīni nayanāni yassa taṃ sitaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2770_3: kiñci ālakkhiyā dijā dantā yassa taṃ hasitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2770_4: Evaṃ madhuro saro saddo yassa taṃ vihasitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2770_6: saha jalena assunā vattamānāni akkhīni yassa taṃ apahasitaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2770_7: Vikkhittāni ito tato pasāritāni aṅgāni yassa taṃ atihasitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:2770_8: Esañca sitādīnaṃ majjhe dve dve hassā ādito paṭṭhāya kamaso yathākkamena jeṭṭhe majjhe adhamepi ca kathitāti sambandho.
anya-e0812n:2771_2: Iha imasmiṃ hassavisaye vikāsinayanaṃ vivaṭanayanaṃ sitaṃ nāma.
anya-e0812n:2771_8: Vikkhittaṅgaṃ aṭṭhāne pasāraṇavasena vikkhittahatthapādādiavayavavantaṃ atihasitaṃ nāma bhavati.
anya-e0812n:2771_9: Esaṃ channaṃ kamaso kamena dve dve jeṭṭhe majjhe adhamepi visaye kathitā purātanehi bhāsitāti.
anya-e0812n:2771_11: kiñci īsakaṃ ālakkhiyā dijā yasseti ca,
anya-e0812n:2771_16: saha jalena vattamānāni akkhīni yasseti ca,
anya-e0812n:2771_22: Evaṃ sitādayo anurūpavibhāvādinā payuttā ime rasā’vatthaṃ pāpuṇantīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0812n:2777_0: Yo purā pubbe dhamme tassa dhammakathane pasanno kaṇṭhamaṇinā api attano anagghakaṇṭhamaṇināpi taṃ pūjesi,
anya-e0812n:2777_1: so nāgarājā sabhāvaṃ attano adhippāyaṃ gopentiyā api thiyā vacanena itthiyā vacanena asamadhuraṃ tulyarahitaṃ
anya-e0812n:2777_2: vidhuraṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ hantuṃ vināsanatthaṃ pharuse caṇḍe mayi bhattiṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0812n:2777_3: Iha ekasmiṃyeva vatthuni nāgarājassa pasādavadhavidhānādiviparītappavatti ālambaṇavibhāvo,
anya-e0812n:2777_4: paṭhamaṃ anagghapiyavatthūhi pūjitabhāvo ca bodhisattassa atulyabhāvo ca itthivacanassa sampaṭicchanabhāvo
anya-e0812n:2777_5: ca tassādhippāyassa aññātabhāvo ca puṇṇakassa caṇḍabhāvo ceti imehi sabbavacanehi uddīpanavibhāvo dassito.
anya-e0812n:2777_6: Imehi uddīpitaṭhāyībhāvasaṅkhato hāso vākyasāmatthiyā pakāsito hāsavirodhinibbedādivajjitā samālasiyasantosaassuvepathādikā
anya-e0812n:2777_7: byabhicārībhāvā sāttikābhāvā ca evaṃ sāmatthiyena dīpitā.
anya-e0812n:2777_9: Hassabhedena majjhime purise vattabbāpi hasitaupahasitā dve imā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0812n:2786_2: Aniṭṭhassa puttaviyogādino desanikkaḍḍhanādino patti ca iṭṭhassa dhammassa,
anya-e0812n:2786_3: dhanādino vā nāso ca tato vibhāvabhūtehi sampanno sokarūpo sokasabhāvo tu karuṇo raso nāma.
anya-e0812n:2787_3: desacāgādino vā aniṭṭhassa uppatti ca sīlādino,
anya-e0812n:2787_4: dhanādino vā iṭṭhassa kantivatthuno vināso cāti imehi ālambaṇavibhāvehi karaṇabhūtehi uppanno sokarūpo
anya-e0812n:2787_5: tu sokasabhāvo pana karuṇo karuṇāraso nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:2787_6: Tattha karuṇārase ruditapalayatthambhakādayo rudito palayo thambhotiādayo anubhāvā nāma bhavantīti.
anya-e0812n:2787_9: Iha puttaviyogādianiṭṭhappattiyā ca sīladhammādiiṭṭhanāsanena ca uttamānaṃ soko uppajjati,
anya-e0812n:2787_11: Aññesaṃ dhanādivināsanena pana mahākaruṇikattā uttamasseva uppajjati.
anya-e0812n:2787_12: Tasmiṃ visaye so soko sesānaṃ nuppajjati.
anya-e0812n:2787_18: ruditañca palayo ca thambhako ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2787_20: visādo ca ālasyañca maraṇañca cintā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2792_0: Yo ekasatarājapurakkhato rājūnaṃ ekasatena parivārito jino iva buddho iva dhammena madhuradhammakathanena āsanaṃ dhammāsanaṃ alaṃkurute sajjeti,
anya-e0812n:2792_1: lokatilako lokassa piyatāya tilakālaṅkārabhūto so vidhurapaṇḍito yakkhena puṇṇakena ākaḍḍhito hutvā nīto assavālaṃ avalambiya idāni eko kiṃ kuruteti.
anya-e0812n:2792_4: uddīpitasokasaṅkhātaṭhāyībhāvo ca visādālasyacintādiko byabhicārībhāvo ca ruditapalayathambhakādikā vibhāvādibodhakaanubhāvā
anya-e0812n:2797_2: Ettha paṭhamena ādisaddena avikkhepaupahāsādayo vibhāvā gahitā,
anya-e0812n:2798_2: Kodho macchariyādīhi macchariyaavikkhepaupahāsādīhi ālambaṇādīhi vibhāvehi ca hetubhūtehi tāsamadādīhi
anya-e0812n:2798_3: tāsamadauggatasambhamādīhi byabhicārībhāvehi ca nayanāruṇatādīhi nettarattasubhaṅgaoṭṭhapīḷanādīhi anubhāvehi
anya-e0812n:2798_4: ca karaṇabhūtehi pose sati ruddo nāma raso bhaveti.
anya-e0812n:2798_8: nayanāni ca tāni aruṇāni cāti ca,
anya-e0812n:2804_0: Bho manussabhakkhena yakkhena adhigatosi gahito asi,
anya-e0812n:2804_1: assassa vālamavalamba vāladhiṃ gahetvā idāneva puraṃ avekkha tuyhaṃ nagaraṃ olokehi,
anya-e0812n:2804_2: tatheva hi verambhavātamukhacuṇṇitasabbagatto verambhavātassa abhimukhicuṇṇitasakalasarīro macco manusso jīvalokaṃ sattalokaṃ punapi kathaṃ passatīti.
anya-e0812n:2804_3: Iha macchariyādivibhāvā ca kodhādisaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo ca vākyasāmatthiyā dīpitā honti,
anya-e0812n:2810_4: te ādayo yesaṃ balāvikkhepādīnaṃ paṭipuggalagatānaṃ vibhāvānaṃ,
anya-e0812n:2810_5: tehi jāto ussāho rasattamāpanno vīro rasoti saññito,
anya-e0812n:2810_6: ayaṃ vīro raṇadānadayāyogā tividho bhave yuddhavīro dānavīro dayāvīroti,
anya-e0812n:2810_7: te yuddhakaraṇādayo eva tattha anubhāvā bhavanti.
anya-e0812n:2811_4: tesameva paramaṇḍalakkamanasaṅkhātavikkamo phalabhedo cetiādīhi uppanno ussāho vīroti vīrarasoti saññito kavīhi ñāto,
anya-e0812n:2811_5: ayaṃ vīraraso raṇadānadayāyogā yuddhacāgakaruṇāyogena hetubhūtena tividho bhave.
anya-e0812n:2811_6: Te eva raṇadānadayā eva imā anubhāvā nāma honti.
anya-e0812n:2811_11: raṇo ca dānañca dayā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2821_0: Kuveraṃ vessavaṇamahārājaṃ viññāpetvā bodhetvā sumahatimapi kumbhaṇḍasenaṃ atimahantiṃ kumbhaṇḍasenaṃ
anya-e0812n:2821_1: ekova uttāsetvā bhayaṃ janetvā maṇiratanavaraṃ gahetvā jūte akkhakīḷāyaṃ lakkhaṃ ādhāya ṭhapetvā korabyarājaṃ
anya-e0812n:2821_2: jetvā raññaṃ satamhā rājasambandhinā satena sacivaratanaṃ amaccaratanaṃ uddhacca uddharitvā etthānetvā
anya-e0812n:2821_4: ettha yathāvuttesu mama ko bhāro atthīti.
anya-e0812n:2821_5: Ettha “ko mametthatthi bhāro”ti iminā ussāhasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo pakāsito.
anya-e0812n:2821_9: “raññaṃ satamhā sacivaratanamuddhaccā”ti ca imehi dhitiuggatagabbādayo ca,
anya-e0812n:2821_12: “etthānetvā iccādayo”ti ca imehi matyādayo ca byabhicārino bhāvā vibhāvitā honti.
anya-e0812n:2828_2: Vikāri asabhāvappavatto viruddho sano saddo satto ca,
anya-e0812n:2828_7: kittimassa vā ukkaṃso bhayānako nāma raso.
anya-e0812n:2829_3: rakkhasādisattehi vā vibhāvehi hetubhūtehi sañjāto sābhāviko,
anya-e0812n:2829_4: kittimo vā bhayapaṭibandho ukkaṃso bhayānakaraso nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:2829_5: Ettha bhayānakarasavisaye sedādayo dāhasarīrakampanādayo anubhāvā kāyikavācasikappayogasaṅkhatā anubhāvā honti.
anya-e0812n:2829_6: Tāsādī byabhicārino tāsasaṅkādayo iha byabhicārībhāvā hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2829_9: vikārino ca te sanasattā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2829_15: tāso ādi yesaṃ saṅkādīnamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2835_0: Diṭṭhisatthapatanena diṭṭhisallasampātanena paripphurantī kampamānā samantā parisamantato ācakkavāḷanagaṃ
anya-e0812n:2835_1: cakkavāḷapabbatāvadhi gamitā palāpitā kumbhaṇḍarakkhasacamū kumbhaṇḍarakkhasānaṃ senā yaṃ assagataṃ assapiṭṭhe
anya-e0812n:2835_2: nisinnakaṃ bhoto bhavataṃ tumhākaṃ purī iva puriyā dassanamiva muhuṃ muhuṃ apassi khaṇe khaṇe apassittha,
anya-e0812n:2835_4: Ettha “diṭṭhisatthapatanenā”ti diṭṭhisatthāropanena ca “sa puṇṇako aha”nti iminā ca bhayajananassa hetubhūtaviruddhasattasaṅkhātā vibhāvā niddiṭṭhā,
anya-e0812n:2835_6: “kumbhaṇḍarakkhasacamū gamitā samantā ācakkavāḷanaga”nti tāsasaṅkādikā byabhicārino bhāvā jotitā.
anya-e0812n:2844_2: Rudhirantādīhi pūtikimiādīhi virāgato ca jātā jigucchā garahā kamena khobhano ubbegī karuṇāyuto ca bībhaccho bhavati,
anya-e0812n:2844_4: saṅkāvegādīhi byabhicārīhi ca assa posanaṃ bhavatīti.
anya-e0812n:2845_4: virāgato virattabhāvena cāti imehi tīhi vibhāvehi hetubhūtehi uppajjamānā jigucchā kamena rudhirādīnaṃ
anya-e0812n:2845_5: tiṇṇaṃ vibhāvānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā khobhano anavaṭṭhāno asamāhito ubbegī ubbegavā karuṇāyuto sokarūpena sahito
anya-e0812n:2845_6: cāti evaṃ bībhaccho raso nāma hoti.
anya-e0812n:2845_7: Nāsāvikunanādīhi nāsasaṅkocanamukhapidahanādīhi anubhāvehi ca saṅkādīhi ca saṅkāāvegādīhi byabhicārībhāvehi
anya-e0812n:2845_8: ca karaṇabhūtehi assa bībhaccharasassa posanaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0812n:2845_10: khobhanādīsu tīsu ca gamyamānattā avuttopi casaddo yojetabbo,
anya-e0812n:2845_11: tasmā khobhanādīhi tīhi yuttova bībhaccharaso nāmāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0812n:2845_18: saṅkā ādi yesaṃ āvegādīnamiti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2851_0: Puṇṇakena yakkhena nimmitā maccakaraṅkakaṅkanadharā manussaṭṭhisaṅkhātakarabhūsanadhārino uttaṃsīkatapāṇipallavadharā
anya-e0812n:2851_2: lohitakuṅkumehi rudhirasaṅkhātakuṅkumakakkehi littā sīsakapālapātihi sīsakapālasaṅkhātehi sarāvehi vasāmajjaṃ
anya-e0812n:2851_3: vasāsaṅkhātasuraṃ pure abhimukhe pivantā ye yakkhā siyuṃ,
anya-e0812n:2851_4: ete yakkhā vidhurena paṇḍitena dhuttā viya nagare surādhuttā viya upekkhitā hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2851_5: Iha “littā lohitakuṅkumehī”ti ca “uttaṃsīkatapāṇipallavadharā”ti ca “hārīkatantoragā”ti ca imehi cittakkhobhakāraṇabhūto rudhirādivibhāvo ca,
anya-e0812n:2851_6: “maccakaraṅkakaṅkanaro”ti ca “sīsakapālapātihi vasāmajjaṃ pivantā”ti ca imehi ubbegavantasabhāvassa hetubhūto pūtyādivibhāvo ca pakāsito.
anya-e0812n:2851_7: Karuṇāyutasabhāvassa kāraṇabhūtavirajjanavibhāvo ca nāsāvikunanādianubhāvo ca saṅkāvegādibyabhicārībhāvo
anya-e0812n:2851_8: ca bībhacchasaṅkhātaṭhāyībhāvo cāti ime sabbe vākyasāmatthiyena gammāti veditabbā.
anya-e0812n:2860_2: Atilokehi lokātivuttīhi māyādibbagehārāmādīhi padatthehi jāto ayaṃ vimhayo cittavikārasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo abbhuto raso nāma.
anya-e0812n:2861_3: uppajjamāno ayaṃ vimhayo cittabyāpanasaṅkhāto ṭhāyībhāvo abbhuto raso abbhutaraso nāma bhave,
anya-e0812n:2861_5: tāsāvegadhitippaññā ettha abbhutarasavisaye byabhicārino bhāvā hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2861_7: te ca te padatthā ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2861_9: sedo ca assu ca sādhuvādo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2861_11: tāso ca āvego ca dhiti ca paññā ceti ca vākyaṃ.
anya-e0812n:2867_0: So vidhurapaṇḍito puṇṇakena yakkhena naṭena iva anekavikāradassanakena nāṭakena viya āhaṭanekabhiṃsanesu
anya-e0812n:2867_1: bhayattamānītānekavidhabhiṃsanesu vattamānesu suniccalo tena puṇṇakena acalā saṭṭhiyojanubbedhakāḷāgiripabbatamatthakato
anya-e0812n:2867_2: nipātito avaṃsiropataṃ adhosīsaṃ patanto asantasaṃ evaṃ appatiṭṭhepi anuttasanto taṃ pabbataṃ diṭṭhiyaṭṭhiyā
anya-e0812n:2867_5: Ettha bhayahetumhi sati bhītiyā ca tattha parijānanābhāvassa ca lokasabhāvattā tamatikkamma bhayakaraṇe
anya-e0812n:2867_6: asantāsassa ca diṭṭhiyā pabbataminanassa ca pavattabhāvakathanena lokātikkantapadatthasaṅkhāto vibhāvo
anya-e0812n:2867_9: tassa sāmatthiyena ca sādhuvādasedaassuādayo anubhāvā vibhāvitā.
anya-e0812n:2881_2: Mettādayāmodādisambhavo mettākaruṇāpītiādivibhāvehi sambhūto samo kāyacittopasamo ṭhāyībhāvo nāma hoti,
anya-e0812n:2881_4: apica tassa samassa anurūpehi byabhicārībhāvānubhāvehi tadukkaṃso tassa ṭhāyībhāvassa ukkaṃsayutto santanisevito
anya-e0812n:2881_5: sādhūhi sevito santo santaraso nāma hotīti.
anya-e0812n:2881_6: Mettā ca dayā ca modo ceti ca,
anya-e0812n:2887_0: Kesarikarīsu sīhahatthīsu entesu api bhiṃsanākārena samīpamāgacchantesupi nāge veṭhayantepi nāgesu sarīraṃ veṭhayantesupi.
anya-e0812n:2887_2: veḷugumbaṃ madagaje viya vicālayati madagaḷitahatthimhi cālente iva yakkhe puṇṇake nagaṃ kāḷāgiripabbataṃ
anya-e0812n:2887_3: vicālayatipi anekappakāre cālentepi vidhuro paṇḍito santiṃ gatova nibbānaṃ ālambaṇakaraṇavasena sampatto
anya-e0812n:2887_4: viya phalasamāpattisamāpanno iva atha vā diṭṭhadhammanibbānasaṅkhatanirodhasamāpattisamāpanno viya īsakampi
anya-e0812n:2887_5: appakampi madhurā bhāvā api madhurasabhāvatopi no cali,
anya-e0812n:2887_7: Ettha dhāvanarodanakampanādīnaṃ karaṇabhūtaṃ sīhādīnamāgamanaṃ nāgaveṭhanaṃ pabbatakampanantiādīsu vattamānesupi
anya-e0812n:2887_8: nibbikārattena santiṃ gatoti iminā santarasassa pakatibhūte uddese dassito navamo ṭhāyībhāvo dassito hoti,
anya-e0812n:2887_9: etassa uppattiuddīpanānaṃ kāraṇabhūtā mettādayāmodādivibhāvā sāmatthiyā dassitā hontīti.
anya-e0812n:2887_10: Dhitimatisatiādayo tadanurūpabyabhicārībhāvā ca tādisānubhāvā ca “entesu veṭhayante vicālayatī”ti iminā,
